story:
All what we have learnt in the last year has gone into producing the NEW SUMPOD ALUMINIUM 3D Printer range.

 

SUMPOD ALUMINIUM is the next generation of SUMPOD 3D Printer. It replaces the MDF of the original SUMPOD with an extruded aluminium frame and painted aluminium sides.

 

Also it will  now use the newly developed simple hotend and feeder.

 

Both SUMPODs will come with a PCB heated bed.

 

The estimated delivery time is 4-6 weeks after the end of the campaign.

 

 

Specifications

The SMALL machine will have a build area of 120x120x100, with the large having a build area of 250x250x150. Both machines will have a positional accuracy of 0.01mm.


WHY IndieGoGo

 

The aim of this campaign is to offer a professional fully assembled 3D Printer at less than the average cost of a hobby Kit.

The aim is to reach the goal which will enable further investment in the Professional 3D Printer for all dream.

If the goal isn't met all orders will still be filled. The goal enables bulk buying.

 

This is a great opportunity to get a SUMPOD ALUMINIUM at an introductory price.

 

 

Postage Costs

These will be charged separately at time of shipping.

 

 

Pickup:                   Free

UK:                         £29

Europe:                  £39

US and Canada:    £59

R.O.W                    £89
story_txt:
All what we have learnt in the last year has gone into producing the NEW SUMPOD ALUMINIUM 3D Printer range.
 
SUMPOD ALUMINIUM is the next generation of SUMPOD 3D Printer. It replaces the MDF of the original SUMPOD with an extruded aluminium frame and painted aluminium sides.
 
Also it will  now use the newly developed simple hotend and feeder.
 
Both SUMPODs will come with a PCB heated bed.
 
The estimated delivery time is 4-6 weeks after the end of the campaign.
 
 
Specifications
The SMALL machine will have a build area of 120x120x100, with the large having a build area of 250x250x150. Both machines will have a positional accuracy of 0.01mm.
WHY IndieGoGo
 
The aim of this campaign is to offer a professional fully assembled 3D Printer at less than the average cost of a hobby Kit.
The aim is to reach the goal which will enable further investment in the Professional 3D Printer for all dream.
If the goal isn't met all orders will still be filled. The goal enables bulk buying.
 
This is a great opportunity to get a SUMPOD ALUMINIUM at an introductory price.
 
 
Postage Costs
These will be charged separately at time of shipping.
 
 
Pickup:                   Free
UK:                         £29
Europe:                  £39
US and Canada:    £59
R.O.W                    £89

story:
To our supporters and email followers:

It’s time for an update, and what an update we have for you this time. Obviously our fundraising goal here on Indiegogo was not met; but we still have three pieces of big exciting news to share with you, and our supporters will still receive rewards (more on that in a minute).

1
Our team, particularly Mark and Josh, have worked really hard on making media contacts and getting intelliPaper out there. Their hard work has been successful—we’ve had dozens of articles in outlets like Discovery.com (the Discovery Channel’s website), Ubergizmo.com, TheNextWeb.com and a bunch more.

We’ve also made contact with specific reporters and shipped sample packs to Mashable.com, the Wall Street Journal, Forbes.com, ABC news, and USA Today. We were able to make contact with people there because of the media exposure we’ve had so far. So thanks, reporters! And a big public thank-you to Mark and Josh. Joan, our executive assistant and bookkeeper, hardly has time to figure out whether she’s coming or going because the phone is ringing off the hook these days.

2
Not only has our media exposure started to reach critical mass, but we’re in the middle of another big developments too! We recently inked an agreement with a U.S. distributor. That takes some of the logistical work off of Andrew so he can focus more on developing cool new intelliPaper products. If you're in the promotional space, you'll want to visit the intelliPaper store online and get in touch with one of our awesome sales reps.

3
Notwithstanding the fact we did not meet our funding goal, we are still planning to release consumer-oriented product (DataNotes™) mid next year. We’re pretty excited about where we are going and about the awesome feedback we got from the public as part of this project.

Your Rewards!
We noticed that by far most of the interest people have expressed in intelliPaper products has been centered on DataNotes™, not on the greeting cards as we’d originally thought would be the case. Hindsight is 20/20, but current data is even better. Given our new strategic direction and its financial demands, we need to substitute DataNotes™ for the greeting card rewards.

We think you’ll be pretty excited about what you can do with DataNotes™. Once you receive them, don’t forget to write us and let us know what you think about them. At this point we plan on maintaining the delivery schedule as explained in the project. Your feedback is really important. Seriously. Important. So thanks in advance for letting us know how things go.

If you ordered greeting cards, and don't want DataNotes™ instead, we'll gladly refund your contribution. Just let us know. We will be contacting each contributor individually after the holidays so stay tuned.

 

Paper USB - A New Frontier

intelliPaper® opens doors that have never been open before. Our patented process embeds a small silicon chip inside ordinary paper and turns it into a USB drive. These drives are inexpensive and environmentally friendly. intelliPaper USB drives are transforming printed materials.

Our patented technology uses a small silicon chip

 

All the functions of a standard USB drive -- in paper

 

The Perks

We are offering three exciting applications of this paper USB technology:

  • Greeting Cards

  • Disposable USB Drives

  • Blank USB Paper

 

Perk #1: Greeting Cards

A greeting card with a built-in removable USB drive. It looks like a standard greeting card, but you can add your own digital media files.

 

Customizable

The USB portion of each card will include an original, multimedia e-card-like experience. You will be able to customize this with your design, plus add your own pictures and multimedia content.

 

User-Designed

Each card's design with be finalized with input from our supporters. We want to make sure these are cards people will love.

 

Higher Funding = More Card Options

The number of greeting card options available for supporters will depend on the final funding level of the project. At each milestone we’ll add two more card options to choose from.

 

 At each milestone, we’ll add two more options

  

Wireless Greeting Card Option

You can receive wireless-enabled greeting cards for just $25 more per box. These wireless cards will work with any near field-enabled device (many smart phones and tablet computers have this function built in).

Use wirelessly with any near field-enabled device

 

Special Rush Valentine’s Cards

Order the Valentine’s Day perk to receive two intelliPaper® Valentine’s cards by February 14! You’ll also be able to get any other box of nine cards at the standard delivery date.

Valentine’s perk will arrive in time for the big day! 

 

Perk #2: Disposable USB Drives (aka DataNotes™)

DataNotes™ are the sticky notes of the future. Write on it, staple it to a document, hole-punch it, or hand it off to someone, without worrying about the cost. This 3x3 card is great for sharing!

DataNotes™ are the sticky notes of the future!

 

Perk #3: Blank USB Paper

This is for the creative genius in you. Cut it, fold it, color it, print it…  Want to make your own business cards? Wedding invitations? Recipe cards? Photo cards? Indulge your imagination. These are 3x5 blank cards (except for the instructions near the USB contacts in the corner). Comes with custom labels that can be used with any inkjet or laser printer.

Be creative! Cut it, fold it, color it, print it… 

 

Looks Like Regular Paper

No bumps or lumps here. intelliPaper® looks and feels like regular paper. Proprietary intelliPaper cardstock is half a millimeter thick (like 146-lb. cover stock).

No bumps or lumps...looks & feels like regular paper

 

Where We Stand Now

intelliPaper® currently burns customer-directed information onto business products as part of manufacturing, and ships them to marketing customers in large quantities only. Indiegogo support will help us bring this same technology to average people for personal use at a low cost—technology that has never been available on a small scale before.

USB drive strip at edge of paper, with instructions

 

Standard reader/writer device used to add content

 

Tough Questions We've Been Asked

We’ve been asked a lot of good questions over the past five years. Many of these have helped fine-tune and sharpen our vision for this exciting technology. You can see some of these questions and our answers here.

 

Perks at a Glance

 

We Need Your Support

We are excited about this project. We believe intelliPaper® will transform the face of print materials in the coming years. Hundreds of industries will be enhanced as digital and printed media can be joined together with our patented technology. Get in on the ground floor today. Thank you for your support!

story:
10 things we hate about streaming music.........

1)Bad quality tunes. When we stream from our phone or computer we lose quality. We want the ability to play (high quality) at the highest bit rate

2)Dead batteries. Let's face it, most of us stream from our phones and it really sucks the juice.

3)Drop outs due to calls. Just cos' I'm on the phone doesn't mean my tunes are on hold!

4)Bluetooth connections. Let's face it, Bluetooth is 'AM' compared to WiFi ;-). I've walked behind a wall so I lose my connection? Huh? I'm trying to stream via Bluetooth at a party but it drops out sue to too many signals? Huh?

5)Lack of control. We want to be able to use our phone or computer but we don't want to HAVE to use them. And we certaqinly don't want them to be the powerhouse. How about being able to control our speakers .... from our speakers!

6)Flexibility. We want multiple USB's, Flash Drive storage, DLNA and Airplay compatible so that we can access our computers' music library remotely, HDMI to turn our dumb TV smart or add a projector, 2 AUX's, SD card. In short we want to be able to play any music, any way.

7)Save our phone data. Streaming really sucks the data and we've all forgotten to switch to home WiFi.

8)Being dictated to. We want open source software and we want to be able to browse the web, not be told what app we can play!

9)Boring. How long has it been since something really nailed it as a streaming solution? Let's face it, the current options don't work! The GUNN StreamTower is exciting in design, concept and looks, a joy to show your friends and fun to use.

10)No complicated software. Simply plug and play. Download the remote app from the App store and you are in business.

Never Fear! GUNN is Here.....

We began building the SX series out of frustration. Why weren't the other manufacturers getting it right? It was so obvious that their solutions don't work.

So we started with outcomes and worked backwards. And the answer is quite simple. Take an awesome new cabinet design and make sure it broadcasts truly world class sound quality. Add Android and WiFi. Come up with an ingenious remote app that's  never been done before...... and you've got yourself a StreamTower!

(It's a bit harder than that :-)

GUNN SX speakers have built-in WiFi and a touch-screen. Simply connect them wirelessly to your home router and stream your music from your favourite app or site.


The way it should be:

Style over function? Function over style? Sound quality above all? Many a head has been scratched over these weighty questions. Fortunately the GUNN SX smart speakers deliver. The best quality sound is broadcast from wooden cabinets. A pair of 100k speakers will be made from wood. It's dense yet porus to deliver thick, rich sound at low volumes and quality tunes at high volume due to the weight of the housing. 


The sound quality is on par with MUCH more expensive systems from the engineered, hand made wooden cabinets.

We believe in powered speakers so our amplifier is hidden away in the subwoofer and the clever touch screen recesses into the speaker housing on a specially designed bracket. So all you see is speakers; beautiful speakers. No trekky, techy knobs and flashing lights. Just sleek, streamlined audio heaven. The way it should be.

Connectivity – check!
Looks – check!
Concept – awesome!
But what do they sound like and how do they perform?

At GUNN Audio we've never been about small sound systems. We believe that the best sound is broadcast from well designed, heavy, quality built wooden housing. All GUNN systems are hand-made from wood and designed for maximum impact and sound quality. 

We also believe that multiple black boxes cluttering up our rooms is a thing of the past. Our speakers are powered, meaning that all you see (and communicate with) is the speakers themselves. No external amps, tuners, docks ... anything! 

The Speakers:

We decided to spend our time looking for existing speaker manufacturers to team up with rather than recreate the wheel. GUNN had agents all over the world looking for the best quality, best sounding speakers, for the best price. This took over 6 months and countless train trips, countless samples, countless rejections of those samples and countless sleepless nights. We found many bad speakers, we found a few good ones, but we wanted great, incredible, unbelievable. We wanted passion from our factory. A passion for sound. A passion for striving to be better and to offer more.

Eventually we found them! 

The GUNN SX smart speakers produce a sound quality on par with much, MUCH more expensive systems. In short, they sound bloody amazing.

Our high-end speaker manufacturer has been in the game for years. We set out to design the amazing StreamTower together. The GUNN operating system has been built into their existing speaker designs for the rest of the range, which has saved us a lot of time and money. We are passing these savings on to you.

The Technology:

Our engineers designed the GUNN system to be the best in the world. Our team has worked on some of the biggest projects for THE biggest companies. We are talking world leaders here. And they have built the best music streaming system available in the GUNN SX series. Our Android system and user interface to brings you an intuitive, reliable and beautiful operating system. 

So you can rest assured the GUNN SX range are excellent quality, ultra reliable speakers. The speaker drivers and cabinets have been tested and improved over time and the operating system is world class.

We're not into comparisons.

So we'll just tell you that we believe that this is the best value, most functional streaming solution available. Full stop.

The GUNN remote app:

This enables the user to control the speakers from any iOS and Apple device. Users can see and control the entire StreamTower system including the music stored in the Flash drive or via the USB port and any other dvics connected through the local WiFi. The user is seeing and controlling the StreamTower screen therefore system through a series of images bradcasting many times a second to the screen of the device.



And you can play any music you like, from any online source you like. Other WiFi speaker solutions only let you play what they want you to play, through their app.

Ummm, no thanks. Who wants to be dictated to when it comes to tunes? 

With the GUNN SX speakers you can browse the web via the touch screen and play any site you like.

Picture this ...

You've just come home from a long day in front of the computer. You want to put some music on and chill. The last thing you want to do is turn on another computer. But you are a streamer! With any other wireless option you need to turn on the computer, wait for it to load and then use that to control your sound system.

So you have to wait five minutes to control the speakers that are right in front of you?

Ummm, no thanks. Playing music shouldn't be this hard. That's why we use our phone for streaming most of the time.

What about my phone, you ask?

All you want to do is to play some music and cook dinner? You just need to connect your phone to your speakers, right? Forget docking, that ties up my phone. I'll use Bluetooth. Waiting for connectivity (twiddling thumbs). Okay connected!

Hold on, it's out of battery! Plug it in to charge. You might as well leave it plugged in as playing a wireless signal really sucks the juice.

The phone rings. Music drops out. Bummer, you didn't need the music to stop.

Hang up. Music starts.

But you need to go to the store downstairs for some milk. You'd better take your phone as you're expecting a call... so it disconnects from the speakers. Music stops. When you come back upstairs you'll have to connect it again. Great!

Your flatmate comes home. You are leaving, so you'll need to disconnect your phone before they can connect theirs.

It's then that you realise: you've been chewing up your phone data because you didn't connect to your home WiFi! Great again, now you're going to be charged excess on your phone plan.

Grrrr.

Having a party?:

Who wants to risk having a valuable laptop having a drink spilt on it. And do you want to spend all night worrying about where your phone is, or connecting/disconnecting between your friends?


So while it seems like a handy, streamlined approach, truth is external devices can be a pain. Try this ...

You come home from a long day and touch the screen of your awesome looking GUNN SX-4 Manta sound system. It lights up. It loves you! You love it back. Your friend is drawn to this awesome looking piece of art. This is surely the latest and greatest thing in audio!

Glistening like shiny, appy stars are Spotify, Pandora, Rdio and every other app in the galaxy. Excited and wanting to play, you touch your choice. Music begins playing immediately. 

Using the seven inch touch screen, you type in "RUN DMC". A good day for old skool! Their entire catalogue appears in 1024 x 600 goodness. Select Greatest Hits 1998. It's not tricky to rock around!

Your computer is off, your phone isn't being drained, you can take calls, pop to the shops and the GUNN SX-4 Manta smart speaker continues playing like a true legend, a faithful companion, a knowing ally.

A flick of the screen and the Flash eMMC storage appears with your fave collection. You've downloaded your songs directly into the speakers.

Oh, and the GUNN SX series can play your existing collection from your current devices via DLNA or Bluetooth. Or you could just transfer it into the Flash Drive.

Plus you can use your phone, computer or tablet to control them with the GUNN remote app.



The Perk:

There are five models in the SX range. We have chosen the SX-3 StreamTower for your perk because it's our favourite. You could wait for the other models to come out, but then you wouldn't be the first on the block to own one :-)

There are very few risks involved with the speakers themselves. These have been heavily tested in the market. The speakers and surrounding hardware are excellent.

The Android system is quite straightforward and any updates to the GUNN software will be a simple upgrade.

The beauty of the GUNN SX smart speaker project is that this is not untrialled, brand new technology. All components are existing and extensively tested. We have incredibly tight Quality Control so the only things that could go wrong with the units can be solved with an upgrade.

The Journey:

Over the course of the campaign we will be travelling to my factory in Guangzhou, China and then on to the CES in Las Vegas. It's going to be a wild ride, and I'll be updating this site regularly!

The Goal:

I am running an Indiegogo campaign to:
1. build awareness around the CES launch in Las Vegas;
2. cultivate a team of interested individuals:
3. take some pre-orders: and
4. to have FUN!

We are establishing GUNN Audio in the U.S. and Europe next year, with a target of over 100,000 units to be sold.

Want in? We are looking for marketing professionals, distributors, advisors and everyone (who's genuinely awesome and interested) in between.

Email: sales@gunnaudio.com, and say hi :-)

The Perks:

GUNN Aerio Bluetooth Headphones.The GUNN Aerio Bluetooth headphones are a revolution. Finally we have the quality, power, comfort, design and battery life we’ve been waiting for. The GUNN Aerio’s connect to any Bluetooth enabled computer, tablet or phone including all Apple products in seconds. The Aerio’s look great and are built to last.

    • Ultra long lasting lithium battery up to 10 hours.
    • Super fast charge time.
    • Headphones control device functions to skip tracks.
    • In built microphone.

Enjoy hours of uninterrupted music from your iPhone, iPod or Android product on the go. Use your Aerio’s on the job, on the water, or just on the train …..and never get caught up in a spaghetti of wire again.

Soon to be seen on the fashion catwalks of Milan!..............................................................................................................................................

The future of audio has arrived. GUNN SX speakers sound great, look awesome, have all the features you need for the way you play your music TODAY and are the price you've been waiting for.

New website launching very soon! Please forgive the current site; it hasn't been upgraded due to being made defunct shortly: www.gunnaudio.com.

Please be sure to note that we are only taking contributions from North America, Australia and E.U. countries in this campaign. For those of you in other areas, stay tuned!

FAQ:

1) Will you offer synchronised streaming?

Yes, we are working on that technology and it will be available in 2014. The system we are working on is to use one GUNN SX unit to be a 'lead unit' for other GUNN SX systems. This, again, eliminates the need for an external device. It will be a simple upgrade to the existing systems. 

2) Will we introduce Airplay into our speakers?Our speakers have DLNA. There are many apps that will convert Airplay to DLNA. Apple licensing is expensive and we aim to keep our prices down and our quality up....... but we will include it if the dema

reliable speakers. The speaker drivers and cabinets have been tested and
 improved over time and the operating system is world class.We're not into comparisons.So we'll just tell you that we believe that this is the best value, most functional streaming solution available. Full stop. The
 GUNN remote app:This enables the user
 to control the speakers from any iOS and Apple device. Users
 can see and control the entire StreamTower system including the music stored in 
the Flash drive or via the USB port and any other dvics connected through the local WiFi. The user is seeing and controlling the StreamTower screen therefore system through a series of images bradcasting many times a second to the screen of the device.And you
 can play any music you like, from any online source you like. Other 
WiFi speaker solutions only let you play what they want you to play, 
through their app.Ummm, no thanks. Who wants to be dictated to when it comes to tunes? With the GUNN SX speakers you can browse the web via the touch screen and play any site you like.Picture this ...
You've just come home from a long day in front of the computer. You 
want to put some music on and chill. The last thing you want to do is 
turn on another computer. But you are a streamer! With any other 
wireless option you need to turn on the computer, wait for it to load 
and then use that to control your sound system. 

So you have to wait five minutes to control the speakers that are right in front of you?
Ummm, no thanks. Playing music shouldn't be this hard. That's why we use our phone for streaming most of the time.

What about my phone, you ask?

All you want to do is to play some music and cook dinner? You just 
need to connect your phone to your speakers, right? Forget docking, that ties up my phone. I'll use Bluetooth. Waiting for 
connectivity (twiddling thumbs). Okay connected!
Hold on, it's out of battery! Plug it in to charge. You might as well
 leave it plugged in as playing a wireless signal really sucks the 
juice.
The phone rings. Music drops out. Bummer, you didn't need the music to stop.
Hang up. Music starts.

But you need to go to the store downstairs for some milk. You'd 
better take your phone as you're expecting a call... so it disconnects 
from the speakers. Music stops. When you come back upstairs you'll have 
to connect it again. Great!
Your flatmate comes home. You are leaving, so you'll need to disconnect your phone before they can connect theirs.
It's then that you realise: you've been chewing up your phone data 
because you didn't connect to your home WiFi! Great again, now you're 
going to be charged excess on your phone plan.
Grrrr.
Having a party?:
Who
 wants to risk having a valuable laptop having a drink spilt on it. And 
do you want to spend all night worrying about where your phone is, or 
connecting/disconnecting between your friends?

So while it seems like a handy, streamlined approach, truth is external devices can be a pain. Try this ...

You come home from a long day and touch the screen of your awesome 
looking GUNN SX-4 Manta sound system. It lights up. It loves you! You 
love it back. Your friend is drawn to this awesome looking piece of art. This is surely the latest and greatest thing in audio!
Glistening like shiny, appy stars are Spotify, Pandora, Rdio and 
every other app in the galaxy. Excited and wanting to play, you touch 
your choice. Music begins playing immediately. 
Using the seven inch touch screen, you type in "RUN DMC". A good day 
for old skool! Their entire catalogue appears in 1024 x 600 goodness. 
Select Greatest Hits 1998. It's not tricky to rock around!

Your computer is off, your phone isn't being drained, you can take 
calls, pop to the shops and the GUNN SX-4 Manta smart speaker continues 
playing like a true legend, a faithful companion, a knowing ally.
A
 flick of the screen and the Flash eMMC storage appears with your fave 
collection. You've downloaded your songs directly into the speakers.
Oh,
 and the GUNN SX series can play your existing collection from your 
current devices via DLNA or Bluetooth. Or you could just transfer it 
into the Flash Drive. 
Plus you can use your phone, computer or tablet to control them with the GUNN remote app.


The Perk:There
 are five models in the SX range. We have chosen the SX-3 StreamTower for your
 perk because it's our favourite. 
You could wait for the other models to come out, but then you wouldn't 
be the first on the block to own one :-)
There
 are very few risks involved with the speakers themselves. These have 
been heavily tested in the market. The speakers and surrounding hardware
 are excellent.
The Android system is quite straightforward and any updates to the GUNN software will be a simple upgrade.
The
 beauty of the GUNN SX smart speaker project is that this is not 
untrialled, brand new technology. All components are existing and 
extensively tested. We have incredibly tight Quality Control so the only
 things that could go wrong with the units can be solved with an 
upgrade.
The Journey:
Over
 the course of the campaign we will be travelling to my factory in 
Guangzhou, China and then on to the CES in Las Vegas. It's going to be a
 wild ride, and I'll be updating this site regularly!
The Goal: 
I am running an Indiegogo campaign to:1. build awareness around the CES launch in Las Vegas;2. cultivate a team of interested individuals: 3. take some pre-orders: and 4. to have FUN! 
We are establishing GUNN Audio in the U.S. and Europe next year, with a target of over 100,000 units to be sold.
Want
 in? We are looking for marketing professionals, distributors, advisors 
and everyone (who's genuinely awesome and interested) in between. 
Email: sales@gunnaudio.com, and say hi :-)
The Perks:
GUNN Aerio Bluetooth Headphones.The
 GUNN Aerio Bluetooth headphones are a revolution. Finally we have the 
quality, power, comfort, design and battery life we’ve been waiting for.
 The GUNN Aerio’s connect to any Bluetooth enabled computer, tablet or 
phone including all Apple products in seconds. The Aerio’s look great 
and are built to last.

Ultra long lasting lithium battery up to 10 hours.
Super fast charge time.
Headphones control device functions to skip tracks.
In built microphone.

Enjoy
 hours of uninterrupted music from your iPhone, iPod or Android product 
on the go. Use your Aerio’s on the job, on the water, or just on the 
train …..and never get caught up in a spaghetti of wire again.
Soon to be seen on the fashion catwalks of Milan!..............................................................................................................................................The future of audio has arrived. GUNN
 SX speakers sound great, look awesome, have all the features you need 
for the way you play your music TODAY and are the price you've been 
waiting for. 
New website launching very soon! Please forgive the current site; it hasn't been upgraded due to being made defunct shortly: www.gunnaudio.com.

Please be sure to note that we are only taking contributions from 
North America, Australia and E.U. countries in this campaign. For those 
of you in other areas, stay tuned!
FAQ:
1) Will you offer synchronised streaming?
Yes,
 we are working on that technology and it will be available in 2014. The
 system we are working on is to use one GUNN SX unit to be a 'lead unit'
 for other GUNN SX systems. This, again, eliminates the need for an 
external device. It will be a simple upgrade to the existing systems. 
2) Will we introduce Airplay into our speakers?Our
 speakers have DLNA. There are many apps that will convert Airplay to 
DLNA. Apple licensing is expensive and we aim to keep our prices down 
and our quality up....... but we will include it if the dema

story:
What is 3Deva ?

The Viiwok 3Deva is an universal adapter for 7" tablets or large screen smartphones. It is basically a 3D visor (HMD - Head Mounted Display) with stereoscopic capabilities.


What does it do ?

  • It converts your tablet/smartphone into a fully fledged, completely mobile, Home Cinema.
  • It can be used to watch all the video content your own in a completely new and exciting way.  You don't need to have specific SBS beforehand. You can play ANY video, as it is.
  • It can also be used as a remote, wireless monitor for your computer, thus opening the way for remote gaming and various virtual reality applications.

How do you use it ?

  • You slide your tablet or smartphone into your adapter.
  • You open your media-player with SBS capabilities and play content.

How does it work ?

  • It works for video the same way headphones do for audio. It brings the content to you, in a natural way.
  • Humans have binocular vision. This means that each eye is receiving reflected light from the surrounding world. The two images are combined by the brain into a single video feed.


  • Our adapter works in the same way. It converts the content (movies, videos, games, etc.) into a side-by-side stream that is displayed on your tablet or smartphone.
  • If the two side-by-side images are offset, you will also experience the depth of the objects, thus real 3D.


  • The Viiwok Deva has two specially designed lenses that magnify the mobile device's display, without any quality loss, so that the user can watch desired content in a natural, comfortable way.


Technical features and specifications

  • It's made of polycarbonate. This means it's very lightweight, durable and has a smooth, pleasant touch. (our prototype, although fully functional, has been 3D printed in PLA plastic, thus its somewhat rough appearance)
  • The design will be miles better compared to the prototype. We have extremelly skilled designers which are working as we speak in order to bring you best in class ergonomics and looks. 
  • It will come in 4 colors, depending on your preference (white, black, red and blue).
  • It uses 2" in diameter, custom made, aspheric lenses, for best focusing and magnifying capabilities.
  • Adjustable IPD (Inter Pupillary Distance) and focal length (distance from eyes to display) for a natural and comfortable experience, without headaches and eye strain.
  • Integrated, discrete headtracking sensors for motion detection - you can use our product in order to stream and play your favourite PC games***. No special drivers needed.




The Impact

This product has the potential of becoming a paradigm shift for the entertainment and general media sectors.

Not only it can completely eliminate the need for a TV, but it can save you tremendous amounts of money in the future.


The image quality is astounding. Watching movies or playing games through the Deva is like being 3 feet away from a 80” plasma display.


The experience is incredible. It’s like having your own Home Cinema, completely mobile, at a fraction of the cost, and future proof.

You no longer need to be in your living room, in front of the TV, to watch your favorite films. You can go out, on your bedroom, in the kitchen, outside on the porch or even on your way to work or during a trip. You will always have your media center along with you, completely devoid of site restrictions.

                                   


We believe that this will become the main way of watching movies in the future.
Instead of paying thousands for the latest TV set which will keep you stuck in your living room for hours, the Viiwok 3Deva is truly refreshing and liberating. You already have your movies, clips and films on your tablet, so why shouldn't you watch them as they were intended in the first place ? On a huge display, with absolute clarity.


Why have we applied for crowd funding ?

The money will be used to convert this somewhat bulky (but fully functional) prototype into a sleek, streamlined product.
We are in contact with a number of extremely skilled designers, fabricators and manufacturers from Europe and Asia. All they waiting is the word from us to start mass-production.
This is why we need until April to build an effective distribution chain and to finish the manufacturing process (CAD/CAM design - prototype - molding - batch production - product on the shelves).

Even if we don't get fully funded, we are commited to deliver the product to those who have purchased it.


F.A.Q.

  • How does it compare with a classical TV experience ? It doesn't. It's a totally different game. The experience is that of complete and fully immersion. It's like being in a state of the art Multiplex or having your own, extremely expensive Home Cinema.
  • Can i play any kind of video, or do I need 3D/SBS content ? You can play any kind of video. If it is "normal", 2D, it will be automatically converted into SBS. Of course, for the best experience, we recommend watching native 3D movies, but this is by no means mandatory.
  • Do I need a certain video player program ? You can use any video player which can display SBS format. VLC for example, is the most popular. If your video is 2D, you can use VR Player, which is free and has fully fledged 3D compatibility. There are also various, free apps for Android and iOS that can play SBS content, one of the best being GoShow.
  • Can I play local stored content (from the tablet's memory or SD card) ? By all means, yes. It's how it was imagined to work, free from all spatial restrictions. Total mobility.
  • Is the image fullHD (1080p) ? It totally depends on your tablet resolution. Check with your manufacturer on your device specifications. We are not interfering in any way with the hardware of your device. The better your tablet display is, the better experience you will have. Generally, the higher the resolution, the better. At FHD resolutions, the experience is phenomenal, and there is no reason to believe that starting with 2014, we will not see the appearance of 4K resolutions.
  • Can I use any brand of tablet or smartphone? How will I know if it's a fit for the adapter ? Yes, our adapter is universal and it will come in two sizes - for 16:9 (widescreen) tablets (most of the Android ones) and 4:3 (classic size) tablets (like the iPad). The only restriction is that your tablet must have a 7" display. For smartphones - a 4.7"-6" smartphone is recommended.
  • Do I need a specific smartphone brand/model ? No, the only requirement is that it must have a large screen. We will get in contact with you before sending the adapter, to enquire about your specific model.
  • Do I need a to setup a specific configuration for it to work ? No, it's an out of the box experience. By all means, we'll send you VR presets, best tailored for your specific IPD and tablet model.


***PC Streaming & Gaming

Our product was designed to be mobile. Thus, it works best within the mobile ecosystem - any designed for VR games or apps will work perfectly. For casual video streaming - things work perfectly smooth but for hi-performance gaming, you need to meddle with the settings a bit but we assure you that it's worth it. You will end up having a complete console like experience from wherever in the house, without getting tangled up in cables or stuck to your desktop.

So, if you choose to transform your tablet or smartphone into a second monitor, we have the following recommendations and tips:

  • have a powerful computer at your disposal (Core 2 Duo or better CPU, at least 4GB of RAM and, most importantly, a decent GPU - Nvidia Geforce 6xx chipsets or better).
  • if possible, check and see if your setup supports native wireless display configurations - like Miracast or Intel WiDi.
  • have a fast network connection - WiFi 802.11n routers work best. 802.11ac is ideal.
  • you will need a remote-desktop program to stream your games to your device - we recommend: Splashtop Remote, Splashtop Gamepad THD, Kainy, AirPlay or Limelight. They are the best in class, offering latency times as low as 30ms.
  • some games can be played in native 3D (SBS), some can't. In order to convert your favorite game to SBS, you can use a number of programs like: TriDEF, VorpX, Vireio Perception.


We are a small team of hardware engineers with the firm belief that products like this have the potential to transform the way we interact with computers and media, while pushing VR forward.

Help us bridge the gap from this proof-of-concept prototype and a consumer product !

story:
Ever heard of Tony Stark looking down and driving? Me neither. That’s why we built HeadsUP!, a transparent windshield display that integrates with your smartphone. 



What is 

Displays your Smartphone navigation, calls, and enhanced communication on your windshield without obstructing your view. 

Plug in your favorite smartphone into HeadsUP! and see your notifications.

A Transparent display with your messages. Only appears when you need it.

Control HeadsUP! with your voice and gestures. 

     


How does work?


Connect HeadsUP! to your smartphone via Bluetooth or USB.



HeadsUP! is invisible until you receive an incoming call or message. 



Hands-Free +. Use gestures and your voice to make a call, communicate, or get directions. 


Will work with my phone?


It works with over a Billion Smartphones! Thats 94% of Smartphones.

HeadsUP! is compatible with iOS and Android. Windows and BlackBerry may be supported based on demand.



Design.



The Specs.


HeadsUP! also includes and array of sensors to pick up your Gesture Commands. The sensors are seamlessly built into the top of the transparent display. 
 



The Story.

We at NeXt have been drivers, passengers, back seat drivers. We've done it all.  We often see people driving while texting, eating a sandwich, putting on makeup and driving - sometimes all at the same time! 

We love the thrill of driving on a curvy road on a sunny day, but we also hate reaching for our phones with guilt while driving or risk getting lost in a new city. At NeXt, we believe that technology needs to adapt with our evolving needs. 

So we built HeadsUP! to help people stay safely connected while driving, without ever having to look down at their phones.  HeadsUP! evolves the ability of your car, and adds your important social interactions and the best mapping software, all on the corner of your windshield! 



Frequently Asked Questions.

Is HeadsUP! illegal?

No, in many states making phone calls or texting on your smartphone are considered offenses. But, most states have exemptions for hands-free, non-obstructive devices such as HeadsUP!.


What about regulations against placing something on the windshield?

Legislation bans affixing items that will block the driver’s view of the road. HeadsUP! utilizes a transparent screen, so the driver can see the road at all times.


I want one. But how do I install it?

HeadsUP! is a stick, connect, and play device. Installation should take less than 60 seconds for the average user, and does not require assembly.


Does it connect to my existing Car speakers?

Yes. HeadsUP! can connect to your car speakers, with bluetooth. (In the final HeadsUP! we are planning to include a 1/8th" port for aux connections).


What if I drive different cars, or what if I’m a baller and own 10 cars?

HeadsUP! is designed to be portable. Removing the unit from one vehicle and placing into another vehicle is a piece of cake.


Can I watch videos from my Smartphone?

HeadsUP! is not intended to play video from your smartphone - because that would be really distracting!

Use your favorite driving apps, navigation, calls, and enhanced communication - all without touching your phone.


Will I be able to use my favorite Navigation App?

Yes. HeadsUP! will let you use a variety of navigation, driver assist apps, and enhanced communication. No more fumbling with your phone!


What's next?

We have a patent pending on the design and have existing relationships with suppliers for the components. We've invested all of our own funds so far to develop the 2nd prototype.

We need $50,000 to complete engineering & software development to have HeadsUP! ready for mass production. We have taken this as far as we can on our own, and now we need YOUR help to make this product a reality. Let's make a difference together!

Follow us on Twitter for updates: @nextHeadsUp

story:
Da viaggiatori per viaggiatori

Ciao ragazzi, siamo un gruppo di appassionati folli per i viaggi, cresciuti con lo zaino in spalla ed i risparmi sempre spesi nel prenotare un nuovo posto da vivere. Di lavoro programmiamo (2), comunichiamo (2)  e commercializziamo (1, il peggiore).

Il nostro tempo libero è invece totalmente preso dalla creazione dell'app che avremmo sempre voluto avere: un diario di viaggio digitale dove appuntare e conservare ricordi ed emozioni (ci avete sgamato, siamo anche scrittori ossessivi di moleskine) ed un planner dove pianificare la nostra prossima meta sbirciando nei diari di chi c'e' già stato. 

Immaginate di trovare nelle esperienze altrui alcune "chicche" da visitare assolutamente, importare le coordinate GPS sul vostro planner e farvici condurre direttamente da Mymory. Il tutto con la possibilità di arricchire il percorso con i contenuti che volete.

Il perché della campagna su indiegogo? Ci serve una mano per sostenere gli ultimi costi di sviluppo e quelli relativi all'hosting e ai server (avremo un sacco di dati da gestire e lo vogliamo fare al meglio).  


Il diavolo itinerante è nei dettagli

Ecco alcune specifiche:

L'app verrà realizzata inizialmente su Android e iOS e verrà integrata con una piattaforma web consultabile anche da PC. I soldi ci servono per sostenere i costi dei server del primo anno (prevediamo di utilizzare circa 5 tera di spazio per i dati).

Il 27/11/2013 sarà online il sito www.mymory.it dove potrete trovare maggiori info sul progetto e, iscrivendovi alla newsletter, visualizzare in anteprima le novità in corso di realizzazione.

Q & A

Perché devo scaricare un'app quando, per tenere un diario, posso scrivere una moleskine e per trovare le chicche da vedere posso comprare 3 guide, cercare consigli 2 ore sui blog e trovare i ristoranti su Tripadvisors? 

Perché noi attualmente i viaggi li pianifichiamo così e ti assicuriamo che Mymory sarà molto meglio per almeno 4 ragioni 1. è GRATIS 2. è più semplice 3. è tremendamente più' veloce  e non stressante 4. le esperienze saranno salvate in cloud quindi non le potrete perdere (sul telefono non garantiamo)

Ci sono già app che ti consentono di registrare i viaggi!

Caro ipotetico questionante (omettiamo l'ultimo aggettivo), certo che ci sono MA non funzionano bene perché richiedono troppo tempo per creare il diario e non consentono la condivisione dell'esperienza. Mymory sarà velocissima da usare  e ti consentirà la pianificazione del TUO viaggio perfetto, sulla base delle esperienze di altri utenti.

Ok, ma siccome sono questionante questiono e vorrei capire perché sul sito si parla di Mymo!

E' il nome che abbiamo dato ai diari di viaggio, è più' semplice e si ricorda. 

Ah ah! Leggo che ci saranno dei profili PRO e dei PRO Mymo! di cosa si tratta?

Grazie della domanda. Mymory, oltre ai diari degli utenti, proporrà alcuni contenuti PRO, realizzati cioè da viaggiatori professionali che gli utenti potranno scaricare con un costo equo. Saranno miniguide molto particolari perché conterranno informazioni estremamente specifiche. Ne abbiamo già alcune, ecco alcuni esempi. I playground che hanno fatto la storia del basket americano; i siti industriali da visitare assolutamente; Le città a misura di bambino. 

Per ora vi siete salvati, ma non è finita..

Attendiamo fiduciosi ;)

story:
When creating Bluesphere we’ve been having in mind to have the perfect combination of several factors such as the weight, fixation method and the balance, managing the proportion, wireless charger, vibration, packaging, and the delivery.



Thanks to a great team of engineers and constant team efforts we achieved the goal we were aiming for.

In 2 years of constant prototyping and development, we have created the product that meets every requirement for your smartphone most comfortable use. Every step from prototyping and the user test to production and packaging is being done on our own to provide the best quality control.

Every step from prototyping and the user test to production and packaging is being done on our own to provide the best quality control.

story:
•  Messy Tangled Cables?

 

In this era of mobile devices, it can be a problem to effectively charge them so they are ready to go when you are. We all suffer from too many tangled cables and not enough charging ports, forcing us to charge different devices in different places. XONE solves this problem and provides the perfect solution for charging your essential devices.

 

 

  •  Apple Fans?
     

Power up your Apple Watch, Airpods and iPhone at the same time. XONE is the perfect place to keep your favorite Apple gear while safely charging them simultaneously.

 

  •  Supports Multiple Devices:
     

XONE can charge up to 3 devices all at once. It’s a convenient place to keep all your devices that dispenses with the mess of cables and solves the problem of limited USB sockets.

 

XONE is compatible with all Qi-compatible devices using magnetic-induction technology: 

 

  • Removable Watch Stand

 

No Apple Watch? Nevermind! Let XONE help you!

The removable watch stand could be replaced with light or fan.

 

  • Bladeless Fan

 

  •  Led Light

 

 

You can simply place your Qi-supported device on the charging dock and it automatically starts charging at up to 10W speed. Life is simple, and tangled cables become a thing of the past.

 

XONE adopts a high-quality copper coil with built-in temperature sensing probe. When the charging temperature is too high, XONE will automatically reduce the current output. It prevents battery overheating to protect your valuable devices at all times.

 

 

With a sleek design, XONE makes an attractive complement to any desk or home. It efficiently handles all your smart device charging needs with a modern sense of style. Its minimalistic design will perfectly match both work and life.

 

  •  Charging Indicator Lights:

 

Three independent charging indicator lights will alert you if your charger is connected. Its soft illumination creates comfortable mood lighting. XONE also features built-in safety systems including over-current and short circuit protection as well as foreign object detection that will turn off charging to protect you if a metal object is misplaced onto it.

 

  •  Night Stand Clock Mode:

 

Sleep soundly and wake up ready and refreshed for your day. XONE keeps your Apple Watch partially visible in nightstand mode while charging your devices for another day on the go.

 

  •  Anti-slip Base:

The anti-slip base will make sure your devices stay safely in place, protecting them from scratches, drops and falls.

 

  •  Color：Black & White

story:
About us

The Lumin-8 is the brainchild of Alva, a private startup created with the help of James Hannam -- the CEO of  Makerlabs and Pantri. Alva's mission is to create powerful yet accessible devices that can be powered with a phone. The Lumin - 8 is a great example of this ideology because it is a gadget that turns a phone's simple flashlight feature into a device that can be used in place of an average and heavier torch. The funds raised by this kickstarter will be used for a 3d printing,patenting and packaging.  .

Other ways you can help

A way that you can help for free is to spread the word using the #Lumin-8 on twitter. By doing this you will be entered into a competition to win a free Lumin-8!* There's nothing to lose!! 

 

 

 

*winner will only receive Lumin-8 if crowdfunding is successful.

Professional filming with DSLR-cameras - our new system solves incompatibility issues.
NiceDice- The Swiss Army Knife for the film and photo industry!

Contribute to our campaign and make it happen! With your support we are ready to start the first production. Delivery is scheduled for the summer of 2014. 

Spread the word!

- Your Andreas, Nils and Ken


The NiceDice is the very first multifunctional adapter in the field of film- and photo equipment. As we work in close cooperation with the film equipment rental 25p* cine support, the development of the NiceDice is steered directly by the demand and wishes of cameramen and photographers. Our vision states that the equipment of a cameraman should be subordinate to the creative process instead of the other way around. With its interchangeable adapters, the NiceDice-System provides the opportunity to quickly, easily, tools-free and independently react to situations in the studio, on set or on the streets. 

The concept won a bunch of awards over the past year:

                


Nils, product designer, is responsible for the pretty design and the amazing functionality of the NiceDice, as the idea was created at his desk. With over a decade of experience as an independent film producer and cameraman, Andreas knows our market like no other. With a degree in cultural sciences and event conception, he makes sure that everybody gets to know the NiceDice and supports us with further development. With a degree in economics and business economics, Ken is the one to check, double-check and adjust the financials of the project.


With the current NiceDice-System -and some of the additional features we’re working on at this very moment- we want to make a cameraman’s life easier. His tools should look pretty, should stimulate a creative way of thinking and should, above all, offer a wide range of functionalities.

The NiceDice is our first product and with your help we can start to provide tools, that will make cameramen and photographers worldwide realize that their tackle box is not a burden, but a first opportunity to let their creativity flow!

Whether you are a cameraman or a photographer, professional or an amateur, on the streets, on a set or in the studio, you’ll always rely on some special adapter(s). At the end of the day (or actually, in the middle of the day), there will always be something missing, like a little screw or an adapter of some sort. These missing parts interrupt the creative process, as the demanded equipment can’t be used.

That problem had to be solved, and so we did! We developed a lightweight, small, multifunctional and pretty adapter: The NiceDice.

Together with the Berliner film camera equipment rental 25p*cine support and photo camera equipment rental rent one*photo support we investigated the demand of cameramen and photographers and thereupon we developed these extraordinary adapters.


The NiceDice-System is simple. It consists of a basic module -the NiceDice- with two holes and two slots. Both have the diameter of a standard 15mm rod. The NiceDice fits perfectly on the standard rods, while using the second hole to fasten an adapter of choice t our specially designed screw. The innovative slots in the NiceDice make sure that the rod is not only pressed from above and below, but also squeezed from the sides. As there are forces working horizontally and vertically, the fixation of the NiceDice is solid as a rock!

But what if you want to use a different adapter? Simply disconnect the adapter from the universal screw and connect the adapter of your choice. In a blink of an eye you have changed the solid construction you had before, into a something equally solid, but that better fits your needs! 

The doubler-adapter enables you to connect two NiceDice with each other in every angle you can think of. This gives you the freedom to reposition the rods -and resultantly your equipment- as you wish.  

     


Example aplenty. Whilst developing the NiceDice, we had a number of requirements in mind that the NiceDice had to fulfil, such as a double hot shoe mount. During the field tests however, the cameramen displayed their creativity and every single one of them came up with new and interesting ideas! In the end, it turned out that not only almost every existing connection could be made, but also that unknown solutions were created!


NiceDice- basic module

All parts of the NiceDice-System are manufactured in CNC-machines with high precision and are made from quality aircraft aluminum. A number of producers in Germany have shown interest in the production of the NiceDice and so we can make sure that all parts are made in Germany. In that way we ensure high quality, short communication channels and domestic working places.

After the production, the parts will receive its graceful color and robust surface through the process of anodization.

Quality and usability are essential for us. And that’s why, after making drafts, scrapping them and redesigning, we managed to make it possible for you to use the NiceDice-System without any tools! So you can leave your screwdriver at home, as the system is secure, stable and can be fixed in place easily.

The NiceDice adapters

To start off, we have placed our focus on integrating the most important of the existing standards. The following adapters are already tested and are available:

Hot Shoe Adapter – male
Hot Shoe Adapter – female
Tripod thread 1/4" – male
Tripod thread 3/8" – male
Doubler, both sides 3/8" thread - female


We are working hard and eagerly to lift the NiceDice to the next level: the open market.

We’re almost there! With your support we can afford to start an economically viable first round of production. As we want to personally contribute to this revolution, your money will NOT be used to compensate ourselves for the time we spend on this project. The production costs simply stretch further than we can reach by ourselves and therefore we rely on your support. Also, the prototypes need a redesign to live up to the feedback we received during the field-tests. 

So pledge whatever you can, as you are given the opportunity to purchase the first NiceDice for a friends' price! 


We put a great deal of effort in putting together the perks. So go ahead and show us some love!

*************

*************

Aside from money, we need publicity, lots of publicity. Share this campaign with your friends and let them know what you think about the NiceDice via Facebook, Twitter, smoke signals or in whatever way you prefer. Help us reach those people, that will love our idea.

Visit our website, like us on Facebook and subscribe for our newsletter to get updates about our project and to stay in touch.

When you have ideas for new adapters or other ways in which we can improve the NiceDice-System, let us know! Leave a comment, send us an email, a letter or give us a call. Andreas will be delighted to hear your ideas!


____________________________________________________________________

                                            DEUTSCH

Update: Wir verschenken ein Sound Set oder Light Set plus ND-Key Tool!

Professioneller Filmdreh mit DSLR-Kameras - ein neues System löst Kompatibilitätsprobleme.

Wir stehen in den Startlöchern mit der Produktion zu beginnen und den NiceDice im Sommer 2014 auszuliefern. 

Unterstützt dieses Projekt und helft uns diese Kampagne in die Welt zu tragen! Danke!


- Andreas, Nils und Ken


Der NiceDice ist der erste Multifunktionsadapter für Kamerazubehör im Bereich Film- und Fototechnik. In enger Zusammenarbeit mit dem Berliner Filmtechnikverleih 25p* cine support entstand die Entwicklung des NiceDice unmittelbar aus den Bedürfnissen von Kameramännern und Fotografen. Die Vision ist: Die Technik soll sich dem kreativen Handeln des Kameramanns unterordnen und nicht andersherum. Der NiceDice bietet mit seinen austauschbaren Adaptern genau diese Möglichkeit – auf jede erdenkliche Situation kann schnell, unkompliziert, werkzeuglos und unabhängig reagiert werden.


Das Konzept wurde bereits mehrfach ausgezeichnet:


            


Für das tolle Design und die Funktionalität zeichnet Nils verantwortlich. Aus der Feder des Berliner Produktdesigners stammt der NiceDice. Der seit über einem Jahrzehnt als unabhängiger Filmproduzent und Kameramann arbeitende Andreas, kennt unseren Zielmarkt wie kein Zweiter. Als studierter Kulturwissenschaftler und Eventkonzeptioner lässt er jeden vom NiceDice wissen und unterstützt bei der Produktentwicklung. Der in Holland studierte Betriebswirt Ken sorgt im Team dafür, dass die Zahlen stimmen und dass alle finanziellen Entscheidungen wasserdicht und kugelsicher sind.



Mit dem NiceDice System wollen wir das Leben der Kameramänner und Fotografen leichter machen. Wir glauben, die Technik sollte immer möglichst vielfältig einsetzbar sein, zu einer kreativen Arbeitsweise anregen und natürlich auch gut aussehen! 

Der NiceDice ist unser erstes Produkt aus einer Reihe von Ideen, die wir in naher Zukunft entwickeln werden. Mit Eurer Hilfe wollen wir den NiceDice für alle Wirklichkeit werden zu lassen. Wir wollen weltweit Filmemachern und Fotografen ein Tool bieten, mit dem sie Ihre Technik nicht mehr als Last, sondern als erste kreative Aufgabe begreifen, um ihre schöpferische Arbeit umzusetzen.


Das unterbricht den kreativen Prozess. Das gesamte Zubehör kann nicht flexibel eingesetzt werden, sondern braucht Spezialadapter, um an der Kamera angebracht zu werden.

Entwickelt aus dem wahren Leben von Filmemachern und Fotografen, haben wir einen Adapter entwickelt, der leicht, klein und flexibel ist und dabei auch noch gut aussieht: den NiceDice.

In enger Kooperation mit dem Berliner Filmtechnikverleiher 25p *cine support und dem Fototechnikverleih rent one *photo support haben wir genau auf die Bedürfnisse der Filmemacher und Fotografen gehört und daraufhin diesen besonderen Adapter entwickelt, produziert und weiterentwickelt.

Mit dem NiceDice gehören nun einige Nachteile der Vergangenheit an:

  • Schwere Tasche voller Speziallösungen
  • Hohe Investitionen, denn viele Spezialadapter kosten in Summe viel Geld

Unser System ist simpel. Es besteht aus einem Grundbaustein – dem NiceDice – mit zwei Löchern und zwei schicken Schlitzen. Beide Löcher haben einen Durchmesser von einem Standard 15mm Rohr. Der NiceDice passt daher perfekt auf dieses Standardrohr, während man durch das zweite Loch den Adapter seiner Wahl mit unserer Allzweckschraube fixiert. Durch die patentierte Schlitzung des Würfels wird nun nicht nur ein Klemmdruck, sondern auch eine Verkantung erzeugt, die den Würfel besonders fest fixiert. Das der Adapter jetzt noch verrutscht ist sehr unwahrscheinlich. 

Brauchst Du einen anderen Adapter? Dann tausche ihn unkompliziert und einfach gegen einen anderen! Du kannst den NiceDice mit unserem Verdoppler auch mit anderen NiceDice verbinden. So erhältst Du unendliche Erweiterungs- und Kombinationsmöglichkeiten.


 

In der Testphase haben wir festgestellt, dass die meisten Kameramänner und -frauen gleich neue und ungewöhnliche Ideen für Einsatz des NiceDice entwickelten. Hier ein Beispiel:


Der NiceDice-Grundbaustein

Alle Teile des NiceDice werden aus einem Block hochwertigem Flugzeug-Aluminium mit computergesteuerten CNC- Maschinen hochpräzise gefräst. Dafür haben wir bereits namhafte Hersteller in Deutschland gewinnen können, die uns unterstützen. So wird eine hohe Qualität gewährleistet und wir unterstützen damit gleichzeitig Arbeitsplätze in der Region.

Nach dem Feinschliff bekommt der NiceDice seine exquisite Farbe und seine widerstandsfähige Oberfläche durch ein spezielles Eloxatbad.

Funktion und Qualität stehen an erster Stelle. Das war uns auch beim Design sehr wichtig. So haben wir es, nach langem konzipieren, verwerfen und neuentwerfen geschafft den NiceDice werkzeugfrei einsetzbar zu machen. Den Schraubenzieher kannst Du zu Hause lassen, denn dank der innovativen Konstruktion ist das System sicher und stabil und kinderleicht zu fixieren.

Die NiceDice Adapter

Zum Auftakt haben wir unseren Fokus darauf gelegt, die wichtigsten der existierenden Standards zu integrieren. Folgende Adapter sind bereits ausgiebig getestet und stehen zur Verfügung:

Blitzschuhadapter - male
Blitzschuhadapter – female
Stativgewinde 1/4“ - male
Stativgewinde 3/8“ – male
Verdoppler – inkl. 3/8“ – female 


Wir arbeiten hart daran, den NiceDice zur Serienreife zu überführen.

Alles was uns am Ende dafür fehlt, ist die Finanzierung für die erste Produktionsserie. Und genau dafür werden wir Deinen Beitrag einsetzen. Die Kosten für unsere Arbeit werden durch die Kampagne natürlich nicht bezahlt, denn wir glauben an unser Produkt, seinen Nutzen für den Kunden und seinen Erfolg am Markt. Was aber die Kosten für die erste Produktion angeht, übersteigen diese unseren Rahmen. Neben der Produktion werden wir das Geld für den letzten Schliff am Design einsetzen und ihn in die Produktion überführen.

Deshalb vertrauen wir auf Eure Unterstützung. 

Spende was immer Du kannst, wir sind für alles dankbar.


Bei der Auswahl der Geschenke haben wir uns viel Mühe gegeben. Besonders freuen würden wir uns natürlich, wenn Du Dir gleich ein NiceDice Set aussuchst. Es ist tolles Gefühl, dass der NiceDice so gut bei Dir ankommt, dass Du schon jetzt einen haben willst. :)


********

*********

Neben Geld brauchen wir auch Aufmerksamkeit! Teile diese Kampagne mit Deinen Freunden, erzähle Ihnen vom NiceDice über Facebook, Morse-Code oder per Brief. Was immer Du bevorzugst :) Hilf uns die Menschen zu erreichen, die uns und unsere Idee finanzieren wollen.

Besuche unsere Webseite, Like uns auf Facebook und trage Dich in unseren Newsletter ein, damit wir Dich über alles auf dem Laufenden halten können.

Du hast eine Idee, wie wir unser Produkt noch besser machen könnten? Oder eine Idee für einen fehlenden Adapter? Dann melde Dich bei uns: Sende uns auch hier einen MorseCode, einen Brief oder E-Mail! Andreas freut sich auf Deine Nachricht!

Professional filming with DSLR-cameras - our new system solves incompatibility issues.NiceDice- The Swiss Army Knife for the film and photo industry!
Contribute to our campaign and make it happen! With your support we are ready to start the first production. Delivery is scheduled for the summer of 2014. Spread the word!- Your Andreas, Nils and Ken

The NiceDice is the very
first multifunctional adapter in the field of film- and photo equipment. As we
work in close cooperation with the film equipment rental 25p* cine support, the
development of the NiceDice is steered directly by the demand and wishes of
cameramen and photographers. Our vision states that the equipment of a
cameraman should be subordinate to the creative process instead of the other
way around. With its interchangeable adapters, the NiceDice-System provides the
opportunity to quickly, easily, tools-free and independently react to
situations in the studio, on set or on the streets. The concept won a bunch of awards over the past year:                

Nils,
product designer, is responsible for the pretty design and the amazing
functionality of the NiceDice, as the idea was created at his desk. With over a
decade of experience as an independent film producer and cameraman, Andreas knows our market like no other.
With a degree in cultural sciences and event conception, he makes sure that
everybody gets to know the NiceDice and supports us with further development. With
a degree in economics and business economics, Ken is the one to check, double-check and adjust the financials of
the project.




With the current
NiceDice-System -and some of the additional features we’re working on at this very moment- we want to make a cameraman’s life easier. His tools should look
pretty, should stimulate a creative way of thinking and should, above all,
offer a wide range of functionalities.
The NiceDice is our first
product and with your help we can start to provide tools, that will make
cameramen and photographers worldwide realize that their tackle box is not a
burden, but a first opportunity to let their creativity flow!Whether you are a cameraman
or a photographer, professional or an amateur, on the streets, on a set or in
the studio, you’ll always rely on some special adapter(s). At the end of the day (or
actually, in the middle of the day), there will always be something missing,
like a little screw or an adapter of some sort. These missing parts interrupt
the creative process, as the demanded equipment can’t be used.
That problem had to be
solved, and so we did! We developed a lightweight, small, multifunctional and
pretty adapter: The NiceDice.
Together with the Berliner film
camera equipment rental 25p*cine support and photo camera equipment rental
rent one*photo support we investigated the demand of cameramen and
photographers and thereupon we developed these extraordinary adapters.


The NiceDice-System is simple. It consists of a basic module -the NiceDice- with two holes and two slots. Both have the diameter of a standard 15mm rod. The NiceDice fits perfectly on the standard rods, while using the second hole to fasten an adapter of choice t our specially designed screw. The innovative slots in the NiceDice make sure that the rod is not only pressed from above and below, but also squeezed from the sides. As there are forces working horizontally and vertically, the fixation of the NiceDice is solid as a rock!
But what if you want to use
a different adapter? Simply disconnect the adapter from the universal screw and
connect the adapter of your choice. In a blink of an eye you have changed the
solid construction you had before, into a something equally solid, but that
better fits your needs! 
The doubler-adapter enables you to connect two NiceDice with each other in every angle you can think of. This gives you the freedom to reposition the rods -and resultantly your equipment- as you wish.  

     








Example aplenty. Whilst developing the NiceDice, we had a number of requirements in mind that the NiceDice had to fulfil, such as a double hot shoe mount. During the field tests however, the cameramen displayed their creativity and every single one of them came up with new and interesting ideas! In the end, it turned out that not only almost every existing connection could be made, but also that unknown solutions were created!









NiceDice- basic module
All parts of the
NiceDice-System are manufactured in CNC-machines with high precision and are
made from quality aircraft aluminum. A number of producers in Germany have
shown interest in the production of the NiceDice and so we can make sure that
all parts are made in Germany. In that way we ensure high quality, short
communication channels and domestic working places. 
After the production, the
parts will receive its graceful color and robust surface through the process of
anodization. 
Quality and usability are
essential for us. And that’s why, after making drafts, scrapping them and redesigning,
we managed to make it possible for you to use the NiceDice-System without any
tools! So you can leave your screwdriver at home, as the system is secure,
stable and can be fixed in place easily.
The NiceDice adapters
To start off, we have placed
our focus on integrating the most important of the existing standards. The
following adapters are already tested and are available:
Hot Shoe Adapter – male
Hot Shoe Adapter – female
Tripod thread 1/4" – male
Tripod thread 3/8" – male
Doubler, both sides 3/8" thread - female






We are working hard and eagerly to lift the NiceDice to the next level: the open market.
We’re almost there! With your support we can afford to start an economically viable first round of production. As we want to personally
contribute to this revolution, your money will NOT be used to compensate
ourselves for the time we spend on this project. The production costs simply
stretch further than we can reach by ourselves and therefore we rely on your
support. Also, the prototypes need a redesign to live up to the feedback we received during the field-tests. 
So pledge whatever you can,
as you are given the opportunity to purchase the first NiceDice for a friends' price! 





We put a great deal of effort in putting together the perks. So go ahead and show us some love!
*************


*************





















Aside from money, we need
publicity, lots of publicity. Share this campaign with your friends and let
them know what you think about the NiceDice via Facebook, Twitter, smoke
signals or in whatever way you prefer. Help us reach those people, that will
love our idea.
Visit our website, like us on
 Facebook and subscribe for our newsletter to get updates about our project and to stay in touch.
When you have ideas for new
adapters or other ways in which we can improve the NiceDice-System, let us
know! Leave a comment, send us an email, a letter or give us a call. Andreas
will be delighted to hear your ideas!
____________________________________________________________________                                             DEUTSCH
