 Professioneller Filmdreh mit DSLR-Kameras - ein neues System löst Kompatibilitätsprobleme.
Wir stehen in den Startlöchern mit der Produktion zu beginnen und den NiceDice im Sommer 2014 auszuliefern. Unterstützt dieses Projekt und helft uns diese Kampagne in die Welt zu tragen! Danke!- Andreas, Nils und Ken
Der NiceDice ist der erste Multifunktionsadapter für Kamerazubehör im Bereich
Film- und Fototechnik. In enger Zusammenarbeit mit dem Berliner
Filmtechnikverleih 25p* cine support entstand die Entwicklung des NiceDice
unmittelbar aus den Bedürfnissen von Kameramännern und Fotografen. Die Vision
ist: Die Technik soll sich dem kreativen Handeln des Kameramanns unterordnen und nicht andersherum. Der NiceDice bietet mit seinen austauschbaren
Adaptern genau diese Möglichkeit – auf jede erdenkliche Situation kann schnell,
unkompliziert, werkzeuglos und unabhängig reagiert werden.Das Konzept wurde bereits mehrfach ausgezeichnet:            Für das tolle
Design und die Funktionalität zeichnet Nils verantwortlich.
Aus der Feder des Berliner Produktdesigners stammt der NiceDice. Der seit über
einem Jahrzehnt als unabhängiger Filmproduzent und Kameramann arbeitende Andreas,
kennt unseren Zielmarkt wie kein Zweiter. Als studierter Kulturwissenschaftler
und Eventkonzeptioner lässt er jeden vom NiceDice wissen und unterstützt bei der Produktentwicklung.
Der in Holland studierte Betriebswirt Ken sorgt im Team dafür, dass
die Zahlen stimmen und dass alle finanziellen Entscheidungen wasserdicht und
kugelsicher sind.

Mit dem NiceDice
System wollen wir das Leben der Kameramänner und Fotografen leichter machen. Wir glauben, die Technik sollte immer möglichst vielfältig einsetzbar sein, zu einer kreativen Arbeitsweise anregen und natürlich auch gut aussehen! 
Der NiceDice ist
unser erstes Produkt aus einer Reihe von Ideen, die wir in naher Zukunft entwickeln werden. Mit Eurer Hilfe wollen wir den NiceDice
für alle Wirklichkeit werden zu lassen. Wir wollen weltweit Filmemachern und Fotografen ein
Tool bieten, mit dem sie Ihre Technik nicht mehr als Last, sondern als erste
kreative Aufgabe begreifen, um ihre schöpferische Arbeit umzusetzen.Das unterbricht
den kreativen Prozess. Das gesamte Zubehör kann nicht flexibel eingesetzt
werden, sondern braucht Spezialadapter, um an der Kamera angebracht zu werden.
Entwickelt aus
dem wahren Leben von Filmemachern und Fotografen, haben wir einen Adapter
entwickelt, der leicht, klein und flexibel ist und dabei auch noch gut
aussieht: den NiceDice.
In enger
Kooperation mit dem Berliner Filmtechnikverleiher 25p *cine support und dem
Fototechnikverleih rent one *photo support haben wir genau auf die Bedürfnisse
der Filmemacher und Fotografen gehört und daraufhin diesen besonderen Adapter
entwickelt, produziert und weiterentwickelt.
Mit dem NiceDice
gehören nun einige Nachteile der Vergangenheit an:
Schwere Tasche voller Speziallösungen

Hohe Investitionen, denn viele Spezialadapter kosten in Summe viel Geld


Unser System ist
simpel. Es besteht aus einem Grundbaustein – dem NiceDice – mit zwei Löchern
und zwei schicken Schlitzen. Beide Löcher haben einen Durchmesser von einem
Standard 15mm Rohr. Der NiceDice passt daher perfekt auf dieses Standardrohr,
während man durch das zweite Loch den Adapter seiner Wahl mit unserer
Allzweckschraube fixiert. Durch die patentierte Schlitzung des Würfels wird nun
nicht nur ein Klemmdruck, sondern auch eine Verkantung erzeugt, die den Würfel
besonders fest fixiert. Das der Adapter jetzt noch verrutscht ist sehr
unwahrscheinlich. 
Brauchst Du
einen anderen Adapter? Dann tausche ihn unkompliziert und einfach gegen einen anderen! Du kannst den NiceDice mit unserem Verdoppler auch mit anderen
NiceDice verbinden. So erhältst Du unendliche Erweiterungs- und
Kombinationsmöglichkeiten.
 In der Testphase
haben wir festgestellt, dass die meisten Kameramänner und -frauen gleich neue und ungewöhnliche Ideen für Einsatz des NiceDice
entwickelten. Hier ein Beispiel:


Der NiceDice-GrundbausteinAlle Teile des
NiceDice werden aus einem Block hochwertigem Flugzeug-Aluminium mit computergesteuerten CNC- Maschinen hochpräzise gefräst. Dafür haben wir bereits namhafte Hersteller in Deutschland gewinnen können, die uns
unterstützen. So wird eine hohe Qualität gewährleistet und wir unterstützen
damit gleichzeitig Arbeitsplätze in der Region.
Nach dem Feinschliff bekommt der NiceDice seine exquisite Farbe und seine widerstandsfähige Oberfläche durch ein spezielles Eloxatbad.
Funktion und Qualität
stehen an erster Stelle. Das war uns auch beim Design sehr wichtig. So
haben wir es, nach langem konzipieren, verwerfen und neuentwerfen geschafft den
NiceDice werkzeugfrei einsetzbar zu machen. Den Schraubenzieher kannst Du zu
Hause lassen, denn dank der innovativen Konstruktion ist das System sicher und
stabil und kinderleicht zu fixieren.
Die NiceDice AdapterZum Auftakt
haben wir unseren Fokus darauf gelegt, die wichtigsten der existierenden
Standards zu integrieren. Folgende Adapter sind bereits ausgiebig getestet und
stehen zur Verfügung:
Blitzschuhadapter
- maleBlitzschuhadapter
– femaleStativgewinde
1/4“ - maleStativgewinde
3/8“ – maleVerdoppler –
inkl. 3/8“ – female 
Wir arbeiten
hart daran, den NiceDice zur Serienreife zu überführen.
Alles was uns am
Ende dafür fehlt, ist die Finanzierung für die erste Produktionsserie. Und
genau dafür werden wir Deinen Beitrag einsetzen. Die Kosten für unsere Arbeit werden durch die Kampagne natürlich nicht bezahlt, denn wir glauben an unser Produkt, seinen Nutzen für den Kunden und seinen Erfolg am Markt. Was aber die Kosten für die erste
Produktion angeht, übersteigen diese unseren Rahmen. Neben der Produktion werden wir das Geld für den letzten Schliff am Design einsetzen und ihn in die Produktion überführen.Deshalb vertrauen wir auf
Eure Unterstützung. 
Spende was immer Du kannst, wir sind für alles dankbar.
Bei der Auswahl
der Geschenke haben wir uns viel Mühe gegeben. Besonders freuen würden wir uns
natürlich, wenn Du Dir gleich ein NiceDice Set aussuchst. Es ist tolles
Gefühl, dass der NiceDice so gut bei Dir ankommt, dass Du schon jetzt einen
haben willst. :)*****************











Neben Geld
brauchen wir auch Aufmerksamkeit! Teile diese Kampagne mit Deinen Freunden,
erzähle Ihnen vom NiceDice über Facebook, Morse-Code oder per Brief. Was immer Du bevorzugst :) Hilf uns die Menschen zu erreichen, die uns und unsere Idee
finanzieren wollen.
Besuche unsere Webseite, Like uns auf  Facebook und
trage Dich in unseren Newsletter ein, damit wir Dich über alles auf dem
Laufenden halten können.
Du hast eine
Idee, wie wir unser Produkt noch besser machen könnten? Oder eine Idee für
einen fehlenden Adapter? Dann melde Dich bei uns: Sende uns auch hier
einen MorseCode, einen Brief oder E-Mail! Andreas freut sich auf Deine Nachricht!

story:
Redefining Safety:

At spotNsave we wanted to create something that would allow parents, grandparents, and loved ones to have a peace of mind. Today, we are living in a world where we dont know what is going to happen next. Safety is a big concern, we all in our daily lives think about our loved ones whether they are fine or not.

spotNsave band is a Bluetooth bracelet worn on your wrist ( android users ) and as a key chain or neckpiece ( for iOS users ) and with a double click your location is sent out to your guardian Angels. We have made it very simple for users, without reaching out their phone they can initiate a SoS and alert your loved ones so that they can reach on time.

spotNsave changes the definition of security and provides millions of people the opportunity of a real solution and for the first time, one that is simple yet powerful.

How does it work?

  • Step one: Download spotNsave from your nearest app store and buy our bracelet from www.spotnsave.com or download spotNsave from the play store                    https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.epicelements.spotnsave
  • Step two: Create and activate your account.
  • Step three: Choose up to five guardian angels and you’re ready to go!

In any unpleasant situation, with a Double click on the SOS button on the spotNsave bracelet or Pendant, or a double click on the power button of your phone, spotNsave will send your guardian angels a text with a link to your location. Your guardian will receive the fastest route to your location with turn by turn driving instructions. They can also follow you by real time tracking knowing your exact location. Automatic notifications are sent to your guardian when your battery is running low or when you leave network coverage. Location history is an easy reference for looking later for the most frequent location that you have visited.



Why are we different?

The Bracelet & Pendant makes it easy to use, fast, and secure.

When you are in an unpleasant situation all you need to do is double click the button on your band and your guardian angels will be alerted with your location and every movement of yours until you cancel the SOS.Just imagine if someone grabs you, or you fall, your first instinct would be to look for your phone to inform your loved ones and seek for help, unlike other sos applications, spotNsave allows you to use the bracelet and pendant without having to look for your phone. With a double click on the band, notifications will be sent to your guardians and help will come to you. Help is just a “Double Click “away, Or if your running out of battery, notifications will still be sent to your guardians and safety will still be the top priority. Every micro second counts when you are in an emergency.



Ideal For:

  • Women of any age
  • Old Age Homes
  • Construction Sites
  • For Any individual who wants to feel secure.

Features


Colors Available


Why Indiegogo?

We've been working on our application and the security devices for collectively a year. Our spotNsave team is very proud of the work we've done so far, but we need one more push to get it in production for IOS.

Through Indiegogo you're ORDERING the spotNsave security device. With your support, we will put spotNsave onto wrists worldwide and start ensuring security for millions of people. Your support and contribution is deeply appreciated, your contribution will help fund:

  • Production for iOS Version
  • Final touches on the IOS and Android applications
  • Packaging details for our consumers


The Team 

Perks

Frequently Asked Questions:

story:
Our campaign is over, but if you still like to get a CASE, you can visit our Official website www.CASERemote.com! 


Updates

Great news! 

Thanks to our great R&D members, we will release IOS app together with Android app. Now, we can say that you can enjoy IOS app and Android app when you receive your CASE in July. We have unlocked the first stretch goal!

We got a lot of comments and suggestions from photographers and backers. Many of the comments and suggestions are great.  We really really appreciate it. That's why photography community is so amazing.  A lot of backers ask for hot shoe connection. Here it is:

CASE will have one more connection method! Please comment us any idea you think great for CASE. We will carefully think about it. CASE may be the shape just as you want. CASE is a dream of us, and we believe it will also be a dream of photography community. 


CASE has attracted a lot of press attention. CASE is a solid product, and photographers definitely love it. You can check what the press said:

Click Blog; CASCHYS Blog; Photo Rumors; JuzaPhoto; Ilgossip.net; Pttl.gr; BackerJack; Tech News Report; F Stop Lounge; Photography Blog; GadgetSin

Be the First to Feel CASE Only @ Indiegogo

Quick Review

With CASE’s help, you can wirelessly control your Canon or Nikon DSLR from your mobile devices. Supported devices include Android smart phones and tablets as well as the iPad and iPhone.

Compare

Supporting List

This is NOT the completed list! Please feel free to comment us or send email to us about your camera model.

Operation

Live View


  • Live view from DSLR viewfinder to mobile devices
  • Magnification adjustable
  • Touch screen to focus

Capture And Save Photo

  • Wirelessly capture a photo
  • Quick view photo in mobile device
  • Full resolution image view supported
  • Share photo on internet

Wirelessly Edit Camera


  • Adjust all DLSR parameters remotely
  • View and manage SD card 

Movie


  • Live view recording
  • Touch screen to focus

Time Lapse


  • Set up interval time and shoot number
  • Adjust camera settings for every shot (CASE Pro)

User Friendly


  • Freely attach CASE by 4 types of connections (hot shoe or reusable tape)
  • Super user-friendly App
  • One CASE controlled by multiple IOS and Android devices
  • Plug-in sensors (CASE + CASE Pro)


Who Are We

Our team is a group of young and innovative people that hold the full patent rights to CASE technology. We have won awards in the Liaoning Province Innovation and Entrepreneurship Competition.  Our team features experts in different fields with international education background in the USA, Italy, and China.

Why Indiegogo

All of our team members love photography, and we want to make photography much easier. That’s why we create CASE. We want to share this wonderful tool with all photographers, and make it as cheap as possible. Indiegogo community has supported so many great projects. Unlike many big companies, we don't have huge funds to invest. Thanks to our hard working technique developers, we have used the limited funds to finish this CASE prototype. However, we are running out of money and cannot massive produce CASE for photographers. With more backers’ help, we can decrease the cost further and move faster to release plug-in sensors and CASE Pro. For this reason, we hope to build a popular campaign and spread this wonderful device all over the world.

So help us, join us, and let us make photography much easier!

Be the first to get a CASE.

Start enjoying easy photography.

Your contribution will not only help us, but also decrease the price of CASE to help all others who love this smart device.

All funds will be used for mass production and product R&D. We will ship CASE in approximately 3 months.  

Time Line

Indiegogo campaign timeline:

CASE will be well packaged and shipped to you!!!

Stretch Goals

CASE is a smart photography platform with various plug-in smart sensors. In the future, you can order any plug-in sensor to make photography with CASE much easier!

We will release two versions of the CASE App: CASE and CASE Pro.  They will be available in Google Play and the Apple Store.

CASE and CASE Pro App comparison:

CASE now, enjoy future!

Even if we raise no money, CASE development will still strictly follow this schedule:

Rewards

Updated perks!!!

Many backers suggest customer engraving service, we hear that. Here it is. You can choose $10 perk to engrave some special words on your CASE. The engraving letters will be on the back side of CASE, and limited in 16 English letters (number is also accepted). You can send the words by email to us. We will take care of the rest.

Risks and Challenges

CASE is a solid product. We have demonstrated this with our prototype. However, as with all crowd-funding campaigns, there are risks and challenges:

(a)  Fewer units sold may increase price

We are confident with CASE. After some predictive calculation, we offer CASE at $79. If we can achieve the goal ($15,000), that’s perfect. If not, we will still keep our word even if we lose money. CASE is a wonderful device for photographers, and Cheering Tech is a trustworthy team.

(b)  Supply and production

We have some resources here to support mass production. Our team will preorder key components and prepare for production. We will try our best to make it happen as soon as possible.

(c)  Shipping

We cannot control what will happen during the delivery. We will choose trustworthy shipping company like UPS, FedEx, DHL etc. However, there is still no guarantee that this will work in your country (most country will be no problem). 

FAQ

Unfortunately，CASE doesn't work stably with most of Sony and Panasonic cameras. We will continue to update FAQ

  1. What are the shipping costs?
    It is free shipping for China mainland, Hong kong, Taiwan, Macau. $15 for shipping outside China. 
  2. When can I receive my CASE?
    We will start to deliver CASE in July 2014. And you can download the Android CASE App on Google Play for free. Please check our stretch goals and updates for the release date of IOS CASE App.
  3. Can I choose any other colors?
    Now we only provide black and white CASE. We will provide more colors if a lot of supports request.
  4. Can I use multiple smart devices with my CASE?
    Yes. One CASE can be controlled by multiple Android and IOS devices.
  5. If I get a CASE now, can this CASE work with CASE Pro App in the future?
    Yes, absolutely. There will be two versions of App: CASE and CASE Pro. Both of the App will work with CASE.
  6. Is the reusable tape included in the CASE package?
    Yes, of course. A double headed USB connector is also included, so you can choose different connection methods to connect CASE to your camera. This tape is special tape, it will not leave any traces to your camera, and can be used for many times. We all know that camera is our baby :)
  7. Does CASE support Sony and Panasonic cameras?
    Unfortunately，CASE doesn't work stably with most of Sony and Panasonic cameras.
  8. Is Canon's zoom feature in live view to pull critical focus?
    Of course, CASE can provide zoom feature in live view mode, that's very important feature of CASE App.

For any further information about CASE or if you wish to talk to us, you can contact us at email sales@cheeringtech.com

Our campaign is over, but if you still like to
get a CASE, you can visit our Official website www.CASERemote.com! 
UpdatesGreat news! Thanks to our great R&D members, we will release IOS app together with Android app. Now, we can say that you can enjoy IOS app and Android app when you receive your CASE in July. We have unlocked the first stretch goal!We got a lot of comments and suggestions from photographers and backers. Many of the comments and suggestions are great.  We really really appreciate it. That's why photography community is so amazing.  A lot of backers ask for hot shoe connection. Here it is:CASE will have one more connection method! Please comment us any idea you think great for CASE. We will carefully think about it. CASE may be the shape just as you want. CASE is a dream of us, and we believe it will also be a dream of photography community. CASE has attracted a lot of press attention. CASE is a solid product, and photographers definitely love it. You can check what the press said:Click Blog; CASCHYS Blog; Photo Rumors; JuzaPhoto; Ilgossip.net; Pttl.gr; BackerJack; Tech News Report; F Stop Lounge; Photography Blog; GadgetSinBe the First to Feel CASE Only @ Indiegogo







Quick Review
With CASE’s help, you can wirelessly control your Canon or Nikon DSLR from your mobile devices. Supported devices include Android smart phones and tablets as well as the iPad and iPhone.




Compare



Supporting List
This is NOT the completed list! Please feel free to comment us or send email to us about your camera model.

Operation

Live View


Live view from DSLR viewfinder to mobile devices


Magnification adjustable


Touch screen to focus


Capture And Save Photo


Wirelessly capture a photo


Quick view photo in mobile device


Full resolution image view supported


Share photo on internet


Wirelessly Edit Camera


Adjust all DLSR parameters remotely


View and manage SD card 


Movie


Live view recording


Touch screen to focus


Time Lapse


Set up interval time and shoot number


Adjust camera settings for every shot (CASE Pro)


User Friendly


Freely attach CASE by 4 types of connections (hot shoe or reusable tape)


Super user-friendly App


One CASE controlled by multiple IOS and Android devices

Plug-in sensors (CASE + CASE Pro)


Who Are We
Our team is a group of young and innovative people that hold the full patent rights to CASE technology. We have won awards in the Liaoning Province Innovation and Entrepreneurship Competition.  Our team features experts in different fields with international education background in the USA, Italy, and China.

Why Indiegogo
All of our team members love photography, and we want to make photography much easier. That’s why we create CASE. We want to share this wonderful tool with all photographers, and make it as cheap as possible. Indiegogo community has supported so many great projects. Unlike many big companies, we don't have huge funds to invest. Thanks to our hard working technique developers, we have used the limited funds to finish this CASE prototype. However, we are running out of money and cannot massive produce CASE for photographers. With more backers’ help, we can decrease the cost further and move faster to release plug-in sensors and CASE Pro. For this reason, we hope to build a popular campaign and spread this wonderful device all over the world.

So help us, join us, and let us make photography much easier!Be the first to get a CASE.Start enjoying easy photography.Your contribution will not only help us, but also decrease the price of CASE to help all others who love this smart device.All funds will be used for mass production and product R&D. We will ship CASE in approximately 3 months.  

Time Line
Indiegogo campaign timeline:

CASE will be well packaged and shipped to you!!!


Stretch Goals

CASE is a smart photography platform with various plug-in smart sensors. In the future, you can order any plug-in sensor to make photography with CASE much easier!We will release two versions of the CASE App: CASE and CASE Pro.  They will be available in Google Play and the Apple Store.CASE and CASE Pro App comparison:

CASE now, enjoy future!Even if we raise no money, CASE development will still strictly follow this schedule:


RewardsUpdated perks!!!Many backers suggest customer engraving service, we hear that. Here it is. You can choose $10 perk to engrave some special words on your CASE. The engraving letters will be on the back side of CASE, and limited in 16 English letters (number is also accepted). You can send the words by email to us. We will take care of the rest.


Risks and Challenges
CASE is a solid product. We have demonstrated this with our prototype. However, as with all crowd-funding campaigns, there are risks and challenges:(a)  Fewer units sold may increase priceWe are confident with CASE. After some predictive calculation, we offer CASE at $79. If we can achieve the goal ($15,000), that’s perfect. If not, we will still keep our word even if we lose money. CASE is a wonderful device for photographers, and Cheering Tech is a trustworthy team.(b)  Supply and productionWe have some resources here to support mass production. Our team will preorder key components and prepare for production. We will try our best to make it happen as soon as possible.(c)  ShippingWe cannot control what will happen during the delivery. We will choose trustworthy shipping company like UPS, FedEx, DHL etc. However, there is still no guarantee that this will work in your country (most country will be no problem). 

FAQ
Unfortunately，CASE doesn't work stably with most of Sony and
Panasonic cameras. We will continue to update FAQ

What are the shipping costs?It is free shipping for China mainland, Hong kong, Taiwan, Macau. $15 for shipping outside China. 


When can I receive my CASE?We will start to deliver CASE in July 2014. And you can download the Android CASE App on Google Play for free. Please check our stretch goals and updates for the release date of IOS CASE App.


Can I choose any other colors?Now we only provide black and white CASE. We will provide more colors if a lot of supports request.


Can I use multiple smart devices with my CASE?Yes. One CASE can be controlled by multiple Android and IOS devices.


If I get a CASE now, can this CASE work with CASE Pro App in the future?Yes, absolutely. There will be two versions of App: CASE and CASE Pro. Both of the App will work with CASE.


Is the reusable tape included in the CASE package?Yes, of course. A double headed USB connector is also included, so you can choose different connection methods to connect CASE to your camera. This tape is special tape, it will not leave any traces to your camera, and can be used for many times. We all know that camera is our baby :)


Does CASE support Sony and Panasonic cameras?Unfortunately，CASE doesn't work stably with most of Sony and Panasonic cameras.


Is Canon's zoom feature in live view to pull critical focus?Of course, CASE can provide zoom feature in live view mode, that's very important feature of CASE App.

For any further information about CASE or if you wish to talk to us, you can contact us at email sales@cheeringtech.com

story:
For Consumers, Merchants, and Acquirers.

For Merchants

Online Merchants:

  • By accepting amhCard you pay a much lower fee per transaction. Lower than for credit cards. 
  • You can accept small payments as little as 1c.  You pay a flat 10% fee on transactions under $2. That's 1c on a 10c sale and 10c on a $1 sale.  For transactions between $2 to $10  our fees are a flat 2.5%.  For transactions above $10, we charge 1.5%. We have a fee schedule that ensures that your transaction fees are much lower than credit card fees for all amounts from 1c to $1,000.
  • It's simple to use. You simply register at our web site and download a self installing amhCard package.  You configure your payments page(s) and you are ready to begin accepting amhCard.
  • There are no monthly charges for merchants with less than 500 transactions per month or for any merchants who support us.
  • Catalog and TV sales no longer require “Operators are standing by”.  Auction vendors don’t need special registration.  You can receive funds directly into your phone.  Its real cash.  You transfer it out of the phone or draw it from an ATM once you receive it.

Offline Merchants:

  • You can accept mobile payments with your existing terminal. You simply register, download and install our UPGRADE TERMINAL APP and you are ready to accept amhCard.  
  • You get an automatic terminal upgrade, if your credit card Acquirer is an amhCard partner.  You instantly become capable of processing amhCard mobile payments.  Your transaction fees will be what you negotiated with your Acquirer.
  • Get the amhCard POS terminal, and pay much lower fees for amhCard mobile payment transactions. Your terminal will also handle biometric payments, that is a consumer can make a payment with his thumb and index finger.  You will also be able to accept “tap-and-go” amhCard mobile payments.  (Note:  This is a new patent-pending technology that works on any phone, we do not use NFC or bar codes).

For Consumers

amhCard is cash on your cell phone or mobile device.  You download the amhCard Mobile Payment App (AMPA) from the amhCard site or Android market.  You then load your phone either online from your bank account or debit card, or offline by paying an amhCard agent. Once your phone is loaded you can:

  • Buy online and offline. That is you can pay in-store or purchase from Amazon.com with your phone.
  • Pay any amount from 1c to $1,000
  • Transfer funds to anyone who has a cell phone.
  • Draw the cash on your phone from an ATM using a special amhCard debit card which we mail to you.  Its linked to the funds on your phone instead of to a bank account.
  • Remotely unload the cash on your phone, if you loose your phone. You can transfer the unloaded cash to another phone or to a bank account.
  • See your cash balance in real time after each transaction.

Our technology is novel, and protected by multiple issued and pending patents. It's not Square. It's not NFC.  It's not SMS.  It's cash on your phone.

For Acquirers

With our software, an Acquirer supporter can enable all its merchants to accept amhCard mobile payments with one software upgrade.

Our Technology

amhCard has multiple technology innovations undergirding its payment features. All are patented or patent-pending. We have also implemented robust security functions across every amhCard payment feature to ensure that your cash is very, very safe. 

How we'll use the funds.

Our prototype only has 3 features and we need to develop the remaining 3, as all 6 need to be present at launch. In addition, because amhCard is a payment product, it is subject to stringent regulation, even for the prototype, so we need robust (read: expensive) infrastructure to meet regulations which include backup, reporting, security, and data retention requirements.

So funds raised will be used to:

  • Complete development of remaining payment modules for the amhCard Mobile Payment App (AMPA), for mobile devices, as well as the complementary modules which run on our back-end systems.  We also need to full QA of both new and existing modules before prototype release.  For example, we have tested our terminal upgrade module on the two most widely used terminals in the US, but need to test on a wider range of terminals. 

  • Purchase additional computer hardware for our “prototype” back-end processing infrastructure that will support a few merchants and about 5,000 users on Android and IOS devices. We will scale out this infrastructure to support up to 30 million consumers for production. A cloud infrastructure solution though cheaper than building our own, has PCI DSS constraints that make it unsuitable for storing payment data.

We will distribute our full featured prototype to our supporters in March 2013 and go live in May 2013.  

THE FUTURE.

Big banks, payments providers, and several deep pocket entities are all pursuing mobile payments but they currently lack the technology and deployment strategy, though they expect to develop this 2 to 3 years in the future.  We have both, the technology and the strategy.  Here. Now. 

amhCard. The future of money is here.

story:
MiFunnel Real Estate Sales Forecasting App Summary

Many real estate agents in the real estate business today are running their businesses blind and may one day go broke, if they do not start tracking and plotting the critical sales metrics that would help them become successful business owners.

Enter stage right. The MiFunnel Real Estate Sales Forecasting App is an aspiring, simple iphone app that would help Real Estate Agents keep track of their future and pending sales activity.

Funding is for:

Design of the logo; development of the app itself which includes wireframing, design mock-ups, creative assets, and programming. This inculdes creative copy for a splash page, the ad copy within the app store and subsequent screen shots.

Soup to Nuts: You would be supporting us from start to finish and essentially help us get our product to market.

The Impact

If you are a real estate agent reading this, I bet you can imagine sitting at an open house or in-between appointments calculating your monthly commissions in your head and trying to figure out what you absolutely must do for the day, week or month so that your transactions and deals successfully get to the closing table. But, you might not have your lap top with you, but I know you will at the very least have your cell phone on you. Our goal is to make it easier for you to conduct your business in the field. Everything is going mobile right? Why not mobile sales forecasting?
 
Imagine how easy it could be to have an all in one app to set reminders about transactions. Imagine getting a call from a hot lead on the road and never having to lose the name, phone number, email address of hot lead ever again. Imagine knowing how much money you are going to make per deal and how much you have to set aside for taxes without having to sit through and do messy commission calculations! UGH!
 
Stop the madness and start thinking like a business owner.
 
Let's face it agents and other business owners alike. Business is mobile and we need mobile soltuions to keep up with the pace (life, ugh I mean real estate sales.)
 

Other Ways You Can Help

Get the word out and make some noise about our campaign. We appreciate contributions, facebook updates, tweets, and just about anything else that might help us reach our fundraising goal inside of 45 days or less.

If you are not in the real estate industry, why should you care?

Sometimes its fun to get behind cool projects and show your support. If you have a friend, relative or former co-worker that is in the real estate industry, you should know that they need tools to keep them on track and productive. This is one of the ones you might want to suggest to them. (:-)

Plus, our company is about paying it forward and we intend to give back a percentage of our proceeds to causes that help the real estate industry like foreclosure prevention or counseling; down-payment assistance for buyers; college scholarship for Agents with children and other positive causes to raise awaresness about the challenges both agents and consumers face in today's economy. Or maybe you know Angie Perez personally and want to support her cause. Either way, we'd be happy to have your support in any which way you can lend a hand. Thanks again for your support.

story:
CLICK HERE TO ACCESS OUR REWARDS PROGRAM QUICK SHARE PAGE EARN UP TO $25 OFF PUKU PERKS!


puku [poo-koo]

1. an African antelope, Kobus Vardonii, closely related to the reedbuck and impala, known for its speed, strength and survival instincts.
2. the most stylish charging device.

Puku is a high capacity, high powered, and high fashion USB charger for all your mobile devices. Puku merges form and function into one power-packed stylish device.

The flagship Puku S8, now Puku Flash was launched Fall 2013. Backed by popular demand, Puku is launching the Puku Spark and the Puku Bolt exclusively on Indiegogo.

With your support on Indiegogo, we will be able to bring Puku to millions of people in need of  beautifully designed, high quality chargers at a more affordable price. Proceeds will be used directly to start a larger production run for new and existing models.

Learn more about Puku below. 

Also, check us out on Instagram.

Introducing the Puku Spark

The Spark comes with the power and style of the Puku Flash, but more compact, lighter to carry and definitely lighter on your wallet. 

Say hello to the Puku Bolt

Previously available only in the Camo prints, but now available in all the six Puku colors. The Bolt has the designs and dimensions of the Flash but with higher battery capacity. 

Apple lightning cables now included

Puku now includes a beautiful lightning short cord, perfect for charging Apple devices. 


 

No two people are the same, and neither are their power needs. That's why Puku comes in three different sizes, to match your lifestyle.

Space in your bag or pockets is precious. Puku Spark was built with this in mind. Though it may be small (less than 4 inches long) the Puku Spark packs a 6000mAh battery capable of fully charging your smart phone 2 to 3 times. With that much power, you'll get over 24 hours of extra talk time and over 104 hours of music and movies.

Whether you're trying to make it uptown on the subway or make it across the ocean on a 747, you're not always going to be able to find a power outlet. The Puku Flash stores a high capacity 8000mAh battery in a package smaller than a pack of cigarettes. With 8000mAh of battery life, you can fully power most smartphones 3 to 5 times, giving you over 36 hours of extra talk time and over 153 hours of music or video playback. 

Sometimes you just need more power. With the Puku Bolt we've done something incredible by putting a huge 12000mAh battery in a beautiful device that is smaller than most smartphones. Puku Bolt has enough power to completely recharge most tablets, or fully charge most smartphones up to 6 times, giving you an incredible 50+ hours of talk time, and over 210 hours of music or video playback. With the Puku Bolt, you'll never run out of power again.





Puku is the perfect accessory for any smartphone, tablet, or other USB charged device, keeping your favorite device charged and ready for any situation. The minimalist curved design and soft touch matte finish allows you to look great and feel great while you stay charged.


With Puku's dual USB ports, you can charge two devices at once from it's high capacity lithium-ion battery. Puku's batteries can go through over 500 charge cycles before beginning to wear out.


Puku comes with a signature micro-USB cable with American Wire Gauge (AWG) Standard 28/24, ideal for high speed conductivity. This cable charges the Puku unit and Android devices approximately 1.8x faster than the typical 28/28 USB cable. 



Founded by New York - based entrepreneurs, Meck Khalfan, Ani Onuorah and Abraham Merishani, Puku was inspired by necessity in the aftermath of Hurricane Sandy. The flagship Puku S8 portable charger (now Puku Flash) was developed and launched within 10 months of the event that left thousands of New Yorkers, powerless for days.

Since then, the company has been fortunate enough to attract the help and support of friends, family, experienced trendsetters and professionals in the field of fashion, design, engineering, finance, legal, marketing and mobile technologies.

Thanks to all the support, Puku has been able to grow faster and accomplish more than ever anticipated within 1 year of operations. See the major milestones resourcefully accomplished below. 

The Puku Charger was developed with a passion and a sense of responsibility to present New York City’s iconic style, fashion and culture to the world. 

Our motto: "Charge Where You Are" expresses our core belief that everyone deserves a quality and stylish charger engineered for performance. 

We earnestly thank our loyal fans, customers and supporters. With your backing on Indiegogo, we look forward to bringing Puku to millions of people across the globe in need of a quality charger. 

Sincerely
Team Puku

Key Accomplishments

  • Puku became the most requested item among fashion enthusiasts at the New York, Milan, Paris and Moscow Fashion Weeks. 


  • Shipped to customers in over 20 countries within 3 months of NYFW launch. 
  • Established e-commerce site and other market place presence on Amazon, EBay, Rakkuten and NewEgg.com.
  • Retail partnership with Urban Outfitters and other concept stores. 


  • Established partnerships with Victoria's Secret, The View, and the NBA via the State Farm assist center. 

Click HERE to see more in our Gallery!

See where Puku has been on our Instagram!


The Puku Flash and Bolt will be delivered between May and June. The Puku Sparks will be delivered between June and July.


When will I get to choose the color of my Puku? 

Following the end of the project, backers will be contacted to confirm color choices, and select which color Puku they prefer. 

Am I supposed to manually add shipping if I'm not in the US?

Yes, you have to add shipping on top of your selected perk. When you pledge, manually add an additional $10 or $15 to the price of the perk you want, $10 for the Puku Spark and $15 for the Puku Bolt or Flash, please note this is on a per unit basis. We will do the matching at the end of the campaign.

Can I have my Puku’s shipped to different addresses?

No, all Puku’s for your backing will be shipped to a single address. 

Do you ship internationally?

We will ship the Puku chargers globally, with the exception of Argentina, Belarus, Cuba, Iran, Iraq, Lebanon, Libya, Myanmar/Burma, North Korea, Russia, Somalia, Sudan, Syria, and Yemen. Please note that you may be responsible for duties, fees and taxes applicable to your region.  FYI orders from Canada are considered to be international.

Help! What do I do if I forget to pay for shipping?

No problem. Click the contribute now button at the top of the page and manually enter $10 or $15 depending on your Puku. It will be added to your pledge amount. Enter the same personal information you did on your initial contribution. We will do the matching ourselves at the end of the campaign.

When are you going to be shipping my Puku? 

Indiegogo isn't like Amazon or any other online store. When you contribute to Puku you are funding all of our engineering, software, manufacturing and shipping. Everything that is needed to make a real product.  We estimate that delivery to backers will start mid - June 2015. 

I asked for my perk to be sent to the wrong address! What do I do?

Please email us at customerservice@gotpuku.com to make the appropriate adjustment.

How much charge can I get out of my Puku?

Puku Bolt- 4 - 6 smartphone charges and at least 100% charge on tablets (12000 mAh battery)

Puku Flash- 3 - 5 smartphone charges and 50 - 100% charge on tablets (8000 mAh battery)

Puku Spark- 2 - 3 smartphone charges and 40 - 75% charge on tablets (6000 mAh battery)

Is Puku waterproof?

No, please don’t take it swimming.

What devices are Puku’s compatible with?

Puku’s are hardware agnostic and can charge any device with a USB cable.

Can I choose the color of my cables?
No, each Puku package comes standard with a micro USB cable and lightning short cord.  The color of the lightning short cord matches the color of your preferred Puku.  FYI the Camo print Puku’s are matched with a cool gray lightning short cord.

When will I see updates received from you?
Updates on how the project is progressing will be done on a monthly basis on Indiegogo and across our social platforms. You should receive this update via email too. If not please check your spam folder. Please keep an eye on the comments field of the campaign where a lot of questions you are looking for have been answered already.

I want a refund?
Refunds are at the discretion of the creator. You have entered a contract with the creator to see this product goes into production and to be one of the first to receive one at a discounted price before it goes to retail. All funds raised have been used for production, graphic design, app design, marketing, logistics, tooling, manufacturing, sourcing etc. Please see the Indiegogo playbook for more information on the fundamentals of crowdfunding.

Please Note: Indiegogo is not a webshop.

What does Puku mean?

Puku is a breed of antelope found in the savanna grasslands of central Africa mostly in Tanzania and Zambia. They are beautiful, fast and the strongest among the existing members of the antelope family. Known for excellent survival instincts, Puku survives in extremely wet or dry weather conditions. They also live in high altitudes when escaping floods.

We feel deeply connected to these attributes of Puku which we have integrated in the Puku design and brand. Our mission is to ensure that everyone has the freedom to charge where they are using high quality and high performance portable chargers with beautiful and superior design attributes in a class of its own.

What is included in a single Puku package?

Each Puku package includes the following:

Puku Bolt – Charger, 2.1 Amp Socket, Micro USB Cable, Lightning Short Cord, Carry Bag and a User’s Manual

Puku Flash – Charger, 2.1 Amp Socket, Micro USB Cable, Lightning Short Cord, Carry Bag and a User’s Manual

Puku Spark – Charger, Micro USB Cable, Lightning Short Cord, Carry Bag and a User’s Manual

How do I charge my Puku?

You can charge your Puku with the included charger or a compatible USB charger for your local outlets. The Puku charger comes with a USB cable which has a micro-USB connector and a wall charger. Charge your Puku by connecting it to the wall charger via the micro-USB connector.Depending on the Puku model, it takes 3-6 hours to fully charge the Puku.

Please note that the Puku Spark does not come with a wall socket.  The device can be charged from any USB wall socket or laptop.  The Puku Flash and Puku Bolt both have sockets that can be used for charging.

How do I know how much battery life is left on my Puku?

The Puku comes with a battery level indicator that displays different colors depending on the charge level of your Puku. White: 71-100%, Orange: 35-70%, Red: 11-34%, Flashing Red: 0-10%

Can I charge my Puku from the wall while charging my device with the Puku?

Yes

How do I know my Puku is fully charged?

The flashing indicator becomes a solid white color once your Puku device is fully charged.
story_txt:
CLICK HERE TO ACCESS OUR REWARDS PROGRAM QUICK SHARE PAGE EARN UP TO $25 OFF PUKU PERKS!
puku [poo-koo]1. an African antelope, Kobus Vardonii, closely related to the reedbuck and impala, known for its speed, strength and survival instincts.2. the most stylish charging device.

Puku is a high capacity, high powered, and high fashion USB charger for all your mobile devices. Puku merges form and function into one power-packed stylish device.



The flagship Puku S8, now Puku Flash was launched Fall 2013. Backed by popular demand, Puku is launching the Puku Spark and the Puku Bolt exclusively on Indiegogo.
With your support on Indiegogo, we will be able to bring Puku to millions of people in need of  beautifully designed, high quality chargers at a more affordable price. Proceeds will be used directly to start a larger production run for new and existing models. 
Learn more about Puku below. 
Also, check us out on Instagram.

Introducing the Puku Spark


The Spark comes with the power and style of the Puku Flash, but more compact, lighter to carry and definitely lighter on your wallet. 
Say hello to the Puku Bolt



Previously available only in the Camo prints, but now available in all the six Puku colors. The Bolt has the designs and dimensions of the Flash but with higher battery capacity. 
Apple lightning cables now included


Puku now includes a beautiful lightning short cord, perfect for charging Apple devices. 


 No two people are the same, and neither are their power needs. That's why Puku comes in three different sizes, to match your lifestyle.

Space in your bag or pockets is precious. Puku Spark was built with this in mind. Though it may be small (less than 4 inches long) the Puku Spark packs a 6000mAh battery capable of fully charging your smart phone 2 to 3 times. With that much power, you'll get over 24 hours of extra talk time and over 104 hours of music and movies.Whether you're trying to make it uptown on the subway or make it across the ocean on a 747, you're not always going to be able to find a power outlet. The Puku Flash stores a high capacity 8000mAh battery in a package smaller than a pack of cigarettes. With 8000mAh of battery life, you can fully power most smartphones 3 to 5 times, giving you over 36 hours of extra talk time and over 153 hours of music or video playback. 

Sometimes you just need more power. With the Puku Bolt we've done something incredible by putting a huge 12000mAh battery in a beautiful device that is smaller than most smartphones. Puku Bolt has enough power to completely recharge most tablets, or fully charge most smartphones up to 6 times, giving you an incredible 50+ hours of talk time, and over 210 hours of music or video playback. With the Puku Bolt, you'll never run out of power again.









Puku is the perfect accessory for any smartphone, tablet, or other USB charged device, keeping your favorite device charged and ready for any situation. The minimalist curved design and soft touch matte finish allows you to look great and feel great while you stay charged.




With Puku's dual USB ports, you can charge two devices at once from it's high capacity lithium-ion battery. Puku's batteries can go through over 500 charge cycles before beginning to wear out.






Puku comes with a signature micro-USB cable with American Wire Gauge (AWG) Standard 28/24, ideal for high speed conductivity. This cable charges the Puku unit and Android devices approximately 1.8x faster than the typical 28/28 USB cable. 









Founded by New York - based entrepreneurs, Meck Khalfan, Ani Onuorah and Abraham Merishani, Puku was inspired by necessity in the aftermath of Hurricane Sandy. The flagship Puku S8 portable charger (now Puku Flash) was developed and launched within 10 months of the event that left thousands of New Yorkers, powerless for days.Since then, the company has been fortunate enough to attract the help and support of friends, family, experienced trendsetters and professionals in the field of fashion, design, engineering, finance, legal, marketing and mobile technologies.Thanks to all the support, Puku has been able to grow faster and accomplish more than ever anticipated within 1 year of operations. See the major milestones resourcefully accomplished below. The Puku Charger was developed with a passion and a sense of responsibility to present New York City’s iconic style, fashion and culture to the world. Our motto: "Charge Where You Are" expresses our core belief that everyone deserves a quality and stylish charger engineered for performance. We earnestly thank our loyal fans, customers and supporters. With your backing on Indiegogo, we look forward to bringing Puku to millions of people across the globe in need of a quality charger. SincerelyTeam Puku



Key Accomplishments


Puku became the most requested item among fashion enthusiasts at the New York, Milan, Paris and Moscow Fashion Weeks. 




Shipped to customers in over 20 countries within 3 months of NYFW launch. 


Established e-commerce site and other market place presence on Amazon, EBay, Rakkuten and NewEgg.com.

Retail partnership with Urban Outfitters and other concept stores. 



Established partnerships with Victoria's Secret, The View, and the NBA via the State Farm assist center. 


Click HERE to see more in our Gallery!See where Puku has been on our Instagram!
The Puku Flash and Bolt will be delivered between May and June. The Puku Sparks will be delivered between June and July.






When will I get to choose the color
of my Puku? 
Following the end of the project, backers will
be contacted to confirm color choices, and select which color Puku they prefer. 
Am I supposed to manually add shipping if I'm not
in the US?
Yes,
you have to add shipping on top of your selected perk. When you pledge,
manually add an additional $10 or $15 to the price of the perk you want, $10 for the Puku Spark and $15 for the Puku Bolt or Flash, please note this is on a per unit basis. We will do the matching at the
end of the campaign. 
Can I have my Puku’s shipped to different
addresses?
No,
all Puku’s for your backing will be shipped to a single address.  
Do you ship internationally?
We will ship the Puku chargers globally, with the exception
of Argentina, Belarus, Cuba, Iran, Iraq, Lebanon, Libya, Myanmar/Burma,
North Korea, Russia, Somalia, Sudan, Syria, and Yemen. Please note that you may
be responsible for duties, fees and taxes applicable to your region.  FYI orders from Canada are considered to be
international.
Help! What do I do if I forget to pay for
shipping?
No problem. Click the contribute now button at
the top of the page and manually enter $10 or $15 depending on your Puku. It
will be added to your pledge amount. Enter the same personal information you
did on your initial contribution. We will do the matching ourselves at the end
of the campaign.
When are you going to be shipping my Puku? 
Indiegogo isn't like Amazon or any other online
store. When you contribute to Puku you are funding all of our engineering,
software, manufacturing and shipping. Everything that is needed to make a real
product.  We estimate that delivery to backers will start mid - June 2015. 
I asked for my perk to be sent to the wrong
address! What do I do?
Please email us at customerservice@gotpuku.com to make the appropriate adjustment.
How much charge can I get out of my Puku?
Puku Bolt- 4 - 6 smartphone charges and at least 100% charge on
tablets (12000 mAh battery)
Puku Flash- 3 - 5 smartphone charges and 50 - 100% charge on
tablets (8000 mAh battery)
Puku Spark- 2 - 3 smartphone charges and 40 - 75% charge on
tablets (6000 mAh battery)
Is Puku waterproof?
No, please don’t take it swimming.

What devices are Puku’s compatible with?
Puku’s are hardware agnostic and can charge any
device with a USB cable.
Can I choose the color of my cables?
No, each Puku package comes standard with a micro
USB cable and lightning short cord.  The
color of the lightning short cord matches the color of your preferred
Puku.  FYI the Camo print Puku’s are
matched with a cool gray lightning short cord.

When will I see updates received from you?
Updates
on how the project is progressing will be done on a monthly basis on Indiegogo
and across our social platforms. You should receive this update via email
too. If not please check your spam folder. Please keep an eye on the comments
field of the campaign where a lot of questions you are looking for have been
answered already.

I want a refund?
Refunds are at the discretion of the creator. You have entered a contract with
the creator to see this product goes into production and to be one of the first
to receive one at a discounted price before it goes to retail. All funds raised
have been used for production, graphic design, app design, marketing,
logistics, tooling, manufacturing, sourcing etc. Please see the Indiegogo
playbook for more information on the fundamentals of crowdfunding.

Please Note: Indiegogo is not a webshop.

What
does Puku mean?
Puku is a
breed of antelope found in the savanna grasslands of central Africa mostly in
Tanzania and Zambia. They are beautiful, fast and the strongest among the
existing members of the antelope family. Known for excellent survival
instincts, Puku survives in extremely wet or dry weather conditions. They also
live in high altitudes when escaping floods.
We feel
deeply connected to these attributes of Puku which we have integrated in the
Puku design and brand. Our mission is to ensure that everyone has the freedom
to charge where they are using high quality and high performance portable
chargers with beautiful and superior design attributes in a class of its own.
What
is included in a single Puku package?

Each Puku package includes the following:
Puku Bolt – Charger, 2.1 Amp Socket, Micro USB
Cable, Lightning Short Cord, Carry Bag and a User’s Manual
Puku Flash – Charger, 2.1 Amp Socket, Micro USB
Cable, Lightning Short Cord, Carry Bag and a User’s Manual
Puku Spark – Charger, Micro USB Cable,
Lightning Short Cord, Carry Bag and a User’s Manual


How
do I charge my Puku?
You can charge your Puku with the included charger or a
compatible USB charger for your local outlets. The Puku charger comes with a
USB cable which has a micro-USB connector and a wall charger. Charge your Puku
by connecting it to the wall charger via the micro-USB connector.Depending on the Puku model, it takes 3-6 hours to fully charge the Puku. 
Please note that the Puku Spark does not come with a wall
socket.  The device can be charged from
any USB wall socket or laptop.  The Puku
Flash and Puku Bolt both have sockets that can be used for charging.
How
do I know how much battery life is left on my Puku?
The Puku comes with a battery level indicator that displays
different colors depending on the charge level of your Puku. White: 71-100%,
Orange: 35-70%, Red: 11-34%, Flashing Red: 0-10%

Can
I charge my Puku from the wall while charging my device with the Puku?
Yes
How
do I know my Puku is fully charged?
The flashing indicator becomes a solid white color once your
Puku device is fully charged.

story:
Get your "Free limited edition Duet"

We are extending ‘Free Limited Color Edition Black Duets’ to our Indiegogo campaign backers and will ship it to you by End-September. Please use the sharing tools above to enjoy the benefits. 

We will publish all referral results by the end of our campaign. We will be prototyping and creating a new ‘Gold’ Duet for our top 3 Duet ambassador. Exclusively to him only. Terms and conditions apply.

*This is the extension of our $107,127 campaign*

We are absolutely blown away by the overwhelming response in our first Duet campaign (see it here:http://bit.ly/1haEhPN). What started out originally as an idea to validate if people would get a Duet to prevent phone loss, became a $107,127 project! After the campaign closed, we had several requests from people who wanted an extension in order to order Duet.  We mulled hard over these decision, and so here's the GOOD NEWS.  The Duet Team has decided to extend the campaign to make Duet available again to more people!

*Shipping Updates*

Due to lessons learnt in our previous campaign, Duets ordered in this extension will be shipped earlier by end-September 2014. 

We'll take this chance to incorporate feedbacks we will receive from the previous campaign to deliver a better Duet experience to you.

Thank you for your love and support!

Do you, or someone you know often lose smartphones?

Duet, and the PROTAG app, is an entire eco-system built upon latest Bluetooth 4.0 Low Energy technology, to prevent you from losing your phone. It’s your phone’s ever watchful buddy.


Jump to: Why Get Duet? | Colors | App | Team | FAQs|Perks 

Why Get Duet?

1.You'll Never Lose Your Smartphone Again

Be alerted quickly if you've left your smartphone behind! Duet's in-built seperation alarm immediately beeps anytime you’re more than 10m away from your phone, so you can hear and return immediately to retrieve it before its lost.

Let's say you’ve accidentally dropped your phone out of your pocket in a cafe and walked off. With duet's beep, you’ll know it right away. And for those of us with a habit of losing phones, you will find that Duet’s alarm trains your brain to develop the good habit of checking if the phone’s on you always. Say goodbye forever to the panic, worry and frustration of losing personal messages, contact lists and selfie photos.

Key Features

Prompt - Left your phone behind? You will be immediately alerted by duet’s in-built speaker

Intuitive use- Just press a button on duet, and you can audibly ring your phone even if its in silent mode. Great if you often leave keys under the sofa.

Everlasting - Easy to replace battery gives you 6 months of uninterrupted power.

Discreet - With Wifi Safe zones,duet knows when to alert you, and when not to. Useful especially if you work in confined spaces such as offices or classrooms.

Amazing connectivity - duet works even in airplane mode. All you need is to turn on Bluetooth.


2.You'll Never Lose Your Valuables Too

Duet can be attached to your valuables. It works together with the all-new PROTAG™ app. The  app constantly monitors your duet-tagged valuables. For example, if you've left your wallet behind in the cafe, the app will notify you. And you can even see the last known GPS location of your valuables on the map. This way, you can be assured that your valuables are always being safeguarded too.

3.You'll Love That It's Versatile

While designing duet, we strove to keep the form factor small, simple to use, and versatile. At just just 2.8 cm X 2.8 cm, it is one of the world’s smallest bluetooth tags. Duet can be easily attached to keys, thumb drives and wallets. Or it can be hung on your bags and handheld clutch.


Jump to: Why Get Duet? | Colors | App | Team | FAQs|Perks 

Duet Comes in 5 anything-but-dull colours 

There's a colour for every personality. Whether you are action-oriented, cool, serious, sociable, or simple person, take your pick of duet’s 5 colors.

PROTAG App

duet connects by Bluetooth to your iPhone or Android device. Setting up duet is as easy as downloading the PROTAG app onto your phone from the Apple or Google Play app stores.

What the PROTAG app can do

Ring Your Duet. 

Press 'Buzz' on the app. Then keep calm and search on. Say you’ve left your keys lying somewhere in the classroom and don’t know where to start looking for it. Most people will start panicking, but you’re calm and composed because you can ring your duet’s inbuilt alarm from the app. And if you can hear it, you’ll be able to find it in no time!

Track up to 10 duets

You can add up to 10 duets and view them in the elegant map view. And the app will always remember the last location it saw them. And with that many duets, your phone also becomes virtually loss-proof.The protection you get is so tight, it’s almost reaching that of a musical orchestra.

Duet Radar

You’ll know if you are getting nearer or further away from the duet within a 30m range when you turn on the Radar™. 

Compatibility

Duet works with all Apple devices iOS 7 and above, as well as Android phones running v4.3 and above.

Unfortunately duet does not work with Blackberry or Windows Phones at this time.

Jump to: Why Get Duet? | Colors | App | Team | FAQs|Perks 

Perks


Who We Are

Meet the PROTAG™ team, the makers behind the Duet. We’ve been working on loss prevention devices for personal belongings for 3 years now, and come from different fields of expertise and countries.

"We are united by a dream to create a world where people never need to lose their smartphones and valuables again."

 Rick Tan, Founder and CEO, oversees the development of over 20 markets for the distribution and advancement of the PROTAG line of products.


Johnathan Lim, Chief Engineering Officer , brings 3 years of electrical engineering chops into the team and oversees the hardware development of the Duet.


Jay Jay, Operations Head, ensures smooth daily operations of the startup.


Johnathan Leow, Marketing Head, does marketing and brand strategy development. 


Morad Salhi, Chief Software Engineer, oversees a team of software engineers and is responsible for the development of the PROTAG app.


Lenny Cendrawasih, Product Designer, is responsible for the visual looks of the Duet, and also all visual collaterals at PROTAG.

The duet that you see in the video is a real working prototype. We were founded in 2011, and duet is our 3rd product.

What Your Contribution Will Fund

With your support, we can put duet into people’s hands worldwide. Your contribution will help lessen the overall production costs. The more you order in bulk, the lesser we can cut the production cost and hence the better value for money to your wallet.


Jump to: Why Get Duet? | Colors | App | Team | FAQs| Perks 

FAQs

What phones does it work with?

Works with iPhone 4S, iPhone 5, iPhone 5S, Android v4.3. duet does not work on windows phones or blackberry currently.

How long can duet last?

Each duet lasts up to 6 months, and can be easily replaced with any 3V coin lithium battery.

Are the batteries replaceable?

Yes. Duet runs on a replaceable 3V battery. Each battery lasts 6 months for normal use. Every Duet shipped will come with 2 batteries.

When will I receive my duet?

This is the 3rd batch of Duets. Duets will begin shipping from end October 2014.

Does duet ship internationally?

Yes. duet is available for shipment internationally.

Do you have a guranteed warranty?

Yes. Every duet comes with a 1 year guaranteed warranty. If your duet is ascertained to be faulty, we will replace it for you at no cost.

Can duet prevent theft?

No, though you will still be alerted if someone takes away your phone or valuables. It's designed mainly for people who tend to lose their phones.

Where can I attach duet on

duet ships with a key-ring, adhesive sticker, and a lanyard by default. You can attach it easily to most everyday items such as keys, bags, purse.

How do I setup my duet?

Just 3 easy steps. When you’ve received your duet, put in the batteries provided. Secondly, download the PROTAG app. Lastly, follow the easy in-app tutorial to add your duet to your account.

How can I contact you?

Email support@innovatechnology.com.sg

What is the range of duet?

The range of duet from your phone is up to 10m, subject to your surroundings. That means that once your phone goes beyond 10m of you, you will be immediately alerted.

Jump to: Why Get Duet? | Colors | App | Team | FAQs| Perks

story:
If your country's currency should happen to be another than Euro, you can still easily donate and help the campaign using PayPal! PayPal converts any amount you choose to give into Euros and gets your donations where they're supposed to go!


WHAT is an parabolic mirror?

A parabolic mirror reflects light like a normal mirror but while reflecting light it also focuses it into a very small spot.


If you use such a mirror in combination with the sun you'll get amazing results!           (Look below for examples)      


The problem with parabolic mirrors today:

Today's mirrors are either very good but EXPENSIVE or have a really poor quality. 

You can see there is a GAP and I want to fill it with cheap but high quality parabolic mirrors. Affordable by ANYONE.


What can you do with such a mirror?

Parabolic mirrors are an effective way to use the power of the sun.                             For example: A mirror with a diameter of about 3.5 feet can deliver 1 kW or 1000 Watts. That's enough to set every wood on fire in under one tenth of a second or even melt metal!                                                                                                                                   Now imagine having for example 5 of these in your backyard:
  • With only 3 hours of sunlight a day you will have 15 kW/h a day of FREE Energy.       
That's way more than the needs of an average household!


How can YOU use this much "free" energy?

Well, the easiest and most effective way to use concentrated light is to use it as a heat source. As for this method, you only need a black surface, because black surfaces absorb all the light and turn it directly into heat with nearly no energy loss. With the generated heat energy you could for example, in combination with some black cooper pipes, easily heat up the water you need to shower, etc. 

You could also power some kind of steam engine to produce electricity (coming soon if this project will be successful).
A completely different way to use a parabolic mirror is to use it in combination with solar cells and cooper pipes.                                                                                                         Let me explain: First, you point the mirror to the sun. Then you attach a small solar cell in front of it. Not directly onto the focal point (it would be way too hot), but a little bit in front of it. Now the cell gets a concentrated amount of light and, because of  that, it will be much more efficient. As a result, you need less expensive solar cells to gain the same effect more cells would have. There is even a little bonus: Because of the concentrated light, the cell gets really hot, but for this "problem" you have the copper pipes, which will be attached to the back of the cell. Now if you let water run through the pipes you'll get hot water AND electricity! And both for free!   

How the parabolic mirror can help in a Third World country:

An inexpensive parabolic-shaped mirror can be used to get clean drinking water by boiling dirty water from river. Or also to cook something or to easily start a fire. I'm sure even one or two robust mirrors per village would make a permanent difference.

Targeted / Facts:

My targeted price per 1000 Watts (1 kW) mirror, which will have a surface area of 10.76 square feet (equals 1 m²), is roughly 50$.
The complete sun tracker set for one or more mirrors will be about 25$.

What will the money be used for?

  • Research Purposes: further improving of the quality and price / testing new materials and special coatings etc.
  • Building a Negative Mold: very expensive but with one negative mold you can build an unlimited amount of good low priced mirrors
  • Getting Started: building up a small business and make the first line of fully complete finished mirrors for you
  • Developing a Cheap Sun Tracker: with a sun tracker your mirror will fully automatically follow the sun

Sun Tracker:

A sun tracker is used to adjust your mirror fully automatically directly at the sun for the whole day. I'm currently also working on such a devise! Not on the ultimate high end overly expensive one but on a robust working model for about 25$.
I'm very close to finishing the prototype but i need some more funding to test some things and try other electronic parts/materials so I can then provide the best functional an cheapest tracker for you.


About me:

I have always been a person who wanted to improve things or even build something completely new. Everyday my mind is filled with new ideas that are worth it to be brought to reality. With this project I want to help the entire world. On one hand, it can help poor people, and on the other it helps you to consume less electric power generated by fossil fuel or radioactive materials.
So by supporting my work, you're actually helping our whole planet!
I always work tirelessly on my projects and I take them very seriously!

Current Problems:

The road to success has always been a bumpy path, with problems aligned here and there, but this is in no way going to stop me from achieving my goal and with the amount of motivation I bring into this, I am not worried that I won't overcome every obstacle!


    Other ways to help the campaign:

    You can also help the campaign by SHARING the following link:
    - http://igg.me/at/indiegogo-cheap-parabolic-mirrors
    Thank you!

    Addition:

    If you want more information or if you have some questions about me or the project, feel free to contact me! I'm looking forward to talking to you!

    My e-mail: merlinbehling@arcor.de      (pay attention to the .de (it's not .com))


    If your country's currency should happen to be another than Euro, you can still easily donate and help the campaign using PayPal! PayPal converts any amount you choose to give into Euros and gets your donations where they're supposed to go!

With this project I want to help the entire world. On one hand, it can help poor people, and on the other it helps you to consume less electric power generated by fossil fuel or radioactive materials. So by supporting my work, you're actually helping our whole planet!

I always work tirelessly on my projects and I take them very seriously!

The road to success has always been a bumpy path, with problems aligned here and there, but this is in no way going to stop me from achieving my goal and with the amount of motivation I bring into this, I am not worried that I won't overcome every obstacle!


  

Other ways to help the campaign:


You can also help the campaign by SHARING the following link:

Thank you!

If you want more information or if you have some questions about me or the project, feel free to contact me! I'm looking forward to talking to you!

story:
What the heck is this for?

This is a campaign to raise money for a 3DS XL with a capture card installed.

With this capture card, I will be able to stream DS and 3DS games which I plan to use while playing through the entire Final Fantasy series (minus mobile titles) on my Twitch stream.

That will be more than 45 games played through live! Check out the full list right here!

The specific games that require this capture card are:
  • Final Fantasy 3 Remake
  • Final Fantasy 4 Remake
  • Final Fantasy Tactics A2
  • Final Fantasy Crystal Chronicles: Ring of Fates
  • Final Fantasy Crystal Chronicles: Echoes of Time
  • Final Fantasy The 4 Heroes of Light
  • Final Fantasy Fables: Chocobo Tales
  • Chocobo Tales, Cid to Chocobo no Fushigi na Dungeon
  • Chocobo to Maho no Eho
Making our goal will also add Bravely Default to the marathon!

Perks!
  • $5-10 I will do silly things in stream that you request (within reason) Want me to sing a song? Play with the controller upside down? 
  • $20  Have a character's name changed to whatever you want (within reason) in whichever game you want! 
  • $50+ Join me in a stream! Watch, go head to head in a race, choose the classes, whatever!
