story:
These days, you can carry the whole world in your pocket.

But try watching something on your mobile device without holding it. Go on, try now. Lean it, balance it, wedge it. Nope? Those slippery blighters just won’t stand up. So there it lies, flat on the table, projecting its wonders towards your ceiling. 

Now imagine taking from your wallet an ultra thin, ultra tough device, which let’s your mobile or tablet stand on its own two feet. Imagine no longer, oh brave new world.  

Discover the Standeazy Ultra.
Designed and made in Britain.

 

The Standeazy Ultra is manufactured from a premium quality laminate of brushed aluminium and polypropylene, and easily folds into a 3D stand for virtually all smartphones, e-readers and most tablets, too. 

It can be adjusted to hold your device at a variety of angles in both landscape or portrait depending on what you prefer for each app.

To give your phone or tablet a safe place to rest, the Standeazy Ultra has pleasingly smooth rounded edges, giving it an extra luxurious feel. It really is beautifully finished, just as slick as the slickest electronic device in your collection.

You'll want to stroke it, own it or buy it for your loved ones. It's a perfect stocking filler or little thank you gift – easy to post in an envelope. It’s just one of those simple ideas that really works and actually solves a problem.

  

 

There's a different angle for everything! Great for watching things or taking pictures – no matter which phone you use – Android or Apple devices, no adapters required!

 

 

 

The Standeazy Ultra has a variety of settings to make it super versatile for both Apple and Android phones and tablets.

 

 

The polymer version of Standeazy has been around for a few years now and is not just a concept, but a tested and proven product our customers love and use every day – at home, at work and of course when travelling. That's why we feel the Ultra will be a great addition to your travel and home accessories – and with your help we can bring it to market at an affordable price whilst producing it locally. 

One of our highlights was being selected by the the Gadget Show on Channel 5 as the product of choice for holding the iPhone 6 and the HTC smartphone in an Android vs Apple comparison feature.

 

Here are some of the reviews we've had for our original Standeazy, the polymer version, on Amazon. We thought we'd share this because it has the same mechanism, but the Ultra is obviously stronger and can hold even more devices...

 

And some reviews from the tech press...

 

 

 

 

 

 

This created the basis for the Standeazy you see today. The next few years saw various improvements to the design and material of Standeazy and we patented the initial and follow-on designs. In 2014 we launched the second generation polymer model that is available in selected shops. Our ambition has always been to create an extra versatile version for heavier or larger devices whilst keeping Standeazy small enough to fit in a wallet. That's why we started work on the prototypes for a metal version, the Standeazy Ultra. 

We are proud to work with local manufacturers, which means the Standeazy is truly designed and made in Britain. 

Thanks to your support we can now produce the Standeazy Ultra at a price that's affordable for every smartphone owner. 

It's fantastic to have you be part of our journey! Thank you... 

Music: littleidea - Bensound.com
story_txt:
These days, you can carry the whole world in your pocket. But try watching something on your mobile device without holding it. Go on, try now. Lean it, balance it, wedge it. Nope? Those slippery blighters just won’t stand up. So there it lies, flat on the table, projecting its wonders towards your ceiling. Now imagine taking from your wallet an ultra thin, ultra tough device, which let’s your mobile or tablet stand on its own two feet. Imagine no longer, oh brave new world.  Discover the Standeazy Ultra.Designed and made in Britain. The Standeazy Ultra is manufactured from a premium quality laminate of brushed aluminium and polypropylene, and easily folds into a 3D stand for virtually all smartphones, e-readers and most tablets, too. It can be adjusted to hold your device at a variety of angles in both landscape or portrait depending on what you prefer for each app.To give your phone or tablet a safe place to rest, the Standeazy Ultra has pleasingly smooth rounded edges, giving it an extra luxurious feel. It really is beautifully finished, just as slick as the slickest electronic device in your collection.You'll want to stroke it, own it or buy it for your loved ones. It's a perfect stocking filler or little thank you gift – easy to post in an envelope. It’s just one of those simple ideas that really works and actually solves a problem. 
A note on the hinges: German RWTÜV testing of the material has shown that the hinge application is unimpaired even after 80,000 bends.  
Thinner than a penny!Only 7g light and 1.2mm thin, the size of a credit card – ultra portable! There's a different angle for everything! Great for watching things or taking pictures – no matter which phone you use – Android or Apple devices, no adapters required!    The Standeazy Ultra has a variety of settings to make it super versatile for both Apple and Android phones and tablets.  The polymer version of Standeazy has been around for a few years now and is not just a concept, but a tested and proven product our customers love and use every day – at home, at work and of course when travelling. That's why we feel the Ultra will be a great addition to your travel and home accessories – and with your help we can bring it to market at an affordable price whilst producing it locally. One of our highlights was being selected by the the Gadget Show on Channel 5 as the product of choice for holding the iPhone 6 and the HTC smartphone in an Android vs Apple comparison feature. Android vs Apple comparison on national TV... proudly supported by Standeazy! Here are some of the reviews we've had for our original Standeazy, the polymer version, on Amazon. We thought we'd share this because it has the same mechanism, but the Ultra is obviously stronger and can hold even more devices... And some reviews from the tech press...  

A super convenient way for hands-free selfie photography. Set up your phone in one of the different angles. Position the family. Use your Apple Watch remote app to check and set the timer. Say CHEESE!  
 

 
Get Cash Back on the Projects You Love!
 
   John, Petra, Regine and Steven. It's a family affair.
Back in 2009, John and Steven Wilber (father and son) designed and engineered a credit card sized stand – and after many iterations of mechanisms, materials and finishes, the first Standeazy was born in the form of a polypropylene design with two unique hind legs for extra stability. This created the basis for the Standeazy you see today. The next few years saw various improvements to the design and material of Standeazy and we patented the initial and follow-on designs. In 2014 we launched the second generation polymer model that is available in selected shops. Our ambition has always been to create an extra versatile version for heavier or larger devices whilst keeping Standeazy small enough to fit in a wallet. That's why we started work on the prototypes for a metal version, the Standeazy Ultra. We are proud to work with local manufacturers, which means the Standeazy is truly designed and made in Britain. Thanks to your support we can now produce the Standeazy Ultra at a price that's affordable for every smartphone owner. It's fantastic to have you be part of our journey! Thank you... Music: littleidea - Bensound.comGet Your Project Funded Today!

story:
One Nixie Lab Environment

  • Nixie LAB - Ultimate Nixie Project
  • 25 Nixie Tube Sockets
  • Nixie Shield for Arduino
  • Nixie Hat for Raspberry Pi
  • Universal Nixie Tube Tester
  • Useless Nixie Device

A common feature of all these projects are the universal nixie sockets (supporting the majority of existing nixie tubes). The sockets are compatible with all devices.

 

Must-Have Device

Thanks to the hobbyist from around the world, nixie tubes are experiencing their renaissance these days. 

How many times a nixie tubes fell into your hands but you have not had the capability to check them? Have you ever seen how your tube is slowly dying and could not do anything about it? It is a real tragedy for all who have experienced this, especially when the most valuable tubes cost over $100-200.

If you're a nixie tube enthusiast then you should take care of your tubes.

 

 

Features & Specifications

  • Healing nixie tubes - cathode poisoning reversal
  • Testing nixie tubes - manual/auto option
  • Testing nixie drivers e.g. 74141, K155ID1 etc... 
  • Autodetection 13 & 15 segment nixie tubes
  • Diagnostic and measurements outputs (current, voltages) 
  • Outputs for external tubes connections (anode, 15 cathodes)
  • 21 PCB testing points (A...U) for assembly troubleshooting 
  • Dimensions: 55 x 90 x 170 mm
  • Perfect quality housing (color: red, blue, black), laser-cut and engraved
  • 22 tube sockets compatible
  • Power on/off switch & LED indicator
  • Current adjustment: 1-20mA
  • Voltage adjustment: 140-200V
  • Frequency adjustment: 1-10Hz
  • External power supply: 12V; 1A DC; plug diameter 2.5 x 5.5 mm; center pin positive+

 

Perfect Quality Components

  • Laser cutted and engraved housing components
  • Gold plated pcb board
  • Solid electronic components
  • Dedicated carton packaging for sockets

 

Why Self Assembly Kit

  • Easy to assemble (without smd components)
  • Well-prepared documentation
  • Educational value - you can always learn something new
  • Because it's fun to build 
  • Individual support


 

Exchangeable Tube Sockets

  • 22 sockets available for dozen different tubes and nixie drivers
  • Each socket have the same form-factor
  • Acrylic housing
  • Easy to assemble and use
  • Dedicated carton packaging
     

 

TUBE SOCKET

COMPATIBLE TUBE
         
 

NO.1

ZM1181, ZM1182, ZM1183, ZM1185A, ZM1185B,

ZM1020, ZM1021, ZM1022, ZM1023, ZM1024, ZM1025, B5092, B5094, NL5094, B6032, B6033, B6034, B6036, B6091, LC513A, LC511, LL551, LL552, LL553, LL554, LL555, LL556,  LL557, LL558, QS30-1

B8033, NL8091, B8091, NL1212

ZM1134, ZM1138A, F9080B, F9080BA,
TAF1093, TAF1317A, TAU7030 		 
 

NO.12

NO.14

NO.15

NO.16

 NIXIE TUBE DRIVER SOCKET - DEDICATED ONLY FOR NIXIE TUBE TESTER. IN12 - TUBE INDICATOR.
TUBE DRIVERS: 74141, DM74141, DM74141N, NTE74141, SN74141, SN74141J, SN74141N, TL74141N, 155ID1, K155ID1, KM155ID1, 7441, 7441A, DM7441A, DM5441A, DM54141, DM8640N, FJL101, FLL101 		 
 

NO.17

 Z567M, Z5670M, ZM1041, ZM1043
COMPATIBLE WITH ALL DEVICES, DEDICATED FOR USELESS NIXIE DEVICE 		 
 

NO.18

 IN8-2  
 

NO.19

ZM1010, ZM1011, ZM1012, ZM1013,
MTC0X 3B/3F/3J/4I/5B/6B/6F, MCD0X, MUD0X 		 
 

NO.20A

 B7971, NL7971, 283CQAD7971
WITH CATHODE RESISTORS
DEDICATED ONLY FOR NIXIE LAB
NOT AVAILABLE - WORK IN PROGRESS 		 
 

NO.20B

WITHOUT CATHODE RESISTORS
DEDICATED ONLY FOR PRO NIXIE TESTER 		 
 

NO.21

 ZIN18 - Millclock   
 

NO.22

NL5441A, B5442, NL5442, B5442A, 
B5445, B5448, NL987 		 
 

NO.23A

 B5971, NL5971
WITH CATHODE RESISTORS
DEDICATED ONLY FOR NIXIE LAB
NOT AVAILABLE - WORK IN PROGRESS 		 
 

NO.23B

 B5971, NL5971
WITHOUT CATHODE RESISTORS
DEDICATED ONLY FOR PRO NIXIE TESTER 		 
 

NO.24A

 B8971, NL8971
WITH CATHODE RESISTORS
DEDICATED ONLY FOR NIXIE LAB
NOT AVAILABLE - WORK IN PROGRESS 		 
 

NO.24B

 B8971, NL8971
WITHOUT CATHODE RESISTORS
DEDICATED ONLY FOR PRO NIXIE TESTER 		 
 

NO.25

 NL803, NL811, NL812, NL840, NL840VR, NL841,
NL842, NL843, NL844, NL845, NL847, NL848,
NL864, NL867, NL900, NL908, NL939
NL943, CK1907, CK8754, 340-0005 		 
 

 

Production & Preparation for Shipping

The product (pcb and housing) is ready for production. The lead time for production is approximately 4 weeks, and and the production will start as soon as the campaign ends and funds are transferred. Universal Pro Nixie Tester printed circuit boards and housings will be ordered in a contract manufacturers who’s been involved in prototype production. Once the key components are ready, they will be checked to ensure it meets exacting quality standards.

 

Risks & Challenges

All the technical challenges have already been worked out and a prototype is already validated and fully functional. A possible risk with this project is a logistical one e.g. production & shipping delays, customs delays, etc. In any case, all backers will be regularly updated with the current status of the project.

Production & Preparation for Shipping
The product (pcb and housing) is ready for production. The lead time for production is approximately 4 weeks, and and the production will start as soon as the campaign ends and funds are transferred. Universal Pro Nixie Tester printed circuit boards and housings will be ordered in a contract manufacturers who’s been involved in prototype production. Once the key components are ready, they will be checked to ensure it meets exacting quality standards.


 
Risks & Challenges
All the technical challenges have already been worked out and a prototype is already validated and fully functional. A possible risk with this project is a logistical one e.g. production & shipping delays, customs delays, etc. In any case, all backers will be regularly updated with the current status of the project.

story:
9+ is a super powerful cable that with more than 9 functions. It is with micro USB for android and Lighting for iPhone 5/5s/6/6s device. 


9+ can work with keyboard, and type what ever you want. Free your hand.


9+ can work with Mouse, what you need to do is just connect to the keyboard and plug with phone. 


When device is running out of juice, and you get no where to charge, 9+ can help. 


Running out of space with your phone?  No worries, 9+ will offer you a extra memory with USB Flash drive. No need computer transfer, 9+ is able to realize PC operation freely such as directly data storage, input and output operation.


With 9+, making gaming on the phone easier and more fun.

 

You can easily print pictures from your phone. It is that simple. 

Project PPT or whatever document from your phone to the screen. No need to carry your heavy computer again.

Transfer photos from camera to phones and share with friends.

                    For  Android and IOS (iPhone5/6/5s/6s)

                      

1. When can we get the 9+ cable? 

We can deliver 9+ to you on August.

2. What payment options do I have?

You can pay via credit card or PayPal. Select a perk and you'll see the available payment methods at checkout.

3. What is the warranty for 9+?

16 Months warranty

4. Who should I contact with?

Please email us to louis@time2selfie.com for more detail.

story:
Visual Charger provides you with visualization on charging status, and opens your gate to understand charging process. Visual Charger is full-compatible with Android and iOS devices. Multi-channel output enable you to share spare ports with your friend.

Visible Charging

Visual Charger provides visual charging technology:
  • Display dynamic charging voltage, current.
  • Display real-time charging speed(power circle).

It is quite exciting to watch electricity streaming into your devices. Never suffer from poor contact or damaged cable again.

Multi-Channel

Visual Charger is a good charger, which provides 4 independent charging channels.

Compatible

Visual Charger Compatible Solutions:
  • Full support Android devices.
  • Full support of Apple devices.

Visual Charger is optimized for phones, but it maintains compatibility. Its Android 1A mode is a universal mode, ensuring all cellphones, mp3, PDA or other devices able to enter charging sequence.

Safety

Safety Description
Human Visual Charger adopts DC as input, so it is absolutely safe to human, even you tear it apart.
Devices Visual Charger has four high-speed DC-DC engine inside. Its regulated output is quite steady, benefitting device's health.
Desktop Visual Charger adopts DC as input. It safe from water spilled from cup and surges from electricity grid.
Bad Cable You can detect cable damage and loose contact, right from the current value displayed on LCD.
Charging You can choose charging scheme freely: high speed or low speed. If you have doubts with quick charge, Visual Charger offers you choices.

Devices No Messing

Visual Charger integrates USB Hub. It helps to manage desktop space from messy wires.

Phones Party

Phone separates people, Visual Charger get them together. Share your spare charge ports with your friends.

For Who

Home

Increase your tastes. Share your port with your friend. Charge your multiple devices simultaneously. It is nasty to store more and more chargers of more and more devices.

Campus&Dome

Digital media browsing, Mobile Net Surfing, Mobile Games. It is comfortable play a cooperative game pretty hard with your friends, never concerning power breakdown.

Company

Online meeting, Mobile interworking, Management on Phone. People handles more and more works on mobile phone nowadays. People start to crowd at one desk, each grabbing a phone, especially in meeting room.

Bar

Attracts visitors. Low cost decoration that has great effects. Increase degree of satisfaction. Social responsibility. Visual Charger has a bracket fastening screw to fix it on desk.

Team

Chris Hsiung, Richard, Young, Szt.

Risks and challenges

SUPPLY CHAIN RISK

Our LCD manufacture has fixed ability of 5K/month. We promise to keep funder informed about manufacturing progress.

story:
Quick jump: Features | Goals | Referral | How Does It Work? | Rewards | How Can You Use tageme? | Production Timeline | The Story Behind tageme | Get In Touch | Press | FAQ | Our Team

Features

When creating tageme, we wanted to put together functionality and expressive design. A gadget that is effective, but stylish as well. These four key features make tageme the world’s most efficient lost and found system. 


Stretch Goals

With your support, we can achieve these goals and offer you more tageme options. In case of any questions, feel free to contact us. 


How Does It Work?

tageme is simple, quick and secure. Most importantly, your lost things get back to you easily. All that anyone needs is a smartphone.






Rewards - Finder's Motivation

We have created our own reward system to motivate the finders to return the lost items back to you. 



How Can You Use tageme In Everyday Life?


There are many ways on what can you apply tageme to. Thanks to its unique design, it fits basically to any of your belongings. 


Production Timeline


Story Behind

What motivated us to create tageme and work on it so hard? It is not only a gadget itself, it is also about a society, where we do not have to worry about our belongings. Have fun with our crazy accent!


Get In Touch

Feel free to contact us in comments, social networks or via email: info@tageme.com, if you have any questions, proposals or suggestions. We would be glad to hear from you because you are a part of the project and its development. Your opinion matters to us! 


Press

Please email info@tageme.com for more information.

Press kit download:

https://www.tageme.com/data/press/Presskit_EN.zip (english version)

https://www.tageme.com/data/press/Presskit_SK.zip (slovak version)


F.A.Q. - More Questions?


Q: Why does tageme appear to be different in the video than on the pictures in the campaign?

A: In the video, we are using the first working prototype. By the time, we have improved tageme to its current design which you can find on the pictures. The functionality is still the same.

Q: When will I be able to choose from the colours that I want to order? 

A: Once the campaign is over, you will be contacted to choose from the available colours. Even if you order tageme at the first stage of the campaign when are only three colours available, you will have a choice to order from all of them at the end of the campaign (depends on how many stages will be unlocked). 

Q: Am I supposed to manually add shipping?

A: Yes, you have to add shipping on top of your selected perk. When you pledge, manually add an additional shipping fee according to the perk you want. We will do the matching at the end of the campaign.

Q: Why do I have to pay for shipping in the US as well? 

A: Our headquarters is in Slovakia, Europe. Since this is our first international project, we cannot afford to have offices in the countries, where tageme will be purchased the most. That's why the shipping is not free in the US. 

Q: What do I do if I forget to pay for shipping?

A: No problem. Please contribute the shipping amount ($5 or $10 according to perk you bought) and select no perk. It will be added to your pledge amount. Enter the same personal information you did on your initial order. We will do the matching ourselves at the end of the campaign.

Q: You claim that tageme does not require any battery, so it is always ready. How come? 

A:  Thanks to NFC Technology and QR Code. None of them requires any juice - QR code is an information transformed to a visual and NFC operates on the inductive principle. When you tag NFC with your smartphone, it uses a small amount of juice from your device. 

Q: QR Code and NFC Technology - those are not the coolest technologies ever. 

A: Good point. But in case of lost & found gadgets, the compatibility is the key feature. That is why we have used these technologies: they are well-known and anyone can use them. Moreover, they are safe and hassle-free. The innovative character of tageme is in its combined solution consisting of SW solution, functionality and design. While it functions very easily and quickly, more & more people can use it and return your lost things back to you.

Q: What is the main difference between tageme and bluetooth trackers? 

A: Those are two different gadgets based on two different technologies (bluetooth vs NFC & QR Code). Plus, both have a diverse type of use. Bluetooth is used for the localization of the misplaced items. Tageme, on the other hand, is a truth lost & found. Bluetooth functionality is attractive and we are developing our own solution to be able to combine both technologies into one gadget: anti-misplace as well as lost & found. The biggest challenge of bluetooth technology is in its battery use. Even if it is called LE, it needs a lot of juice. Due to this disadvantage, bluetooth tracker is more or less a cool thing but it is not a hassle-free and effective gadget. Check its reviews.  

Q: How many pieces of tageme can I use? 

A: There is no software or any other limitation. You can use as many pieces of tageme as you like. It is purely up to you.

Q: Can tageme help when my belonging gets stolen?

A:  If something is stolen, none lost & found gadget can help you out. Naturally, a thief will get rid off anything that can localize the item. Tageme supports honesty in people and thanks to its reward system, it motivates finders to return the lost belongings. But even in case your tageme gets stolen, a thief has no chance to find out whose tageme he has, or to reveal any other personal details or other tageme of yours.

Q: How resistant tageme actually is? 

A: You can drop it off from heights, wear it with your keys or apply it on a huge dog without worrying about its resistance. You want more? Hang yourself on it and swing if you’d like. Did we answer the question sufficiently? 

Q: Is tageme really waterproof?  

A: Yes, it is. It is not an original waterproof gear but it will not get damaged when you/your things fall into the pool with it. Also, it survives all everyday situations connected with water-use. 

Q: You promote the compatibility of the tageme. With which smartphones is it compatible then? 

A: A finder needs a smartphone that has one of these two features: either QR Code Reader or NFC compatibility. Therein,  every smartphone. 

Q: Is tageme safe for my skin or skin of my pet? 

A: Tageme is made of anti-allergic material so it is harmless for your skin or skin of your pet. At the moment, we are testing the most suitable antiallergic materials to keep it resistant, but wholesome firstly.  

Q: How can you claim that it is the world’s most efficient lost & found system? Do you have any proof on this? 

A: Nowadays, market is so overwhelmed with smartphones that basically everyone owns one. Therefore, anyone can use tageme and return your lost things back to you. 

Q: Why has tageme such an expressive design? These colours could be less gaudy…

A: It is designed to catch finders’ attention on your belonging. Also, its look is a short guideline on how to use it: NFC Logo, QR Code, lost & found logo. 

Q: My bank has given me this product years ago. It is basically a key label, which has a unique serial number written on it, and if I lose my keys, the finder can drop them into any mail box on the street, and the post will deliver them to my bank, which will afterwards let me know they have my keys. Isn't it basically the same with tageme ?

A: No, it isn't. Imagine you just found out you lost your keys. What are you going to do ? Most probably you are going to turn your home upside-down while searching for it, then your workplace, and if you won't find them go one-by-one through all the places you have been today. If you still won't find them at the end of the day, the next day morning you will get your lock replaced, as you wouldn't like to risk that you might have forgot them in your doors from the outside and someone took them or something similar. In case of the product your bank has given you, even if someone found your keys 10 minutes after you lost them, it would take the post and then the bank at least 1-2 days to let you know someone found them. By that time you would have already replaced your locks, created copies of the new keys for your whole family, informed your workplace, that you lost your keys, etc. If you were using tageme, you would have been informed someone found your keys maybe even before you have realised you lost them.

Q: In our country it is mandatory to have your pet microchipped at a vet. Each chip has a unique code in it a if a pet is found a vet can check, whose pet it is and the pet gets returned afterwards. Does it make any sense for me to get a tageme for my pets ?

A: Sure it does! If you lost your pet, or it ran away for some reason, wouldn't you like to know as soon as possible, that it's ok ? If someone finds it and it is microchipped only, he or she would have to call someone to take care of it and take it to a vet. Only after a vet takes a look at it and reads data from the microchip will someone let you know, that your pet is just fine a was a few blocks away. With tageme, if someone finds it, you are immediately notified, and you can be back together in no time, without bothering and wasting time of a vet or an organisation responsible/caring for lost pets.

If someone finds it and it is microchipped only, he or she would have to call someone to take care of it and take it to a vet. Only after a vet takes a look at it and reads data from the microchip will someone let you know, that your pet is just fine a was a few blocks away. With tageme, if someone finds it, you are immediately notified, and you can be back together in no time, without bothering and wasting time of a vet or an organisation responsible/caring for lost pets.

story:
We are raising funds to complete the development of an app that allows any user to customize pictures of their penis.

"Some women want penis pictures. No women want them under the wrong circumstances." - Julieanne Smolinski, GQ

In the world we live in, dick pics may be a lot of things -- classless, stupid, offensive -- but one thing is for sure, they aren't going anywhere. We may not be able to stop dick pics from happening, but we believe we can (and therefore must) make them way more hilarious. 

Enter Rock that Cock. Rock that Cock is a mobile app that allows users to customize pictures of their penis. Currently, dick pics are crude and just plain boring. With Rock that Cock, dick pics are finally elevated to a form of personal expression on the side of the giver and a potentially delightful reason to smile on the side of the receiver. 


         Our mission is to rid the world of boring old dick pics. 


The Origins, A Story of Friendship:

The origins of Rock that Cock begin on Easter of 2013 -- a date which, in our humble opinion, seems all too symbolically rife to make the conception of Rock that Cock anything other than divine. "He has risen," anybody? Come on! Just thinking about it gives us a half-resurrection. 

We, Stephy and Lauren, met on a fateful all-girls weekend snowboarding trip to Mammoth Mountain. On the final morning of the trip, while cooking Easter brunch for the ladies, we overheard a conversation between two of the babes that would change our lives - and, with your help, possibly the world - forever: 

Babe 1:

 (Scrolling through her phone) John (A townie she'd met and hooked up with the previous night at the local bar) texted me a picture of his dick at 3am to say he's sorry.

Babe 2: 

(Unphased. Also scrolling through her phone) Ugh. I get soooo many dick pics. 

A dick pic to say he's sorry?

"Soooo many dick pics?"

Our brains were spinning. 

That night in the back seat of a Prius headed back to LA we wrote an infomercial sketch for a dick pic personalization app called Rock that Cock. At first we only planned to film the sketch, however every person we told about the sketch responded the same: 

"You have to make that app." 

We realize that there is a real problem that needs a real solution:

Men are sending more and more dick pics to an audience of women who don't want them! What's more, these communicate nothing - no personality, no message - except that you have a penis! It's boring and confusing! 

So, here we are. 

(The sad reality of what dick pics actually look like to girls)

Where the funds are being spent: 

We have secured a great team of design & development talent that we'll need to pay to get Rock that Cock ready for use.  

Where are these funds going: 

Designers - We've recruited artists, designers, and photographers to ensure we have a wide selection of specialty made accessories and backgrounds to create truly custom dick pics. With the "In Dedication of your Dick!" perk, you'll be able to imagine and name your very own costumes, accessories, and backgrounds.

Developers - You'll see our wireframe sketches down below. This is just the beginning! Our development team is excited to get this baby into production, but we'll need to be able to pay them for their hard work.

Licensing Functionality - We have negotiated an agreement with a creator of an app that is similar in functionality to Rock that Cock to allow us to license the backend technology they have created so we won't need to start from scratch!

Registering as a Business / Legal Council  -  We'll need to cover the costs of registering ourselves as a real company, fighting off all cease & desist letters, receiving council on how to handle being grilled by morning news programs, and negotiating any and all business development deals that result from the release of this app. 



Rock That Cock Logo : The Boss Cock  

                                      


UI Wireframes and Architecture 





Who are we? 

Classy Lauren Brenner & Stephanie Pool 

Classy Lauren Brenner & Stephanie Pool 

As this campaign goes live, we are celebrating our one year friendship anniversary thanks to Rock that Cock. We decided to wait a year to release this idea to see if it continued to gather traction and hold our attention. It has, and we can't wait to turn this dream into a reality. By day, Lauren is a comedian, yoga instructor, and guru of Not-Giving-AFuck while Stephanie actually creates apps, writes and is a creative strategist. You could say this little partnership was destined to bring something so completely necessary to the world. 

Oh, and we aren't being sarcastc about this being necessary. If dick pics are going to be sent in this world -- and they are -- it's time to raise our standards! NO. MORE. BORING. DICK PICS!  NOT ON OUR WATCH. 


What We Need & What You Get

We want you to be able to send & receive amazing dick pics more than anyone else.  Your contribution helps:

  • Pay the developers.
  • With the app, you will be able to choose from playing with our "stock cock" penis or uploading a penis of your choosing -- 
  • Once you have chosen a penis, choose between a stock backdrop, uploading your own background, or just doodling on the penis!
  • Then, decide if you want to add costumes, stickers, or upgrade to do things never-before-possible, like, shoot diamonds out of your penis!
  • Final step? Save, send, or upload *anonymously* to the Rock That Cock Penis Gallery for the chance to win Rocked Cock of the Day.
Also -- and we may be partial here, but -- be sure to check our list of really spectacular perks! These include artisan dick pics made by us for you, a "Happy to see you T-shirt", and even the ability to take us on a vacation. Most importantly, at ANY contribution level, we really do consider you a part of our team and an important part of the creation of this app. 


(A early mock-up of a "Happy to see you" T-shirt) 


**Rock That Cock cares about the health of penises everywhere! We will donate 10 percent of all proceeds to prostate cancer research.**




The Impact 

Imagine living in a world where you can:

  • Scroll through a gallery of dick pics.
  • Immediately know whether or not he's the right man for you through just one picture of his penis.
  • Send hilarious dick pics to ur bros.
  • Laugh WITH dick pics, instead of at them. 




Other Ways You Can Help

Look, these dick pics aren't going to decorate themselves. We need your help. Even if you aren't able to put money where your mouth is (eww!) we'd really appreciate: 

  • Scream our name and let everyone know "Rock That Cock" is here!
  • Share the video! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VlYzcWQYiOc
  • Live your dreams.

story:
BUTTERFLY EFFECT

HAVE YOU EVER BELIEVED IN SOMETHING SO STRONGLY THAT YOU FEEL YOU COULD SHOUT IT OUT AT THE TOP OF YOUR LUNGS—BECAUSE YOU KNOW IT HAS THE POTENTIAL TO HAVE A GLOBAL IMPACT?

That’s how we feel about ISABEL. 

When you support ISABEL, you will be helping us provide advanced software to educators, students, and parents. FREE.

But there is more to ISABEL than meets the eye. Driving this project is a powerful concept that can profoundly change children’s lives all over the world.

When we launch ISABEL, it will also create a self-sustaining platform—an economic ecosystem, if you will—that can help schools and communities that results in new jobs, not only here in the U.S. but in other countries too.

All our users need to do is use ISABEL and other applications we will be creating thereafter. And it all begins here. With you.

WHAT IS ISABEL?

ISABEL is a powerful suite of web-based tools that will serve students and their parents, teachers, staff members, and professors from elementary schools to college. Isabel will give its users the benefits of advanced design, modern social interaction and information sharing and yet remain circumspect and mindful of every individual’s and group’s privacy.

This cool and awesome project is the first level and first software suite of a larger, longer-term effort that is designed to create a new framework for tomorrow’s technology. It will make traditionally tedious and time-consuming education processes easier for everyone. Like homework, class projects, calendar, quizzes and exams, tracking classes and grades, classroom materials, fund-raising for school projects, communicating with teachers and classmates, and much more.

ISABEL is our first Crowd Funding Project. We hope you like it enough to fund it. It stands for Insanely Supremely Awesome and Brilliant Ecosystem/4 Learning. (We love the name so much, we’re printing it on T-Shirts. We had a more official-sounding acronym but it was too boring.)

Some of the sample tools shown here, on our video, and on our website, will be the first tools we build.

WHERE WE ARE ON THE PROJECT

ISABEL is just a few weeks away from ALPHA. Design is complete, coding is going strong. We finished our technical proof of concept and are currently working on implementing the functionality we plan to include when we launch ISABEL. (In tech-speak, we’re selecting the final use-cases that will go into version 1.0).

The pilot version was tested by several teachers in Eugene, OR., from February through June of 2012. After getting feedback we completely redesigned the system from the ground up. We estimate that we’re 3-4 months away from a fully operational release that will be available to a select audience, and 6 months from a full launch available to the public. Sooner if we are able to raise more funds.

NOT A CHARITY NOR CAUSE

Metroleta was created to help children, teachers, and schools—but it is not a charity, a philanthropy, nor a cause. It is not a non-profit corporation. At its core it is a Silicon Valley-style start-up with advanced technology, brand-engineering, and high-level design as its core competencies.

The INTERSECT and ISABEL software will create a product platform that will enable users to practice mass philanthropy. But it is not truly free. The cost to the user will be the time they spend on Metroleta.com. The same is true for teachers, who will directly benefit from using the system.

Metroleta will raise funds through advertising, product sales, and software licensing to businesses and larger organizations such as colleges.

GOOD THINGS HAPPEN WHEN YOU FUND ISABEL

  • ISABEL will be completed and released for use by teachers, parents, professors, students, and the public—for free.
  • The framework and first subsystems of the advanced technology called the INTERSECT will be created.
  • Metroleta will start to build revenue from advertising and sales, and then create jobs and hire additional programmers to build the next subsystems.
  • We will build an ecosystem that creates the revenue to help students, makes life easier for teachers, saves schools cash (to perhaps hire new teachers), and makes businesses and advertisers happy and proud. And puts school supplies and food in the hands of children in need.

IF YOU SPEAK NERDIC...

Warning. Technology content follows.

ISABEL is a non-linear graph-based online application designed with deep interoperability among its user-base, functions, and peer-systems. It addresses use-cases and actors common to the non-administration side of education (i.e. students, faculty, and parents). We intend to create a follow-up peer subsystem to address the needs of the Student Services and Administrative sides of any educational institution, be it school, district, or college.

Conceptually, ISABEL’s design takes graph theory and social-oriented design and pushes them further into deeper dimensions. It is considerably different from procedural or “process-driven” applications typically found in education and business. It should be noted that version 1 of ISABEL is intended as a bridge app to span the chasm of today’s traditional Internet systems and tomorrow’s INTERSECT framework. In the following versions, ISABEL will be refactored to fully capitalize on the INTERSECT’s advantages.

WE HAVE EXPERIENCE, KNOWLEDGE, AND SKILLS

Success in software, like any other effort, is predicated on the diverse skills of its team. True, it requires high-level technical expertise, but also demands a deep understanding of business and marketing, and social media savvy.

Our founder Robert Cura is an experienced Chief Technology Officer, Advanced Systems Engineer, and Technical Architect steeped in business, marketing, and technology. Much of his 33-year broad-based background was honed in Silicon Valley (that’s where he met his wife Alice, who’s currently our Marketing and Design Director. She started her career in Silicon Valley too!) A full set of bios for our founders and our team is available on our website http://metroleta.com.

For this project, Robert has assembled a team with diverse skills and experience, all working together towards the success of ISABEL. We have social media specialists, user interface designers, web-content writers, graphic designers, photographers, and so on.

That we have an active team of over 20 people ALL VOLUNTEERS, is the tribute to his considerable ability to gather people around a purpose.

 

OUR TOKENS OF APPRECIATION

One of the things we’re proud of is the design skills of our graphic design team. They have created a set of LIMITED EDITION designs that will only be available to our sponsors.

Please consider this as our modest way of saying Thank You for backing ISABEL:

  • Special Metroleta Stickers
  • Limited Edition Tote Bag
  • Limited Edition T-shirt
  • Limited Edition Polo Shirt
  • Limited Edition Sweatshirt (This one’s specially cool).

Backers in the business community will have the option of choosing a special “ISABEL Supporter” advertisement on Metroleta.com.

We also will publish a special “ISABEL Supporters” web page, listing our backers (unless they prefer to remain anonymous, of course).

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

We have taken steps to mitigate those problems that, from long experience, typically occur in software development. It is the unique issues of this project that we are preparing ourselves for so that we can meet them confidently.
Delay is certainly an issue, but that risk is somewhat mitigated by the fact that much of the framework of ISABEL’s code is already written.

Beyond the technical abilities of its engineers, 70% of the success of any piece of software is dependent on its usability. The success of this project depends on getting users excited about the broad functions and usefulness of ISABEL. Our technology design has been under development for quite awhile now. This is the reason why we have been able to devote a lot of care and time in designing the ISABEL’s user interface.

We are also well aware that our success depends on achieving a critical mass of users beyond the regional education arena that METROLETA is currently in. This is also the reason why we have been diligently preparing our marketing, communications, and social media campaigns.

ISABEL is a much-needed alternative to what teachers, professors, parents and students have at their disposal today. We are confident that ISABEL’s advanced design will help create a vibrant community of users around it.

IT ALL DEPENDS ON YOU

How much we will be able to build initially will depend on how much funding you help us raise. The more funds we raise, the more functions we will be able to include in the first release of ISABEL.

One thing is sure. When you help fund this project, many teachers and students will have more than just a powerful tool, they will have a resource that can help make life a little easier for the children.

story:
So Frustrated!

Life is just too busy and far too short without having to sit down on your bed and unravel a mountain of tangled cables. Not only do you have to untangle them, you also have to find them all. Argh! 

Finally, you get them all plugged in to only find an ugly mess and a jungle of random cords on your bedside cupboard.

So You Then Go And Investigate For A Wireless Solution

You start by looking online for a wireless solution for your Apple devices. Quickly you realise that there is nothing on the market that looks good and does the job properly. You have invested in all of your Apple devices but the only available wireless charging stations are all cheap plastic trash.

The other annoying thing is that the devices are all lying down. What is it with that?

There Is No Complete Solution

The fact is there is no complete solution on the market that complements your favourite Apple Devices.

The iComboStand Was Born!

We understand your pain and felt it ourselves as Apple Users. So the "Solutions to Inspire"Team began working on the ideal solution in January 2018. 

After countless hours of research and development together with numerous concepts and prototypes, we believe we have now created the best possible outcome for all Apple lovers. The iComboStand is currently patent pending and ready to level up your current charging experience.

The iComboStand design not only looks elegant, but it has also been engineered to make your life better.

Not only does it look amazing, the iComboStand utilizes world leading, cutting-edge technology!

It's as simple as placing your devices on the iComboStand and they magically start to charge. Yes, it's that easy! 

Perfect For Your Home & Work

The iComboStand is the perfect charging station for both Home and the Office. There's nothing worse then getting half way through your day and your device starts going flat. So why not have a second iComboStand at your work station?

Easy FaceTime

The iComboStand enables you to FaceTime handsfree whilst your phone continues to charge. We have positioned the iComboStand for the perfect viewing angle, which is very natural and comfortable.

Watch Netflix or YouTube

The iComboStand is also designed to fast charge in the landscape position. This means that you can watch Netflix or Youtube handsfree with total confidence that your iPhone won't go flat.

Bonus USB Port

We received great feedback during our prototyping stage that the 3 in 1 Qi Wireless Charging Stand was amazing. However, we also had a couple of awesome recommendations. People loved that they could charge 3 devices at once, but they still wanted more! This led us to introduce an additional bonus USB port for a 4th device (iPad, Powerbank, Kindle etc.)

Charge Phone While In Bed

The reason people wanted the extra USB port was to enable them to charge their Iphone whilst using it in bed. 

There is nothing worse than settling into bed and just wanting to wind down on your phone, but you can't because it's dead flat! Well now you can, all whilst still utilizing our next generation wireless charging station.

Perfect Night Stand and Alarm Clock

The other design features that make the iComboStand superior than current wireless chargers is the fact that it enables you to set up your iPhone as your Alarm Clock. Decluttering your bedside cupboard and complimenting the iComboStand's minimalist design.

SILVER/BLACK

 

Unfortunately, the current Apple AirPods are not Qi wireless compatible. Luckily, we have this covered with our NEW iComboStand AirPod Charging Case. All you need to do is place your current AirPod case in the iComboStand AirPod case and they are now Qi wireless compatible. 

(*There will be an extra charge for the iComboStand AirPod charging case if ordered) Apple may bring out the AirPod 2.0 during the iComboStand launch.

 

What if you have an iPhone 6 or 7 which is NOT Qi wireless compatible, but you want this wireless technology without having to upgrade your phone? Well we have you covered! The NEW iComboStand Qi iPhone charging case enables you to charge wirelessly. Simply put the case on your iPhone and you are ready to go!

(*There will be an extra charge for the iComboStand iPhone 6 or 7 charging case if ordered)

 

Risks and challenges

We make it our mission to ensure that every customer is satisfied with their iComboStand experience. That being said, there are inherent risks when manufacturing a new product. We have an amazing team that have a deep understanding of the phone accessory industry as well as the product development process. Our previous experience makes us prepared for any unforeseen challenges we might encounter during the tooling, manufacturing, testing and certification processes.

Despite our familiarity with the process and long-term partnership with our top-tier supply partners, there is still risk in tooling, assembling, and producing these products. Any unforeseen problems during the manufacturing or assembly process could possibly create delays. If anything does come up along the way, you will be the first to know.

The iComboStand product you see in the above videos is an actual working prototype. The product has been fully tested and is ready for the next stage of development.

The “Solutions To Inspire” way is to make the best products possible the first time. We will do everything we can to make that happen with the new iComboStand.

With your support, we can bring the iComboStand to Apple lovers worldwide
story_txt:
So Frustrated!Life is just too busy and far too short without having to sit down on your bed and unravel a mountain of tangled cables. Not only do you have to untangle them, you also have to find them all. Argh! Finally, you get them all plugged in to only find an ugly mess and a jungle of random cords on your bedside cupboard.So You Then Go And Investigate For A Wireless SolutionYou start by looking online for a wireless solution for your Apple devices. Quickly you realise that there is nothing on the market that looks good and does the job properly. You have invested in all of your Apple devices but the only available wireless charging stations are all cheap plastic trash.The other annoying thing is that the devices are all lying down. What is it with that?There Is No Complete SolutionThe fact is there is no complete solution on the market that complements your favourite Apple Devices.The iComboStand Was Born!We understand your pain and felt it ourselves as Apple Users. So the "Solutions to Inspire"Team began working on the ideal solution in January 2018. After countless hours of research and development together with numerous concepts and prototypes, we believe we have now created the best possible outcome for all Apple lovers. The iComboStand is currently patent pending and ready to level up your current charging experience.The iComboStand design not only looks elegant, but it has also been engineered to make your life better.Not only does it look amazing, the iComboStand utilizes world leading, cutting-edge technology!It's as simple as placing your devices on the iComboStand and they magically start to charge. Yes, it's that easy! Perfect For Your Home & WorkThe iComboStand is the perfect charging station for both Home and the Office. story:
Over the past few years, several of my friends and family have had their identities stolen. Anyone who has been through the experience can attest that it's not only time-consuming to resolve, but also frustrating. 

This is where lynk comes in.

Acting as your first line of defence against digital fraud, lynk protects the passwords, bank login, credit card codes, etc. stored in your device. lynk is small, lightweight, and boasts a patent-pending four layer authentication and encryption process that can only be accessed by you. 

Combined with its free companion app, lynk also serves as a tool to help you find your missing phone.  If you are unable to locate your phone, simply tap lynk three times and your device will start ringing, even if it's set on silent mode. 

HOW IT WORKS:

Touch your device to lynk in order to set the encryption connection that cannot be broken.


Now while you're working remotely, you can do your banking, trading, shopping, and other tasks confident that your personal information is safe and secure. 

Once paired with its companion app, lynk will work within a range of 100 feet of your device. Its battery lasts three to four months, thanks to a low-frequency Bluetooth connection that does not require a network connection. 




I WANT lynk

The options below will allow you to enjoy the benefits of our secure encryption technology, especially if you use your phone for online banking, stock trading, online shopping, etc.

Perks include:

Early Early Bird Adopter – 1 lynk device  Cost = $39

Couple Package – 2 lynk devices  Cost = $115

Odd Couple Package – 3 lynk devices cost = $162

Family Package - 4 lynk devices cost = $200

Wholesale Package – 10 lynk devices cost = $415

V.I.P Package – 4 lynk devices cost = $500

Every option Includes:

3 Free CR2032 Batteries



SIZE:   2.24 x 1.73” x .39”  (WxDxH)

MATERIAL: high strength plastic

CPU: ARM Cortex-M

ALERTS: White LED, Red LED, Vibrator, Buzzer, and Accelerometer 

POWER: single CR2032 coin size battery

OUR REFERRAL PROGRAM:

CLICK HERE TO ACCESS OUR REWARDS PROGRAM QUICK SHARE PAGE




Shipping, Packaging & Costs

1. What will be included in the box?

 lynk device and instructions.

2. Do I manually add the cost of shipping?

Yes, you have to add shipping in addition to your selected perk. When you pledge, manually add an additional $10 to the price of the perk you want. We will do the matching at the end of the campaign. 

3. What do I do if I forget to pay for shipping?

No problem. Click on the “contribute now” button at the top of the page and manually enter $10. It will be added to your pledge amount. Enter the same personal information you did on your initial order. We will do the matching ourselves at the end of the campaign.

4. When are you going to be shipping my lynk device?

With your campaign contribution to lynk, you are funding our software development and manufacturing. uConekt Inc. - the owner of lynk is expecting to ship the first production lot by end of July 2015.

5. When will my credit card be charged?

Your credit card will be charged immediately after you submitted your payment.

Technical Specs

1. In which countries will lynk function?

lynk is approved and certified for: United States (FC), Canada (IC), Europe (CE), Japan (Japanese Radio Certification).

2. How secure is the lynk back-up database?

uConekt’s servers are designed to encrypt and securely backup your data using your unique key in your lynk device. Your data cannot be accessed by any other lynk device or without your credentials.

3. What mobile smartphones platforms does lynk work with?

Works with Android 4.4.2 Jelly Bean and Kit Kat, and 5.x Lollipop. Samsung: Galaxy Note II, S4, Note 3, Note 3 Neo, S5, S6, K zoom; Sony: Xperia T3 and Apple® iPhone, Blackberry® BB10 and Windows®.

4. Will you make an lynk app for iPhone smartphones?

Yes,  lynk apps works on Apple® iPhone, Android™, Blackberry® and Windows® smartphones.

5. How will lynk be supported?

uConekt will offer technical support through our website at support@uconekt.com

Product Features & options

1.  What type of battery do I need for lynk?

  lynk operates with an inexpensive and small coin size battery – CR2032.

2.  Will I be notified if my battery is running low?

The lynk app on the phone has a battery monitor and will you alert you when it is low.

3.  Is lynk waterproof?

No, but it is splash proof and moisture proof.

4.  What is the range of the Bluetooth connection?

Bluetooth range is typically around 100 feet and it can reach up to 200 feet when it is in line of sight.

5.  Does lynk offer privacy settings?

Yes, your personal and private data secured with lynk patent-pending authentication login process will ensure that your data is encrypted and secured.

6.  What will uConekt do with my data?

Once your data is secured with lynk, your data will be safely stored using your lynk unique key. uConekt will only store your data. Your data cannot be opened or accessed by uConekt or any other third party without your lynk device and authentication login.

7.  Can lynk be used with another smartphone?

Not at this time. We are investigating.

8.  What materials is lynk made of?

lynk has a durable high quality plastic enclosure and we use high quality plastic for other components.

9.  How do I report my smartphone or tablet lost or stolen?

The user will login to uConekt's servers - www.uconekt.com - using the login/register button to report that they no longer have their smart mobile device.

10.  How do I report my lynk lost or stolen?

The user will login to uConekt's servers - www.uconekt.com - to report that they no longer have their lynk device.

11.  How does lynk communicate with uConekt servers?

lynk securely communicates with your smart device via NFC and Bluetooth and your smart mobile device will communicate with the uConekt servers.

12.  How is my information secured?

uConekt secures the database where your information is stored with 128bit AES encryption and a unique patent-pending authorization and encryption process. 

13.  Why would I want to relinquish physical security of my private and personal data?

If someone wants to steal your personal and private, they will steal your smart mobile device that is with you.  With uConekt and lynk, only uConekt servers via lynk and your smart mobile device know the physical location of your data.  Your relationship with us is never published or revealed. Remember, we have created some really ingenious ways to make access to your personal and private data personalized only to you and your lynk device.

14.  What happens if I forget how to access uConekt servers?

We have a simple verification process that you initiate and then confirm independently on www.uconekt.com .  After getting your access reset, your will then be asked to secure your access with your personal access information. 

For additional product questions and concerns, contact us directly.

story:
Why choose Chicso?

Keys are easy to lose. Passwords are easy to forget. Bluetooth locks are easy to hack.  Chicso is the ultimate security solution to make luggage, outdoor, and gym theft a thing of the past. 

The Chicso features an Advanced Fingerprint Sensor with a 0.2 sec unlock time along with an unbreakable design. Chicso provides fast and secure unlocking experience. With IP65 rated waterproof, 360° fingerprint recognition, ultra-long standby time and storage for 40 fingerprints, you need only one finger to keep your belongings safe.

Problems Solved：

  • No more worry about forgetting your password. 
  • No need to carry keys or a mobile phone with you. 
  • No need for multiple steps just to open the lock. 
  • One touch is all you need to open your secure lock.

 

Say goodbye to your old bulky lock and step into the future. Chicso is so small that you can easily keep it in your pocket until you’re ready to keep your stuff protected. Chicso is superior to the simple match-and-unlock mechanism on ordinary locks, as access is only allowed through your unique fingerprint. Great for indoor or outdoor use, and CHICSO is widely used for luggage, golf bags, handbags, school lockers, gym lockers, furniture, wardrobes, bike and anything else that you need secured. 

 

 

 

 

 

Your fingerprint is your key, Chicso is much safer and more convenient, as it’s truly keyless. A smart lock that loyally defends and protects your valuables on all of your journeys. 

 

 

Chicso features a 3ft (1m) long retractable wire made from cut-resistant 304 stainless steel, which has a load-bearing capacity of 120kg. The shackle is flexible and incredibly strong which makes it the ideal lock for any situation. As an accessory, widely used for luggage, furniture, wardrobes, bike and anything else.

 

 

Chicso, unlike many other intelligent locks on the market, can prevent copycat fingerprints from thieves. This A.I. fingerprint identification solution reads prints in high resolution (508 dpi) and from 360 degrees. 

 

 

 

Chicso knows the difference between a live fingerprint and a picture of a fingerprint and will reject anything that isn’t 100% authentic. Chicso relies on independent A.I. technology to keep user biometric data safe and secure.  

 

 

Chicso allows for two administrator fingerprints which enables multi-user management. Up to 40 fingerprints can be registered on the lock so you can share it with friends and family.  

 

 

With 100% construction made of aviation grade aluminum alloy, Chicso is ready to handle daily bumps and bruises and can stand up to any tampering by force. 

 

 

Chicso’s design is super resistant to prying, slamming, cutting, or anything else that could break weaker locks. Chicso uses an integrated stamping method to create an aluminum alloy, making it ultra-strong and capable of standing up to potential breaking attempts. 

 

 

Multispectral recognition systems can read your fingerprint even if it’s wet, oily, dry, or dirty. 

 

 

With IP65 dust and water resistance, Chicso can stand up to the elements, meaning that it is excellent for both indoor and outdoor use. 

 

Chicso is also resistant to varying temperatures from -20°C-45°C（-4°F-113°F）. Take your Chicso wherever you go without worrying about environmental factors.  

 

 

 

Smart locks need to be reliable, meaning that the battery should work for long periods. Chicso uses a 130mAh built-in battery, and the system is incredibly energy efficient, using only (0.5μm), allowing for one year of regular use (with more than 3,500 unlock/lock actions) or one year of standby on a single charge. Even if the battery dies, Chicso features quick charging technology to get powered up sooner rather than later. 

 

TEST VIDEO

 

MEASUREMENT

 

About Us 

Whenever we used to go out for exercise, fitness, swimming, etc., we would have to bring our traditional keys—this caused a lot of inconveniences. But now, life is much more convenient with a fingerprint sensing lock. It protects our personal belongings and privacy, and with the keys being at our fingertips, opening a lock has never been more convenient. Our designer team did an excellent job on this project.

story:
Introducing the CSB502SSD!

Pi 2 Design is excited to introduce the first offering in a new line of Embedded and Media-based I/O shields for the popular Raspberry Pi 2. The CSB502SSD Multi-Function Solid State Drive shield allows users to create a low cost, high performance, embedded network storage device. The powerful combination of the CSB502SSD and the Raspberry Pi 2 lets you leverage the ever expanding RPi 2 ecosystem for a wide variety of Embedded, Data Storage, Medical and Industrial applications.

In addition to the mSATA SSD Socket (up to 1TB) the CSB502SSD provides key functionality to the Raspberry PI 2. This includes: 802.11b/g/n Wifi with Soft-AP support and u.FL jack for optimal antenna placement; Dual USB 2.0 with 5V @ 1.5A power; On-Board wide-input (8V-24V) power supply delivers 50W (5V @ 10A) of power to all on-board peripherals and the Raspberry PI 2; Real Time Clock with removable battery back up insures proper time keeping even with spotty or no network access; finally, the Temperature Sensor with 64-bit ID allows the CSB502SSD to monitor the health of the SSD and provide a unique asset tag.


Technical Specifications

  • Full size Raspberry Pi 2 I/O Shield
  • Two USB 2.0 ports for additional expansion
  • PL2571 - USB to SATA Bridge controller
  • mSATA Socket for up to 1TB on-board storage
  • GWF-3M08 WiFi Module (Based on Ralink RT5370) provides 802.11b/g/n for up to 150Mbps. On-Module IPEX connector allows for optimal antenna placement.
  • DS1339 Real Time Clock with 16mm Coin Cell Battery Backup and Programmable Alarm.
  • 1-Wire DS18B20 Temperature Sensor mounted below SSD to monitor health of drive.
  • Additionally the DS18B20 has a unique 64-Bit ID that can be used to identify the shield.
  • On-Board Wide-Input 5V @ 10A power supply, powers all peripherals as well as the Raspberry Pi 2.
  • 5-Pin Header with 5V @ 1A, I2C and GPIO Interrupt supports the official Pi Foundation 7" Touch Display.


Design Background

When designing the CSB502SSD we looked at the broader Raspberry PI shield market to determine what made sense for a multi-function shield oriented toward embedded control and development.  Along the way we made a handful of decisions and this is a bit of background on this.

USB Hub - The CSB502SSD interfaces to the Raspberry Pi 2 via GPIO, I2C and one USB port.  That port connects to a four port USB hub.  Two ports are used by the WiFi and SATA, while the other two go to separate USB Type-A connectors.  These ports provide a minimum of 1.5A per port.

SSD Socket - We chose the mSata for this project since it offered the most capacity in the space we had available. Although we have used, and continue to use the newer M2 form factor where space is tight, mSata was the best choice for the CSB502SSD.  The PL2571 Hi-Speed USB to SATAII Bridge Controller  was chosen as it offered great Linux support while being low cost and low powered.

WiFi - The GWF-3M08 is a small, low cost module based on the popular Ralink RT5370 chip.  This chip supports 802.11b/g/n speeds at low power and with Soft-AP support so you can use the Raspberry PI 2 as a WiFi access point.  Again, great Linux support was a key factor in our decision.

RTC w/Battery - Many DIY projects have chosen the Dallas//Maxim DS1307 Real Time Clock.  The Dallas/Maxim DS1339 we chose is software compatible, but offers extra features such as programmable alarm, auto-switch over from the 3V rail to the battery, as well as trickle charge for re-chargeable coin cells.  A 16mm coin cell holder allows for up to 250ma/hr non-rechargeable as well as re-chargeable cells.

Temp Sensor - A key issue for SSD drives is that they can be sensitive to temperature.  The Dallas/Maxim DS18B20 provides an easy I2C interface to monitor the ambient temperature at the SSD drive itself.  While some SSD's support internal temperature monitoring, most lower cost, commercial units do not.  An added bonus is the inclusion of a unique 64-bit ID allowing each CSB502SSD to be identified and tracked for asset management purposes.

On-Board Power Supply - The maximum input of 5V @ 700ma via the Raspberry Pi 2 Micro-USB connector has always limited power available to the four USB ports.  Although the CSB502SSD uses one Raspberry PI 2 USB port, it does not take any power from it.  Instead an external 12V brick supplies power to the CSB502SSD via a standard 2.1mm barrel jack.  The 5V @ 10A supply on the CSB502SSD powers all peripherals, plus the Raspberry Pi (up to 4A).


Custom Projects

Recently the Raspberry Pi foundation announced a new program to allow users to create their own customized version of the Raspberry Pi 2. With 3-5K yearly minimums this program shows the commitment of the Raspberry Pi foundation to the embedded marketplace.

But, what if your not ready to make that commitment? We've got you covered. Our Pi2Custom program allows you to create your own application specific shield or carrier board for the Raspberry Pi 2. Select from our vast library of IP and years of industrial interface experience, all with no volume commitments and low or no NRE! Contact us with your ideas and project needs. We love to help.


Production Update

We already have production units coming off of the assembly line as we work to fulfill our Kickstarter pledges for our initial backers.


Top side Production Unit

Bottom Side Production Unit

story:
Short Summary

LiveNow!TV app has been on Google Play and Amazon Market for eight months with a total of 650,000 downloads. The app has a 3.8 rating on Google Play with close to 3000 reviews. 
LiveNow!TV allows users to watch and record from over 500 live and On Demand channels and 45,000 on demand programs, (including movies, sports, interactive and docs).
Revenue is generated from advertising and in app subscriptions. Subscriptions can be purchased for dvr storage and hd. There is programming that is also pay to view.
We are currently looking to develop the app for iphone and ipad in the first stage and then for windows phone.

What We Need & What You Get

Funding is needed to create an iOS app, a Windows Phone app and for marketing.

story:
Hello friends! Thanks for visiting our Indiegogo page for The Draw Thing, the first game inspired and affordable touchscreen stylus that helps give you an edge over your Draw Something friends. The Draw Thing™ will enhance your all around Draw Something™ game on iPad®, iPhone®, iPod® touch and Android® devices.

Draw Something is the new app that has taken the world of smartphones by storm.  An online version of Pictionary®, it allows players to use Apple® and Android devices as a canvas.  Until now players had to use their fingers as a paintbrush.  With The Draw Thing you will be able to transform your doodles from finger-painting into art.

The Draw Thing was born out of our desire to have a really great stylus for the amazing Draw Something game. We bought several different stylus models currently available on the market but they all suffered the same problem: they were designed to look and feel like a pen and did not have kids in mind. In addition we have a rubber sleeve that can be interchanged with different  colored sleeves. We will be adding licensed designed sleeves as well so collect them all! 

Once again, we can’t thank you all enough for your support. You are allowing us to continue to do what we love. As you can see, The Draw Thing is the labor of love of two individuals, Dan Weinstein and Doron J Fetman. With your support we will continue to bring innovative designs to market. We are a team of creative out of the box thinkers committed to the philosophy that through strategic thinking and innovative design a concept can become reality.

story:
Our Story  

1 in 5 young women will be a victim of sexual assault during college.


We are sick and tired of this behavior. Aren't you? We can all do better to prevent sexual assault and dating violence BEFORE it happens. 


We know that close relationships are the cornerstone of college life. We designed this App to highlight these bonds, and link you to your friends and the people you love, to help prevent violence, get home safely, and look out for each other. To make sure that no one suffers needlessly and to prevent violence before it happens.


To do this, we created the Circle of 6 mobile app and are determined to make it FREE.


Our goal is to get the app in the hands of 30,000 college students by the end of 2012.


The Apps Against Abuse challenge had NO CASH PRIZE. Our amazing team is left to our own devices to raise the funds.


Here's the deal: We are COUNTING ON 2500 donors to give $10 each. To do that, use the Share Tools to tell 10 (or 100!) people you know about Circle of 6. And then, they can each tell 10, and another 10 and so on.


Passionate Collaborators


Circle of 6 is a White House award-winning app. Vice President Joe Biden called on us as software innovators to harness the power of mobile tech to prevent dating violence and abuse among students aged 16-24.


Nancy Schwartzman is the director of the cutting edge documentaries â€œThe Lineâ€ and â€œxoxosms.â€ She is the Founder and Executive Director of The Line Campaign, a non-profit that creates original media to inspire action to end sexual violence. www.whereisyourline.orgï»¿.


Deb Levine, Exec. Director and Founder of ISIS, a non-profit organization using social and mobile media for sexual and reproductive health, and the development of healthy relationships.  www.isis-inc.org

Christine Corbett Moran is an engineer, artist and dilettante. She is CEO and Co-founder of Kliq, a mobile startup, a freelance iPhone developer, organizer at TedXZurich, and working on her PhD in theoretical physics.ï»¿ www.kliq.in


Thomas Cabus is an award-winning photographer, art director and motion graphics designer. His clients range from Warner Bros. to Orange. Prior, he worked as a Senior Designer at Oracle. www.thomascabus.fr


IMPACT


Circle of 6 has been recognized by the White House Office of Science and Technology Policy (OSTP) and US Department of Health and Human Services. We've also received significant media buzz in Marie-Claire, The New York Daily News, Christian Science Monitor, and the official Apple blog.


More than 3200 individuals have already taken our Facebook pledge that says
â€œI wonâ€™t let violence happen in my circleâ€ 



 

 THE CIRCLE  OF 6 APP IS OFFERED FREE TO ALL!

 

 What We Need

We have an  ambitious campaign to reach 30,000 U.S. students in 2012-- young women and men. We need your support to finish the initial release for iPhone (slated for February 2012) and to develop the Droid version. We are planning a college tour of 300 campuses for 2012 and need funds for travel, speaker fees, and materials. 


We are looking for 2500 people to donate $10 each; OR 25 people to donate $1,000 each.

How You Can Help

  • Take the pledge to end violence in your community - www.facebook.com/Circleof6
  • Use IndieGoGo share tools to reach out to your friends and ask them to donate.
  • Download the app, starting February 2012 at open.gov and circleof6app.com
  • Hook us up to your company's matching plan, CSR folks, or volunteer pool - email circleof6app@gmail.com

story:
Courtesy cell phone Chargers (Courtesy Chargers)

Cell Phone chargers for BARS

Take a look around and what do you see? CELL PHONES! EVERY WHERE. We live on cell phones today we use them for work and play all day long. How many times have you looked at your phone and it's about to die?

COURTESY CHARGERS is a compact charging stations for BARS and many other uses also. They can also be customized with daily specials or even your own logo.

Wow don't you get tired of your cell phone dying while you’re out with friends or just stopping by the local bar on the way home. Hi everyone, I'm a former Restaurant/Bar owner for over 16 years. While out one night having dinner I was sitting at the bar waiting for a phone call with my girlfriend and my phone lit up and I thought great here it is, WRONG my phone said powering down my battery was DEAD. Has this ever happened to you? I bet it has. So as I walk out to my car to plug my cell phone in and came back into the bar and I had to keep running back and fourth to try to catch the call, VERY FRUSTRATING. As I’m sitting eating I look up and down the bar and everyone is either on there phone or it is sitting in front of them on the bar that’s when it hit me WE NEED A COURTESY CHARGER. Just about everyone offers free WIFI, so I thought why not offer a free charge!  I think you will all agree that we live on our cell phones today, some more than others. We work on them, we play games on them and we surf the web on our phones now more than we do on our home computers. It is almost impossible to keep a full charge through the whole day as you well know. By you helping us on this we will be able to bring COURTESY CHARGERS TO ALL.

Think about it

  • Bars
  • Car Dealerships
  • Suites in sporting arenas and      concert halls
  • Beauty Salons
  • Doctor Offices
  • Country Clubs
  • Bowling Alleys

ANYWHERE YOU ARE FOR 30 MINUTES OR LONGER!!!!!!!!!!

The units are also repairable so if a tip breaks you can just replace the tip if the power supply goes bad you can just buy a power supply YOU DONT HAVE TO BUY A WHOLE NEW UNIT!!!

What were looking and what were giving back? 

We are looking for $50,000.00 to fund MARKETING and our first FULL shipment of COURTESY CHARGERS. We have already paid for and made our molds and did a small production run and have some units out already. The feedback has been fantastic and we are now ready to move forward and place a full order and do alot of marketing with the funds we receive from this campaign.  In return for your support we are offering everything from a Thank You to a COURTESY CHARGER UNIT/S. Helping us help you stay charged up!

Other ways you can help!!!!!

Please tell your friends to tell their friends and help us spread the word to all. Tell your favorite barteneder or even better the bar owner. Help us spread the word on Facebook, Twitter and any other form of social media out there. We cant live without our cellphones today and they do us no good if their dead. Please help us so we can help you keep your phone charged while you are out and about.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   Thank You for looking at our project

Dale & Barb and the Courtesy Chargers team

story:
Short Summary

Gee-Wey is one of the most committed friend, colleague, and community organizers I know. He loves his community so much.

He does this all on a pink phone that I swear looks and functions like it was from the late 1900s.

He deserves better. Join me and fellow friends of Gee-Wey's in helping buy him a smartphone for Christmas.

  • $5 donation: Gee-Wey will send you a christmas text
  • $10 donation: Gee-Wey will send you a unique sexy Gee-wey picture from the phone
  • $20 donation: Gee-Wey will do all of the above and will play with you in scramble with friends or the smartphone game of our choosing

What We Need & What You Get

some more detail:

  • Will likely buy a smartphone that is unattached to a dataplan (so he can initially use it with wifi)
  • Trying to get it to him by Christmas
  • It's not too much of a secret, I warned Gee-Wey I'd start a campaign for his technology

The Impact

With your small donation Gee-Wey will be able to do the following:

  • check his email
  • hear you clearly
  • you can hear him clearly
  • keep Gee-Wey entertained as he commutes and travels across the nation working tirelessly for his community
  • take pictures of precious moments
  • find directions
  • join the 21st century

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about Gee-Wey's campaign.

Seriously 5-20 dollars isn't a crazy huge thing to ask. We can do it! I believe!
