story:
Liquid Sapphire - Scratch Resistant Touch Screens

Due to our previous Indiegogo campaign for Flash Flood a DIY coating for waterproofing phones & tablets, we have developed a new scratch resistant touch screen Nanotechnology DIY coating for any touch screen devices.  We have be lucky enough to be selected by Indiegogo for extended funding, so for all you that have missed out last time, now is your chance  ! 





We are looking for help to bring the cost down from funding from Indiegogo community to make it accessible for everybody at a great price.

So what is Liquid Sapphire and how does it work ?

Liquid Sapphire is a DIY coating that stops your phone, tablet or any touch screen from getting scratched, ditch your old plastic shield protector and get the full clarity of your screen using liquid sapphire, it’s invisible, contains man-made liquid sapphire which is second only to diamonds in hardness. It is also chemical resistant, ideal for people who need to keep their device sanitised. Liquid Sapphire is a one time Nanotechnology application and does not need to be topped up.

Liquid Sapphire improves the clarity of your screen, the effect is caused by the Sapphires in liquid which will be a technology used in all touch screen devices over the years to come.

Specifications

Works with any touchscreen device and camera lenses.
Scratch resistant & waterproof.
Life Span : Permanent, Can only be removed by polishing
Chemical Resistant Coating
Invisible coating
External Coating : Yes
Internal Coating : No
Shelf Life : 18 months from opening
Non Toxic
Non Hazardous. 


How to apply Liquid Sapphire

Please watch the video below


After coating  (following the video above)  the device is ready to use, keep away from any sharp objects or anything that might scratch your screen for 48hrs, in this time the Liquid Sapphire is fully cured.

Don’t be tempted to start scratching your device, you will see the results of Liquid Sapphire over normal day to day use. 

Liquid Sapphire improves the clarity of your screen, the effect is caused by the Sapphires in liquid which will be a technology used in all touchscreen devices over the years to come.

Liquid sapphire does not work on plastic or metal, it’s designed specifically for touch screen and camera lenses.


Liquid sapphire can be used with Flash Flood Blue Label for waterproofing phones & tablets, just apply Liquid sapphire first and then Flash Flood Blue giving you a waterproof & scratch resistant device !


See how Flash Flood Blue Label Works

Please watch the video's below



How To Apply Flash Flood Blue Label 



Perks

We have arranged some unique perks for you, Only on Indiegogo !  


Perk 1 $34

1 x Liquid Sapphire 

Liquid Sapphire will cover ;
3-4 Large Smart Phones
2-3 Tablets 10″


Perk 2 $65

2 x Liquid Sapphire


2 x Liquid Sapphire will cover ;
6-8 Large Smart Phones
4-6 Tablets 10″


Perk 3 $65

1 x Liquid Sapphire
1 x Flash Flood Blue Waterproofing For Phones & Tablets Combo.

Liquid Sapphire will cover ;
3-4 Large Smart Phones
2-3 Tablets 10″


Flash Flood Blue Label Waterproofing For Phones & Tablets Liquid Will Cover ;
3-4 Smart Phones
2-3 Tablets


Perk 4 $89

2 x Liquid Sapphire
2 x Flash Flood Blue Waterproofing For Phones & Tablets Combo.

2 x Liquid Sapphire will cover ;
6-8 Large Smart Phones
4-6 Tablets 10″

2 x Flash Flood Blue Label Waterproofing For Phones & Tablets Liquid Will Cover ;
6-8 Large Smart Phones
4-6 Tablets 10″


Perk 5 $99

3 x Liquid Sapphire 
3 x Flash Flood Blue Waterproofing For Phones & Tablets Combo.


2 x Liquid Sapphire will cover ;
6-8 Large Smart Phones
4-6 Tablets 10″

2 x Flash Flood Blue Label Waterproofing For Phones & Tablets Liquid Will Cover ;
6-8 Large Smart Phones
4-6 Tablets 10″


ALSO SOME NEW PERKS HAVE BEEN ADDED :-)



Delivery of your Indiegogo Perks.

The products will be shipped in 5 working days maximum from the UK.

Please note there are 2 shipping options 

1 Without Tracking & 1 With Tracking

Without tracking : $5   (7-30 days transit) 
With Tracking : $12  (5-7 days transit)

We make no profit on the shipping, you can check the prices at Royal Mail.

Please note we cannot ship to Mexico, France, Italy or India as we have our agents in these areas.

On check out use the "Additional Contribution" to add the extra cost for the shipping.



You Can Help

Please help to get the word out and make some noise about the Liquid Sapphire campaign. You can use the Indiegogo share tools on the top of the page under the video. Any help in any form is really appreciated and thank you in advance.

Thanks for all those who gave us facebook likes :-) it's really helped, please leave some comments for us just on your thoughts of the products as it gives us good moral. 

If you missed the facebook likes please please give us a like, only if you do of course !


Any Questions

Please leave them public in the comments (at the top of the page) so it helps other visitors, a lot of questions are being made private when they don't need to be really. Thanks in advance.

Common Questions

Will Flash Flood effect the speakers on the HTC m8 - As long as you follow the video, no problem I use the m8 myself. It's been tested on all kind of speakers and there are no problems. As standard Flash Flood covers the ear speaker on all phones so there is no difference, you may get some distortion or low volume for a couple of hours if too much liquid goes inside, but once dry in a few hours it will go back to normal. It's designed not to causes any damage to electronics or speakers.

Will Flash Flood effect the iphone 5s Finger Scan - Flash Flood will not effect the finger scan, the coating drys 40,000 times thinner than a human hair. 

Will Liquid Sapphire effect the iPhone 5s finger scan -  There is no need to coat the finger scan button as it's made out of real sapphire.

Will Liquid Sapphire & Flash Flood work on the new iPhone 6 

Yes it will.

story:
Introducing TikTrak

World's First APP FREE Auto Self-Tracking Gimbal

TikTrak is the world's first APP free auto objective tracking phone mount with AI camera. It is super convenient for TikTok, Youtube, live streaming video, selfie video and party.

Auto Face & Objective Tracking with AI Camera

No APP/WiFi/Bluetooth Connection! 

Shipping Starts on September

Fit All iPhone & Android Phones 

Live Video with Family

Live Stream Hands-Free Video

Auto Action Tracking

Auto Tracking Anywhere

The Best Phone Mount for TikTok 

 

Compatible with Tripod

Perfect for Pet Shooting

Snap & Play

As easy as 1-2-3 steps, no need any APP to install, just set the phone and play.   

 

Replaceable 3 X AA Battery

Specifications

The Phone LED Light (Choose Your Perk)

30pcs 3200K Warm Light LED + 30pcs 5600K Cool Light LED

10 levels brightness controlling and 3 light modes: cool white, warm white and cool + warm white. The front clip can be used on the top of the phone. The back clip (can be taken off) can be used on the back of the phone. With built-in 2000 mAh battery, it offers 2 hours working time. With Micro USB and USB-C input, it is convenient to charge anywhere.

Perks

Super Early Bird

TikTrak (51% off)

  • $29  -  1 x TikTrak
  • $54  -  2 x TikTrak
  • $79  -  3 x TikTrak
  • $129  - 5 x TikTrak
  • $259 - 10 x TikTrak

TikTrak+LED Light (51% off)

  • $49  -     1 x TikTrak + LED Light Set
  • $89  -     2 x TikTrak + LED Light Set
  • $132  -   3 x TikTrak + LED Light Set
  • $209  -  5 x TikTrak + LED Light Set
  • $409  -  10 x TikTrak + LED Light Set

Expected Retail Price

  • $59  -  1 x TikTrak
  • $118  -  2 x TikTrak
  • $177  -  3 x TikTrak
  • $295  -  5 x TikTrak
  • $590 -  10 x TikTrak

Timeline

Design & Development

Mass Production Now

Team

Thank you for supporting TikTrak team. We can’t say it enough. TikTrak is an interesting phone mount for your phone with built-in AI camera. The idea of TikTrak is come from our team’s interest of making selfie video, we want to make an individual holder tracking the movement without any limits, No APP, No annoying Bluetooth. Place the phone on the holder and start record. After months of developing and prototyping, TikTrak now is a product ready to share with the world.

The TikTrak is already in mass production in factory, with your help we can make the mass production start and share TikTrak to more people. We are offering TikTrak at a super early bird price! Back us here and be the first on the world to have TikTrak.

Shipping and Fulfillment

We are planning to mass production and ship TikTrak before Sep 30th. Please be aware that shipping and taxes are not included in the pledge levels. Shipping charges vary based on your country - $6 US shipping and $9 International shipping. There are no additional shipping charges for add-ons, extra USB cables.

Taxes will vary based on where your rewards are shipped. We will not charge any taxes in the pledge manager. However, you may be responsible for sales tax, VAT/GST taxes, duties, import fees, or other taxes/fees when your reward is delivered. We plan to ship all parcels directly to backers using existing fulfillment partners with local warehouses.

Risk and Challenge

We are really excited to launch our TikTrak on Indiegogo. However we know that the most important of this project is that we fulfill our promise to you. While there are always risks & challenges with creating and delivering a brand new product, we've minimized both by having the entire process, from production to delivery, already set and arranged.

We have our manufacturers lined up, and our production team is waiting for our signal. We know what we're doing, and you should be confident that we will deliver what we promise when we say we will. We assure you that we are all working very hard to produce a sensational product that not only arrives on time but is of optimum quality!Thank you for your support! We are deeply grateful that you're on this journey with us!

story:
---BARTR: Changing the way we trade---

BARTR is more than a mobile app, it's a supplement to the cash we carry in our wallets and the amount on our bank statements. It's goal is to simplify the current bartering methods--countless posts to wade through, endless conversations for deal making, tons of websites and groups to sift through--by using the swipe left/swipe right method of Tinder and geofiltering. Almost anything can be traded to save your hard earned money: Home goods, Handmade items, Tutoring, Technical skills, business perks...the list is endless!

 

---But here's where we're really different...---

BARTR cares about our user's safety, and we know that meeting up to make a trade can get a little...sketchy. So we're using the geolocation feature of our app to create another layer of safety for our users. You can opt to create a "safety pin"--a four digit code--and a phone contact before meeting for the trade, and BARTR will check in throughout the meetup, prompting for the pin. If the pin is put in incorrectly or not put in at all, the app will send your location to your phone contact along with a message alerting them, so that help can be sent to you. Our aim is to not only make bartering easy, but also secure for all parties involved!

 

---Meet The Founder---

Hi! My name is Deborah Williams. I'm a farmer's wife, boy-mom, author, and the founder of BARTR.

BARTR started as just a passing thought, when bills were being paid but items in for-sale groups kept catching my eye. It's hard to save for the things you need money for while still getting the things that you want. And it's especially hard when small business expenses creep up. But current bartering sites and groups just hadn't caught up to the browsing ease I've grown accustomed to-- it was all time consuming and clunky to look at.

So I decided to change that. Being an author means I'm no stranger to a lot of rejection and a lot of obstacles, but it also means that I can take feedback and run with it. And that's what I've done. Going through countless versions of business plans and investor comments, together with Dom & Tom app developers and Appency marketers, we're ready to begin development on an app that's going to change the way we trade so we can change the way we save.

 

---What We Need & What You Get---

We're entering the Discovery Phase of development, which means our development partners at Dom & Tom are ready to start creating the prototype of our app in preparation for full scale development. To make that happen, we need two things:

  • A few weeks of developmental R&D
  • $37,000 and the support of our backers!

This covers the total cost of prototype development, including the labor costs of our developers. From here, we begin beta testing, which some of our backers will have the opportunity to be a part of!

We hope to make our full goal, because without that, it becomes harder to make this app and our goals possible, but even if we don't reach it, every donation made will go towards prototyping costs and an appeal will be made based on our backers' interest to investors who've discussed being part of our overall development funding. Because every dollar represents traction in the market, presenting it to angel investors will help tremendously in gaining funding for full scale development.

 

---The Impact---

We know that the barter system can't ever replace money, but we do know that it can help supplement it so that the things we can't help but need money for can be saved for. We know that individuals and small businesses can benefit from the exchange of goods and services to free up cash for the important stuff, and we want to be a part of building a community that does just that, all at the familiar swipe of a finger!

 

---Other Ways You Can Help---

Pledging to our campaign isn't the only way you can help us out! Even if you can't pledge, you can help just by sharing this campaign with friends and family who could benefit from this app!

Share us on Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, email...any way you can, exposure helps us reach our goal and get our app into your hands!

story: TIMELINE
story_txt: TIMELINE

story:
We invented a smart charging cable equipped with Bluetooth and dedicated app, which by automating charging process in safe ranges ensure optimum battery charging, thus preventing reduction of its life in subsequent cycles.  Save your battery from overheating and  give your battery optimal charge and de-charge cycles to maintain an optimum level that increases its lifetime.

 

 

Each mobile device’s battery has a defined initial capacity, but overtime, as a result of subsequent charging cycles, it becomes smaller. It means your phone is dying faster and faster… What is especially harmful for the battery? 

Charging your phone to 100% and discharging to 0%, but that is hard to control and prevent. Not with BatteryPal, though! It charges the battery in a safe range, eg. 20%-80%, which significantly extends its lifespan.

 

 

 

Plug your phone into BatteryPal at bedtime, set the alarm and sleep peacefully, knowing for certain that it will be ready to work all day just before you wake up. Slow and safe charging in an optimal range while maintaining a low temperature of the device will take care of its health. 

 

 

 

Use your plugged phone while driving and keep it cool so it won't shut down. Overheating your phone and charging it to 100% are the most common causes of deteriorating battery capacity. BatteryPal provides optimal charging process in a narrow range, perfect for heavy load and temperature when you're using a GPS or have many apps opened in the background.

 

 

Forget about protecting battery health by constantly plugging and unplugging your phone at work. You can easily keep it plugged all day long, knowing that it won’t let you down when needed most. BatteryPal will take care of optimal charging process in a wide range, dedicated for low and medium device load and temperature.

 

 

User mode – choose your own individual setting of charging range and time. We realize that each and every one of us uses their phone in a different way, that’s why we don’t limit you to default modes.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Risks and challenges

As in every INDIEGOGO campaign, there are some risks and many challenges. We are already at the stage of a fully functional prototype and application - working out the logistics of mass production. We’ll do our best to deliver on time!

It means your phone is dying faster and faster… What is especially harmful for the battery? Charging your phone to 100% and discharging to 0%, but that is hard to control and prevent. Not with BatteryPal, though! It charges the battery in a safe range, eg. 20%-80%, which significantly extends its lifespan.   Plug your phone into BatteryPal at bedtime, set the alarm and sleep peacefully, knowing for certain that it will be ready to work all day just before you wake up. Slow and safe charging in an optimal range while maintaining a low temperature of the device will take care of its health.    Use your plugged phone while driving and keep it cool so it won't shut down. Overheating your phone and charging it to 100% are the most common causes of deteriorating battery capacity. BatteryPal provides optimal charging process in a narrow range, perfect for heavy load and temperature when you're using a GPS or have many apps opened in the background.  Forget about protecting battery health by constantly plugging and unplugging your phone at work. You can easily keep it plugged all day long, knowing that it won’t let you down when needed most. BatteryPal will take care of optimal charging process in a wide range, dedicated for low and medium device load and temperature.  User mode – choose your own individual setting of charging range and time. We realize that each and every one of us uses their phone in a different way, that’s why we don’t limit you to default modes.        Risks and challengesAs in every INDIEGOGO campaign, there are some risks and many challenges. We are already at the stage of a fully functional prototype and application - working out the logistics of mass production. We’ll do our best to deliver on time!

story:
Watch the video first please  

 

THE FUTURE OF SHOPPING IS NEAR...

Questions:

Are you tired of Traditional e-commerce solutions that are slow, cumbersome and clunky?  Searching through various sites for different products, trying to find the best deal, or it's exactly what you want. This can often take many hours of online comparison and effort. 

And Is the e-commerce site you are thinking of purchasing from real? Is the product real?

In some cases, it seems that it would be easier for you to drive to the store, pick out what you want, pay for it and drive home - but then there is the parking situation? Shopping should not be this difficult - PERIOD.

Would you value having a sales assistant as your own personal shopper to help you from stores locally and worldwide to assist you with making the right decision and confidently?

 The Answer - We can help you!

Our solution will make shopping a breeze.  It will empower you to become a trusted and valued customer where ever you decide to shop. You'll receive VIP treatment, with a personal shopping experience and enjoy your shopping adventure. as it should be an enjoyable experience.

GAME CHANGING TECHNOLOGY IS COMING

Founder of Amazon Jeff Bezos knew he would never be able to offer the kind of online experience one gets from a physical store staffed by human helpers through his e-commerce site..

"We " are never going to have sofas; we're never going to have lattes," Jeff said back in 1997 to Business Week Magazine.

 Founder of Zappos Tony Hsieh ,believes "The delivering of happiness, is a successful business model".

 Founder of open4sale Simon La Barrie, aims to bring the concepts of two of the most successful e-commerce creators together with his vision: "I want to bring the sofa and lattes to online shopping and by delivering happiness to customers along the way in the process".

Open4sale portal technology was created to revolutionize online shopping as we know it and enhance the customer experience for online shoppers and bring back the customer service you deserve -  we are to dramatically change the world of shopping.

 

         

With this campaign the Open4sale creators are giving you the opportunity to become a VIP member, And be the one of the first users of the application in the world.

You will have the opportunity to shop online within our mall to retail stores locally and in countries all over the world.-  be connected to real people in real time, who will be able to assist  you with all your purchasing needs.

 

Works Globally and  WE ARE GLOBAL

Open4sale.com is now not only based in USA and Australia, but also Singapore, Europe, and Dubai. Interest in the portal is continuing to grow rapidly with retailers and customers hoping to be amongst the first in the world to trial this application.

 You will be able to  use our application worldwide and to shop from stores in our global mall very soon.

 

 

Launch APP Features in our Worldwide Mall Directory

-  Merchant Search/Favorites

·  Sales Rep Search/Favorites

·  Fast Product Search

·  Product Listings, Product Detail

·  Friend Search/Add Friend (3-way)

·  View Touch Products/Ask questions in real time

·  View Shopping Bag, Shipping / Tracking

·  Purchase Products-Checkout Confirmation

·  View Purchase History

·  Book Appointments for private viewing or group viewings.

·  VIP Customer Service Connect

·  Rate / Review, Leave Feedback

·  Request Text/email Chat 

- VIP members sales and new products first alerts

- Instant UPS notification with tracking number of VIP shipping

 - Talk, actually see products, interact with a real sales associate live in the store!

There will be many more additional features added to the application in the future. 

 HOW IT WORKS

Customers are able to link to retailers through an Audio/Video Connection currently via a Ipad/tablet, then smartphone, and a desktop connection later.

 •The app is interactive and very easy to use, and gives customers the ability to search products as if they were physically in the store. Customers are greeted by the real store assistant's from the comfort of their own surroundings , where they can engage with the store assistant , look around the store and then then purchase products with guaranteed safety..

• Open4sale gives customers a greater online experience by giving them a real person to speak with, who can provide the same level of attention that they would receive if they were physically in the store themselves. The video definition has been developed to be higher quality than that seen with normal video conferencing, Skype and FaceTime applications, and customers are able to touch and research products, ask questions and make confident purchases with the help of a personal shopper in the store.

 



 

Open4sale.com Partners to market launch.

 International Open4sale Software support Team.

Our International support team will continue working toward the shared vision of building innovative products for consumers. Open4Sale will revolutionize the way consumers shop, utilizing current and future-focused technologies to improve the shopping experience, while offering improved mechanisms for merchants.

 

 Some of our Retail Consultants 


  www.startupfashion.com ·  www.thestorefront.com 

 Open4Sale is the bridge between sales associates, customers, and e-commerce. I am so excited to be a part of ushering in this new technology into the retail world. Retailers can now leverage their experienced sales associates to gain customers and loyalty like nothing ever before. This is a new era in customer service."

Syama Meagher is a retail strategist who has worked with brands like Barney's New York, Gucci, and Macy's. She consults with retailers and brands through the consulting firm Scaling Retail

www.scalingretail.com  

 Syama Meagher

Founder, Scaling Retail

 

 UPS

UPS is excited to begin its partnership with Open4Sale and is looking forward to helping you coordinate your International logistics for you and your partners. With our constructed overall logistics plan to help you navigate the global marketplace and achieve your goals to deliver an entirely new experience to the retail area.

UPS looks forward to helping Open4Sale generate a International logistics. We would like to offer Open4Sale special incentives for shipments to and from China, Europe, Singapore, USA and Australia.

I am looking forward to our future business partnership.

Matthew Gerard

UPS Business Consultant

 

 

 

SOME OF THE WONDERFUL Retailers waiting for you, with a lot more to be announced within this campaign and at our VIP events.

 

www.sabicollection.com         NY  USA

www.erindana.com                  NY USA

www.carrieparry.com              NY USA   

www.ashersboutique.com      OC  USA

www.lasambuca.com              Singapore

www.ruthtarvydas.com           Perth, Australia

  

First Customer testimonial.

Open4Sale.com- Teams up with Celebrity Designer Ruth Tarvydas to make a Fashion History.

From their beginnings in Australia in the late 60’s to now, Celebrity designer Tarvydas has always been at the cutting edge of design, and in becoming the first retailers to use this cutting edge open4sale technology

We are so happy to be here in New York, This collection represents everything we have come to stand for and what better way to greet the U.S.A than by being the first fashion label to use Open4Sale”. And what a success it was for us!

Open4Sale.com is a technological savior for fashion retailers across the world. This innovative software combines the traditional in store experience and personal service with the convenience of online shopping. If Net-a-porter and Skype had a baby, this company would be it. .

We are so happy and excited to be not only one of the first, but involved with open4sale.com.   and its passionate team worldwide,its so exciting!!.

SIMON YOU’RE A LIGHT TO THE WORLD!!!!!!

SO BRIGHT.

Ruth Tarvydas

http://au.news.yahoo.com/thewest/lifestyle/a/-/fashion/14803220/tarvydas-goes-global/

Australian press release 
 

SO WHY ARE WE CROWDFUNDING

Your financial support here will enable us to get into production and get the application out into the market quicker.

The more we raise here the quicker we can get our product into your hands to use.

 http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Q3xc0deO-A8

So welcome to the Open4Sale.com crowd funding "Pre launch" campaign.  With support from UPS, www.thestorefront.com and www.startupfashion.com  We want you to be involved in helping us improve the way retailers view you, the customer.  We want to give you the power and the tools to improve your online shopping experience and we want all retailers to realize that you, the customer, have the power to make decisions and shop where you are appreciated and valued.  We're here to revolutionize your experience with e-commerce sites and online shopping.

 
Open4Sale is going to make your online shopping experience enjoyable and easy.  And for your support you will be given the application for FREE, and as a VIP member will be amongst the first in the world to use it.  

 

 

 

OUR PRE LAUNCH PARTIES TO VIP S ONLY

 We want to invite you to help us launch our newest platform at our "launch events".  We want to meet you, hear from you, allow you to experience our superior technology. We want to give you the power and control you deserve when shopping online. Join our team and come to our exciting "launch events" and be the first to see and use our revolutionary technology when its commercialized for release next year..

With continued development and consumer/merchant research, Open4Sale will offer next-generation e-commerce applications, to be implemented across multiple public and merchant-facing platforms.

  

So lets start Reinventing Online Shopping for the 21st Century Together.

 

As THE WORLD OF ONLINE SHOPPING NEEDS AN UPGRADE 

Lidewij Edelkoort one of the world's most renowned fashion trend forecasters said-“Shopping will need to become a trip within our inner selves to satisfy our complex needs and wishes, and therefore needs to be addressed in a truly innovative manner, to reach the consumer on another, more private level”

 

Open4sale technology supports this concept of a completely new shopping experience needed, by integrating current and future-focused technologies, to both improve and reinvent the online shopping experience for customers and offer more effective sales-force mechanisms for merchants.  

 

 

The company s History to now.

The concept was first brought to life in  Australia in 2006 as a "one stop" property site To with the founders further vision in 2009,  and 3 years of hard work  with a multi International team and financial support from over 50 family/ friends - Took a dream to reality in 2012 with a working proof of concept of the Open4sale portal that was  demonstrated live to many retailers around the world and received to a great response.

In order to maximize the full potential, the open4sale team now needs to grow and receive further financial help to bring it to commercial market quickly as possible. .

Founder and CEO Simon La Barrie demonstrating a live sale from Singapore to retailers in California USA.

 

 

Plan and path to market launch.

 Crowd funding Project Campaign and Pre Launch meet and greet events will be scheduled and held in the USA, Singapore, Hong Kong, Dubai, London and of course Australia. 

 Events will include:

 - live entertainment

 - food and beverages

 - prizes and giveaways

 - special guests

 - socializing and networking 

 - opportunity to meet our visionary founder and the great team.

- opportunity to meet our excited fashion designers/retailers on board around the world, see there amazing products for you to start entering there stores soon to be your personnel shopper.

- Opportunity to see the technology, and our stores around the world, and provide feedback for further improvements.


 Benefits for joining our team?

 For your involvement you will receive:

- a special VIP release of our Open4Sale application sent to you for your involvement and to be our 1st users as a thank you. 

 - VIP Enrollment in our Open4Sale Premier Rewards Program

- great networking opportunities

- updates of new upgrades and plans for improved features

- open4sale team attire to wear and show all, your are on our team to make this happen, and have your own personnel shoppers. 

- Up to 3 months Free Shipping from our stores available  when up and running for your extra financial support as a reward and huge thank you from us.

- invited to further launch events

 Help us change the future of online shopping for all worldwide.


 What do you have to do?

 Support our efforts financially and passionately let everyone know your on our team  to help revolutionize online shopping

 Attend our launch event and bring your partner or a friend. 

Talk to the developers and owners, tell them of your retail experiences and what you would like to see changed.

Mingle, share, socialize and enjoy. 

Help us help your favorite local fashion designers and the retail community to support there business. Give them the competitive edge and engage with customers on a personal level.

 

Our Movements

As One of our first pre launch campaigns, Open4sale partnered up with a renowned Australian fashion label to give a live demonstration of our platform showcasing designs live from Perth Australia to New York USA Sept 2012.

 

November 2013

Orange County CA

Los Angeles CA

San Francisco CA

New York  NY

December 2013

Singapore-Hong Kong-Australia

March 2014

Dubai/London

All Locations and dates will be confirmed in October 2013 after the campaign is completed.

 

WHO ARE WE.

Open4sale.com

We are a  group of frustrated online shoppers who wanted more. 

Entrepreneurs, ex retailers, and techies who think we should be able to walk into a store anywhere in the world, talk to a real person and feel secured about our online shopping experience, the good old fashioned way within new technology.

So to meet these goals, we’ve explored the existing e-commerce paradigm and exploiting opportunities for improvement and innovation.  Open4Sale will add significant value and a point of difference over existing systems, to achieve the goal of launching a next-generation e Shopping product.

 

Some of our great team members on the road again

  

The fantastic team who support our visionary founder.. 

Rajeev Dujari, CTO Seattle USA

 Rajeev is an entrepreneurial executive with over 20 years of software experience,    was a executive at Amazon, providing innovation at the heart of their e-commerce platform.   

Amanda Laundry – CEO/Marketing Assistant  Newport USA

Amanda has been a spokesperson over the last year with Open4sale. As well as Open4sale, Amanda's accomplishments include several national commercials and most recently she co-hosted the popular television show "The Joe Schmo Show"

Dmitry Semenov, Team Project Manager 

Dmitry Semenov has 14 years of experience building and managing technology projects. He is skilled in the architecture of high demand, high traffic systems and has worked extensively with complex databases and integrating diverse software environments.

Dan Kenton, Product Management  

Dan has 25 years in Information Technology, across a wide variety of industries, projects and roles. Dan has consulted with such companies as:  IBM, AT&T, Merrill Lynch, Blue Cross / Blue Shield, Associated Press and World Bank. 

Hien Tran, Project Management

Hien is a project manager with responsibility for maintaining many project budgets and deadlines. He began his career as a staff accountant for Victoria’s Secret Catalogue in 1996. After receiving his degree in Information Technology, he became a developer and was quickly promoted to senior consultant responsible for managing a team of 20-40 people, for Fortune 500 companies.  Hien has managed projects ranging from $3 million to $400 million. 

 

The Team at the USA Surf Pro meeting with people for more feedback to improve the experience even more.

 

 

Frequently Asked questions

How can I use the apps?

In order of release by

- IOS  Ipad/iphones

- Android tablets/phones

- Web browser windows and mac.

 When can I start using the apps?

This will be confirmed during our launch events from November this year, but we are hoping to personally send the app in early 2014. 

 Which stores can I enter through you mall to shop in first?

At first the platform will be available within multiple unique boutique stores around the world, then we predict to have the app in  high end stores by mid 2014.If you are a retailer please come to our launch events to  see how we can help you have the app  up and running quickly for our VIP users to start shopping in, and be involved in our ongoing marketing events.

 Is there more features to come?

Yes we have additional features planned which will automatically be upgraded to your existing app.

 When will it be available to everyone worldwide within app stores?

An  announcement will be made in mid 2014 during our official launch.

When will your main website be available if I have more questions later?

We plan to go live with our interactive  website once we go to market.

Our Facebook page is 24/7 and we welcome feedback.

 

 

                                             LETS GET THE WORD OUT!

 

                                 

Even if you are unable to  contribute financially , we would love  your help in raising awareness of our product. Please share our crowd funding campaign on social media or emailing the page link to anyone you feel could benefit from the convenience, control and cutting-edge technology that Open4sale technology will provide. 

Website: www.open4sale.com

 

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Open4Sale


Twitter: https://twitter.com/Open4SaleTV

 

Share our dream to let everyone experience the future of shopping online with their own personnel shopper live in real time, with stores locally and worldwide available and growing.

 

 The Business side of Things-

 Use of Funds

 Every dollar we raise will be directed towards improving our technology to become commercially ready, by helping us to schedule and book our Launch Events, provide our customers with more  benefits and rewards, and further progress towards bringing this 21st century technology to the online world.

   The Core technology Vision

As the Achilles heel of online shopping has always been the "one-way" (lack of) interaction between the buyer and product. Open4Sale has spent 3 years developing a proprietary, "two-way," person-to-person platform where buyers and sellers are brought together in real-time.

The overall objective design and development of the Open4Sale platform is to create a innovative technology to allow consumers to have a face to face interaction with the bricks and mortar store front, and create a virtual shopping center that goes over and above the standard norm of current online shopping.

 

So are you ready to shop with your own personal shoppers- worldwide..

- open4sale team attire to wear and show all, your are on our team to make this happen, and have your own personnel shoppers. 
- Up to 3 months Free Shipping from our stores available  when up and running for your extra financial support as a reward and huge thank you from us.
- invited to further launch events
 Help us change the future of online shopping for all worldwide.

 What do you have to do?
 Support our efforts financially and passionately let everyone know your on our team  to help revolutionize online shopping
 Attend our launch event and bring your partner or a friend.  
Talk to the developers and owners, tell them of your retail experiences and what you would like to see changed.
Mingle, share, socialize and enjoy.  
Help us help your favorite local fashion designers and the retail community to support there business. Give them the competitive edge and engage with customers on a personal level.
 
Our Movements 
As One of our first pre launch campaigns, Open4sale partnered up with a renowned Australian fashion label to give a live demonstration of our platform showcasing designs live from Perth Australia to New York USA Sept 2012.

 
November 2013
Orange County CA
Los Angeles CA
San Francisco CA
New York  NY
December 2013
Singapore-Hong Kong-Australia
March 2014
Dubai/London
All Locations and dates will be confirmed in October 2013 after the campaign is completed.
 

WHO ARE WE.
Open4sale.com
We are a  group of frustrated online shoppers who wanted more. 
Entrepreneurs, ex retailers, and techies who think we should be able to walk into a store anywhere in the world, talk to a real person and feel secured about our online shopping experience, the good old fashioned way within new technology.
So to meet these goals, we’ve explored the existing e-commerce paradigm and exploiting opportunities for improvement and innovation.  Open4Sale will add significant value and a point of difference over existing systems, to achieve the goal of launching a next-generation e Shopping product.
 
Some of our great team members on the road again

  
The fantastic team who support our visionary founder.. 
Rajeev Dujari, CTO Seattle USA
 Rajeev is an entrepreneurial executive with over 20 years of software experience,    was a executive at Amazon, providing innovation at the heart of their e-commerce platform.   
Amanda Laundry – CEO/Marketing Assistant  Newport USA
Amanda has been a spokesperson over the last year with Open4sale. As well as Open4sale, Amanda's accomplishments include several national commercials and most recently she co-hosted the popular television show "The Joe Schmo Show"
Dmitry Semenov, Team Project Manager 
Dmitry Semenov has 14 years of experience building and managing technology projects. He is skilled in the architecture of high demand, high traffic systems and has worked extensively with complex databases and integrating diverse software environments. 
Dan Kenton, Product Management  
Dan has 25 years in Information Technology, across a wide variety of industries, projects and roles. Dan has consulted with such companies as:  IBM, AT&T, Merrill Lynch, Blue Cross / Blue Shield, Associated Press and World Bank. 
Hien Tran, Project Management 
Hien is a project manager with responsibility for maintaining many project budgets and deadlines. He began his career as a staff accountant for Victoria’s Secret Catalogue in 1996. After receiving his degree in Information Technology, he became a developer and was quickly promoted to senior consultant responsible for managing a team of 20-40 people, for Fortune 500 companies.  Hien has managed projects ranging from $3 million to $400 million.  
 
The Team at the USA Surf Pro meeting with people for more feedback to improve the experience even more.
 

 
Frequently Asked questions
How can I use the apps?
In order of release by
- IOS  Ipad/iphones 
- Android tablets/phones
- Web browser windows and mac.
 When can I start using the apps?
This will be confirmed during our launch events from November this year, but we are hoping to personally send the app in early 2014. 
 Which stores can I enter through you mall to shop in first?
At first the platform will be available within multiple unique boutique stores around the world, then we predict to have the app in  high end stores by mid 2014.If you are a retailer please come to our launch events to  see how we can help you have the app  up and running quickly for our VIP users to start shopping in, and be involved in our ongoing marketing events.
 Is there more features to come?
Yes we have additional features planned which will automatically be upgraded to your existing app.
 When will it be available to everyone worldwide within app stores?
An  announcement will be made in mid 2014 during our official launch.
When will your main website be available if I have more questions later?
We plan to go live with our interactive  website once we go to market.
Our Facebook page is 24/7 and we welcome feedback.
 
 
                                             LETS GET THE WORD OUT!
 

                                  
Even if you are unable to  contribute financially , we would love  your help in raising awareness of our product. Please share our crowd funding campaign on social media or emailing the page link to anyone you feel could benefit from the convenience, control and cutting-edge technology that Open4sale technology will provide. 
Website: www.open4sale.com
 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Open4Sale
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Open4SaleTV
 
Share our dream to let everyone experience the future of shopping online with their own personnel shopper live in real time, with stores locally and worldwide available and growing.
 

 The Business side of Things-
 Use of Funds 
 Every dollar we raise will be directed towards improving our technology to become commercially ready, by helping us to schedule and book our Launch Events, provide our customers with more  benefits and rewards, and further progress towards bringing this 21st century technology to the online world.
   The Core technology Vision
As the Achilles heel of online shopping has always been the "one-way" (lack of) interaction between the buyer and product. Open4Sale has spent 3 years developing a proprietary, "two-way," person-to-person platform where buyers and sellers are brought together in real-time. 
The overall objective design and development of the Open4Sale platform is to create a innovative technology to allow consumers to have a face to face interaction with the bricks and mortar store front, and create a virtual shopping center that goes over and above the standard norm of current online shopping.
 
So are you ready to shop with your own personal shoppers- worldwide..

story:
Maragon Private Schools are competing in the Sasol Solar Car Challenge in South Africa 2014. 

Our school's solar car will start the race on 27 September and finish 8 days and 2000km later in Cape Town. 

The students are in charge of the project and drives the process from 6 committees with mentors and specialists. The committees are Funding, Marketing and PR, Logistics, Education alignment, Building and Race and execution. 

We are the Solar Eagles, and we prove that we can do anything - today, and in the future. We are being prepared for jobs that don't exist yet. We need you to help us in our education process. Funding will make our participation in this race a reality.

Please be part of this exciting journey and buy a solar cell spot on our car. In return, we will mention your name and brand.

story:
FAQ:

Yes, shipping is free worldwide!

Yes, you can get more than one Beat Ball™!  Once you fund your first Beat Ball™, you can contribute again and select a second perk.

 

GET A FREE BEAT BALL™ PORTABLE MINI SPEAKER FOR REFERRING FRIENDS!

You heard it right, we're going to give a free Beat Ball™ Speaker (of your choice of color) to everyone who refers three friends to grab the fabulous portable mini speaker.  Here is how:

Step 1) Make sure you are logged into your indiegogo account
Step 2) Visit the Beat Ball™ page
Step 3) Locate the link below the video and post, tweet and share it with your friends

Note: the link will look something like this http://igg.me/at/beatballspeaker/x/####### where the number signs are your unique ID code.  When you share this link with friends, anybody who clicks on it and then gets themselves a Beat Ball™ will be associated with your account.

At the end of the campaign, we'll tally up everybody who has referred 3 friends to get the Beat Ball™ and  send them a Beat Ball™ of the color of their choice!

Want to see where you stand?  In the upper-right hand corner, click on "my profile" then click on the tab "my impact" to see your referrals.  Share away!

Any questions?  Post a comment and we'll get right back to you.  Thanks!

 

The Beat Ball™ Story

Inspired by the idea of party everywhere, our team has designed this fun, trendy and colorful portable mini speaker to resemble a disco ball.  We have been working with a manufacturer and all prototypes have been approved and ready to be mass produced!

 Features

The Beat Ball™ is a mini portable rechargeable speaker that offers up to six hours of playback on a full charge of its Li-ion battery.  It has an LED light to let you know when to recharge.  It connects to your smartphone, iphone, tablet, iPad, laptop etc. with a built-in 3 1/2" audio cable.

  • Built-in rechargeable li-ion battery (lasts up to 6 hours) via Micro USB
  • Super lightweight at only 1oz (30g)
  • Great sound quality
  • Compatible with all audio devices with a 3.5mm audio plug.  Adaptors can be bought at any electronics/hardware stores for other sizes plugs (such a an electric guitar)
  • LED indicator to let you know when to recharge
  • 3W RMS or 98db
  • On/Off switch to save battery life when not in use
  • Makes great gift or stocking stuffer

The Rewards

Beat Ball™ are available in these colors:

  • Red
  • Hot Pink
  • Black
  • Lime
  • White

Thank you, Indiegogo!

Remember, you can get a free Beat Ball™ when you refer three friends!  It makes a great gift for everyone!

All perks will be shipped late September / early October - Just in time for Christmas!!

story:
¿How much does your anonymity?

     ¿ How much does your privacy? 


The birth

My name is Andrés Salcedo and I am the developer of the project. The idea for this project was born after reading that a computer security researcher had been able to brake the code of Telegram's App messages. Then this idea turned into a project after watching Alex Winter's documentary called Deep Web.

This project is a change proposal for messaging Apps which do not protect our anonymity and the privacy of our messages. Currently anonymity on the internet has become taboo. However, it is

everyone's right, and our App has the aim of providing the highest levels of anonymity in a simple way for all our messages, and for this reason it is the first messaging App for Smartphones that communicates via TOR.

El nacimiento

Mi nombre es Andrés Salcedo y soy el promotor del proyecto. La idea de este proyecto nació después de la leer que un investigador de seguridad informática, había sido capaz de romper el cifrado de los mensajes de la App de mensajería Telegram y se convirtió en un proyecto después de ver el documental de Alex Winter llamado Web profunda.

El proyecto es una propuesta de cambio para las App de mensajería que no protegen nuestro anonimato y la privacidad de nuestros mensajes. Actualmente el anonimato en internet se ha convertido en un tabú, sin embargo es un derecho de todos nosotros y nuestra App tiene como finalidad, brindar de una forma fácil y sencilla los más altos niveles de anonimato y seguridad de todos nuestros mensajes, por esta razón es la primera App de mensajería para Smartphone que se comunica por TOR.


The project


The project involves developing a smartphone messaging app that transmits messages through the TOR  (The onion ruoter), protected by a password of up to 4096 bit keys asymmetric encryption.There is no need to register your personal data or phone number to use the App and all users will have a (single and intransferable) ID to identify themselves with other users as well as a user number with a 512-bit keys, for those who want to transfer their ID to another terminal (Smartphone). Besides, users can also protect their App, by a key of up to 256 bit. These characteristics translate into the more secure and anonymous messaging system that has been seen so far.


El proyecto


El proyecto consiste en el desarrollo de una App de mensajería para Smartphone que transmite mensajes a través de la red TOR (The onion ruoter), protegido por una clave de hasta 4096 bit y encriptación asimétrica. No es necesario registrar nuestros datos personales o número de teléfono para utilizar la App y todos los usuarios tendrán una ID (único e intransferible) para identificarse con otros usuarios y un numero de usuario con una clave de 512 bit,  para cuando los usuarios quieran transferir su ID a otro terminal (Smartphone), además los usuarios podrán proteger su App, por medio de una clave de hasta 256 bit. Estas características se traducen en el sistema de mensajería más seguro y anónimo que se ha visto hasta ahora.


¿What is TOR?



The Onion Router, abbreviated in English as 'TOR', is a project whose main objective is the development of a distributed low-latency communications network and superimposed on internet, where the routing of messages exchanged between users does not reveal their identity, i.e. your IP address (anonymity at a network level) and which also preserves the integrity and confidentiality of information travelling through it. For this reason it is called Darknet or Deep Web. The main objective of TOR is to get the internet to be used in a way so that the routing of the message protects the identity of users, that is, so that it cannot track the information sent by a user to reach it.



¿ Qué es TOR ?


The Onion Router, abreviado en inglés como 'TOR', es un proyecto cuyo objetivo principal es el desarrollo de una red de comunicaciones distribuida de baja latencia y superpuesta sobre internet, en la que el encaminamiento de los mensajes intercambiados entre los usuarios no revela su identidad, es decir, su dirección IP (anonimato a nivel de red) y que, además, mantiene la integridad y el secreto de la información que viaja por ella, por este motivo se le conoce como Darknet o Deep web. El objetivo principal de TOR es conseguir que internet pueda usarse de forma que el encaminamiento de los mensajes proteja la identidad de los usuarios, es decir persigue que no se pueda rastrear la información que envía un usuario para llegar hasta él.


¿Which is asymmetric key cryptography?



Asymmetric cryptography is the cryptographic method that uses a pair of keys for messaging. The two keys belong to the same person who sent the message. One key is public and can be delivered to anyone, the other key is private and the owner should keep it so that nobody has access to it.

In addition, the cryptographic methods ensure that set of keys can only be generated once, so you can assume it is not possible for two people coincidentally to have obtained the same key pair. If the sender uses the recipient's public key to encrypt the message, once encrypted, only the recipient's private key can decrypt this message, because he is the only one who knows it.

Therefore the message is completely confidential, no one but the recipient can decrypt it.


¿Qué es la criptografía asimétrica?


La criptografía asimétrica es el método criptográfico que usa un par de claves para el envío de mensajes. Las dos claves pertenecen a la misma persona que ha enviado el mensaje. Una clave es pública y se puede entregar a cualquier persona, la otra clave es privada y el propietario debe guardarla de modo que nadie tenga acceso a ella.

Además, los métodos criptográficos garantizan que esa pareja de claves sólo se puede generar una vez, de modo que se puede asumir que no es posible que dos personas hayan obtenido casualmente la misma pareja de claves. Si el remitente usa la clave pública del destinatario para cifrar el mensaje, una vez cifrado, sólo la clave privada del destinatario podrá descifrar este mensaje, ya que es el único que la conoce.

Por tanto se logra la confidencialidad del envío del mensaje, nadie salvo el destinatario puede descifrarlo.



You can help!


With your financial support we will be able to develop an App that will open a new path for messaging Apps and generate a radical change in the information world, because anyone will have access to the largest and most private network in the world. I believe that freedom of expression is a right and we need more and better ways to safeguard this human birthright.


¡ Tú puedes ayudar !


Con vuestro apoyo financiero conseguiremos desarrollar una App que marcara un nuevo camino en las App de mensajería y generara un cambio radical en el mundo de la información, porque cualquier persona tendrá acceso a la red de comunicación más anónima y privada del mundo. Creo que la libertad de expresión es un derecho y se necesitan más y mejores sistemas para salvaguardar un derecho innato al ser humano.


¿You cannot contribute? You can still help!


We know that not everyone can contribute, but you can help spread our idea. Regardless of whether you can financially back this project, we ask you to please share this campaign on your social networks. You can find us on Facebook and Twitter. The more people who find out about this idea, the more chances we have to reach our goal.

¡ Thank you !


¿ No puedes aportar ? Todavia puedes ayudar


Sabemos que no todo el mundo puede contribuir, pero puedes ayudar a que nuestra idea se propague. Independientemente de si puedes financiar esta  campaña, te pedimos que por favor compartas la campaña a través de todas tus redes sociales.

Puedes encontrarnos en Facebook y Twitter. Cuantas más personas conozcan  la campaña, más posibilidades tenemos para alcanzar nuestra meta,


¡ Gracias !

story:
InfiniteUSB is an open chain of USB ports, granting an unlimited supply of open slots!Whenever a new InfiniteUSB is plugged in, a new USB port will be created. Instead of forcing you to constantly hot swap devices into that one port, InfiniteUSB keeps all your cables connected, with only one port from your laptop.

 No longer worried about limited USB ports!

Plug my iPad, plug my iPhone, any more? still one port!

InfiniteUSB is compatible with iOS, Android and any other devices with USB ports.

Engadget: "In a classic case of "why didn't we think of this first," Chinese design student Gonglue Jiang has shown us a new way for overcoming the limitations imposed by the scarcity of USB ports on some computers."

ZDNet: "Despite the hindrances, I'm still all for this design and hope it becomes a reality, as even two or three USB cables combined together would save me some trouble once in a while."

Gizmag: "For anyone who has ever lamented those clunky USB hubs, there might be a far more elegant solution around the corner."

CNET: "It's only in its conceptual stages, but this colourful Infinite USB plug design from China gets our geeky tech juices flowing"

YankoDesign: "The design speaks for itself, so no point elaborating"

No more wild wires or tangled cables.

 Plug all your devices! 

Great products are born to make life easier. For a long time, our mission is to create such products.  

Here are the 3 steps to accomplishing this mission.

Step 1: “When you fell in love with something, you can’t get it off your mind.”

One day, on a bus to the airport, I as usual, ponder over new ideas to improve people’s life. The work scenes earlier that day kept flashing back. There were moments that I was pretty frustrated by my computer. I wanted to charge my cell and iPad at the same time, preparing for the trip. But I was not able to do so due to the limited number of the USB ports. Only one port was available…Damn! “Why not make the most out of this one port?” An idea suddenly crossed over my mind. If I could offer another port while using this only one port, then technically I could have infinite USB ports for my tasks. Bingo! I was so excited about the idea and couldn’t wait to sketch it out. Therefore the first drawing of InfiniteUSB was born during the flight. After landing, I rushed home and transformed the initial drawing into a rendering on computer.

Things become pretty amazing after InfiniteUSB won an iF Award. Thousands of people emailed me to express their affection for this product. They told me how they love this idea and how much they want the product. I was deeply touched and greatly encouraged. Since that moment, I decide to bring this product into people’s life. I am determined to make it happen!

Step 2: "Best product is 50% of design and 50% of crafting"

I spent tons of time to find the best USB cable manufacturer in the world to make it happen. Finally I found Vojotech. When I got their product in hand, I was amazed. Their USB cables are stylish, sophisticated and slick, which recall the feeling of Apple's products. We quickly hit it off and decide to produce InfiniteUSB together. They have the best manufacturing team, which perfectly cater to my relentless pursuit of quality. With their accomplished production team, we are confident that a wonderful product will be created.

Step 3: Your support will make it happen.

Now we are proud to announce that this mission has been just about to be accomplished. Your support will make the "launch button" get pushed! And You will be the real contributors to help us embrace the ultimate “mission accomplished”moment!

Thank you for helping us in this long journey. If we can bring you convenience and happiness along the way, that will make us even happier.

Risks and challenges

We've already spent tons of time to solve technical problems. The size is guaranteed to be like that slim in picture. We need some time on tooling and manufacturing. But we are confident in our abilities to deliver this project on time and with our great quality. 

We are committed to making the best USB cable for everyone and your support make this dream a reality.
story_txt:
InfiniteUSB is an open chain of USB ports, granting an unlimited supply of open slots!Whenever a new InfiniteUSB is plugged in, a new USB port will be created. Instead of forcing you to constantly hot swap devices into that one port, InfiniteUSB keeps all your cables connected, with only one port from your laptop.


 No longer worried about limited USB ports!


Plug my iPad, plug my iPhone, any more? still one port!


InfiniteUSB is compatible with iOS, Android and any other devices with USB ports.




Engadget: "In a classic case of "why didn't we think of this first," Chinese design student Gonglue Jiang has shown us a new way for overcoming the limitations imposed by the scarcity of USB ports on some computers."
ZDNet: "Despite the hindrances, I'm still all for this design and hope it becomes a reality, as even two or three USB cables combined together would save me some trouble once in a while."
Gizmag: "For anyone who has ever lamented those clunky USB hubs, there might be a far more elegant solution around the corner."
CNET: "It's only in its conceptual stages, but this colourful Infinite USB plug design from China gets our geeky tech juices flowing"
YankoDesign: "The design speaks for itself, so no point elaborating"





No more wild wires or tangled cables.




Built-in magnet makes it easy to store, like magic.


Put it into your pocket and take it wherever you go.


 Plug all your devices!

story:
____________________________

We are happy to inform you that due to the overwhelming response and post campaign enquiries/request for pre-booking, we have now opened the PRE-ORDER window for your gecko on our web page 

PRE ORDER YOUR GECKO

Missed your shipping contribution ? 

USE the LINK BELOW 

 MY SHIPPING 

 _________________________


Thank your for the continued overwhelming response and interest in Gecko. We will SOON start pre-booking on our website www.geckotag.me. Please watch our website and our Facebook page for more information very soon.


With Gecko you can trigger, secure, remind, capture, track and locate.

Perform your favorite and most common actions with a simple Gecko gesture, without taking your phone out of your pocket.




Turn up the tunes! Gecko controls music on your phone.

Gecko changes tracks and controls volume with a flick of your wrist.

Stick a Gecko Tag on your door, purse, luggage or other valuables.

A Gecko stuck on your door will alert you every time the door opens. If you need to secure a window or a basement door that is not safe for kids, you can count on your Gecko to send you an alert on your phone every time the door is opened. Catch the intruder at the right moment.

Go ahead and take a nap while you are waiting for your flight. Gecko will take care of your bags and alerts you if someone moves them. Feel safer with a Gecko.

We leave it to your imagination to use Gecko’s motion detection alert feature.

Put your Gecko on a pill box and monitor your loved ones medication schedule. Gecko alerts you when the pillbox hasn’t been used at the scheduled time. Alerts can be sent to loved ones who may be in other part of the world, so you can ensure that you – or your kids or parents - never miss another dosage again.

Gecko offers extend-ability to open a whole new set of applications. 

Gecko comes with an extension port to connect with other devices and trigger an actions.

Say CHEESE! Get in the frame, wave your arm and let Gecko trigger the camera.

How many times have you wished for an extra person to take a picture so you don't get left out of the frame? 

Well, now the Gecko is your extra arm. All you need to do is place your phone or DSLR in position and get in the frame. Wave your arm and Gecko does the rest for you.
You can also program Gecko to take pictures either once or multiple times at fixed intervals. The time interval and number of snaps can be programmed from the Gecko App on your smart phone.

Tag anything you need to Track and Find.

Put Gecko on your key chain and you can keep track or find your keys easily.


Be it your wallet, laptop or pet. You can find your phone too with Gecko, even if your phone is laying somewhere in the couch on Silent Mode.

Never again fret 'Now where did I put those keys?'

You have better things to do. Gecko will remember where you left your keys, phone, wallet, bag - just about anything! So go ahead, tag it with a Gecko and you can locate anything within a 100 feet radius.

Tag your pets with Gecko and get alerted when they try to sneak out of your home.

Or... Let's say you are at a mall and took your eyes off your child for just a moment to look at a price tag...now he's not there! Ditch that agony. Tag them with a Gecko and get alerted when your kids wander.
Track: Track anything tagged with Gecko within 100 feet radius from the phone. Or track Phone from Gecko within 100 feet range.
The moment any one moves out of the 100 feet range, get an audible alert on both.

It gets better!!! Lost something out of a 100 foot radius? 

Just declare your item as lost. The Gecko community will find it for you. You may invite your friends to download the Gecko App even if they don't own a Gecko, then help you to find your lost items tagged to Gecko. 

Your friends can download the app and help you find your stuff’s Geo location. 

Widen your Gecko World by simply connecting to your Facebook account and let Gecko send request to all your friends or other actual Gecko users


Why Gecko?

The combination of Gecko cloud community, Motion detection, gesture recognition and support on iOS and Android 4.3 devices makes it more desirable and value for money device.

Specifications:

Hardware:

  • Gecko is a Bluetooth Low Energy (Bluetooth Smart) device. 
  • TI CC2541 SOC 
  • LED indication                        
  • Buzzer for audible alerts
  • Accelerometer Sensor for motion detection 
  • Removable battery 
  • Coin cell  - CR2032, 3V, Average Battery life to be 1 year (however, Battery life depends on the actual usage scenario and other sensors or triggers used with the Gecko too)

Smart Phone Application & Gecko cloud

Gecko smart phone application will be available from Apple App store for iOS devices that support BT 4.0 (iPhone 4S, iPhone 5, iPad 3rd generation, iPad Mini), and it will be available on Google play store for all android devices that support Android 4.3 OEM with Bluetooth 4.0 support. Currently it has been tested on Samsung Galaxy S4 and Nexus 7 tablets. 

Industrial Design

The industrial design of this amazing device is done with lot of care keeping you in mind. We have taken care to ensure it fits into your area of application rather snuggly. While the single piece uni- body feel ensures a sleek and adorable look, the tough build quality and detailing ensures durability with the optimal weight.

With the size slightly bigger than a quarter coin. The “Gecko” fits in any way you would want to use it in, may it be a simple tag to the key chain or to be hidden in your purse.

The industrial design is done by our design partners Wizardry Designs Pvt. Ltd.

The Gecko Story:

We started off building Gecko almost an year ago. We wanted to build a versatile and extendible Bluetooth Smart device that offers long battery life, with replaceable battery and motion sensor.

We wanted Gecko to be an easy to use and fit into everyone's lifestyle.

We have completed Hardware and Firmware design. We went through two rounds of testing and pilot production with the initial version of the product in a different form factor deployed in a couple of use cases. 

Initial version of gecko: We have built the complete ecosystem of Chipset vendors and manufacturing partner to mass produce Gecko.

The basic Gecko application is working on iOS devices and Samsung Galaxy S4. We are currently testing the Gecko App for Android 4.3. We are now working on integrating additional features and connected Gecko cloud.

Rewards

Your Support

We need US$ 50,000 to start mass production of this amazing device. Your support is important to us for going through the next steps of tooling and commercial production. 

With your support we will also be completing the connected Gecko cloud features and all other amazing features that we are talking about.

Production schedule.

Final development schedule.

For Geeks

Gecko creates endless possibilities with its extendibility! We invite the Geeks to  push the envelope on what can be accomplished with secure identity (based on BLE ID), proximity and motion. We will open up API for potential developers who can come up with extensions of gecko to other applications. 

For those who are hardware geeks, Gecko comes with hardware port that allows the developers to extend gecko with additional hardware features such as adding sensors, or triggering other devices or enabling your existing devices to make them Bluetooth Smart devices.

If you have brilliant Ideas to extend Gecko and want to be part of Gecko World! come, join us.

Let's Build the Gecko World

Please share this with your family and friends. We have a cool referral contest running as well through the campaign period.

FAQ

What is the difference between early bird offer of US$ 20/- and other single Gecko offer of US$ 25/-?

As a product there is no difference. However, the first 1000 backers of single Gecko get it at an attractive price for booking early.

What phones and devices do Geckos work with?

Geckos work with iPhone 4S, iPhone 5, iPad Mini, iPad 3rd and 4th gen, iPod Touch 5th gen and all iOS devices that support BT 4.0, android devices that support Bluetooth 4.0 and run Android 4.3 and Samsung devices that support Android 4.2 with BT 4.0 support. 


Do I need to add the shipping charge of US$ 8 when I order shipping outside USA?

Yes, you need to add US$8 while ordering product for shipping outside USA for all perks.


How Can I setup my Pillbox?

Simple, just select the number of times patient is required to take the pill. Set the time. Setup the alert destination email or phone number.


What make/models of Camera Gecko support?

Gecko supports all smart phone's (the ones listed above as support by Gecko App) camera. 

Gecko supports Canon DSLR camera models that support 2.5 mm jack based  remote control port, for example: Rebel, EOS 500D, EOS 600D, etc.

Gecko supports all Nikon DSLR Camera models that have the remote control port shown in the picture above.


Can I control continuous trigger or scheduled triggering of the camera?

Yes, with Gecko App, you can setup the rate at which you want to automatically trigger the camera and even you can set the time at which you want it to be triggered. More advanced features are planned in the later releases.


What is the Warranty I get with a Gecko?

Gecko comes with one year warranty against manufacturing defects. Warranty does not include battery.

What is the email ID i can contact you?

contact@geckotag.me

REFERRAL

While we have built this amazing device, we request your support to build the Gecko World. Spread this word. We have referral rewards:

For every 10 (Ten) referral converting to backers, we will ship one Gecko absolutely free. So what's stopping you?

Share this with your friends and family, help us to build the Gecko World.

CLICK HERE FOR GECKO RESELLER ENQUIRY

story:
Have you ever

 found yourself charging your cell phone up at least three times a day? Minutes later, your battery life starts to decrease as soon as you check your email or after looking something up something online, or you just taking a call for a few minutes, or just can't find the cord to charge it. Well the easiest solution would be to buy a cell phone charger for work, the car, one for the home and a extra one just in case something happens to those or it gets misplaced. Really?


Never again.

The Juvenator is the only, simple solution that will eliminate the stress of so many chargers and watching your cell phone die in front of you.


The Juvenator is the first step towards conserving energy for our future. It is a intelligent, sleek and tiny device which is equip with infrared technology with the latest Bluetooth Low Energy. (Extremely high performing Bluetooth wireless technology) The WT41 is a fully integrated Bluetooth 2.1 + EDR, class 1 module combining antenna, Bluetooth radio, and an on-board iWRAP Bluetooth stack. The WT41 provides a superior 110dB link budget and more than 1000-meter line-of-sight connectivity for Bluetooth applications where extreme radio performance. So the Juvenator is accompanied with the app (iOS, Android) which enhances the Juvenator.


Picture being out in public at a restaurant waiting for your dinner parties, and your cell phone begins to alert you of your battery percentage is low. As you enter the doors of the restaurant, your cell phone begins to charge because the restaurant has the Juvenator available. Never worry about plugging into any electrical outlet ever again.


You’ll never have to worry again if you haven't charged your cell phone up, as long as the Juvenator is present. - the Juvenator will take care of that. 


Using the latest smart technology, the Juvenator can pair up with multiple mobile devices. The Juvenator will allow you to link up with the application provided where a Juvenator is located. The Juvenator's mesh networking capabilities help to overcome any distances barrier and brings any electrical outlet closer to you in a smart an energy efficient way. 


About (100-300feet). This also depends on your smartphone’s Bluetooth radio as well as the environment you are in.



How does it work

Place the Juvenator in any room of your choice. 

With the double sided mounting tape provided it can be easily placed on any stable structure. 

Download the app to your phone, tablet, laptop... Then get ready for usage.


The App


Compatible with iPhone 4,5 & later, iPad 3rd Generation & later, and Android 4.3 & later devices with Bluetooth 4.0.


We need your help 

to develop the Juvenator and start mass production and development. Then Juvenator will come to reality. You'll be the first to receive the Juvenator at a price significantly less than future retail price. 


Our biggest challenge

is getting started with mass production and development. We need to order at least a 300 of the main components to make it feasible. All that is missing is your help.


Contribute and share our project with your peers!
