story:
The Wacky Video

The above video is from our demo day at SXSW. Five days after our demo, our product changed slightly. The point of this video is to give you a feel about who we are and glimpse at what we're building.

Our Story

Heman and Kyle met on the campus of the University of Central Florida in 2009. In 2012 they began building Doccaster, an analytics dashboard for event organizers. After testing Doccaster in a few events, the pair saw they were onto something special. In November, Doccaster was selected as 1 of 8 companies to participate in the #3 technology accelerator program in the nation, Dreamit Ventures. Two weeks later, they quit their jobs, packed their belongs into 4 small bags and headed to Austin Texas. While in Austin, the two lived in a rented room, worked late every night and turned living extremely cheap into a science while they continued building their business over the next three months.

What is Doccaster

Event organizers and planners need data to enhance and showcase their event's value to exhibitors, sponsors and attendees. Doccaster gives them data on activities, such as attendee engagement and exhibitor lead generation, by grabbing it from our web-based app called EventLocker.me. EventLocker offers event attendee's and exhibitor's:

  • Attendee Check-in and Networking List

  • Event Scheduling

  • Unlimited Do-it-Yourself File-Sharing

  • Qualified Lead Generation

  • Private Communication

  • Access From Any Mobile Device without Downloading

Throughout the life of an event, we pull attendee and exhibitor activities right into the organizers dashboard, so they can spot trends and opportunities to enhance and showcase their event.

The Bridge

Now that the program is over, our goal is to complete our fundraising and continue building key features which'll allow us to secure relationships, win deals and generate revenue. These activities require time, so we're looking build a bridge. This bridge will allow us to do the following:

  • Basic Living Stipend - We're going to pay ourselves a very small stipend over the next 3 months.

All remaining funds will go into the following areas:

  • Design Work (Front End Development) - Our target customers, event organizers, are predominantly women. Women are heavily designed focused and at the moment, our system looks like it was designed by two guys with zero style.

  • Backend Help – Time is not a friend of the tech startup, so we need to purchase some additional development hours to assist us in pumping out a few key features. 

Perks

Event analytics is not sexy. We're not a cool music app, a robot making machine or a t-shirt with holograms on it. Doccaster is plain and simple big data that allows organizers to see what's going on at their event so they can get attract more attendees, exhibitors and sponsors. Here are our perks:

  • Fern Creek Coding Project - We're a company of givers. We founded the Fern Creek Project in 2012 to teach disadvantage elementary school children how to code. We believe coding is the technology version of basketball - it's cheap to setup, easy to teach, and provides a pathway to great opportunity. We're donating 35% of every dollar we raise to the Fern Creek Elementary School Foundation in Orlando Florida, so they can buy computers for the classrooms.

  • Handwritten Thank You Note - $25 Donation

  • I Heart Fern Creek Hackers T-Shirt - $50 Donation

  • Premium Doccaster Cotton T-Shirt - $100 Donation

  • Limited Edition Pink Doccaster Ladies T-Shirt - $250

  • Be Bold Personalized Video - $1000 Donation. Heman, Kyle and the children of the Fern Creek project will send you a personalized video thanking you for your donation.

  

 

 

 

 

Walking With Us

Entrepreneurship isn't easy, but we're pouring every thing we have into our business because that's the effort required when you want to do something great. To us, greatness is not about money. Greatness is about building a product people love, providing jobs and opportunities, serving next to other caring and hardworking people, and impacting communities. Doccaster is an active and working product, Dreamit Ventures endorses us, we're working full-time on our business, we're making the sacrifices and the needle is moving. Investing in us because we've proven that we execute strongly.

Other Ways To Serve

Forward our message to a friend. That's it!

More About Company

Angel.co Profile: www.angel.co/doccaster

Website: www.doccaster.com

Blog: www.doccaster.blogspot.com

More About Kyle, CEO and Cofounder

Twitter: www.twitter.com/kylecsteele

Blog: www.kylecsteele.blogspot.com

Linkedin: http://www.linkedin.com/in/kylechristiansteele

More About Heman, CTO and Cofounder

Twitter: www.twitter.com/hpagey

Linkedin: www.linkedin.com/in/hpagey

Heman and Kyle met on the campus of the University of Central Florida in 2009. In 2012 they began building Doccaster, an analytics dashboard for event organizers. After testing Doccaster in a few events, the pair saw they were onto something special. In November, Doccaster was selected as 1 of 8 companies to participate in the #3 technology accelerator program in the nation, Dreamit Ventures. Two weeks later, they quit their jobs, packed their belongs into 4 small bags and headed to Austin Texas. While in Austin, the two lived in a rented room, worked late every night and turned living extremely cheap into a science while they continued building their business over the next three months.
What is Doccaster
Event organizers and planners need data to enhance and showcase their event's value to exhibitors, sponsors and attendees. Doccaster gives them data on activities, such as attendee engagement and exhibitor lead generation, by grabbing it from our web-based app called EventLocker.me. EventLocker offers event attendee's and exhibitor's:


Attendee Check-in and Networking List



Event Scheduling



Unlimited Do-it-Yourself File-Sharing



Qualified Lead Generation



Private Communication



Access From Any Mobile Device without Downloading

Throughout the life of an event, we pull attendee and exhibitor activities right into the organizers dashboard, so they can spot trends and opportunities to enhance and showcase their event.
The Bridge
Now that the program is over, our goal is to complete our fundraising and continue building key features which'll allow us to secure relationships, win deals and generate revenue. These activities require time, so we're looking build a bridge. This bridge will allow us to do the following:


Basic Living Stipend - We're going to pay ourselves a very small stipend over the next 3 months.

All remaining funds will go into the following areas:


Design Work (Front End Development) - Our target customers, event organizers, are predominantly women. Women are heavily designed focused and at the moment, our system looks like it was designed by two guys with zero style.



Backend Help – Time is not a friend of the tech startup, so we need to purchase some additional development hours to assist us in pumping out a few key features. 

Perks
Event analytics is not sexy. We're not a cool music app, a robot making machine or a t-shirt with holograms on it. Doccaster is plain and simple big data that allows organizers to see what's going on at their event so they can get attract more attendees, exhibitors and sponsors. Here are our perks:


Fern Creek Coding Project - We're a company of givers. We founded the Fern Creek Project in 2012 to teach disadvantage elementary school children how to code. We believe coding is the technology version of basketball - it's cheap to setup, easy to teach, and provides a pathway to great opportunity. We're donating 35% of every dollar we raise to the Fern Creek Elementary School Foundation in Orlando Florida, so they can buy computers for the classrooms.



Handwritten Thank You Note - $25 Donation



I Heart Fern Creek Hackers T-Shirt - $50 Donation



Premium Doccaster Cotton T-Shirt - $100 Donation



Limited Edition Pink Doccaster Ladies T-Shirt - $250



Be Bold Personalized Video - $1000 Donation. Heman, Kyle and the children of the Fern Creek project will send you a personalized video thanking you for your donation.

  
 
 
 
 
Walking With Us
Entrepreneurship isn't easy, but we're pouring every thing we have into our business because that's the effort required when you want to do something great. To us, greatness is not about money. Greatness is about building a product people love, providing jobs and opportunities, serving next to other caring and hardworking people, and impacting communities. Doccaster is an active and working product, Dreamit Ventures endorses us, we're working full-time on our business, we're making the sacrifices and the needle is moving. Investing in us because we've proven that we execute strongly.
Other Ways To Serve
Forward our message to a friend. That's it!
More About Company

Angel.co Profile: www.angel.co/doccaster
Website: www.doccaster.com
Blog: www.doccaster.blogspot.com
More About Kyle, CEO and Cofounder

Twitter: www.twitter.com/kylecsteele
Blog: www.kylecsteele.blogspot.com
Linkedin: http://www.linkedin.com/in/kylechristiansteele
More About Heman, CTO and Cofounder

Twitter: www.twitter.com/hpagey
Linkedin: www.linkedin.com/in/hpagey

story:
Materials and Specs


JUSE combines our proprietary PMS (Power Management System) and algorithms with Texas Instruments robust "Ultra Low Power Harvester Power Management IC with Boost Charger" technology.




PERKS!


$20 - JUSE LIGHTNING 100% COTTON T-SHIRT. 




FROM $79. PLEASE SEE PERKS COLUMN FOR PRICING ON YOUR DEVICE. AVAILABLE IN BLACK OR WHITE. SHIPPING IN USA & CANADA IS FREE. FOR ALL OTHER COUNTRIES, PLEASE ADD $20. 



$250 - YOUR NAME ENGRAVED IN A SOLAR CELL ENCASED PLAQUE ON OUR FOUNDATION WALL. PLUS ANY 1 JUSE CASE AND OUR JUSE LIGHTNING             T-SHIRT. SHIPPING IN THE USA & CANADA IS FREE. FOR ALL OTHER COUNTRIES, PLEASE ADD $20.


THE FIRST 5

The Impact

Every contribution matters and brings us one step closer to delivering "Power to the People". We truly appreciate every dollar that is contributed. 

    Risks & Challenges

    Product Development and Production can be challenging. Manufacturers and suppliers of our parts could possibly delay delivery. As well, if there is an overwhelming demand (100,000 units sold), delay from our PV manufacturer may occur. Our team consists of over 20 years + of experience in product development and we are confident that we can deliver the first 20,000 units without delay. 

    Other Ways You Can Help

    We understand that it might not be the best time for you to purchase a JUSE case. We would love and appreciate it if you would share our campaign with those who might benefit from our product. Thank You!

    LIVE Q&A - Ask and we shall answer!

    Q: Does JUSE really work?

    A: Yes JUSE really works! Solar technology has been around for 30+ years. What makes JUSE able to deliver on perpetual power is it’s ability to efficiently take in any light source and convert it to energy.

    Q: Does JUSE work without the sun?

    A: JUSE can work under low light conditions. For example typical office lights. It does take more time to charge the nano battery. Typical time would range fro 6-8hrs in a typical office environment. JUSE will NOT work if you live in a cave and are not exposed to any light through out the day.

    Q: How long does it take for the SUN to charge JUSE?

    A: Depending on what time of the day, it typically take about 2hrs of sun light to charge JUSE to 75%. This is all you will need to power your phone throughout the day. Combine outdoor light with indoor light and you will have perpetual power for the whole day.

    Q: Do I need to think about charging?

    A: NO. JUSE is designed as a passive device. Simply put your JUSE case on your phone and go about your every day life. *JUSE does need to see light!… If your phone is in your pant pocket or purse for 24hrs or more, with no access to light, JUSE will not perform the way it was meant to. 

    Q: What type of battery do you use?
    A: Our batteries are made from Lithium Ion Silicon Graphene and have a gravimetric weight of 400-500 Wh/kg. Read more about Silicon Graphene here:  http://electroiq.com/blog/2011/11/northwestern-... 
    Q: Do you ship overseas? 
    A: Please add $20 for shipping outside the USA or Canada.

story:
Join the Baseprø Thank You Program

Click Here to Earn $25+ Off & Get Yours Free


INTRODUCING BASEPRØ

Your laptop experience will never be the same. 

For Windows or Mac Laptops


All-In-One Laptop Workstation For Efficiency & Comfort




Easily create a multi-monitor laptop workstation.

Using a HDMI, VGA or DVI USB monitor adapter, easily create a multiple monitor workstation that allows you to take your laptop on the go, without disconnecting multiple connections. 



Built for speed.


With 4 additional USB 3.0 ports, BasePrø allows you a maximum signaling rate of 5 gigabits per second (10x faster than USB 2.0) making it built to last for next few years.

So go ahead, connect all your favorite devices at lightning fast speeds:


Built for convenience.

Connect all your devices to BasePrø, then take your laptop on the go without a complicated disconnect/reconnect.



The BasePrø Laptop Workstations comes with 2 Hard Drive options:


Pre-Installed Plug'n Play

BasePrø comes stocked with a hassle free hard drive pre-installed. You have the option to choose the choice of memory that fits your work load. 


CLICK HERE TO PLEDGE $119 FOR 1 TB

CLICK HERE TO PLEDGE $149 FOR 2 TB

CLICK HERE TO PLEDGE $229 FOR 4 TB


Custom User Installation 

For those who may already have their own SATA Hard Drive or want to customize their workstation for specific use.

CLICK HERE TO PLEDGE $69 FOR NO HARD DRIVE

It's incredibly easy: pop out the side lid, slide your hard drive in, lock it in place, then close. Done.



Ergonomically designed for comfort and efficiency by promoting good posture.

The angled ergonomic keyboard design reduces muscle strain and reduces the risk of carpal tunnel syndrome or other kinds of repetitive strain injuries. 



BasePrø is simple, yet sophisticated in design.

Clean lines and anodized aluminum blend seamlessly with laptops (PC or Mac) of every size.



Increase airflow to dissipate heat.

BasePrø's unique aluminum structure is designed to dissipate the heat from the bottom of your laptop while improving airflow to your laptop's fans.



No need to clutter your desk with additional cables.

BasePrø runs using only the power from your laptop's USB port with the ability to disengage the power if your laptop is low on battery.



Easily take your BasePrø with you.

Ideally sized for travel or for at home, throw your BasePrø in your briefcase for use at work, at home, or both.

Hard Drive Enclosure

Capacity: up to 4TB
Compatible with all 3.5" SATA HDD's
USB 3.0 (Backwards compatible with USB 2.0)
Supports: Mac OS 9 or higher, Windows 2000 or higher, and Linux.

4 Port USB 3.0 Hub

Interfaces: USB 3.0 (Backwards compatible with USB 2.0)

Interface Transfer Rate: Up to 5 Gb/s (USB3.0)



After months of developing and testing, we now have a working prototype and with your support we will have enough funding to pay for the manufacturing process. 




Our first products focused on bettering our mobile experiences, where we developed a protective cases to maximize the reception of smartphones, improving call quality and battery life. 

As laptop users, we realized there were still too many problems with the laptop user experience. It inspired us to create the BasePrø: a space efficient, ergonomic, and stylish working station. 

As technology becomes a fact of life, Absolute will keep working on smart products to improve your daily experiences.

story: The money raised will be used for Kurset Bedellioglu's ( a minority national of Turkey Republic) exemption from mandatory military service by paying 7000 USD. Because he is a minority citizen, it might be extremely dangerous for him to join the army for 12 months :((((( Please show your solidarity with little poor Kurset by donating. This is not just a simple act of solidarity with somebody, but an act to stand against RACISM, MILITARISM, WAR, CAPITALISM, ISLAMOPHOBIA and HOMOPHOBIA.

story:
We are looking to raise as much as we can to help my uncle, Andy, who was in a horrific car accident on July 18. Early in the morning he overcorrected his vehicle, rolled and was trapped in his vehicle as it started on fire. There was thankfully someone in the area that witnessed the accident and was able to pull him out of his burning vehicle and save his life. Now he is in the hospital undergoing several surgeries from his accident and is looking like a long road ahead of him. 

Andy is an amazing Father of 3, uncle, friend, grandfather of 2 and one on the way, and so much more. He would give anyone the last dime he had to his name or the shirt off his back regardless of the situation. He is a hard working man who has owned his own construction business for as long as I know. I am hoping that people are willing to help with any costs of the medical to show him how loved he truly is by more than just his family and give him the motivation to keep striving forward in his recovery process. 

All of the funds raised will go to medical bills for Andy to take care of a little of the financial burden that has been on his family at this time. 

Any amount of money will help as well as prayers are also requested at this time. Andy is in very bad shape, but already so far he has fought a hard battle and is moving forward. 

Thank you so much from the bottom of my heart and from Andy and his family. Your contributions will help Andy tremendously as well as the prayers!! Please remember to share this. Thank you!!!

story:
Protoboards Trio


After couple successful Kickstarter campaigns we come to Indiegogo.  Bringing to you 3 types of prototyping boards.

  • SMD prototyping - solder those tiny components you always wanted to try
  • Breadboard Style PCB - move your breadboard creation to permanent place 
  • Arduino Prototype Shield - make your own custom Arduino compatible shield
You can pledge to to get 3 of the same kind of one of each. Or a bunch of them...

SMD Prototyping Board


  • QFN - up to 64pins
  • SOIC -  28 pin
  • SOIP - 48 pin
  • DFN - 14pin
  • 1206 size Capacitors, Resistors and LED's x 33
  • Pushbuttons
  • SOT-233
  • SOT23-6
  • SMA Diodes
  • Mini USB
  • Arduino and Raspberry PI headers or use them from DIP components 


Breadboard PCB

  • Size of a half size breadboard
  • 370 holes
  • familiar to the heart design
  • mounting holes
  • rounded edges


Arduino Protoshield


  • Arduino R3 compatible
  • ISCP header 
  • Support for DIP IC
  • Reset and push buttons
  • LEDs
  • Stackable headers - stack as high as you need
  • Power and Ground rails - plenty Ground and 5V pins


What We Need & What You Get

As it is 3 different projects combined in one, the manufacturing costs are higher. Thus the 3000 pounds will allow a good quantity of boards to be produced to make them affordable price.

    The Impact

    These 3 little boards will make your day to day prototyping simpler easier and faster. If you never tried using SMD components this is the best place to start, The money made from this campaign will go towards bringing you more amazing project (and we have few in prototype stages)

      Risks & Challenges

      We already had few successful crowd-funding campaigns. And learned a lot about design and manufacturing. The boards are in the final stage. And there are not any more designed changes planed. Thus there will not be any design problems. 

      The roll out plan is flowing:

      • 30 days  For the campaigned to run
      • 15-20 days for the money from backers to get to us
      • 5-7 days to transfer money to the manufacturers 
      • 2-3 day shipping 
      • 3-7 days pack-edge preparation and shipping out 
      • 2 days shipping time for order within UK
      • 5-7 days for the rest of the world
      • Total between 32 to 46 days from the end of the campaign to the day you can start prototyping.

        Other Ways You Can Help

        We know there are loads of friends that you have who would love to get their hands of these great prototyping boards. So please share it with your friends and colleagues to make this project a success.  

        • Write a post on facebook or google+ or tweet (tweeting is always good)
        • Email to your friends
        • Write a blog post
        • Tell that girl you like about it (good way to start a conversation)..
        • Talked about it to that guy you always say hello in the lift...
        • Use the Indiegogo share tools!
        • Or if you have no friends you can always double the pledge 

        A really big thanks to you all!

        How does the t-shirt look like?

story:
We all use our smartphones a lot these days, and the uses for them keep growing and growing.  For my part, I'm a big outdoors person, and use my smartphone for GPS while sailing or hiking - but okay, I confess that I also stream films to my smartphone in bed when It's late and I can't fall asleep. 

Whether we're watching the news at breakfast, reading a recipe while we cook, loads of the things we do with our smartphones require us to hold it up in front of us, or find a place to lean it.  

When we take the train, plane or bus, arms get tired trying to hold the phone up at the right viewing distance and angle, especially if there's a coffee in one hand, and a sandwich on our lap.  It would be cool if we could hang the phone off the seat in front, or make it stay on an arm or knee.

How about trying to make videos or "selfies"? An adjustable stand which can stay ANYWHERE would be very handy.

Trying to get dinner on the table? An impatient three-year-old? Imagine putting Bugs Bunny on the phone, on the table, in a secure stand where little eyes can see it, but little hands won't drop it on the floor. Peace of mind.  Replacement screens are expensive!

What if we are driving a car or a truck with no hands-free kit? No SatNav or GPS?  The smartBandStand™ will stay on the dashboard, or hang from the AC vent. Now that's really handy!

When we use smartphone GPS for hiking, fishing or sailing, we worry about dropping it in water or mud while trying to dig it out of a jacket pocket with cold or wet hands. Why not wear it on an arm, safe and usable?

By the way, where should it go when we have no pockets - like when out jogging, or working in the garden in warm weather?

People have devised smartphone stands already, and people have devised smartphone armbands, too. What if we could combine these in one device?

Smartwatches have come on the scene, and can be used hands-free, but a smartwatch isn’t the same as having your own phone!


 

   


made a carrying band which will let me use my phone while it's on my arm or wrist? If they did, I wouldn't need to buy a smartwatch, or a rubber/plastic arm band (which makes it very hard to get the phone out when it rings).

 


made a good-looking, rugged, well-designed all-in-one device to help us with our smartphones in almost any situation? Filming, viewing, reading? With quickly interchangeable urban or outdoor cases?

 


made a stand/armband which lets me remove or replace the smartphone in one simple movement, instead of needing to pull it out of a pocket, or unhook it from clips, clamps, screws, or rubber arms?

 

 

 


What's in it for you?

Three products in one:

1. Impact-resistant smartphone case with connector button

2. Armband with Velcro™ or bungee hook closure

3. A fully-adjustable stand with tilt-screen feature

Even without the super-perks available only to Indiegogo supporters, the smartBandStand™ represents amazingly good value.

Why buy three separate products when you can have them in one great-looking device?  

A smartBandStand™ just makes good sense!

Be the first to get your hands on a smartBandStand™ and make your smartphone do more for you every day!

You get this awesome new product, at a huge pre-order discount.


What do I do NOW?


1. For a simple pre-order of the smartBandStand™ click the "Bronze Token".

    (or choose your own perk!)

2. Wait for confirmation email (usually within 24 hours)

3. Reply to confirmation email with:

    Choice of colour - black, white or red

    (unless you choose a custom colour perk!)

   

   


    Your closure preference (Velcro™ or bungee type)

    The exact type of smartphone you own so we can send the correct case!

  Supported Models:

  IPhone 4

  IPhone 4S

  IPhone 5

  iPhone 5S

  iPhone 5C

  Samsung S3

  Samsung S4

  Samsung S3 Mini

  Samsung S4 Mini

  HTC One

  HTC One Mini

  LG G2


No problem! We also make the smartBandStand Button™, which can be attached permanently to the back of most smartphone cases. It is extremely low profile, and comes in three colours (black, white and red).

Just let us know what you decide when you are specifying colour and strap preference.

Note: Our impact resistant cases are compatible with flip cover smartphones.


Thinking of changing smartphones soon? Nothing to worry about. 

If you change smartphones between now and 1 September 2014, just drop us an email with your order reference number, and we will update your case choice!

Alternatively, choose a perk which includes a replacement case. There is no time limit for redeeming your second case - subject only to the condition that your replacement case is for one of the "Top 12" selling smartphones at the time of claiming.

Replacement cases will be shipped within 48 hours of order receipt.

Please bear in mind that smartBandStand™ cases may be purchased separately to the smartBandStand™ itself at any time once manufacture has begun. All subsequent case products which we make (heavy-duty/waterproof/dust-proof/shock-proof) will remain fully compatible with the smartBandStand™.

Replacement case shipping costs ARE INCLUDED as part of the perk.

When you receive your confirmation of order email, don't forget to reply with your choice of colour (black, white, or red).  Please also specify if you would like matching closure straps, as mixing and matching is allowed!




PLEASE bear in mind that your supporter's contribution does not include shipping cost! Use the  table below to add delivery cost to your supporter's contribution.


Ireland & Northern Ireland

$5.75

Rest of the World

$7



Look who's talking!



 Prototyping and Manufacture

After 20 months and a lot of sweat and hard work, we're ready to move this idea beyond concept and sketches, CAD rendering, prototyping, patent filing and business execution plan.  This is a hugely exciting time.

We're looking for YOUR support, and here is what crowdfunders will help us do:

We need to complete the tooling for cases for all the leading brands of smartphone. That is why our funding goal is larger than some; it's like making over a dozen separate products.

We want to follow our debut product with our impact, dust, and water-resistant case - the smartLocker™. This will be the premier-level case with a "smartBandStand Button™" for attaching to the smartBandStand™.

We need to get smartbandstand.com to act as our worldwide sales portal. 

Great web design is a lot of work, and we think this device warrants the best.


We need to do proper branding and packaging design work. 

We need to get this packaging made. It must be eco-friendly, and still look as good as what's inside it.

Our local toolmaker/machinist/injection moulder must make and assemble the first 5000 smartBandStands™.

The worldwide distribution/fulfilment system must be rock-solid.

Most of all, only your help will make all of this happen!


  



Now for the breakdown...this is how your support will make it all happen:


 

  • Phase 2 will require $209,000, and will comprise:
  • further IP protection work;
  • branding, logo and packaging design;
  • web portal design;
  • final pre-tooling prototyping of ancillary products;
  • drawing-up of manufacture, assembly, packaging and distribution licence contracts;
  • fulfilment of the first 5000 unit orders taken via crowd-sourced investment website Indiegogo.

 

$209,000 is a lot of money, and would get this project off to a flying start  Life would be much easier if this level of support arrived up front – no doubt about it. But let's look at how this project will happen no matter what!

 

 

Our absolute baseline is to honour our commitment to Indiegogo funders. 5000 units with standard case can be made, assembled, and plain-packaged for this amount of money. This amount would also allow us to produce soft-tooling for the top-twelve-selling smartphones.

Having 5000 happy smartBandStand™ owners out there in the world is one heck of a powerful marketing tool. 5000 people committed to the product also makes it a lot easier to get other investors on board, so the shortfall becomes less short!

 

 

What if we raised around 50% of our ideal target? $100,000 could complete all web shop design, retail packaging and hard-tooling work for smartBandStands™ with standard cases for the top-twelve-selling smartphones. This also means the product would exist beyond our Indiegogo supporters, and be available for sale worldwide on smartbandstand.com

 

 

This amount would allow us to produce a full range of colours. We would also be able to work full-time on research and development of our water, dust and shockproof smartLocker™ cases for the smartBandStand™.

 

 

This amount of money allows us to finance the digital marketing campaign which we believe will get our product seen worldwide.

 

 

If we raise less than the amount necessary to honour our commitments to Indiegogo supporters, we will approach investors for matching funds.

During our campaign, we will gladly answer any queries relating to our costing and funding allocation. Our Facebook and Twitter pages will remain "live" throughout the campaign for this purpose. Every contributor has a stake in our success or failure, and their questions are hugely important to us.

  

 


I've put the iron to one side for now, because my experience in the forge has led me to design a clever little device - one which I think will solve a lot of the problems associated with getting the most out of your smartphone.


Management and Board

Company Name: smartBandStand™ Ltd 
Address: Carrownagh, Ballintogher, Co. Sligo, Republic of Ireland 
Telephone: +353 (0)87 6478775  email: info@smartbandstand.com 

Co. Registration No.: 518882 
V.A.T. No.: 9847213T

Organisational Chart

Board members

Owner/Director: Brian Halpin  

Hello! I was born in Kansas City, Missouri, USA

After much travel, university and many youthful (mis)adventures, I settled in County Sligo, Ireland, and have been an artisan-blacksmith here for over 20 years. My work has included everything from specialist tools to high-profile public sculpture commissions.

Qualifications: Educated to third-level (archaeology at Birkbeck College London, through University College London Institute of Archaeology Campus, graduated 1992). 

Twenty years' experience running artisan-blacksmithing company. Mr. Halpin was also a founder member of the Irish Artist-Blacksmiths' Association, and served as editor of its magazine, An Ceárta, for two years. Mr. Halpin has also supplied apprenticeships to two other people in his forge, both of whom are now full-time working blacksmiths.

Expertise: Very strong ability to wed engineering sensibility to art and design. Examples include well-received public art commissions such as the “Salmon of Knowledge” sculpture in Sligo and numerous bespoke iron creations ranging from furniture to spiral stairs. 

Years spent teaching at both secondary and tertiary level have taught him how to get ideas across in a clear manner.

Strengths: Ability to multitask. Sharp grasp of complex problems, mainly due to extremely wide-ranging life experience. Doggedness in getting to the goal.

Responsibilities: Product design; quality control; oversight of all smartBandStand™Ltd. operations.

Non-Executive Directors: Lorcan Neary, Dave McLoughlin

Organisational Contractors

Accountants: Jason McDowell & Co., Sligo

Licensing Attorneys: O'Donnell McKenna Solicitors, Donegal and Dublin

Patent Agents: Tomkins, Dublin

Bank: Bank of Ireland, Sligo, Rep. of Ireland

Technical Advisors: Donncha Ryan, Senior Lecturer in Digital Marketing, DIT

Advanced Prototyping:

3D Polyjet Composite Moulding: Laser Lines, Oxfordshire, UK

Manufacturing and Distribution Contractors:

Tooling, moulding and assembly: STD, Sligo

Packaging and Fulfilment: Dutec, Limerick

Marketing:

Digital marketing strategy: ICAN, Dublin

Online Design:  Infacta, Sligo, Rep. of Ireland


Thank you for supporting this campaign! smartBandStand™ will be in contact within 24 hours of your donation in order to provide you with an order reference ID. Please use this order reference ID when contacting smartBandStand™ to specify the color & phone fitting of your smartBandStand™.


Wir sprechen auch Deutsch!
story_txt:
We all use our smartphones a lot these days, and the uses for them keep growing and growing.  For my part, I'm a big outdoors person, and use my smartphone for GPS while sailing or hiking - but okay, I confess that I also stream films to my smartphone in bed when It's late and I can't fall asleep. 


	Whether we're watching the news at breakfast, reading a recipe while we cook, loads of the things we do with our smartphones require us to hold it up in front of us, or find a place to lean it.  

	When we take the train, plane or bus, arms get tired trying to hold the phone up at the right viewing distance and angle, especially if there's a coffee in one hand, and a sandwich on our lap.  It would be cool if we could hang the phone off the seat in front, or make it stay on an arm or knee.


	How about trying to make videos or "selfies"?  An adjustable
	stand which can stay ANYWHERE would be very handy.




	Trying to get dinner on the table?  An impatient three-year-old? Imagine
	putting Bugs Bunny on the phone, on the table, in a secure stand
	where little eyes can see it, but little hands won't drop it on the floor.  Peace of mind.  Replacement screens are expensive!

	What if we are driving a car or a truck with no hands-free kit? No SatNav or GPS?  The smartBandStand™ will stay on the dashboard, or hang from the AC vent.  Now that's really handy!


	When we use smartphone GPS for hiking, fishing or sailing, we
	worry about dropping it in water or mud while trying to
	dig it out of a jacket pocket with cold or wet hands.
Why not wear it on an arm, safe and usable?

	By the way, where should it go when we have no pockets - like
	when out jogging, or working in the garden in warm weather?


	People have devised smartphone stands already, and people have devised
	smartphone armbands, too. What if we could combine these in one
	device?


	Smartwatches have come on the scene, and can be used hands-free, but a smartwatch isn’t the same as having your own phone!

 
   

	made a carrying band which will let me use my phone
	while it's on my arm or wrist?  If they did, I wouldn't need
	to buy a smartwatch, or a rubber/plastic arm band
	(which makes it very hard to get the phone out when it rings).

 


    made a good-looking, rugged, well-designed
	all-in-one device to help us with our smartphones in almost any
	situation?  Filming, viewing, reading?  With quickly
	interchangeable urban or outdoor cases?

 


made a stand/armband which lets me remove or replace
	the smartphone in one simple movement, instead of needing to pull it
out of a pocket, or unhook it from clips, clamps, screws, or
	rubber arms?

 

 
 What's in it for you?Three products in one:1. Impact-resistant smartphone case with connector button2. Armband with Velcro™ or bungee hook closure3. A fully-adjustable stand with tilt-screen featureEven without the super-perks available only to Indiegogo supporters, the smartBandStand™ represents amazingly good value.Why buy three separate products when you can have them in one great-looking device?  A smartBandStand™ just makes good sense!Be the first to get your hands on a smartBandStand™ and make your smartphone do more for you every day!You get this awesome new product, at a huge pre-order discount.What do I do NOW?1. For a simple pre-order of the smartBandStand™ click the "Bronze Token".    (or choose your own perk!)2. Wait for confirmation email (usually within 24 hours)3. Reply to confirmation email with:    Choice of colour - black, white or red     (unless you choose a custom colour perk!)            Your closure preference (Velcro™ or bungee type)    The exact type of smartphone you own so we can send the correct case!  Supported Models:  IPhone 4  IPhone 4S  IPhone 5  iPhone 5S  iPhone 5C  Samsung S3  Samsung S4  Samsung S3 Mini  Samsung S4 Mini  HTC One  HTC One Mini  LG G2No problem! We also make the smartBandStand Button™, which can be attached permanently to the back of most smartphone cases. It is extremely low profile, and comes in three colours (black, white and red).Just let us know what you decide when you are specifying colour and strap preference.Note: Our impact resistant cases are compatible with flip cover smartphones.Thinking of changing smartphones soon? Nothing to worry about. If you change smartphones between now and 1 September 2014, just drop us an email with your order reference number, and we will update your case choice!Alternatively, choose a perk which includes a replacement case. There is no time limit for redeeming your second case - subject only to the condition that your replacement case is for one of the "Top 12" selling smartphones at the time of claiming.Replacement cases will be shipped within 48 hours of order receipt.Please bear in mind that smartBandStand™ cases may be purchased separately to the smartBandStand™ itself at any time once manufacture has begun. story:
Please, turn the subtitles on! 

The idea came to me accidently. While I was doing the grocery shopping, I saw an     old lady who was selling baby hats and slippers made by her. They were hand-made yarn knitted and I thought it would be cool to have a hand-made knitted phone case,just because no one has that kind of phone case and it will look just amazing.


Select The Ladybug Phone Case Perk! FREE SHIPPING WORLDWIDE!

So I ordered the old lady to make me a phone case. And this is how all have started. To be honest the first case was just awful…but then came the second one and then the third and so on. Finally I had what I wanted. While we worked together I was getting to know her and she once told me that she doesn’t have a job and selling baby hand-made clothing is the only what she does for living is only. 

Select The Panda Phone Case Perk! FREE SHIPPING WORLDWIDE! 


Then I came up with the idea to order her enough phone cases so she can get an income she can live with. I wish the knitting  became her full-time job. The problem seems to be that Katya is not the only one in that kind of situation- there are a lot of old ladies just like Katya who don’t have any income. But here is the solution- they also can knit…
Select The Minion Phone Case Perk! FREE SHIPPING WORLDWIDE!


So basically that’s all about- to hire as many as possible old ladies who can knit. I know it sounds crazy, but here in Bulgaria this is a huge problem- there are a lot of old people who are not old enough to be retired so they can get a pension and they don’t work either because nobody wants to hire them. My goal is not to hire all the old people in Bulgaria who don’t take any income, of course this is impossible and pointless. The main goal is to hire enough capable old ladies so they can get paid, help their families and feel useful.



I don’t need a lot of money to achieve the campaign’s goals at this point and that’s why the budget is not huge. We need money to buy supplies such as yarn, needles, to make a well-looking website and the most important- to hire more women who are good at knitting and to pay them fair so they can be financially independant. We have yarn and needles, but we need to buy new and more supply and tools, to try new types of yarn to create new designs with more colors and uniqueness. 

      The Greatest challenge is to find and hire people who are in need but also         capable of doing the Phone Sweaters products. The more women we hire the more we produce, but we need to sell what we are producing. So we need to build a website, an Etsy store, to find our target group and to sell to them so we can create a sustainable business model.

My name is Anton Doynov, I am from Sliven, Bulgaria (EU). I have graduated from the University of National and World Economy in Sofia, Bulgaria. I have worked in the field of logistics and supply chain area for two years and now I develop The Phone Sweaters project.


Don’t forget to share the campaign on Facebook and Twitter.

story:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION




Features @A Glance

Remark: When integrating Faxing, Printing & Scanning, we isolate those activities to preserve Mobile+ performance in par with the competition. In other words, those extra functionalities do not impact the device performance.


Bluetooth

At manufacturing time, Mobile+ will be fitted with the latest Bluetooth technology available. As you may already be aware, 4.0 is already being implemented in new devices. We are watching this technology closely to integrate the latest into Mobile+

Wifi

One of the best things that has happened to communication. At InterNotes Mobile, we’re all about “Cutting the Cord”. Already in use is 802.11n. Don’t worry if those numbers don’t ring any bell. Suffice to know that 802.11n gives your Wifi device a much longer range of communication with the source. We are watching this technology closely to integrate the latest into Mobile+

3G/4G/LTE

Look to your cellphone provider for guidance on this. This is one aspect of communication we have no say on. We simply integrate it into Mobile+.

Faxing

We don’t have to explain faxing to you. One neat thing about using Mobile+ to fax is how original it looks to the recipient; no more ink smudge, missing word or letter. Your clients and customers will love receiving faxes from you. Remind them you are using Mobile+

Printing

We don’t have to explain printing to you.

Well, we do.

We integrate into Mobile+ inkless technology that enables printing without the fuss; no more running out of ink, no more paper jam (the possibility of that happening is 1 in a million).

Scanning

We don’t have to explain scanning to you, except that we place the scanner near the exit point, making it virtually impossible to have any issue.

Camera/Video

Camera, Light, Action or is it the other way around. Whichever you decide, you’ll find snapping pictures with a 39MP camera one of the best experience of your photographic career. And if you’re into video, you can keep your distance and still get in on the action. When you turn the video feature ON, no event is too far. Your eyes may not catch the details, our camera will. In those times when you wish you could be close enough to capture a crime in progress, Mobile+ will come to the rescue. How about spying on your boyfriend? Well, we are completely against that. Hmm!

Security

Everyone mentions security as a priority; well, we don’t simply mention it. We implement it. There is no upside for anyone to steal your Mobile+. Once the security is active, no one can make use of your tablet. Even at the point when a phone number is provided to call to have Mobile+ unlocked, the “thief” would also need your personal code (generated at time of shipment) sent to you with the product. Unless it’s someone who just wants to piss you off, a girlfriend maybe. Hmm!

Display

We are looking at 260ppi (a resolution close to that of iPad 3 which is 264ppi) as of this writing but things can change. The final determination will be made at time of manufacturing of course,

Ports

Well, ports are ports. Mobile+ sports mini-USB, mini-HDMI, audio, video and any other port that may be deemed necessary at time of manufacturing. As usual, those ports will be compatible with the latest technology.


REWARDS

Your help is needed to reach our goal; pledge of any amount is appreciated and gets us closer to reach the goal. Keep in mind that any pledge of $50 or more today can be used as credit in the future towards the purchase of a Mobile+ tablet when it’s available.

Thank you for Helping with Our Goal


Thank you for Helping with Our Goal


Thank you for Helping with Our Goal


Thank you for Helping with Our Goal


Thank you for Helping with Our Goal


We've applied a $300 discount towards the Price of Mobile+ during the first two weeks of the campaign.

Thank you future Owner of Mobile+


We've applied a $200 discount towards the Price of Mobile+ during  weeks 3 & 4 of the campaign.

Thank you future Owner of Mobile+


We've applied a $100 discount towards the Price of Mobile+ during  weeks 5 & 6 of the campaign.

Thank you future Owner of Mobile+


This represents the regular price of Mobile+

Thank you future Owner of Mobile+


REMARK: During the campaign, you are also encouraged to submit your suggestions for Mobile+ device; you can do it here on this site or submit directly to InterNotes Mobile site. As we finalize the schematic, improvement and/or addition may still make way into the final product. Please, do share any idea.

UPDATE:  As of the time this document is uploaded into the site, there is only one color (silver) Mobile+ comes in. Other colors will of course be considered at manufacturing time.


HOW DID IT START?

One night, I went to bed thinking that I needed to contribute a little bit more to society. In a vision that night, God spoke to me:

God: Michael, Michael

Me: Yes Lord

God: I chose you to lead the world into the technology future

Me: Me Lord?

God: Yes Michael, you.

Me: What do I do?

God: Michael, use your imagination

And I woke up.

Of course I am kidding.


I do a lot of technology consulting; translation, I travel a lot. I cannot begin to quantify how many times I found myself in a situation when I either needed to print a page document to be signed by a client or scan a document to be immediately sent to headquarters for review and approval.

Those situations were not isolated or rare. So, I began to think of a more practical solution to my problem. I lost a few contracts because I couldn’t obtain a client’s signature on the spot. By the time I’d traveled back to the office, the client had already changed his mind about the deal. Other times, the client would want so many changes that would warrant a brand new meeting which didn’t always go my way.

Most of those meetings happened outside the office, at a restaurant, at a concert, at the airport and even at the park. Try to bring a printer there, or a fax. As it is probably obvious, there were times when it was the client that would hand me a document that was already drafted that I had to sign, in which case I would need to send a copy immediately to my superior at the headquarters. Try finding a fax at a restaurant or anywhere nearby while having dinner.

The solution was simple, to carry those basic office equipment with me. I christened it Mobile Office. Think about it. What do we do mostly at the office? Print, Scan, Fax, Email, Calls and Meetings, right? So, Mobile Office (Mobile+) handles the printing, the scanning, the faxing and the emailing. It can even handle some of the calling, using a headset; it’s fitted with GSM, CDMA, LTE, WiFi. With a Skype account, a Wifi connection and a headset (if you want privacy; otherwise, the speaker is perfect to use), you can start making calls the day you receive Mobile+. As far as the meetings aspect of the office, I need to have another dialog with God.

Below, the first images are what Mobile+ looked like when first conceived, bulky, heavy. Time has changed; and of course today, the second images are rather contemporary.

Picture 1A


Picture 1B


Picture 2A


Picture 2B


Picture 2C



THE PRODUCT

Below is an image of the current schematic; this is where we're at. For obvious reasons, a number of proprietary placements of circuitry and labeling are not revealed. Later in this document, there is a timeline of activities regarding the concept, the patent application, the schematics and the expected date of completion of Mobile+.

Mobile+ Internal Circuitry


WHERE DO WE GO FROM HERE?

We are very anxious to get Mobile+ completed and introduced to the market; we have already taken a number of steps to make that happen:

  • May 2012: InterNotes Mobile applied for and was granted a provisional patent (EFS ID: 12900728; Application No: 61653525; Confirmation No: 9840)
  • May 2012: InterNotes Mobile applied for a tax ID with US Internal Revenue Service; tax ID was issued (EIN: 45-5388174)
  • June 2013: Filing with New York (NY) Department of State for Certificate of Corporation; one (1) billion shares registered along with the filing. NY State approved InterNotes Mobile request for Corporation status in the state of NY (DOS ID: 4377538)
  • Ongoing: Schematic Update, Improvement, Change, Substitution. This is where most of the time is being spent to bring scanning, printing & faxing to  Mobile+ without extra weight or loss in performance.
  • Ongoing: Negotiation with Manufacturer; we take a one-stop shopping approach to minimize delay, problems and cost. The manufacturer tasked to complete the prototype is also responsible for manufacturing; in addition, the manufacturer is tasked to handle procurement of raw materials and any components necessary to build Mobile+
  • TBD:  Upon final schematic, a new provisional patent will be filed to reflect the final drawings as well as the look of Mobile+
  • TBD: Upon final schematic, certification with FCC
  • Jan-Feb 2015: Finalize Schematic
  • March 2015: Working prototype; corrections, improvements, changes,etc..
  • April 2015: Fully working Prototype
  • May-June 2015: Working model
  • July-Sept 2015: FULL testing of all components and functionalities
  • October 2015: Preparation for production and other miscellaneous
  • Oct-Nov 2015: Production begins
  • Nov-Dec 2015: Shipment begins


Great Plan, would it work?

I am a very optimistic individual; I am most inclined to believe that if one plans properly, most everything should work. I am not however naïve to ignore problems that could creep in sometimes. We are prepared to deal with those unfortunate situations. The one promise we have vowed to keep is NOT to release a “half-baked” product. It is frustrating sometimes that a promised date is not met; it is however most frustrating if the promised product does not live up to its hype.

To minimize delays, we have carefully selected the manufacturer that will handle all aspects of production. I will personally monitor the manufacturer’s activity to be abreast of any problem and address it promptly. You will be kept abreast as well; we are working the logistics to update all interested parties either on a weekly or bi-weekly basis.

Having said all that, we are fully committed to abide by the aforementioned dates


YOUR HELP IS NEEDED

When you pledge $10 or more, you help us get one step closer to our goal. Mobile+ is no ordinary tablet. Be the first to own one.

We appreciate any contribution to help us get there. As a gesture of gratitude for helping, we have a number of incentives, in addition to the REWARDS earlier:

Incentive 1

If you make a contribution of $50, you are automatically ELIGIBLE to receive a free Mobile+ tablet when it becomes available, and it is easy to get.

Tell your friends (on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram or any social network) about Mobile+

For each of your friends that makes a contribution towards our goal (whether it's a $10 contribution or the purchase of Mobile+), claim a $10 discount towards the purchase of Mobile+. Collect enough $10 discount to cover the Regular Mobile+ price and receive a free Mobile+ tablet at time of shipment

Note: the friends you refer MUST NOT be a current backer for this project; you are encouraged to claim your discount as soon as your friend makes a contribution.

Remark: your contribution is applied towards the Regular Price of Mobile+


Incentive 2

If you make a contribution of $100, you are automatically ELIGIBLE to receive a free Mobile+ tablet when it becomes available, and it is easy to get.

Tell your friends (on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram or any social network) about Mobile+

For each of your friends that makes a contribution towards our goal (whether it's a $10 contribution or the purchase of Mobile+), claim a $25 discount towards the purchase of a Mobile+. Collect enough discounts to cover the Regular Mobile+ price and and receive a free Mobile+ tablet at time of shipment

Note: the friends you refer MUST NOT be a current backer for this project

Remark: your contribution is applied towards the Regular Price of Mobile+


Incentive 3

If you make a contribution of $150, you are automatically ELIGIBLE to receive a free Mobile+ tablet when it becomes available, and it is easy to get.

Tell your friends (on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram or any social network) about Mobile+

For each of your friends that makes a contribution towards our goal (whether it's a $10 contribution or the purchase of Mobile+), claim a $50 discount towards the purchase of a Mobile+. Collect enough discounts to cover the Regular Mobile+ price and and receive a free Mobile+ tablet at time of shipment

Note: the friends you refer MUST NOT be a current backer for this project

Download a fully formatted PDF copy of the Project Description.

This space will be used to provide answers to questions that would benefit all interested parties
story_txt:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION



Features
@A Glance
Remark: When integrating Faxing, Printing &
  Scanning, we isolate those activities to preserve Mobile+ performance in par
  with the competition. In other words, those extra functionalities do not
  impact the device performance.

Bluetooth
At manufacturing
  time, Mobile+ will be fitted with the latest Bluetooth technology available.
  As you may already be aware, 4.0 is already being implemented in new devices.
  We are watching this technology closely to integrate the latest into Mobile+
Wifi
One of the best
  things that has happened to communication. At InterNotes Mobile, we’re all
  about “Cutting the Cord”. Already in use is 802.11n. Don’t worry if those
  numbers don’t ring any bell. Suffice to know that 802.11n gives your Wifi
  device a much longer range of communication with the source. We are watching
  this technology closely to integrate the latest into Mobile+
3G/4G/LTE
Look to your
  cellphone provider for guidance on this. This is one aspect of communication
  we have no say on. We simply integrate it into Mobile+. 
Faxing
We don’t have to
  explain faxing to you. One neat thing about using Mobile+ to fax is how
  original it looks to the recipient; no more ink smudge, missing word or
  letter. Your clients and customers will love receiving faxes from you. Remind
  them you are using Mobile+
Printing
We don’t have to
  explain printing to you.
Well, we do.
We integrate into
  Mobile+ inkless technology that enables printing without the fuss; no more
  running out of ink, no more paper jam (the possibility of that happening is 1
  in a million).
Scanning
We don’t have to
  explain scanning to you, except that we place the scanner near the exit
  point, making it virtually impossible to have any issue. 
Camera/Video
Camera, Light,
  Action or is it the other way around. Whichever you decide, you’ll find snapping
  pictures with a 39MP camera one of the best experience of your photographic
  career. And if you’re into video, you can keep your distance and still get in
  on the action. When you turn the video feature ON, no event is too far. Your
  eyes may not catch the details, our camera will. In those times when you wish
  you could be close enough to capture a crime in progress, Mobile+ will come
  to the rescue. How about spying on your boyfriend? Well, we are completely
  against that. Hmm!
Security
Everyone mentions
  security as a priority; well, we don’t simply mention it. We implement it.
  There is no upside for anyone to steal your Mobile+. Once the security is
  active, no one can make use of your tablet. Even at the point when a phone
  number is provided to call to have Mobile+ unlocked, the “thief” would also
  need your personal code (generated at time of shipment) sent to you with the
  product. Unless it’s someone who just wants to piss you off, a girlfriend
  maybe. Hmm!
Display
We are looking at
  260ppi (a resolution close to that of iPad 3 which is 264ppi) as of this
  writing but things can change. The final determination will be made at time
  of manufacturing of course, 
Ports
Well, ports are
  ports. Mobile+ sports mini-USB, mini-HDMI, audio, video and any other port
  that may be deemed necessary at time of manufacturing. As usual, those ports
  will be compatible with the latest technology.

REWARDS
  
 
 
 

Your help is needed to reach our goal; pledge of any amount is appreciated and gets us closer to reach the goal. Keep in mind
that any pledge of $50 or more today can be used as credit in the future towards the purchase of a
Mobile+ tablet when it’s available.


Thank you for Helping with Our Goal

Thank you for Helping with Our Goal

Thank you for Helping with Our Goal

Thank you for Helping with Our Goal

Thank you for Helping with Our Goal










We've applied a $300 discount towards the Price of Mobile+ during the first two weeks of the campaign.

Thank you future Owner of Mobile+
We've applied a $200 discount towards the Price of Mobile+ during  weeks 3 & 4 of the campaign.



Thank you future Owner of Mobile+



We've applied a $100 discount towards the Price of Mobile+ during  weeks 5 & 6 of the campaign.

Thank you future Owner of Mobile+

UPDATE:  As of the time this document is
uploaded into the site, there is only one color (silver) Mobile+ comes in. Other colors will of course be considered at
manufacturing time.

HOW DID IT START?
One night, I went to bed thinking
that I needed to contribute a little bit more to society. In a vision that
night, God spoke to me:
God: Michael, Michael
Me: Yes Lord
God: I chose you to lead the world into the technology future
Me: Me Lord?
God: Yes Michael, you.
Me: What do I do?
God: Michael, use your imagination
And I woke up.
Of course I am kidding.

I do a lot of technology consulting;
translation, I travel a lot. I cannot begin to quantify how many times I found
myself in a situation when I either needed to print a page document to be signed
by a client or scan a document to be immediately sent to headquarters for
review and approval. 
Those situations were not isolated
or rare. So, I began to think of a more practical solution to my problem. I
lost a few contracts because I couldn’t obtain a client’s signature on the
spot. By the time I’d traveled back to the office, the client had already
changed his mind about the deal. Other times, the client would want so many
changes that would warrant a brand new meeting which didn’t always go my way. 
Most of those meetings happened
outside the office, at a restaurant, at a concert, at the airport and even at
the park. Try to bring a printer there, or a fax. As it is probably obvious,
there were times when it was the client that would hand me a document that was
already drafted that I had to sign, in which case I would need to send a copy
immediately to my superior at the headquarters. Try finding a fax at a
restaurant or anywhere nearby while having dinner. 
The solution was simple, to carry
those basic office equipment with me. I christened it Mobile Office. Think about it. What do we do mostly at the office?
Print, Scan, Fax, Email, Calls and Meetings, right? So, Mobile Office (Mobile+)
handles the printing, the scanning, the faxing and the emailing. It can even

privacy; otherwise, the speaker is perfect to use), you can start making calls
the day you receive Mobile+. As far as the meetings aspect of the office, I
need to have another dialog with God.

story:
What is SocialFrames?

SocialFrames is an animated & dynamic visual summary of your Social Networks in a single, constantly updated screen. This Mobile application for Apple iOS & Android can be run on any of your devices.

>> Looking for the contest? Checkout the bottom of the page. <<

How does SocialFrames Work?

SocialFrames connects to your Social Networks including: Facebook, Twitter, Google+, and LinkedIn and collects all the Likes, Tweets, Posts, and Shares from Friends, Followers, Circles & Connections. Then it processes this raw social network data and creates a single animated tag cloud graphic that represents your social sphere. This tag cloud is re-rendered regularly, and animated... the tag cloud changes with changes to your social network.

What is a Tag Cloud? They are a visual representation of the frequency of word usage. Frequently used words are displayed the biggest, while infrequently used words appear smallest. At a glace you can immediately see the most popular words / topics being discussed - as well all the other conversations as well.

What can I do with SocialFrames?

The SocialFrames tag cloud animation normally moves forward in time... As updates are posted to your Social Networks the keywords appear as a tag in the SocialFrames tag cloud. Initially the tag appears small and dimly lit, and it gets bigger and brighter as the original post is re-tweeted, liked, or shared.

  • When you see a tag on your SocialFrames that interests you, simply touch it, to see a List View of all the social updates that include that tag.
  • From there you can click on a single update - to view in more detail and Reply to as a Tweet, a Like, Share or Post directly from SocialFrames.
  • The Pause, Fast Forward, and Rewind buttons control the animation - you can move backwards or forwards through the last 24-hours.
  • The Timeline on the far right is synchronized - and the current local time is always displayed at the top. When you click Rewind button - the timeline will scroll upwards and show you the animated tag cloud for the last 24-hours of your social network updates.
  • You can share an image of your current SocialFrames tag cloud - as a photo to any of the your networks.

SocialFrames combines...

The SocialFrames Tablet: This will keep you socially connected, but free from the distraction of social networks which use flashing browser tabs, sounds, pop-ups, and incoming chats. We've been working with an Original Device Manufacturer (ODM) who can produce the hardware tablets, with Android preloaded. They can produce these rapidly, and at a good volume to price point.

  • A Sleek & Modern 7” Android Tablet (with at least a 480x800 pixel screen)
  • 1GB of RAM and 4GB of Flash Storage 
  • WiFi a/b/g Connectivity (wired available with dongle - not included) 
  • An 110v A/C Charger & USB Cable
  • This Android Tablet will any of 10,000s of apps on the Google Play Store. Including the SocialFrames Application which will be pre-installed (see below for more info on the application)
  • A Desk or Countertop stand for your SocialFrames (laser cut)

The SocialFrames Mobile Application: The SocialFrames application will be available on the iTunes App store and on the Google Play store. Once you purchase the app - you simply configure it to your social network accounts - and then SocialFrames will connect to these sites, aggregates your stream, and generate the tag cloud.

  • There are NO SUBSCRIPTION fees to use SocialFrames and Kickstarter supporters will enjoy an advertising free experience.
  • There will be a "LITE" or "FREE" version which will be Ad-supported.
  • We are also considering several in-app purchases, that will add additional features to the SocialFrames experience. Also, these feature might find their way into our "Stretch Goals" - Please Stay Tuned!

How can SocialFrames help me?

at Home:

  • Stay connected with friends and family and their social network updates, quickly and easily.
  • Set audible alerts to alert you of posts to your social networks
  • Spend less time on social networks (Facebook / Twitter) and more time with your family.

at Work:

  • Be informed of trends and topics without spending hours a day reading endless tweets & timelines.
  • See the social impact of your outbound marketing on the social sphere of the analysts & market trends you follow.
  • Stay connected with associates & colleagues - even if your work PC “Blocks” social network sites.

at Play:

  • Stay connected with Friends and the HOT upcoming events, parties & hangouts.
  • See what's the most popular topic in your network at-a-glance
  • Optimize you social network time spend, follow only the topics that are most important to you.

Funding Stretch Goals (Revised)

 

"Perks" for Backers => => =>

We have several choices for the SocialFrames campaign. You can choose the Apple iOS Universal App, the Android App, Both iOS & Android Apps, the T-Shirt & the apps. Or you can choose a dedicated Tablet for your SocialFrames either an Android Tablet or a Apple iPad Mini. Other SocialFrames merchandise is Available Here.

 

Additional SocialFrames App Info

  • SocialFrames Main Screen: displays your personalized tag cloud. This is an aggregated view of all the words posted by all your friends across all in your social networks. The size & color of the tags visually show the importance and frequency of that word in your social sphere. So with a quick glance you can see what your friends are talking about on Facebook, who you’re following on Twitter, your circles on Google+ and connections in LinkedIn.
Main Screen
  • SocialFrames List Screen: When you see a word in your tag cloud and you want to know who said it and on which network, you simply touch the tag to view a list of conversations in which that word appears. This list view will show you all of the posts, across all your social networks.
List Screen
 
  • SocialFrames Reply Screen: When you’re ready to join the conversation… you can simply click on the post – and type a reply. This works across all the supported networks including Facebook, Twitter, Google+, and LinkedIn.
Reply Screen
 

Yippee!, A Contest! 

You’ve read this far... So you deserve a chance to win a PRIZE! You may have noticed the "CONTEST CLUE: & movie quotes" at the end of each of the reward descriptions... these are the clues in our contest. Each of these quotes comes from a specific movie, and was said by a specific character. Visit our Facebook Page here (http://goo.gl/MW2pc) - and Answer the Questions with RaffleCopter to be entered to win.

If you’re a backer of our Indiegogo Campaign AND if you provide the correct 16 answers, AND SocialFrames is successfully funded. THEN, you'll will have our endless ADMIRATION and a chance to win one of our prizes. Visit our Facebook Page here (http://goo.gl/MW2pc) - and Answer the Questions with RaffleCopter to be entered to win.

THANK YOU!

 

RISKS AND CHALLENGES 

We expect the standard challenges in building Mobile Applications - the first 80% goes quickly - then the last 20% takes FOREVER! We've built this into our plan - and we'll target an initial release which scope constrained to lessen any delays. We'll release this v1.0 to backers via the Apple iTunes store and the Google Play Store. After this is done we'll begin taking feedback, and working on the next release.

We're using an experienced ODM (Original Device Manufacturer) for our Android Tablets - and they have experience in delivering these devices at volume and in a timely fashion - so we don't expect any hardware related challenges.

We may experience risk with interfacing / extracting / updating Social Network Updates to & from the various Social Network we're planning to integrate with. Some Social Networks have Read / Write APIs, other only offer Read, still others are ambivalent to even reading with Mobile Apps. We have Primary Strategy for these integrations, and we've investigated several "Back-Up" strategies incase we run into issues.
