How can SocialFrames help me?
at Home:

Stay connected with friends and family and their social network updates, quickly and easily.
Set audible alerts to alert you of posts to your social networks
Spend less time on social networks (Facebook / Twitter) and more time with your family.

at Work:



Be informed of trends and topics without spending hours a day reading endless tweets & timelines.
See the social impact of your outbound marketing on the social sphere of the analysts & market trends you follow.
Stay connected with associates & colleagues - even if your work PC “Blocks” social network sites.



at Play:



Stay connected with Friends and the HOT upcoming events, parties & hangouts.
See what's the most popular topic in your network at-a-glance
Optimize you social network time spend, follow only the topics that are most important to you.







Funding Stretch Goals (Revised)

 
"Perks" for Backers => => =>
We have several choices for the SocialFrames campaign. You can choose the Apple iOS Universal App, the Android App, Both iOS & Android Apps, the T-Shirt & the apps. Or you can choose a dedicated Tablet for your SocialFrames either an Android Tablet or a Apple iPad Mini. Other SocialFrames merchandise is Available Here.
 

Additional SocialFrames App Info





SocialFrames Main Screen: displays your personalized tag cloud. This is an aggregated view of all the words posted by all your friends across all in your social networks. The size & color of the tags visually show the importance and frequency of that word in your social sphere. So with a quick glance you can see what your friends are talking about on Facebook, who you’re following on Twitter, your circles on Google+ and connections in LinkedIn.


Main Screen


SocialFrames List Screen: When you see a word in your tag cloud and you want to know who said it and on which network, you simply touch the tag to view a list of conversations in which that word appears. This list view will show you all of the posts, across all your social networks.


List Screen
 


SocialFrames Reply Screen: When you’re ready to join the conversation… you can simply click on the post – and type a reply. This works across all the supported networks including Facebook, Twitter, Google+, and LinkedIn.


Reply Screen
 


Yippee!, A Contest! 
You’ve read this far... So you deserve a chance to win a PRIZE! You may have noticed the "CONTEST CLUE: & movie quotes" at the end of each of the reward descriptions... these are the clues in our contest. Each of these quotes comes from a specific movie, and was said by a specific character. Visit our Facebook Page here (http://goo.gl/MW2pc) - and Answer the Questions with RaffleCopter to be entered to win.
If you’re a backer of our Indiegogo Campaign AND if you provide the correct 16 answers, AND SocialFrames is successfully funded. THEN, you'll will have our endless ADMIRATION and a chance to win one of our prizes. Visit our Facebook Page here (http://goo.gl/MW2pc) - and Answer the Questions with RaffleCopter to be entered to win.
THANK YOU!
 




RISKS AND CHALLENGES 

We expect the standard challenges in building Mobile Applications - the first 80% goes quickly - then the last 20% takes FOREVER! We've built this into our plan - and we'll target an initial release which scope constrained to lessen any delays. We'll release this v1.0 to backers via the Apple iTunes store and the Google Play Store. After this is done we'll begin taking feedback, and working on the next release.
We're using an experienced ODM (Original Device Manufacturer) for our Android Tablets - and they have experience in delivering these devices at volume and in a timely fashion - so we don't expect any hardware related challenges.
We may experience risk with interfacing / extracting / updating Social Network Updates to & from the various Social Network we're planning to integrate with. Some Social Networks have Read / Write APIs, other only offer Read, still others are ambivalent to even reading with Mobile Apps. We have Primary Strategy for these integrations, and we've investigated several "Back-Up" strategies incase we run into issues.

story:
Thank you for supporting Annikken Andee!

Hey guys, you have no ideas how much we want to thank you supporters for making Annikken Andee possible. All the hardwork and effort we have made is all worth it because of you.
Yes, indeed, Annikken Andee Campaign is coming to a close. But that doesn't mean you are seeing the last of us. Annikken Andee lives on! 
Annikken Andee is still available for sale after the Campaign ends. You can get it through our official page 
If you have any question or problem, i invite you to our Annikken Andee Forum. We want to can create a community of passionate Andee users who can share their experience, voice their opinions and help each other out. We will also be there to assist if necessary.
if you have questions, problems or issues involving technical or non-technical aspect of things. We are gladly to hear them out. Contact us at andee@annikken.com.
Be sure to share/add/like/follow our facebook and twitter page if you want to receive the latest news or updates from us. 
www.facebook.com/annikkenandee
https://twitter.com/Annikken_Andee
Official Page : http://www.annikken.com/andee.html
Forum : http://annikken.yuku.com/
Email : andee@annikken.com


Featured On...




 
 
 

 

Annikken Andee - 

An Easy Link between Arduino and Android


Annikken Andee

What is Annikken Andee?

Annikken Andee is an Arduino Shield that lets you connect your Arduino to your Android phone via bluetooth easily. With the free Annikken Andee Library and Android App, you can create your very own monitor and control user interface on your Android Devices from the Arduino IDE. This simply means you are NOT required to develop any Android Apps at all. 

So how is it done?

Mount Annikken Andee on Arduino Uno, Arduino Mega or Arduino Leonardo.


Annikken Andee mounted on Arduino Uno

Download the Annikken Andee library for Arduino here, unpack the content and copy the "Andee" folder into Arduino IDE library folder. This library contains all the necessary functions to create the user interface on your Android Device.


The code segment(left) creates the data display on the Annikken Andee Android App (right)

 

Download and install the Annikken Andee Android Application from the Google Play Store. Connect your phone to your Arduino via the installed App and Voila! You now have an user interface for your Arduino on your phone!

Button input
Keyboard input
Scroll the row to see the hidden button
Roller shutter control UI

Simple monitor and control user interface
Display readings in graphical form

 

How does my Arduino talk to my Android Smartphones and Tablets?

Using Bluetooth 2.1. Simply pair and connect Annikken Andee with your Android devices just like you would with any other bluetooth devices. However, Annikken Andee is a Special Bluetooth Arduino shield with additional hardware/ICs and firmware inside to create this wonderful magic! 

Annikken Andee uses the FCC CE certified WT11i bluetooth module from Bluegiga. This module is capable of reaching distances of up to 350 meters line-of-sight module to module. For actual distance, it depends on the bluetooth chip of your Android device and also how/where Annikken Andee is being positioned.

Do I have to installed any App on my Android Devices?

Yes. You must first download the free Annikken Andee App from the Google Play. Your Android devices will be running this App in the foreground and the App will let you select which Annikken Andee/Arduino pair you want to work with... 


Select the Andee/Arduino pair to connect with

Connection established!

You mean I can connect to different Annikken Andee/Arduino Pairs?

Yes, all with the same Annikken Andee App on your Android Device. However, you can only connect to one Annikken Andee/Arduino Pair at a time. Your screen display/UI will change to whatever the particular Annikken Andee/Arduino Pair was programmed to. Below shows our Annikken Andee App on the same phone connected to two different Arduino/Andee at different instance.


Basketball game with the UI on the Android phone

Electronic safe with the UI on the Android phone

Is that an SD Card reader on your Annikken Andee?

Great observation! Yes you are right, that's an SD card reader. With an SD card, you can use it as a data storage for your Arduino application. You can also read and write to the SD card using functions from our Andee library for Arduino. Most importantly, you can use it to update Annikken Andee's firmware to the latest versions.

What are the Arduino variants that I can use?

Currently, Annikken Andee, as a shield, is designed to fit and work properly with Arduino Uno, Arduino Mega and Arduino Leonardo. It can work with Arduino Nano as well, but you need to connect the Arduino Nano's ICSP header with Annikken Andee and wire both their pin 8 together. Support for other Arduino boards/variants are currently being tested.

Can Annikken Andee work with additional Arduino shields?

Yes. Annikken Andee connects to Arduino using the ICSP header (On Arduino) and pin 8. The rest of the pins are available for you to use with shields or other components. The corresponding SPI pins of each Arduino platform should not be used as well. You can refer to individual Arduino page for the SPI pins.

What about my Android Smartphone and Tablets?

Yes. Annikken Andee can work with any Android Smartphone or Tablets as long as it has a working bluetooth with Android 4.0 Ice-Cream Sandwich and above.

*Update 11 Jul 13:
We are extending our App support to Gingerbread (API 10). It will be ready by the shipping date in August. 

What about my iPhone, and iPad?

We are currently working on an iOS version based on Bluetooth 4.0. We are expecting Annikken Andee for iOS to be released by the end of the year. If you are interested, please let us know by sending an email to andee@annikken.com and we will keep you updated on our development.

What about NFC?

The use of NFC tags simplify the pairing and connection process between Android device and Annikken Andee. Our Annikken Andee App is NFC ready. Simply tap you NFC-enabled phone or tablet to a preprogrammed tag and connection with Annikken Andee will be made. Simple as that! The tag is avaliable as a perk option. If you choose the option with NFC, we will preprogram a NFC tag for you.

Can I access the Smart phone Functions from Arduino?

Yes you can! Currently, you can access Smart phone functions such as sending SMS, create Notification and Text-to-Speech by calling the various functions from the Andee Library.

What is your Schedule like?

July 2013 – Indiegogo Campaign

August 2013 – Finalizing Hardware, Firmware and Apps

September 2013 – Production and Delivery to customers

How will we use the funds?

We NEED your help to get Anikken Andee into actual production! As we need to satisfy the minimum order quantities for production of Annikken Andee, the funds will be used to cover the production cost. A portion of the funds will also be used to the purchase Arduino Uno, SD cards and NFC Tags for the starter kits and accessory pack.

Our team needs your support to make Annikken Andee a reality. Every cent will be put into making Annikken Andee a better product, be it in the software or hardware department. Most importantly, we would like to make Annikken Andee avaliable to all Arduino users around the world.

I love your project! Can I share this on my Facebook/Twitter/Reddit/*wildcard*?

Of course you can! In fact we would love that you do exactly so. Share it with your friends, tell your co-worker about it. We believe that Annikken Andee will be beneficial not just to Arduino developers, but everyone else too. Now spread the words will ya? =D

How do I include the $20/$5 for International Shipping in my contribution?

In the contribution page, first select your perks. Then add $20/$5 to the stated amount below "How much would you like to contribute?"

What is the different between the $20 and $5 shipping fee?

If you pay $20 for the shipping, we will ship Annikken Andee to you via Fedex and it will takes 3-4 working days to reach your doorstep.  As for the $5 shipping, we will ship via Singpost as a registered parcel and it will take 7-10 working days.

About our Team...

We are a team of Hardware, Software and Design Engineers with a combined experience of more than 30 years in the field. Our Engineers have experience in designing and building entire control systems for Industrial Laser Machines, as well as design and fabricate other MCU-based/Arduino controllers using Wi-Fi, Bluetooth and ZigBee. We are proudly based in Singapore, the Southeast Asian Island city-state just slightly North of the Equator. 

Questions? Comments? Suggestions?

Email:andee@annikken.com

User Manual Download

Annikken Andee - Created and Designed in Singapore.

story:
I am a Chicago, USA, technology inventor. My passion for creating tinkling and creating new technological novelty products has been since I was 11 years old.  Decades later now I have increased my passion of inventing new products by creating working prototypes new technological inventions.  I am very passionate about these products and need funding help to produce them and market them to help share them with everyone!!!

_________________________________________________________________________

Every hour, day, week, month and year thousands of people die in automobile accidents due to improper use of cell phones in hand while driving. One of our new product innovations: Kangaroo Pouch Car Cell Phone Safety Holder is sure to help reduce accidents due to distracted driving while talking with cell phone in hand. .

Related Links:

http://www.ghsa.org/html/stateinfo/laws/cellphone_laws.html

http://www.nsc.org/safety_road/Distracted_Driving/Documents/State%20of%20the%20Nation.pdf

Below Pics of Kangaroo Pouch Car Cell Phone Safety Holder:

We are raising funds to purchase raw materials to mass produce the Kangaroo Pouch Car Cell Phone Safety Holder , then distribute the product nationally to major retail store chains, public safety organizations and schools. Our goal is help get our product to market that will ultimately help save lives.

story:
The Story

When we started thinking about using the Raspberry Pi in applications requiring a bit more reliable operation, we always had to face the same problems:

  • Power outages
  • Corrupted file systems or SD-cards
  • Brownouts
  • Inrush currents

As a solution to these problems, we have created the Juice4Halt module. It combines brownout protection and a short-term UPS for properly shutting down the Raspberry Pi. Instead of a conventional battery, the module uses two supercapacitors.

The advantages of using supercapacitors

  • wide temperature range
  • no maintenance
  • long lifetime
  • no mechanical contacts
  • uncomplicated transportation
  • no environmental issues

                                   Juice4Halt on Raspberry Pi, Model B+


                                    Juice4Halt on Raspberry Pi, Model B


The Performance

The Juice4Halt module is a supercapacitor based energy storage. Combined with a Raspberry Pi (Model B, OS Raspbian) it offers:

  • 1 minute backup time for a safe shutdown
  • 12 seconds protection against short-term power failure or brown-out
  • high reliability of operation with peripheral devices attached to the 5V supply output. No risk of voltage drops on the power rail (e.g. at hard drive start up)


How it works


For more information about how it works, download the datasheet or visit our project homepage.

The circuit diagram, as well as the software, is open source. The work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International License.


Communication with Raspberry Pi

The standard handshake between the Juice4Halt module (J4H) and the Raspberry Pi (RPi) requires the I2C-bus interface and the GPIO25 pin. There is a script file running in the RPi background. If you don't want to use the GPIO25 and the I2C-bus there are other options too (e.g. only GPIO25, only I2C-bus, UART, SPI) 

DC power connector

Type: Barrel power plug 0.7 x 2.35mm
e.g.: Digi-Key part number: CP-012-ND


Mounting

The Juice4Halt module is stacked on the Raspberry Pi board using a 2x13 pin stacking GPIO header:

a) Stacking height 13.6mm (e.g. Adafruit ID: 1112)

b) Stacking height 8.5mm (e.g. Samtec SSQ-120-03-F-D)

                                         Stacking header 13.6mm or 8.5mm

Operating in shock and vibration environments requires making use of the 3mm mounting hole. The mounting hole and the push-button share the same space on the board. So when using the mounting hole, the push-button option is not available. Additionally, the supercapacitors have to be fixed to withstand the environment influence.  

In embedded setups, the Juice4Halt module can be placed on a carrier board and soldered using the edge plated contacts at the sides of the module.


Supercapacitor assembly variants

There are several ways how to assemble the two supercapacitors:

  • Depending on the distance between the Juice4Halt board and the Raspberry Pi board, the supercapacitors can be assembled on the top side or on the bottom side of the board - whatever makes the two stacked boards more compact.  There are two types of GPIO headers which lead to different stacking heights (13.6mm or 8.5mm).

  stacking height 13.6mm

   stacking height 8.5mm


  • The assembly position of the supercapacitors is different for the Raspberry Pi B Model and B+ Model.

                     Bottom side: J4H for Model B and J4H for Model B+ 


                     Top side: J4H for Model B and J4H for Model B+

If you are not sure, no problem: You can choose the DIY version instead of the PLUG&PLAY version and solder the two supercapacitors yourself to fit exactly to your needs.

                                        J4H on Raspberry Pi, Model B animation


Personalize Your Juice4Halt

You like the Juice4Halt, but you would prefer using another pin for communication at the GPIO interface? Or do you want to have your own connectors assembled? No matter!

Just download the circuit diagram, choose the perk "Personalize Your Juice4Halt“ and tell us what components you want to have changed. We will modify your Juice4Halt and you don't have to solder the parts yourself.

There is just one condition: We have to review your change and we must agree with it. This is just to protect your project from failure.

And the components? We will cover the cost of materials up to a value of 50 cents. That means if you want to have a few resistors changed, we will not charge you for it. However, if you want to have a connector changed, we have to agree on the price beforehand.


   Juice4Halt - NAKED BOARD

  Juice4Halt - DIY

  Juice4Halt - PLUG&PLAY (Model B)

  Juice4Halt - PLUG&PLAY (Model B+)

In the video, we have used the version 1.0 prototype for the demonstration. In the pictures, we have used the final version 2.0 prototype. It works exactly the same way as version 1.0 does. 

More pictures


Why Indiegogo?


  • The Juice4Halt module is a new product originally suited for industrial and embedded applications. As we have noticed a lot of positive feedback from makers and hobbyists from all over the world, we decided to start this campaign to have direct contact with them.
  • We don't want to start mass production without knowing the demand on Juice4Halt. Indiegogo can help us to better understand and estimate the demand. The Juice4Halt module will retail for more than offered here in this campaign, so use this chance to get it for a special price.


Risks and Challenges

Financial risk

There is no financial risk in this campaign. We have completely funded the development and production of the prototypes.

Technical risk

As you can see in the video, the version 1.0 prototypes are working properly. There is a little technical risk related to the latest redesign of the board.

Demand risk

Since we couldn't find any related product on the market we could compare it to, we are not sure about the demand. From our point of view, this is our most significant risk.



Timescale

The estimated date of shipping the Juice4Halt modules to you: 

End of January 2015


Shipping, Customs and Taxes

All perks in this campaign include 20% VAT, unless otherwise expressly stated.
Shipment via registered mail by Slovak postal service:

  • EU: 3 to 5 days
  • USA: 5 to 7 days
  • Australia: 6 to 7 days

For shipments outside of the EU:

Please check with your country's custom's office to determine import duties and taxes. These are not included in the prices and are your responsibility. According to www.dutycalculator.com there are no taxes or custom's fees when shipped to the USA up to a value of $200. However, we can't guarantee this information.

The Juice4Halt module will be manufactured in the EU.


Safety and EMC Compliance

The module is supplied as a sub-assembly and is not subject to any EMC regulations. Since the user's end product must comply to EMC regulations (CE, FCC, RCM,Industry Canada....), we guarantee that the Juice4Halt module meets the EMC Directive 2004/108/EC which is mandatory for European CE marking. A test report by an accredited EMC testing lab will be attached here as soon as it becomes available.

The Juice4Halt module was designed for integration into a system with the Raspberry Pi. Before using it, it must be installed into a suitable enclosure. Before plugging it in, unplugging it,  or working on the module, the supercapacitors must be discharged.

The Low Voltage Directive 2006/95/EC is not applicable because the Juice4Halt module uses voltages far below 75V DC.


About Us

Nelectra s.r.o. is an innovative start-up situated in the Twin City Region of Vienna – Bratislava. We provide creative solutions in electronic circuit design based on our strong technical background.

Nelectra s.r.o. was founded in 2013 by Pavol Sedlacek, an electronic engineer with a focus on research and development.


The Next Steps

  • Juice4Halt adaptor for BeagleBone Black
  • Juice4Halt with Li-Ion battery support
  • Juice4Halt 5V lite version
  • Juice4Halt low-profile version

+new software releases with many interesting features. The software will be open source. You will have the possibility to modify it or you can code your own software.


Other Ways You Can Help

You want to help us but you can't contribute? You can do it by spreading the word about our campaign. Use the share tools at the bottom of this page.

story_txt:
The Story
 When we started thinking about using the Raspberry Pi in applications requiring a bit more reliable operation, we always had to face the same problems: 

Power outages
Corrupted file systems or SD-cards

Brownouts
Inrush currents


As a solution to these problems, we have created the Juice4Halt module. It combines brownout protection and a short-term UPS for properly shutting down the Raspberry Pi. Instead of a conventional battery, the module uses two supercapacitors. 
The advantages of using supercapacitors

wide temperature range

no maintenance
long lifetime
no mechanical contacts
uncomplicated transportation
no environmental issues



                                   Juice4Halt on Raspberry Pi, Model B+

                                   
 Juice4Halt on Raspberry Pi, Model B
The Performance

The Juice4Halt module is a supercapacitor based energy storage. Combined with a Raspberry Pi (Model B, OS Raspbian) it offers:


1 minute backup time for a safe shutdown 


12 seconds protection against short-term power failure or brown-out 
high reliability of operation with peripheral devices attached to the 5V supply output. No risk of voltage drops on the power rail (e.g. at hard drive start up) 


How it works

For more information about how it works, download the datasheet or visit our project homepage. The circuit diagram, as well as the software, is open source. The work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International License.

Communication with Raspberry Pi
The standard handshake between the Juice4Halt module (J4H) and the Raspberry Pi (RPi) requires the I2C-bus interface and the GPIO25 pin. There is a script file running in the RPi background. If you don't want 
to use the GPIO25 and the I2C-bus there are other options too (e.g. only GPIO25, only I2C-bus, UART, SPI)  
DC power connectorType: Barrel power plug 0.7 x 2.35mme.g.: Digi-Key part number: CP-012-ND
Mounting
The Juice4Halt module is stacked on the Raspberry Pi board using a 2x13 pin stacking GPIO header:
a) Stacking height 13.6mm (e.g. Adafruit ID: 1112)
b) Stacking height 8.5mm (e.g. Samtec SSQ-120-03-F-D)
                                         Stacking header 13.6mm or 8.5mmOperating in shock and vibration environments requires making use of the 3mm mounting hole. The mounting hole and the push-button share the same space on the board. So when using the mounting hole, the push-button option is not available. Additionally, the supercapacitors have to be fixed to withstand the environment influence.   In embedded setups, the Juice4Halt module can be placed on a carrier board and soldered using the edge plated contacts at the sides of the module. 

Supercapacitor assembly variants
There are several ways how to assemble the two supercapacitors: 
Depending on the distance between the Juice4Halt board and the Raspberry Pi board, the supercapacitors can be assembled on the top side or on the bottom side of the board - whatever makes the two stacked boards more compact.  There are two types of GPIO headers which lead to different stacking heights (13.6mm or 8.5mm). 


   stacking height 13.6mm

   stacking height 8.5mm


The assembly position of the supercapacitors is different for the Raspberry Pi B Model and B+ Model. 



                     Bottom side: J4H for Model B and J4H for Model B+ 

                    
Top side: J4H for Model B and J4H for Model B+



If you are not sure, no problem: You can choose the DIY version instead of the PLUG&PLAY version and solder the two supercapacitors yourself to fit exactly to your needs.



                                        J4H on Raspberry Pi, Model B animation





Personalize Your Juice4Halt


You like the Juice4Halt, but you would
prefer using another pin for communication at the GPIO interface? Or
do you want to have your own connectors assembled? No matter!
Just download the circuit diagram,
choose the perk "Personalize Your Juice4Halt“ and tell us what
components you want to have changed. We will modify your Juice4Halt
and you don't have to solder the parts yourself.
There is just one condition: We have to
review your change and we must agree with it. This is just to protect
your project from failure.


And the components? We will cover the cost
of materials up to a value of 50 cents. That means if you want to have a few resistors changed, we will not charge you for it. However, if you want to
have a connector changed, we have to agree on the price beforehand.

   Juice4Halt - NAKED BOARD

  Juice4Halt - DIY

  Juice4Halt - PLUG&PLAY (Model B)

  Juice4Halt - PLUG&PLAY (Model B+)
In the video, we have used the version 1.0 prototype for the 
demonstration. In the pictures, we have used the final version 2.0 
prototype. It works exactly the same way as version 1.0 does.  
More pictures

Why Indiegogo?


The Juice4Halt module is a new product
originally suited for industrial and embedded applications. As we
have noticed a lot of positive feedback from makers and hobbyists from all over the
world, we decided to start this campaign to have direct contact with
them. 
We don't want to
start mass production without knowing the demand on Juice4Halt. 
 Indiegogo can help us to better understand and estimate the demand. The Juice4Halt module will retail for more than offered here in this campaign, so use this chance to get it for a special price. 


Risks and Challenges


Financial risk
There is no financial risk in this
campaign. We have completely funded the development and production of
the prototypes.


Technical risk  

As you can see in the video, the version 1.0
prototypes are working properly. There is a little technical risk related to the latest redesign of the board. 



Demand risk
Since we couldn't find any related
product on the market we could compare it to, we are not sure about the demand.  From our
point of view, this is our most significant risk. 
Timescale
The estimated date of shipping the
Juice4Halt modules to you: 
End of January 2015





Shipping, Customs and Taxes

All
perks in this campaign include 20% VAT, unless otherwise expressly stated.Shipment
via registered mail by Slovak postal service:
EU:
3 to 5 days
USA:
5 to 7 days
Australia:
6 to 7 days



For
shipments outside of the EU: 
Please check with your country's
custom's office to determine import duties and taxes. These are not
included in the prices and are your responsibility. According to
www.dutycalculator.com
there are no taxes or custom's fees when shipped to the USA up to a value
of $200. However, we can't guarantee this information.
The Juice4Halt module will be manufactured in the EU.







Safety and EMC Compliance


The module is supplied as a sub-assembly
and is not subject to any EMC regulations. Since the user's end product
must comply to EMC regulations (CE, FCC, RCM,Industry Canada....), we guarantee that the Juice4Halt module meets the EMC Directive 2004/108/EC
which is mandatory for European CE marking. A test report by an accredited EMC testing lab will be attached here as soon as it becomes available.


The Juice4Halt module was designed for
integration into a system with the Raspberry Pi.  Before using it, it
must be installed into a suitable enclosure. Before plugging it in,
unplugging it,  or working on the module, the supercapacitors must be
discharged. 



The Low Voltage Directive 2006/95/EC
is not applicable because the Juice4Halt module uses voltages far
below 75V DC.













About Us


Nelectra s.r.o. is an innovative start-up situated in the Twin City
Region of Vienna – Bratislava. We provide creative solutions in
electronic circuit design based on our strong technical background.
Nelectra s.r.o. was founded in 2013 by
Pavol Sedlacek, an electronic engineer with a focus on research and
development. 



The Next Steps



Juice4Halt adaptor for BeagleBone Black
Juice4Halt with Li-Ion battery support
Juice4Halt 5V lite version
Juice4Halt low-profile version



+new software releases with many
interesting features. The software will be open source. You will have the possibility to modify it or you can code your own software. 





Other Ways You Can Help


You want to help us but you can't
contribute? You can do it by spreading the word about our campaign.
Use the share tools at the bottom of this page.



Wrote About Juice4Halt


Hackaday.com - Supercapacitors for the Raspberry Pi


Embedds.com - Raspberry Pi power supply with backup solution
LinuxGizmos.com - Raspberry Pi supercapacitor micro-UPS seeks funding

story:
Campaign STOPPED - redesign



Short Summary

Everyone knows the uncomfortable feeling when discharged cell phone or other portable electronics.

Today there are many options, such as external battery. External battery is fine, but you always leave it at home, when you need it most.
Therefore, I created ''Solar charge bracelet'. Solar rechargeable external battery inside the bracelet, which is still with me. Also, if it is connected to the PC, it behaves like a 8/16/32 or 64Gb Usb flash drive. 


  • It's really useful thing, I use it every day
  • If there is no sun, you can charge bracelet using the PC or USB wall adapter

www.solarchargebracelet.com


      Why we need money?

      • Making mold castings
      • Buy material (batteries, electronics and other things needed for manufacturing)
      • Consider series production, according to the number of orders
      • Marketing

      New prototype render

        (more rubber colors available)



        New slim prototype




          Old prototype



                Technical details

                •  2430mAh li-ion battery - it's lot of energy for your device

                • On video is bracelet from 3D printed ABS plastic, it's only prototype, in final it will be from beautiful shiny injection plastic. 3 size versions will be available - large, medium and small. 
                • Solar panel has 0.5W and 2V = 250mA, for full charge bracelet (2430mAh), only from sollar panel, charging time is about ~10hours. It is rather a emergency solution.
                • USB female output for connect any cables (micro usb, mini usb, Apple 30pin connector for ipod, lightning connector etc...)
                • Output is 5V and 1.2A (iPhone supported)


                Availability

                You can choose from lot of 7 case colours and combine it with  7 colours of data cables.

                The expected price per pcs will be about is

                8GB version - only £99

                16GB version - £115

                32GB version - £125

                64GB version - £155

                On every version is arm mounted data cable for FREE.

                First bracelets will be ready available later this year 2014 !
                WORLDWIDE FREE SHIPPING !!!


                You can choose iPhone (lightning connector) or Android (micro usb connector) model


                  Aluminium prototype version



                  3D printed prototype version


                  Other prototypes

                  3D model (render)

                  Special thanks

                  I want give special thanks to company

                  3dquickprinting.co.uk who printed 3D bracelet model for me, for free. It's still here companies with good heart. One more time - THANK YOU.

                  Produce by 

                                         www.grandpatechnology.com

story:
TOGETHER we could speed this process up!!!

Awesome! Now you have the opportunity to receive funding and tips from more than 2.5 billion people with just a few clicks.

PaperLike is an exclusive smart & secure social payment service that allows you to obtain not only virtual support “likes” in gratitude, but also to get support in the simplest and most direct way - byreceiving funds from anyone, anywhere, at any time. 

Receive PaperLikes directly from your blog, website, forum, newsletter, email, feed of comments, social network profile or page, chats, generally from any online platform.


Amazing! Clicking on the Personal PaperLike Button or link, or scanning the qr code, redirects your supporter to a payment window where they can select between payment amounts of$1, $3, $5 or a custom value. Users can also type a message to the recipient and can choose one of 4 payment methods (Paypal, Credit and Debit Cards, Mobile Payment or PaperLike Account and send PaperLike).

All transactions are stored in a magic user's area which keeps track of all notes and messages from supporters, payment methods used, status of payments, the total amount available for payout, and of course has the magic PAY ME button.


All accumulated funds can be withdrawn in cash from any bank or ATM worldwide via the personal PaperLike MasterCard, which will be shipped to you absolutely free.

We do appreciate your support of smart innovations!

Thank you very much!

Contributors get a personal 'THANK YOU' post on the website thanks wall page! Moreover, the money you have donated will go to organizations who cannot afford to buy PaperLike!

Because you're awesome and your contribution means a lot!

You will get:

• a lifetime PaperLike account with a limit of $100 withdrawal per month.

• a personal PaperLike MasterCard

• a possibility to receive: $1, $3 or $5 donations. 

You will get the exclusive opportunity to start using PaperLike starting with the Beta version, at least 3-5 months before the official version goes live!

You will get:

• a lifetime PaperLike account with an UNLIMITED monthly withdrawal amount.

• a personal PaperLike MasterCard.

• the possibility to receive UNLIMITED donations. 

You will get the exclusive opportunity to start using PaperLike starting with the Beta version, at least 3-5 months before the official version goes live!

You will get:

• a lifetime PaperLike account with an UNLIMITED monthly withdrawal amount.

• a personal PaperLike MasterCard.

• the possibility to receive UNLIMITED donations.

• choose the color for your PaperLike window. 

You will get the exclusive opportunity to start using PaperLike starting with the Beta version, at least 3-5 months before the official version goes live!

You will get:

• a lifetime PaperLike account with an UNLIMITED monthly withdrawal amount.

• a personal PaperLike MasterCard.

• the possibility to receive UNLIMITED donations.

• choose the color for your PaperLike window and your background - so everyone will see the picture you decide to upload. 

You will get the exclusive opportunity to start using PaperLike starting with the Beta version, at least 3-5 months before the official version goes live!

You will get:

• a lifetime PaperLike account with an UNLIMITED monthly withdrawal amount.

• a personal PaperLike MasterCard.

• the possibility to receive UNLIMITED donations,

• choose the color for your PaperLike window and your background - so everyone will see the picture you decide to upload.

You will be able to invite 10 of your friends to join the group.

Plus the exclusive opportunity to start using PaperLike starting with the Beta version, at least 3-5 months before the official version goes live!

You will get:

• a lifetime PaperLike account with an UNLIMITED monthly withdrawal amount.

• a personal PaperLike MasterCard.

• the possibility to receive UNLIMITED donations.

• choose the color for your PaperLike window and background.

• the possibility to invite an UNLIMITED number of friends to join your group.

Plus the exclusive opportunity to start using PaperLike starting with the Beta version, at least 3-5 months before the official version goes live!


We know you are the ONE that can change the world! 

Through our Referral Thank You Program, we want to give you a PaperLike Account for FREE, in exchange for taking a few minutes to help spread the word... 

At the end of our Indiegogo campaign, we will reward you for your referrals of anyone who opens a PaperLike account and spends at least $15 during the campaign. 

For example:

story:
What Makes KABLAM so special?

KABLAM is a custom specialized polymer screen protector, that protects your devices from any scenario that it needs to! We only use the highest quality of materials to protect your most valuable devices. With only .26mm thickness, you will have the best protection on your device's screen. We are manufactured right here in the U.S.A! 

Some of the features include:

  • Multi Anti-Shock Absorption layers
  • Anti-Fingerprint
  • Crystal Clear Transparency
  • Anti-Scratch (9 hardness)
  • Sensitive Touch
  • Self-Adsorbed

 KABLAM is also the first customizable screen protector for any electronic device on the market. Yes, that's right, any device and any size! That includes watches, phones, MP3 players, tablets, and cameras! There are endless possibilities as long as it fits inside of our specialized laser cutter machine!  

Perks

After you select your perk, we will send out a survey asking for the make and model of your device. At the end of our campaign, we will produce your customized screen protector right here in California. 

 With your support we can... 

1. Create the retail packaging needed 

2. Develop new products and packages that encompass a wider range of applications.

3. Spread the word about this amazing technology

Thanks for you help! We would truly appreciate if you could share this page with a friend or family member. If you have any questions or would just like to chat please free to contact us. 


FAQ

Q: Can the Kablam Screen Protector fit any device?

A: Yes, our Kablam screen protector can be customized to fit any size watch, phone, tablet, camera, and mp3 player.


Q: Can we pre-order an iPhone 6 screen protector?

A: Of course! If your getting a new device or preordered something that hasn't come out yet, we would love to make that screen protector for you. We just have to wait for the specifications to be released.


Q: How come your prices are so cheap?

A: We have cut out costs for this product in order to bring you amazing quality at an affordable price.

1) We use a laser cutter to cut each screen protector, which allows us to offer screen protectors for any device. We don't have to purchase large quantities of screen protectors, which dramatically lowers our prices.

2) We are offering Kablam screen protectors at a wholesale price.

3) We cut out all the little things that bring up your costs. We decided to go away with press release companies, fancy expensive videos (yes we understand our video might not be the best quality out there), and expensive web design.


Q: How can we order multiple screen protectors?

A: If you would like more then one item, adjust your pledge amount to the total of all the items you want. We will take care of the rest by contacting you. 


Q: Can I add a screen protector to the back of my iPhone?

A: Absolutely!! Just pledge an extra $12 and you got full coverage!

A: We have cut out costs for this product in order to bring you amazing quality at an affordable price.
1) We use a laser cutter to cut each screen protector, which allows us to offer screen protectors for any device. We don't have to purchase large quantities of screen protectors, which dramatically lowers our prices.
2) We are offering Kablam screen protectors at a wholesale price.
3) We cut out all the little things that bring up your costs. We decided to go away with press release companies, fancy expensive videos (yes we understand our video might not be the best quality out there), and expensive web design.

Q: How can we order multiple screen protectors?
A: If you would like more then one item, adjust your pledge amount to the total of all the items you want. We will take care of the rest by contacting you. 

Q: Can I add a screen protector to the back of my iPhone?
A: Absolutely!! Just pledge an extra $12 and you got full coverage!

story:
Privacy.  It’s a human right.  At Jumble we believe privacy matters so we’re simplifying email encryption. 

Your personal information is gathered, collated and distributed in an alarming number of ways through a growing number of technologies.  Jumble is DISRUPTING the collection of data and attachments contained in your emails through its new email encryption service.  You use your existing email account as normal but layer Jumble in on top to CREATE A BARRIER between your data and the surveillance, the hackers and the corporate spies.

Have you ever sent an email that contained sensitive information, like your bank details?  Were you ever worried that someone else could see them?  Or are you tired of other awkward and clunky ways to protect your information?  Jumble is an easy to use email encryption product for EVERYONE.  We developed Jumble because we passionately believe that privacy matters.

We are a self-funded start up that feels strongly that YOU should have the choice to protect your data using a seamless end-to-end encryption product from within your existing email account.

Our product is FREE and we need YOUR donations to keep going and support other platforms and more users.


Why is it needed?

Emails and their attachments can be intercepted, read and collected.  This is an abuse of our human rights.  We don’t know what is being done with this collected information but the possibilities are frightening….and that’s before you consider what could be done if the information were to fall in to the wrong hands.



Orwellian predictions of the public having absolutely no privacy and being subject to round the clock government surveillance as a means to control citizens have come to pass.  It’s time to take back your data and take back your privacy.

Google, Yahoo and Microsoft are all fond of targeted ads.  These ads can only be targeted because the webmail provider is reading your emails.


Email accounts are regularly hacked and device theft is on the rise both of which compromise the security of your data.  Jumble adds another level of protection to your data giving you peace of mind even if your email password is by-passed.

The answer is email encryption however up until now it has been a difficult and clumsy solution to use, which most everyday email users don’t persevere with and as a result  most people’s emails remain unprotected and open to interception and attack.


We think your privacy is as important as the big companies and we want to give everyone the chance to protect themselves.

Why do we need YOUR Support?

Our product has been in public beta since the summer for Gmail via Google Chrome and an iPhone app but we don’t want to stop there.  We want to bring our product to even more people – we want EVERYONE to be able to protect themselves. 


We need your help to build out our Outlook, Hotmail and Yahoo! Mail platforms. 


We need your help to provide iPhone and Android support for all those platforms. 


We need your help to build out the encryption of ALL of your attachments - photos, text files, documents…whatever you want to send we want to protect it for you!

Our beta product for Gmail works but is a little bit of an ugly duckling right now – we want to make it beautiful!  So when we’re finished building everything mentioned above we’d like to give you the user experience you deserve by updating our website, platform and app.



So with your help and support we can bring email encryption to the everyday email user and help them to protect themselves against attacks, targeted emails and government surveillance.


What we can do with YOUR help

We need $1,000,000 to do the following:


The Impact

The online trend is moving in one direction only.  Businesses have been moving online for years, with the rise of social media and mobile apps individuals are moving entire parts of their lives online.  Where the masses go the rest will follow.  Crime, surveillance and advertising are all online and increasing their presence with every passing day.  We want to help you to protect your data and maintain some privacy in your online life.  It’s one thing to share updates and photos on social media but when you bank online you expect absolute privacy – shouldn’t you expect the same with your emails?


Other ways you can help

We appreciate donations from as little as $1, the choice is yours, however we do understand that not everyone is in a position to contribute financially but that’s not the only way to support us - please spread the word and tell everyone that you can about Jumble and our campaign for privacy by sharing this page, check us out on Facebook/Twitter, download our iPhone/iPad APP or by visiting www.jumble.io

We’re also looking for developers to join Jumble, if you think privacy matters and want to work with us then email us at hello@jumble.io

Privacy Pants?

Not sure what exactly they are? Have a look here and see if you would prefer a pair of PRIVACY PANTS or simply use Jumble? 


Jumble in the News


FAQs

How is Jumble funded so far?

So far it’s bootstrapped by its founders.  We believe privacy matters so much we’ve put our life-savings on it! 

How can I reach your team if I have questions?

For questions related to the product email us at hello@jumble.io, for questions relating to our Indiegogo campaign feel free to email us at indiegogo@jumble.io. 

How does Jumble work?

If you want to understand how Jumble works click here to find out more.

How do I get Jumbling?

Installing Jumble is so simple we're sure that you won't need this section. But, just in case, follow this step-by-step tutorial to get Jumble ready and boost your email privacy.

Is Jumble free?

Yes, Jumble is free for all.

Will using Jumble really protect me from hackers, targeted advertising and government surveillance?

We believe our three lines of defence provides piece of mind that your data is protected and safe by the best available technology that Jumble seamlessly provides:


Got a problem contributing?

Please contact support@indiegogo.com.

story:
For all of you who would like to buy the German version of WallCharger please visit our ebay shop ( http://www.stores.ebay.de/TSSTechGermany?-rdc=1 )!

Für alle, die die Deutsche Version des WallChargers kaufen möchten, bitte besuchen Sie unseren ebay shop ( http://www.stores.ebay.de/TSSTechGermany?-rdc=1...)!

These are the international WallCharger sockets available

Delivery times:

Since we are part of the InDemand program of Indiegogo it became quite complicated to adapt the delivery times to reality. Please look here for actual delivery times per type:

  • German type: Immediate shipment
  • UK type: Orders will be shipped out in April
  • USA type: Immediate shipment
  • French type: Immediate shipment

Status of update: March 2015 the 09th


  • The power outlet always remains free for use, thanks to integrated USB Charger Ports. That's a big advantage if you don't have many wall sockets (2 flies with one stone)

  • Where is my charging device? Forget those annoying and time consuming searches. WallCharger is always at the same place, in one room or in all rooms of your house or apartment – living room, guest room, kitchen, childrens room - wherever you are going to install WallCharger
  • Easy connection with tablet or smartphone – on the contrary to charging systems where the smart device is fixed in an upright position. The upright position can cause damage, over a period of time, to the plug or device port through rash movements

  • Our WallCharger is only slightly more expensive compared to standard wall sockets but offer an up-to-date charging infrastructure

  • Classy and minimalistic design. Ugly clutter of charging devices will be a thing of the past!



You can't find your charger or it's faulty? No hassle. Just connect your USB-Cable directly into the USB-Port and off you go.


WallCharger has 2 power sockets and 2 USB-Ports for charging. Having to have an adapter or constantly plugging-in and plugging-out to get a socket free, is a thing of the past.



German Version: TÜV, EMCUK Version: SEMKO, EMCUS Version: ETL, CETL, FCC

Dimensions UK-1: 86 x 86 x 30mm

How many do you need? For business and/or at home? We are offering a variety of Perks which should cover all your needs. Save money and ask friends and colleagues to buy with you. Order in quantity to take full advantage of our bonus WallChargers.

What is the retail price of WallCharger?

Euro 24.95 (Shipping not included)

What should I add for shipping? 

Absolutely nothing! We have included shipping in the total sum of money shown in the Perks above. We did this to make ordering easier for you and help us react faster if you need any changes made to your order.



What is the retail price of WallCharger?

Euro 21.95 (Shipping not included)

What should I add for shipping? 

Absolutely nothing! We have included shipping in the total sum of money shown in the Perks above. We did this to make ordering easier for you and help us react faster if you need any changes made to your order.



What is the retail price of WallCharger?

Euro 19.95 (Shipping not included).

What should I add for shipping?? 

Absolutely nothing! We have included shipping in the total sum of money shown in the Perks above. We did this to make ordering easier for you and help us react faster if you need any changes made to your order.


  • Do you ship to all countries?  Yes, but only to regular postal addresses and only within countries of EU (European Union) and USA/Canada. All the other countries in the world upon inquiry
  • Is shipping included in the price?  Yes 
  • Do you offer a contact address?  Yes, of course. We would like to hear from you via  wallcharger@tsssolar.com . Don't hesitate to contact us!
  • I'd like to write about Wall Charger. Where do I send my media inquiry? For press related items please send us a message via press@tsssolar.com
  • Which Payment types do you offer? PayPal and payment via creditcard with Paypal and without a PayPal account
  • How do I contribute via PayPal? To make a contribution via Paypal, the contributor can either sign in to a PayPal account or select "Payment with creditcard" without signing in. If you use "Payment with a creditcard" you can use a credit card without having a PayPal account
  • When is the payment charged to the contributor's account?  Contributions made by credit card are debited from the contributors card immediately

Which Payment types do you offer? PayPal and payment via creditcard with Paypal and without a PayPal account 


How do I contribute via PayPal? To make a contribution via Paypal, the contributor can either sign in to a PayPal account or select "Payment with creditcard" without signing in. If you use "Payment with a creditcard" you can use a credit card without having a PayPal account

When is the payment charged to the contributor's account?  Contributions made by credit card are debited from the contributors card immediately

story:
GunBoxLive™ Saves Lives

GunBoxLive™ is a wireless, energy efficient portable personal security device that alerts you if a case is tampered with, opened, or stolen. Alerts are delivered to your computer, tablet, cell phone or iPhone/Android smartphone through simple, user-friendly apps. GunBoxLive™ is easy to set up, gives you unprecedented awareness of status of your case and the valuables in it. GunBoxLive™ reduces the risk of unauthorized access or theft.

We envisioned GunBoxLive™ with the secure storage of firearms in mind. We provide locking cases without the worry of lockout due to technical failure. You can also install the GunBoxLive™ device into most existing gun cases! 

The bottom line, we help you “Protect the Ones You Love” and “Protect the Things You Love” and provide peace of mind at home or on the go. We believe that the GunBoxLive™ Smart Case will improve security and save lives.


GunBoxLive™ will save lives by preventing or interrupting actions that lead to tragic consequences. GunBoxLive™ alert notifications transmit critical information to gun owners whenever someone gains access to their firearm. In addition, the information provided by GunBoxLive™ apps can be used to increase public awareness and initiate lockdowns in specific areas or neighborhoods where stolen weapons are reported. 

Firearm prevalence, inadequate and unsafe storage are factors associated with the high rates of unintentional firearm deaths and thefts. There are over 60 million firearms privately owned in the US. Only a tiny fraction of those are stored in a way that provides their owners with the security of knowing the instant their firearm has been tampered with or stolen.

•Every 25 minutes someone is unintentionally shot

•$375,000,000 worth of firearms are stolen a year

•More than 1,000,000 car break-ins per year

•80% of stolen firearms are stolen away from home

•50% of youth suicides are committed with guns

•Children and teens steal relatives' cars to joy ride everyday

•Millions of dollars in valuables are stolen every day

  • Of youths who have committed suicide with firearms, 82% obtained the firearm from their home, usually a parent’s firearm (The National Violent Injury Statistics System, p. 2).
  • When storage status was noted, about two-thirds of the firearms had been stored unlocked (The National Violent Injury Statistics System, p. 2).
  • Among the remaining cases in which the firearms had been locked, the youth knew the combination or where the key was kept or broke into the cabinet (The National Violent Injury Statistics System, p. 2).

GunBoxLive™ is an evolution in security that all responsible firearm owners should have. GunBoxLive™ gives you the peace of mind that your firearms are secure and accounted for every second of every day! With 20,000 unintentional shootings and 500,000 firearm thefts a year in America, it makes sense to upgrade to GunBoxLive™. However, this is just part of the story; GunBoxLive™ is about responsibility!

Instant alerts provide a deterrent and intervention for children and teens who know their parents are notified immediately if they even move the case. These cases can also be used for other sensitive items requiring security such as prescription medications, bicycles, boats, jewelry, spare keys, and other valuables.

We decided to use cell transmission technology for a number of reasons, but the main reason is that we feel this is the best way to stay connected with your cases. Cell technology is somewhat more expensive than other radio transmitters; however, it is very reliable and convenient.
We realize that people are very mobile and so are their valuables. We want to offer our customers the best possible coverage that will cater to almost any scenario.

"GunBoxLive gives you peace of mind and is a great product! I have seen the demo work and it is incredible how easy it is to set up. I am a firearms owner and feel that all responsible firearms owners should have GunBoxLive!"

 -Dan Ramirez, Military Veteran, Business Owner

"For me GunBoxLive is the ideal solution to the problem of gun theft and safely securing firearms properly from unintended use of children. If I would of had GunBoxLive 5 years ago I would of avoided the loss of 2 very expensive hand guns." 

-Stuart Williams, Hunter, Columnist

"Being a staunch supporter of the 2nd Amendment, GunBoxLive is the best way to protect my rights, my family and unintended misuse of a firearm. We do have the right to bear arms, but we also have an equal if not greater responsibility to protect that right and those around us." 

-Fred Thornes, Active Outdoorsman, Entrepreneur

  • Patent Pending
  • Device installation in seconds for almost any brand hard gun case
  • Wireless connectivity
  • Long life rechargeable battery
  • Discreet design & minimum space needed for your existing case
  • Keeps you aware of your firearms and valuables 24 hours a day

Just upload your info on the app or website on where you want the alerts to go (cell phone and/or email) and you’re ready! Turn on device and enjoy!

We do not need the serial number of your firearm or item you are securing in GunBoxLive™ to activate your service.


We have spent months testing, more importantly, using prototypes and refining and acquiring information from firearms owners, child access prevention networks, top mobile design engineers and software developers to make the user experience simple and reliable.

GunBoxLive™ has been designed and prototyped in Seattle, WA and we plan to manufacture via a trusted partner with operations based in Seattle and Shenzhen. We realize that whilst we're reinventing the gun case this doesn't mean we have to
reinvent the manufacturing process.

We are using as many standard gun cases and wireless transmittal components as possible. These components have undergone rigorous testing and stood the test of time. We are also very excited to create our own GunBoxLive™ customized computer board as "the brains" of this project. Also, fully featured apps will be available on the App Store® and Android.

We have designed, redesigned and reimagined GunBoxLive™ numerous times during the past 15 months—pouring countless hours into understanding and improving the user experience, and incorporating feedback from gun owners, moms and dads, retailers, doctors, students, hunters, truckers, and techies. We are in our final, urgent push to bring GunBoxLive™ to the world.

This campaign is seeking $100,000—crucial funding that will allow us to:

  • Complete regulatory certifications
  • Finalize product design
  • Gain critical momentum that will allow us to deliver GunBoxLive™ at a reasonable price.
  • Begin production—GunBoxLive™ cases for guns and SecureBoxLive™ for jewelry, tablets, cameras, wine, and watches – anything that fits!

Storage and operating range for GunBoxLive™ cases and module:
–40°C ~ +85°C


  • External Dimension (inches) (L*W*D) 18.6 * 16.3 * 8.5
  • Internal Dimension (L*W*D) 17.3 * 13.6 * 7.5
  • Type Portable
  • Waterproof IP67
  • Weight 4.7

  • Waterproof, crush-proof and dust-proof
  • Open cell core with solid wall design -strong, lightweight
  • 3-Fold down handles
  • Interior Dimensions (inches) (L*W*D): 44.6 * 13.6 * 5.2
  • Easy open double throw latches
  • Durable wheels for easy transport

GunBoxLive™ MD3G is perfect for use with third party and gun manufacturer cases.

What will happen when GunBoxLive is accessed?
GunBoxLive will alert you or the person you have included in alert instructions that the firearm was accessed.

What happens when the firearm is put back into GunBoxLive?
GunBoxLive will send an alert that the firearm was replaced.

What happens if there is no activity for a long period of time, will the box communicate with me?
Yes, GunBoxLive will periodically send you “I am still alive” and you can review functional reports online for your peace of mind that your firearm is secure.

How long will the battery last?
Expected battery life is about 1 year depending on use. The MD3G device will let you know when it needs to be recharged. Charging is simple through the GunBoxLive™ USB interface.

What if my firearm is stolen?
If your firearm is stolen go to www.gunboxlive.com or access your app on your smartphone to log in and click on the stolen gun tab. Input stolen gun serial number and click send. Your stolen firearm will instantly upload on the stolen weapon registry database.

Are there monthly charges for GunBoxLive™ ?
Your first year subscription is included in the purchase price. You will be able to renew your subscription for 1 year at $60, 2 years at $50/yr or 3 years at $40/yr.

Why is GunBoxLive™ Cellular based?
We've been told by firearms owners 1) they need the mobile security and 2) that when the Wi-Fi is down, that is when you need security and information the most. We believe cellular is the most reliable way to give consistent service where it is needed most.

Do I have to provide my gun's serial number?
No, the information you give us is up to you and under your control. Providing the serial number does give you an easy method to add your gun to the stolen gun database if it is stolen, but it is not required.

How do I receive notifications and alerts?
You will receive alerts to the smart phone, computer, or email of your choice. With GunBoxLive™ you can also add additional people to your list to receive notifications.

If you have any further questions, please don't hesitate to contact us.

in valuables are stolen every day


Of youths who have committed suicide with firearms, 82% obtained the firearm from their home, usually a parent’s firearm (The National Violent Injury Statistics System, p. 2).
When storage status was noted, about two-thirds of the firearms had been stored unlocked (The National Violent Injury Statistics System, p. 2).
Among the remaining cases in which the firearms had been locked, the youth knew the combination or where the key was kept or broke into the cabinet (The National Violent Injury Statistics System, p. 2).


GunBoxLive™ is an evolution in security that all responsible firearm owners should have. GunBoxLive™ gives you the peace of mind that your firearms are secure and accounted for every second of every day! With 20,000 unintentional shootings and 500,000 firearm thefts a year in America, it makes sense to upgrade to GunBoxLive™. However, this is just part of the story; GunBoxLive™ is about responsibility! 
Instant alerts
provide a deterrent and intervention for children and teens who know their
parents are notified immediately if they even move the case. These cases can also be used for other sensitive items requiring security such as prescription medications, bicycles, boats, jewelry, spare keys, and other valuables.




We decided to use cell transmission technology for a number of reasons, but the main reason is that we feel this is the best way to stay connected with your cases. Cell technology is somewhat more expensive than other radio transmitters; however, it is very reliable and convenient.
We realize that people are very mobile and so are their valuables. We want to offer our customers the best possible coverage that will cater to almost any scenario.




"GunBoxLive gives you peace of mind and is a great product! I have seen the demo work and it is incredible how easy it is to set up. I am a firearms owner and feel that all responsible firearms owners should have GunBoxLive!"
 -Dan Ramirez, Military Veteran, Business Owner





"For me GunBoxLive is the ideal solution to the problem of gun theft and safely securing firearms properly from unintended use of children. If I would of had GunBoxLive 5 years ago I would of avoided the loss of 2 very expensive hand guns." 
-Stuart Williams, Hunter, Columnist





"Being a staunch supporter of the 2nd Amendment, GunBoxLive is the best way to protect my rights, my family and unintended misuse of a firearm.  We do have the right to bear arms, but we also have an equal if not greater responsibility to protect that right and those around us." 
-Fred Thornes, Active Outdoorsman, Entrepreneur



Patent Pending
Device installation in seconds for almost any brand hard gun case
Wireless connectivity
Long life rechargeable battery
Discreet design & minimum space needed for your existing case
Keeps you aware of your firearms and valuables 24 hours a day
Just upload your info on the app or website on where you want the alerts to go (cell phone and/or email) and you’re ready! Turn on device and enjoy!We do not need the serial number of your firearm or item you are securing in GunBoxLive™ to activate your service.
We have spent months testing, more importantly, using prototypes and refining and acquiring information from firearms owners, child access prevention networks, top mobile design engineers and software developers to make the user experience simple and reliable.
GunBoxLive™ has been designed and prototyped in Seattle, WA and we plan to manufacture via a trusted partner with operations based in Seattle and Shenzhen. We realize that whilst we're reinventing the gun case this doesn't mean we have toreinvent the manufacturing process. We are using as many standard gun cases and wireless transmittal components as possible. These components have undergone rigorous testing and stood the test of time. We are also very excited to create our own GunBoxLive™ customized computer board as "the brains" of this project. Also, fully featured apps will be available on the App Store® and Android.

We have designed, redesigned and reimagined GunBoxLive™ numerous times during the past 15 months—pouring countless hours into understanding and improving the user experience, and incorporating feedback from gun owners, moms and dads, retailers, doctors, students, hunters, truckers, and techies. We are in our final, urgent push to bring GunBoxLive™ to the world.

This campaign is seeking $100,000—crucial funding that will allow us to:

Complete regulatory certifications
Finalize product design
Gain critical momentum that will allow us to deliver GunBoxLive™ at a reasonable price.
Begin production—GunBoxLive™ cases for guns and SecureBoxLive™ for jewelry, tablets, cameras, wine, and watches – anything that fits!

Storage and operating range for GunBoxLive™ cases and module:

–40°C ~ +85°C


External Dimension (inches) (L*W*D) 18.6 * 16.3 * 8.5
Internal Dimension (L*W*D) 17.3 * 13.6 * 7.5
Type Portable
Waterproof IP67
Weight 4.7


Waterproof, crush-proof and dust-proof
Open cell core with solid wall design -strong, lightweight
3-Fold down handles
Interior Dimensions (inches) (L*W*D): 44.6 * 13.6 * 5.2
Easy open double throw latches
Durable wheels for easy transport
GunBoxLive™ MD3G is
perfect for use with third party and gun manufacturer cases. 







What will happen when GunBoxLive is accessed?
GunBoxLive will alert you or the person you have included in alert instructions that the firearm was accessed.
What happens when the firearm is put back into GunBoxLive?
GunBoxLive will send an alert that the firearm was replaced.
What happens if there is no activity for a long period of time, will the box communicate with me?
Yes, GunBoxLive will periodically send you “I am still alive” and you can review functional reports online for your peace of mind that your firearm is secure.
How long will the battery last?Expected battery life is about 1 year depending on use. The MD3G device will let you know when it needs to be recharged. Charging is simple through the GunBoxLive™ USB interface.
What if my firearm is stolen?
If your firearm is stolen go to www.gunboxlive.com or access your app on your smartphone to log in and click on the stolen gun tab. Input stolen gun serial number and click send. Your stolen firearm will instantly upload on the stolen weapon registry database.
Are there monthly charges for GunBoxLive™ ?
Your first year subscription is included in the purchase price. You will be able to renew your subscription for 1 year at $60, 2 years at $50/yr or 3 years at $40/yr.
Why is GunBoxLive™ Cellular based?
We've been told by firearms owners 1) they need the mobile security and 2) that when the Wi-Fi is down, that is when you need security and information the most. We believe cellular is the most reliable way to give consistent service where it is needed most.
Do I have to provide my gun's serial number?
No, the information you give us is up to you and under your control. Providing the serial number does give you an easy method to add your gun to the stolen gun database if it is stolen, but it is not required.
How do I receive notifications and alerts?
You will receive alerts to the smart phone, computer, or email of your choice. With GunBoxLive™ you can also add additional people to your list to receive notifications.
If you have any further questions, please don't hesitate to contact us.

story:
As featured in the International Digital Times

UPDATE: We've made our fundraising goal!! THANK YOU for all your generous support! We are overwhelmed and encouraged by the response that this project has generated since it began a little over a month ago.

If you are visiting this site for the first time, and would like to know how you can partner with us, we are still accepting contributions until the end of the campaign. You can be assured that any additional funds will only be used towards project related costs. Thanks for your interest!

---


Google Glass has the potential to revolutionize how we interact with technology. One of the most intriguing prospects for its use is with those individuals with disabilities. For the past 15 years my life has revolved around meeting the technology needs of these people. Whether it be through designing and constructing a cellphone mount for a spinal cord injury patient who uses a mouthstick to access it, or to setting up an eyetracking system for a person with ALS, my role is to utilize custom and off-the-shelf solutions to help these people become more independent.

The above promotional video from the official Google Glass Youtube channel shows how this device impacted the life of a young lady with quadriplegia who is attending law school. (Disclaimer: I am in no way affiliated with this person and the Google Glass team). The video gives a brief glimpse of how Google Glass can help a person with a disability achieve greater independence. 

For the past year I have made requests to become a part of the Google Glass Explorer program. A few days ago I was notified that my recent inquiry to join this innovative program has been approved. At this time, I do not have the means to afford a unit, but I do not want this rare opportunity to pass. Thus I will take a leap of faith and order a unit with the hopes of raising the necessary funds to cover the costs. 

In its current iteration, Google Glass may not be the most accessible device due to its limited hands-free capability and user interface. Thus, I will explore what modifications may be needed to be done and begin to develop new applications for it that are specifically catered to the individuals with disabilities that I work with on a daily basis. Any excess funds beyond the purchase price will be solely used for this project.

Thanks for taking the time to read this and for your kind consideration! I appreciate all your support in this endeavor. Together we can make a difference.

Sincerely,
Andy Lin, MS

Technology Specialist


www.linkedin.com/in/andyelin/


--

Here is my friend Erik putting on Glass for the first time. Pictured next to him is Kathleen Shanfield, an occupational therapist who is actively involved in this project as well. Erik is paralyzed from the neck down, so wearable technology could potentially benefit him and other individuals with disabilities. Since he cannot use his hands to manipulate the touchpad, all the functions on Google Glass are not accessible to him. My work will explore ways to modify it to give him complete access to all the features on the device.


--

Here is my friend Robert who is testing out Google Glass for the first time. He was blown away about how unobtrusive it is.

story:
**IMPORTANT**

NOT ONLY DO WE NOT NEED THIS MONEY, WE ENCOURAGE YOU TO NOT DONATE UNLESS YOU ARE SURE! We do not need this money. there is enough money in the kitty to keep us running for months. we have recieved bad press recently for making money from this, what people dont understand is that we have touched none of it. we pay the admins, and run the cost of the server, and the rest goes to a kitty we will use when donations stop! Whether you believe that or not is your choice, but thats what happens :) 

Currently there is enough money in the kitty to last us, if the donations STOP NOW, another: 5 months.

AFTER DONATING, PLEASE LEAVE YOUR INGAME NAME AND PREFERRED GUN IF APPLICABLE IN THE COMMENTS TAB!!! WE CAN NOT PUT GUNS OR ANY OTHER ITEMS IN BACKPACKS!

We have been required to introduce a cost to perk changes for two reasons. one, because it takes a fair amount of time to remake a perk, and two, it is easier for us to keep track of who has what, and the extra need to keep records of how many changes have been made etc.


you can NOT spawn with any of the following:

1. items in BAGS

2. repair equipment (tyres, fuel etc)

3. rpgs, satchel charges, grenades or smoke grenades

4. radio

5. bags any larger than Alice size

6. any form of machine gun


IF YOU DONATE, the procedure for spawning with weapons is as such:

step 1; create a new character

step 2; once logged in, log out within 25 minutes of creating the character, and wait at the lobby for 1 minute

step 3; log back in, once logged in, you will have your weapons and will spawn at your vehicle location (if you have that perk)

step 4; if this does not work, repeat. if it still does not work, contact krauterz or mancow ingame or by email at krauterz@live.com.

step 5; DONATORS CAN NOT CHANGE THEIR PERKS ONCE THE ORIGINAL REQUEST HAS BEEN PROCESSED!

**DONATION PERK RULES**

*1 DO NOT TELL ANYONE THE LOCATION OF VEHICLES!

*2 no deliberate trolling, or exploiting. this includes using vehicles that you have not got the perk access to use

*3 NO SPAWN CAMPING. it is ok to sit in capitals and murder innocents, but give them a change to get out of the city first..

*4 NO WASTING VEHICLES. dont crash one helicopter into 8 others..


*5 TRY NOT TO ADD TOO MANY VEHICLES TO THE GAME! take a chopper to a capital, but HIDE IT WELL. OR imobilize it.

*6 AND FINALLY, DONT DEATHMATCH OR SHOOT OTHERS AT PERK LOCATIONS!!! it takes up to 10 minutes to respawn there each time. please dont do it! DOING IT WILL RESULT IN A ONE DAY BAN, second warning is removal of perks for 2 days, third warning is permenant removal of perks.

*7 WE OFFER FULL REFUNDS FOR DONATIONS FOR ONLY 48 HOURS. AND ONLY IF PLAYER GIVES A RELIABLE REASON FOR THEIR REFUND REQUEST! THIS IS A DONATION SYSTEM! NOT A PAY TO RECEIVE SYSTEM!

**DONATING ACCEPTS THESE RULES. BREAKING RULES MAY RESULT IN SUSPENSION OF PERKS, REMOVAL OF PERKS AND DEPENDING ON THE MAGNITUDE OF THE INCIDENT, BANS MAY BE APPLIED**

Short Summary

ZUST is the most popular Day-Z sanctuary (private hive) server currently running. Funding is running well, the server is stable and we do not need any donations. however, due to popular demand, we will be keeping this donation page up :)

(the reason the perks are not cheaper, is so that not too many people are running around with 50 cals ;)
we just upgraded our server! its now an 8 core with HT (meaning 16 virtual cores!) 8gb of ram and almost 1gbps connection!


What We Need & What You Get
Realisticly, all we need is one months worth of funding, which is $460. ($169 for the server and $300 to hire 3 full time RDC admins) however, the more we collect, the better this server will become. more money means more slots, better uptime and less lag. granted, at the moment we are not looking to expand, but any excess money made gets added to a kitty, which will be used in the event that donations stop :)


QUIRKS INCLUDE WEAPONS AND VEHICLES! depending on how much you donate, we can set you up with weapons, and other items. if you donate a lot, we can even make you spawn at a bunch of Hueys, littlebirds and MI-17's. If we do not reach our goal of $460, no big problem, money will be taken from the kitty to pay for the server until funding is at its target once again.

The Impact
You will be securing ZUST's future in the world of Day-Z. This includes standalone, and many many months, if not years to come.



Other Ways You Can Help
If you cant donate, dont worry, just like us on facebook! and of course feel free to connect to our server to talk directly to an admin!

connect to our TeamSpeak and just talk to us! we like to make new friends :)

If we do not reach our goal of $460, no big problem, money will be taken from the kitty to pay for the server until funding is at its target once again.The ImpactYou will be securing ZUST's future in the world of Day-Z. This includes standalone, and many many months, if not years to come.Other Ways You Can HelpIf you cant donate, dont worry, just like us on facebook! and of course feel free to connect to our server to talk directly to an admin!
