story:
Overview

Do your hands get cramp-y after playing PUBG Mobile or Brawl Stars for long hours? 

Bluetooth controllers not working for you? That cheap grip you bought from Amazon doesn't feel that good after all? 

Do you want to stop losing games and start getting better at gaming?

We've got the perfect mod for you.

The ultimate mobile gaming accessories kit with 5 core essentials, the StygianForce Professionals Kit (SF Pro Kit) is easy to use, makes gaming on your phone crazy comfortable and ultimately helps you play better.

 

So what is the StygianForce Professionals Kit?

The 5 essential products – MobileGrip™, MobileTrigger™, Mobile Care Wipes™, MicroFiber Cloth, and a Leather Carrying Pouch, all serve a unique purpose from gameplay enhancement to device upkeep and even portability.

Ideal for casual or hardcore gamers alike, you can now have the winning edge you have always wanted while gaming on your smartphones.
 

 StygianForce Professionals Kit vs Workarounds / Alternatives


.. and the list can go on, but what makes us different as a brand, is we actually do like gaming. Just like you, we too are gamers with a passion for gaming experiences and therefore, are driven to max out our advantage. 

StygianForce was created so that we can have the best rigs possible and making it accessible to anyone and everyone. 

Now mobile gaming at the pro-level is literally within your grasp. 
 

 

Well, don't just take our word for it. Check out what these YouTubers have to say:
 

 
 

 

 

As Featured In: 

 

Is the StygianForce Professionals Kit really necessary?

 

Of course! Smartphones were not physically designed for gaming and the discomfort from trying to wrestle the phone while gaming is a hindrance to performance. 

Many brands have dictated that a direct port of console controllers is the way to go, but it was not a perfect solution. 

We believe that mobile gaming is not a subset of console gaming and should, in fact, be treated as a genre on its own. As end-consumers ourselves, we wanted a solution that would better serve mobile gamers who experienced these problems on a daily basis. 

As a result, not only did we come up with a better controller alternative, we worked on 4 more solutions to tackle the other problems faced.

We have a philosophy that when it comes to gaming, winning is 60% gear and 40% skill. 

Without the right gear, it's half the battle lost. 

 

1. StygianForce MobileGrip™ 

Multi-Functional, Endless Benefits

Do you suffer from sweaty palms? Prone to slamming your equipment in rage? Want something simple to use?

StygianForce MobileGrip™ is complete with supporting features like our special rubber synthetic coating to curb sweaty palms, the viscoelastic foam that nestles around your phone to provide a cushion for shock absorption, telescopic boom design tailored to a variety of phones sizes and design specific cutouts to enable seamless use of add-ons like charging cable, headphones or MobileTrigger™. 
 


Unrivalled Comfort, 100% Concentration

I know we have said this but smartphones were really not designed for gaming, not until recently. They were made slim and slender to fit seamlessly into our pockets. And it should be, but we want the best of both worlds, practicality and the ability to game on it.
 


StygianForce MobileGrip has an ergonomic silhouette akin to iconic first-rate flagship gaming controllers which improves performance, comfort and maximise hand use. Personalise individual perfection with 3 different interchangeable GripLocks™ to suit different finger sizes and games.
1. Leisure
2. Original
3. Action-Ready 
 

Changing the GripLocks™ is as easy as 1,2 & 3!

 

What is Analog? Imagine Using Less to Benefit More!

Unlike other controllers, StygianForce MobileGrip™ does not face issues like technical failures, compatibility issues or risks of getting banned after being detected for the use of 3rd party software to “cheat” by the games you play. 

This is made possible because it is designed to operate without batteries, zero electronics is involved, and does not require any tampering with game or device software. 

Most importantly, it appeals to users who prefer the authenticity of using the touchscreen for mobile gaming.   
 

Analog VS Digital

 

2. StygianForce MobileTrigger™ 

Look familiar? Or having trouble contorting your fingers this way? Need a hack to aim or shoot better? 

Imagine aiming 50% faster because you are now able to move, aim, scope and shoot all at the same time!   
 


StygianForce MobileTrigger™ is designed to primarily improve on the “Claw Grip” but also acts as an alternative for those who are not able replicate it.

Engineered with features like instantaneous response time (1 ms), anti-slip protection, advanced tactile feedback and ability to game with 4 fingers (or "Claw Grip") instead of being stuck with just 2 thumbs, the MobileTrigger™ makes leaps and bounds to your performance.
 

Gaming Grade: Packs-A-Punch!

To push the boundaries of speed and tactile response, instead of the conventional plastic, casting the triggering points in aluminium has a resulting actuation force of 80g which gives you the highly desirable tactile feedback that you crave when gunning down your enemies. 
 

Aim Faster, Shoot Quicker, Get Better!

The 4mm actuation point is calculated as the most optimal distance for reset and actuation to rack up more triggerfires at an insane speed, maximizing Actions Per Minute ("APM") during fast-paced games. 
 


Easy Quick Setup

 

3. StygianForce Microfiber Cloth 

Have you ever missed that game changing ultimate or missed that quick-scope headshot because your phone screen was too oily and slippery. It is a shame to spend thousands of dollars for the best gaming smartphone for that gaming edge and yet suffer from mistakes like this. 

Device maintenance and proper upkeep is just as important as the gear you need. 


The Best Upkeep for the Best Gears

StygianForce Microfiber Cloth is designed with a superior grade 70% Polyester & 30% Polyamide European hybrid weave of split-microfibers.
 

How do MicroFiber Cloths work?

The Microfiber Cloth is positively charged to absorb and remove negatively charged dust, dirt, liquid stains, grime and most importantly oily fingerprints smudges after each greasy palm sweaty gaming session.

 

4. StygianForce Mobile Care Wipes™ 


 

Did you know that every square inch of your phone, it has around 25,000 germs compared to the toilet seat(if sanitized regularly) which contains around 1,200 germs per square inch. 

Proper phone sanitation is one of the most poorly addressed issues. Even then, what most people do is they ignore it or use improper methods which risk damaging their phones. That is a huge mistake. 

Don't be that person. There is no wrong when investing in quality.


Game Better by Feeling Better

StygianForce Mobile Care Wipes™ is designed to be phone-safe, and is tested clinically safe to be used on your own skin. 

Safely clean and disinfect with our potent antibacterial disinfecting wipes - kills 99.9% of bacteria, viruses and remove any common allergens on your phone screen.
 

Wipes in Wet & Dry

In the SF Pro Kit, there are 10 sets of 2 disposable sachets. Each set of 2 contains 1 Wet Wipe for a disinfecting wash down and 1 Dry Wipe to remove any excess or remaining dirt. 

 

 

5. StygianForce Leather Carrying Pouch 

Bring your gaming accessories out has never been easier. Never worry about loose pieces or not be able to find what you need ever again. 

Compact in size for easy access when you need it on the go makes it ideal to house your StygianForce mobile gaming accessories. It also helps store things like your power bank, earbuds or power brick. 
 

Portable Luxury

StygianForce Leather Carrying Pouch is crafted and pieced together with premium leather to ensure long-lasting strength.

 

Rewards Levels


Add-Ons

 

Timeline

The product you see today is a result of 1 year of market research and product testing as a small brand formally known as MobileGrip. We wanted to make sure that we had a product that would work and fit the requirements of mobile gamers around the world. 

Below, you'll see a brief outline of the journey we're on with StygianForce, starting from the first idea to multiple reiterations for StygianForce, and finally being here on Kickstarter to share this journey with you (and where we will head on from here)!

We want to keep you guys updated so that you can be sure we will continue to work day and night until the very last StygianForce Professionals Kit has been shipped out.

 

Risks and challenges

Despite this being our first time launching on Kickstarter & Indiegogo, the 2 years that led to this  included a year of e-commerce testing. The experience has prepared us for some of the unforeseen challenges we might encounter during the tooling, manufacturing, testing, and certification processes.

While we have been relentlessly concerned with the details throughout designing, prototyping, and planning for production, there is always a chance that things might not go as planned.

In the event of any unscheduled circumstance, whether it's a delay in the manufacturing timeline, shipping date, or something else, we promise to communicate honestly with you and work around the clock until the issue is corrected.
story_txt:
Overview
Do your hands get cramp-y after playing PUBG Mobile or Brawl Stars for long hours? 
Bluetooth controllers not working for you? That cheap grip you bought from Amazon doesn't feel that good after all? 
Do you want to stop losing games and start getting better at gaming?
We've got the perfect mod for you.

The ultimate mobile gaming accessories kit with 5 core essentials, the StygianForce Professionals Kit (SF Pro Kit) is easy to use, makes gaming on your phone crazy comfortable and ultimately helps you play better.
 

So what is the StygianForce Professionals Kit?

The 5 essential products – MobileGrip™, MobileTrigger™, Mobile Care Wipes™, MicroFiber Cloth, and a Leather Carrying Pouch, all serve a unique purpose from gameplay enhancement to device upkeep and even portability.
Ideal for casual or hardcore gamers alike, you can now have the winning edge you have always wanted while gaming on your smartphones. 
 StygianForce Professionals Kit vs Workarounds / Alternatives

.. and the list can go on, but what makes us different as a brand, is we actually do like gaming. Just like you, we too are gamers with a passion for gaming experiences and therefore, are driven to max out our advantage. 
StygianForce was created so that we can have the best rigs possible and making it accessible to anyone and everyone. 
Now mobile gaming at the pro-level is literally within your grasp.  

 
Well, don't just take our word for it. Check out what these YouTubers have to say: 

 

 


 


 
As Featured In: 

 
Is the StygianForce Professionals Kit really necessary?
 
Of course! Smartphones were not physically designed for gaming and the discomfort from trying to wrestle the phone while gaming is a hindrance to performance. Many brands have dictated that a direct port of console controllers is the way to go, but it was not a perfect solution. We believe that mobile gaming is not a subset of console gaming and should, in fact, be treated as a genre on its own. As end-consumers ourselves, we wanted a solution that would better serve mobile gamers who experienced these problems on a daily basis. As a result, not only did we come up with a better controller alternative, we worked on 4 more solutions to tackle the other problems faced.We have a philosophy that when it comes to gaming, winning is 60% gear and 40% skill. Without the right gear, it's half the battle lost.  1. StygianForce MobileGrip™ Multi-Functional, Endless BenefitsDo you suffer from sweaty palms? Prone to slamming your equipment in rage? Want something simple to use?StygianForce MobileGrip™ is complete with supporting features like our special rubber synthetic coating to curb sweaty palms, the viscoelastic foam that nestles around your phone to provide a cushion for shock absorption, telescopic boom design tailored to a variety of phones sizes and design specific cutouts to enable seamless use of add-ons like charging cable, headphones or MobileTrigger™.  Unrivalled Comfort, 100% ConcentrationI know we have said this but smartphones were really not designed for gaming, not until recently. They were made slim and slender to fit seamlessly into our pockets. And it should be, but we want the best of both worlds, practicality and the ability to game on it. StygianForce MobileGrip has an ergonomic silhouette akin to iconic first-rate flagship gaming controllers which improves performance, comfort and maximise hand use. Personalise individual perfection with 3 different interchangeable GripLocks™ to suit different finger sizes and games.1. Leisure2. Original3. Action-Ready  Changing the GripLocks™ is as easy as 1,2 & 3! What is Analog? Imagine Using Less to Benefit More!Unlike other controllers, StygianForce MobileGrip™ does not face issues like technical failures, compatibility issues or risks of getting banned after being detected for the use of 3rd party software to “cheat” by the games you play. This is made possible because it is designed to operate without batteries, zero electronics is involved, and does not require any tampering with game or device software. Most importantly, it appeals to users who prefer the authenticity of using the touchscreen for mobile gaming.    Analog VS Digital 2. StygianForce MobileTrigger™ Look familiar? Or having trouble contorting your fingers this way? Need a hack to aim or shoot better? Imagine aiming 50% faster because you are now able to move, aim, scope and shoot all at the same time!    StygianForce MobileTrigger™ is designed to primarily improve on the “Claw Grip” but also acts as an alternative for those who are not able replicate it.Engineered with features like instantaneous response time (1 ms), anti-slip protection, advanced tactile feedback and ability to game with 4 fingers (or "Claw Grip") instead of being stuck with just 2 thumbs, the MobileTrigger™ makes leaps and bounds to your performance. Gaming Grade: Packs-A-Punch!To push the boundaries of speed and tactile response, instead of the conventional plastic, casting the triggering points in aluminium has a resulting actuation force of 80g which gives you the highly desirable tactile feedback that you crave when gunning down your enemies.  Aim Faster, Shoot Quicker, Get Better!The 4mm actuation point is calculated as the most optimal distance for reset and actuation to rack up more triggerfires at an insane speed, maximizing Actions Per Minute ("APM") during fast-paced games.  Easy Quick Setup 3. StygianForce Microfiber Cloth Have you ever missed that game changing ultimate or missed that quick-scope headshot because your phone screen was too oily and slippery. It is a shame to spend thousands of dollars for the best gaming smartphone for that gaming edge and yet suffer from mistakes like this. Device maintenance and proper upkeep is just as important as the gear you need. The Best Upkeep for the Best GearsStygianForce Microfiber Cloth is designed with a superior grade 70% Polyester & 30% Polyamide European hybrid weave of split-microfibers. How do MicroFiber Cloths work?The Microfiber Cloth is positively charged to absorb and remove negatively charged dust, dirt, liquid stains, grime and most importantly oily fingerprints smudges after each greasy palm sweaty gaming session. 4. StygianForce Mobile Care Wipes™  Did you know that every square inch of your phone, it has around 25,000 germs compared to the toilet seat(if sanitized regularly) which contains around 1,200 germs per square inch. Proper phone sanitation is one of the most poorly addressed issues. Even then, what most people do is they ignore it or use improper methods which risk damaging their phones. That is a huge mistake. Don't be that person. There is no wrong when investing in quality.Game Better by Feeling BetterStygianForce Mobile Care Wipes™ is designed to be phone-safe, and is tested clinically safe to be used on your own skin. Safely clean and disinfect with our potent antibacterial disinfecting wipes - kills 99.9% of bacteria, viruses and remove any common allergens on your phone screen. Wipes in Wet & DryIn the SF Pro Kit, there are 10 sets of 2 disposable sachets. Each set of 2 contains 1 Wet Wipe for a disinfecting wash down and 1 Dry Wipe to remove any excess or remaining dirt.   5. StygianForce Leather Carrying Pouch Bring your gaming accessories out has never been easier. Never worry about loose pieces or not be able to find what you need ever again. Compact in size for easy access when you need it on the go makes it ideal to house your StygianForce mobile gaming accessories. It also helps store things like your power bank, earbuds or power brick.  Portable LuxuryStygianForce Leather Carrying Pouch is crafted and pieced together with premium leather to ensure long-lasting strength. Rewards LevelsAdd-Ons TimelineThe product you see today is a result of 1 year of market research and product testing as a small brand formally known as MobileGrip. We wanted to make sure that we had a product that would work and fit the requirements of mobile gamers around the world. Below, you'll see a brief outline of the journey we're on with StygianForce, starting from the first idea to multiple reiterations for StygianForce, and finally being here on Kickstarter to share this journey with you (and where we will head on from here)!We want to keep you guys updated so that you can be sure we will continue to work day and night until the very last StygianForce Professionals Kit has been shipped out. Risks and challengesDespite this being our first time launching on Kickstarter & Indiegogo, the 2 years that led to this  included a year of e-commerce testing. The experience has prepared us for some of the unforeseen challenges we might encounter during the tooling, manufacturing, testing, and certification processes.While we have been relentlessly concerned with the details throughout designing, prototyping, and planning for production, there is always a chance that things might not go as planned.In the event of any unscheduled circumstance, whether it's a delay in the manufacturing timeline, shipping date, or something else, we promise to communicate honestly with you and work around the clock until the issue is corrected.

story:
LiTeClick is the World's first iOS - Android multi platform Bluetooth-enabled lighting system!




The LiTeClick Lighting Solution works with 500 million compatible iPhones, iPods and iPads AND with almost all 900 million activated Android devices out of the box (not only with the Bluetooth 4.0 compatible ones).

The colours of nature at your fingertips!

LiTeClick – the Bluetooth-enabled colourful lighting system. It allows you not only to turn the lights on and off from the comfort of your couch, but LiTeClick also stays true to its name by being able to brighten up your room in the easiest way possible and in almost any colour that you can find in nature.

We are introducing the LiTeClick Lighting Solution, the LiTeClick LED Bulb and the LiTeClick LED Strip, which can be controlled by almost any smart device you have in your pocket or at home, without a router or any additional devices.

LiTeClick offers the best of both worlds: he LiTeClick Lighting Solution is the world's first Bluetooth-enabled light source that works with Android as well as iOS. Not in the future, not in our plans: it is on right now.

LiTeClick Lighting Solution uses Bluetooth 2.1 AND Bluetooth 4.0 protocols to be able to communicate with Bluetooth LE enabled iOS devices and Bluetooth Classic enabled Android devices. This range, of course, includes almost all devices; not just high-end, expensive smartphones but affordable ones as well.

 LiTeClick Lighting Solution is not a model or a printed prototype. We have the finalised product in our hands, and we are manufacturing LiTeClick Lighting Solution in small quantities.

We are ready to go forward - all we need is the mass production

LiTeClick in action

 First we introduced PuzzLight the LED moodlight for Android devices – now, after 6 month of development and testing, we are finally releasing the LiTeClick lighting system with our first two LiTeClick products suitable for all platforms:

The LiTeClick bulb is made of aircraft grade aluminium and plastic. Inside, there is a Bluetooth 2.1 and a Bluetooth 4.0 module and a high-performance, environmentally friendly hi-end American 12W CREE RGBW LED: red, green, blue and white. This enables the LiTeClick bulb to draw virtually any colour as well as real, bright white light.

LiTeClick Bulb in action



The controller operates the RGB (red, green, blue) LED strip - responsible for lighting - based on data received from a mobile phone via Bluetooth. A total of 16 million (!) colours can be generated by this technology.

The electronic control unit itself and the Bluetooth 2.1 and a Bluetooth 4.0 modules are located in a  CNC machined, anodized aluminium house covered with transparent polycarbonate at the bottom.

The white button on the top of the box functions as a press button, should you wish to control your lamp in offline mode and it also indicates the status of the Bluetooth connection. (blue-red blinking)

The controller has a 12V DC standard input and it is suitable for controlling a maximum of 5m (3x2A) RGB LED strip.

The LiTeClick LED strip is a high efficiency, high power (14.4W/m) RGB colour strip, with a strong adhesive backing mount easily in any area.

LiTeClick LED Strip


Our team has developed the LiTeClick lighting system to enable you to personalise your home lighting in a few short minutes. The bulb or the LED strip makes LiTeClick compatible with most home lighting systems, lamps, etc.

The other significant part of the LiTeClick experience is the App running on your mobile phone. The range of supported devices is, by far, the widest ever seen in the industry.
Supported devices include, but are not limited to, all Android phones and tablets with built-in Bluetooth Classic (2.1); iPhones, iPods and iPads with built-in Bluetooth low Energy (4.0) and more...

The PuzzLight 30 lampshade:

The idea of the lamp's jigsaw puzzle-like pieces was inspired by the IQlight lighting system created by a Danish designer, Holger Strøm, in the 1970s. We further developed a new shape for the puzzle-like pieces in order to achieve better light distribution.

The material of the pieces is polypropylene (white colour) which is very tough yet flexible. It enables you to assemble the pieces into several kinds of shapes and forms such as balls, hearts, doughnuts etc…
30 pieces -  33 cm / 13" diameter.

PuzzLight 30


LiTeClick features – Still more to come!

As the introductory video demonstrates it, the software is the heart and soul of the entire system. Right now there is only one App on its way to Apple App Store and Google Play, but every user is free to create his/her own – we invite developers and enthusiasts to use their imagination and push the limits of the LiTeClick lighting system.

Our Apps allow you to switch the LiTeClick bulb or strip on and off, set its name, set the colour to any colour found on the LiTeClick skin map, and set the RGB (red,green,blue) components individually. Alternatively, you can choose the automatic colour changing mode on the extras panel. In addition, you can also set it to bright white or dim it as you like.

The ongoing software development will be regularly updated and new features implemented. Nonetheless, due to various OS platforms, we need more developers to work with simultaneously.

Your support is, therefore, extremely important to us!

Android app. screenshots

iPhone app. screenshots


What makes the LiTeClick tick?

Naturally eco-friendly

As the LiTeClick lighting system is based on LED light source, its lifespan outshines that of conventional incandescent, fluorescent and halogen light bulbs by years. It also uses far less energy: for example, a 10W LED light bulb is usually equal to a 70-80W incandescent bulb.

What have we achieved so far & why do we need your help?

LiTeClick evolution

Our work is almost done. We have finished the development, and the products are now undergoing real-life, large-scale testing. Currently, there are many bulbs and LED strips handed out to beta testers before the final release.

After we finish the testing phase, we need to start mass production, and we need your backing to do so.

Money talks everywhere, especially in major industries. The more you order, the less you pay for individual products. Gaining significant volume discounts, however, requires an order of a minimum of 1000+ units.

And that is why we need your help.

Back our project with one dollar or a thousand, and be among the first ones to get a LiTeClick product. Check out LiTeClick.com or PuzzLight.com for further information and weekly updates.

Send us your questions or just say hello at info@liteclick.com
or info@puzzlight.com.

Thank you in advance for your support and contribution!

The LiTeClick Team!

The LiTeclick Team:

Marton Zsebok: Marton is our young engineer and he is the one responsible for filling the empty hardware with heart and soul. (HW-SW design)

Krisztian Sulina: Krisztian is our LiTeClick project manager. As the founder of Puzzlight, he is the resident Android guru and hardware developer.

Peter Kozak: With a sharp eye for details and a commitment to excellence Peter is responsible for the overall design, communication and PR.

Peter Kiss: Peter is our iOS enthusiast and developer, he is responsible for LiTeClick's online appearance.

Kornel Halmos: Kornel's 15+ years of experience as the CEO of a software development company makes him the ideal manager of LiTeClick.

Special THX to :

Mihaly Biro (CNC guy)
Ariel Harangi (Szertar kavezo)
and for Friends and Family. :)

story:
Every moment, you carry bulky devices, open, probe, work, retrieve, and bringing you a terrible experience, which severely limits our working efficiency.

As engineers, adventurers, travelers, and technicians, we believe there should be a more practical and smarter handheld device to help us in our work and live.

So, we designed Ulefone Armor 9 - the world's first industrial-grade rugged smartphone.

Just for professionals?

Definitely not! Our mission is to provide convenience for all people's life and work. In addition to powerful industrial applications, the Ulefone Armor 9 is a versatile rugged smartphone that applies to everyone.

FLIR  -  No.1 in Thermal Imaging Field

New generation FLIR thermal imaging camera, your most powerful helper. It will help you no matter in night hunting, outdoor photography, house and auto maintenance, scouting, search & rescue, and etc..

A portable professional endoscope that sees what you can't see. You no longer need to carry bulky devices, it can easily fit into your pocket, plug, and play.

Certified by IP68/IP69K protection grade, waterproof, dustproof, and 1.2m drop proof. More than simply a little splash-proof, you can even use Armor 9 directly underwater, cause it is professional and solid.

Samsung GW1 64MP super camera system makes taking photography much easier from now on. Ultra-high  definition 64MP dual camera is already better than any phone you own.

6.3-inch ultra-large display provides a comfortable visual experience while watching videos, playing games. You'd be surprised how excellent it is after you experienced it.

6600mAh massive battery guarantees you worry-free use. It adopts a high-density battery cell, safe and durable, can work for 2 days and you can enjoy the powerful device to the fullest. 

Support for many countries, regions, and network carriers. Click here to know the supported network carriers.

Support for the following countries: United States, Canada, Spain, France, United Kingdom, Germany, Italy, Switzerland, Sweden, Portugal, Netherlands, Ireland, Denmark, Iceland, Norway, Belgium, Hungary, Finland, Czech Republic, Hungary, Romania, Australia, New Zealand, Japan, South Korea, Singapore, Russia, Ukraine, etc.. For more countries please click here.

With the Armor 9, there's no need to carry any other photographic equipment, so you can easily take photos and videos underwater. Push-button operation is quick and convenient.

The latest Android 10 OS brings the latest interactive experience. More support for Google Pay makes the payment more convenient and secure.

Multifunctional protective case with 2 changeable accessories: a 180° rotatable back clip that can be clipped to the belt for portability and a secure carabiner that can hang on the belt or backpack.

Due to customs policies in different countries/regions, we cannot guarantee the price including taxes. Our product prices do not include VAT or import duties in your country.

Transportation costs have risen significantly during these uncertain times in the world, however, as the global situation improves, we believe these prices should back to normal. Therefore, to minimize the costs for our backers, we will not charge the current higher shipping rates when pledging.

We will try our best to offer you the best shipping price. Purchasing multiple product combos will only be charged once for shipping, so please consider ordering other products as well to help us reduce shipping costs and air miles.

PostNL is currently used by default as a shipping method, If you need a faster shipping method, we will offer DHL as an option. We will confirm it with you and charge you at the same time as we confirm the delivery address.

We are an established mobile phone manufacturer, early we focused on providing ODM, OEM service for other smartphone manufacturers, with rich manufacturing experience. In 2014, we formally established the Ulefone brand, and gradually focus on the field of rugged mobile phones. Since the release of the first generation of Ulefone Armor, we have launched as many as 22 models of rugged phones until May 2020, and have sold more than 5 million smartphones worldwide, accumulating a good reputation in the consumer and tech media.

Thanks to the above enterprises for their support.

If you are a member of the press and need more resources, please download our press kit or reach us at pr@ulefone.com

We've made an FAQ section below, and we'll keep adding new FAQs and updating them via Kickstarter.

1. Back our campaign and leave a comment on our Kickstarter page.

2. Send a direct message to us on Kickstarter.

3. Join our Armor 9 Facebook Group.

Thanks to the above enterprises for their support.

If you are a member of the press and need more resources, please download our press kit or reach us at pr@ulefone.com


We've made an FAQ section below, and we'll keep adding new FAQs and updating them via Kickstarter.

2. Send a direct message to us on Kickstarter.
3. Join our Armor 9 Facebook Group.

story:
Over the past years I have added a wealth of classes, lectures, and workshops by a variety of clairvoyant teachers & directors, thanks to the efforts, and financial support, from Grace, Paul, Pasha, Katherine, and myself. But it costs money to source these rare pieces of history.

Your money will go directly toward upgrading the library. Lectures/classes will be added/prioritized in the order listed below based on donations. The price after each title is the cost necessary to add the title to the library.

The funding for this campaign is "flexible," meaning that the more donations received the more lectures we can get. That's how it works.

While the number of grads who know about the library is limited, it is enough to warrant a collective project like this. All lectures, classes, and workshops will be completely downloadable for you in mp3 format.

Just to be very clear: your donations WILL NOT go toward the psychic newspaper and magazine digitization project. That is an entirely separate project from this one.

Donate to upgrade the Thrive Meditation Library. Everything listed below has not yet been added to the library, but will be soon with your help! story:
This campaign has ended.

Lumenator is available here.

Special thanks to all of our funders! We couldn't do it without you.



Lumenator! The Future of Photo & Video Lighting...NOW

GroundBreaking Feature Set!

  • First Pro Photo & Video Dual Purpose Light
  • Thinnest & Lightest Pro LED Light Available
  • Smoothest most Natural LED Light you've ever seen
  • Patent Pending LEDNatural technology
  • Super Powerful
  • Almost 3000 Lumens for Lumenator & PRO!
  • 3000 Lumens Light Output similar to a 300W bulb

Our least expensive Lumenator. Great for all around photo and video work. Exactly the same as the Lumenator and Lumenator PRO except for the amount of power (1000 Lumens). Recommended for Handheld and On Flash photography. Not recommended for studio applications.


Lumenator is the core of the Lumenator family. This unit has more power than our Lumenator Lite (3000 Lumens). This special IndieGoGo bundle comes with everything you need for Studio, Handheld and On Flash photography and video! It also comes with an an upgraded battery and two free attachments (RingLight and Spotlight). 


Lumenator PRO is ready for just about anything! It comes with 3000 Lumens of power and a 1/8" acrylic tungsten gel to warm up your Lumenator and a cooling gel for cool effects. It also comes with a FREE commemorative edition Lumenator Bounce Card ($30 Value).

Add the attachment Pak to any Lumenator order and get 4 Light Shape Modifiers (RingLight, SpotLight, Super SpotLight and Star) plus 2 Color Correction filters.

FREE Shipping to US!

$25 flat rate for ALL International Orders

Note to International Customers: We will provide you with the correct EU or AU power supply when your order is shipped.

We're making news!

PopPhoto

Zoom

PetaPixel

PhotographyBlog

ThePhoBlographer




 

Diffusers simply diffuse, they can't add any light. But, the Lumenator, well, just watch and see... Flash Diffusers (even ours) just can't hold up in this challenging environment.


 

Thanks for checking out our project! This project has been amazingly fun. Here at ColorRight, we've been making awesome white balance tools and flash diffusers for over 5 years. We've even won awards for our ColorRight PRO line of color balance tools.

But, now we need your continued help to get our newest creation, the Lumenator, off the ground. We have made 3 working prototypes of a revolutionary type of LED lighting for both Photo and Video. The Lumenator dual purpose light is softer (LEDNatural technology), thinner (.5") , lighter (13 ounces) and more flexible (dual purpose) than any conventional LED photo or video light. You can use the Lumenator as a revolutionary continuous cool light source, a photo flash diffuser, as a handheld light source, or as a small and powerful portable studio light.

Most pro LED photo and video lights are harsh and specular, unless diffused to within an inch of their life. Lumenator uses Patent Pending LEDNatural technology to produce the smoothest, most natural LED lighting you have ever seen. The Lumenator side-mounted LED lights are diffused multiple times before they light your subject. You won't get the typical squints, fake grins and hot spots that you get with conventional rear-mounted LED panels. In the case of the Lumenator, soft luscious light does not equal low power. Lumenator uses only high-grade Samsung daylight balanced LED chips rated at over 50 lumens per LED. In fact, Lumenator delivers almost as much power as a 300 watt incandescent bulb. These LED chips also have a high CRI (>=80) providing natural and vivid color rendition.

This is where you come in...

The Lumenator is amazing, but we need your help to raise more capital to get the best pricing and quality. Plus, we plan to  the use additional funds to further the Lumenator line with the Lumenator Lite, Lumenator Warm and more LEDNatural products in the future. We are still a small family run company. We believe the Lumenator is our best product, by far. However, that also means the resources to get this product made are greater than any of our prior products.

Your Impact & Our Future Plans

We think Lumenator is the future of photo & video lighting. By contributing you are making a difference in the lives of photographers and videographers everywhere. The Lumenator project has the potential to totally up-end all our pre-conceived notions about what LED lighting can do, and where it can go. With the success of Lumenator we plan to introduce additional products utilizing our LEDNatural technology.

We believe the Lumenator represents the first product in a true 2nd wave of LED lighting technology. We can't wait to see where you take the Lumenator or what you do with it once you get there.

We can't get there without you. Please help us get the word out, by telling your family and friends and through Facebook, Twitter, Instagram etc. This site has convenient links for most social sites right here on this page.

 

RingLight & Spotlight Adapters

Photos showing a single lumenator handheld just off camera to the left with and without ringlight and spotlight (attachments)



More Images:

Some very basic shots of my son straight out of the camera. Thought they might provide some guidance for what to expect pre post production. Distance was 3.5-4 feet from subject.


More Tech Stuff:

Did you know 3000 lumens is more powerful than all of  these regular LED panels that cost way more.

IceLight ($599 retail / 1,160 lumens)

LitePanels Spot ($598 retail / 160 lux)

Digital Juice ($209 retail / 100W)

These lights also lack our Patent Pending LEDNatural technology for the ultimate in soft, luscious, accurate light.

We are using top of the line Samsung LED chips with accurate color and great color fidelity. 

These conventional LED panels also cannot double as a flash diffuser, they're much larger and heavier.


Thank you so much for supporting the Bright future of Photo and Video Lighting!

Drew and the ColorRight Family

story:
Record every shot perfectly. With a 3-axis gimbal, zoom capability, and action tracking, you’ll be able to capture the action as it happens without missing a stunt.

Klick's 3-axis gimbal gives you professional-quality stabilization. 3-axis doesn't just smooth out basic shakes. You can take consistently steady shots when you're running, skiing, and a part of the action. 
 

Klick has hard buttons and a joystick to make manual shot control easier. It also has a wheel to lock your settings in place.

Outside noise can distract people from really taking in those breathtaking sites you’re witnessing. Klick's has silent motors mean you capture only the sound you want to hear.

Klick's action tracking follows faces and figures. Whether you're in front of the camera or behind it, Klick can automatically keep the subject in focus and in the video.

 

Klick is able to do slow motion and standard timelapses. You will be able to make a day to night transition using our standard time lapse or slow it down a scene to highlight the importance.

 

Rain or shine, you can rely on Klick to shoot videos or take photos. 
 
 

Klick can be attached to any tripod with the universal ¼ “ screw. The bottom of the Klick handle has a tripod mount which allows you to twist it into the tripod.

You can now avoid shaky, unaligned panoramas. By using our joystick found on the handle, you can capture shake-free, neat panoramas.
 

 

We’re continuously improving the app every day to make sure the features you want and need are readily available. Below is a list of all the things you could do with the Klick. Get ready, because your video taking skills are going up to a whole new level.

  • Photos and video shooting resolution adjustment
  • Filters
  • Manual/automatic tilt adjustment
  • Flash, and grid-view options
  • Face-tracking, object tracking
  • Time-lapse photography
  • Front and rear camera switching
  • Camera and video mode switching
  • Burst shooting option
  • View option for taken photos and videos

If you're interested, email us to learn more about the additional features our team is working on to add to the app in the future! 

 

Want to take some action shots on your GoPro? We’ve got you covered. Simply attach the Klick GoPro adapter onto the Klick stabilizer and you’ll be able to take amazing action footage in no time.

Superior Technology was founded in 2009, and for the past 8 years has provided manufacturing and development services to companies like Belkin, Incipio, Otterbox, TechArmor, and more. We specialize in automation, motors, sensors and manufacturing smartphone related products. 

In 2016, we launched our first proprietary product line, the Klick phone gimbal, to help people easily record shake-free, cinema-quality video on their smartphones. This new Klick S2 is the perfect mix of features and affordability to give most consumers amazing video from their phone.

So many Klicks already in the making in our factory's production line - we can't wait to ship them to you soon!

What is your returns & exchanges policy?
If you receive a defective or broken unit, we will resend a unit or process a full refund to you. We will help process exchanges as long as we have inventory–if not, we’ll send you your money back.

When will I receive my product? What if I receive it past the listed date?
We have experience with production runs of up to 5,000 units at a time with other products we’ve made in the past, meaning that we’ll put in the order as soon as we finish the campaign. From that time, it will take 1 month until we can get it across the sea and to your door.

We will honor our timelines and aim to ship to you by the stated delivery date.  We will keep everyone up-to-date on shipping and provide tracking numbers so you're able to monitor your shipment.

What happens if I never receive the product?
We’ve already done a production run of 500 units to test for defect rates (we have photos and videos to prove this). Things are looking great so far. We do not foresee any challenges in scaling up the production quantity. If we aren’t able to ship to you, we’ll refund your money. 

How much is internationally shipping? Am I responsible for taxes and duties in my country?
We will cover the shipping fees for you! Keep in mind that you are responsible for paying your own country’s taxes and duties.


How can I get in touch with your team?
We’d love to hear from you. Email us at klick@klickinnovates.com with your questions and ideas. We’re receiving a lot of emails lately due to our launch, but we’ll get back to you as soon as we possibly can!

story:
Our Bible App 
Believers of All Stripes 

Think of it as a media hub where you will be able to find books, podcasts, bible translations, videos and more--in one spot, like we've never seen before. Our Bible App will be the first media outlet for Christians like you and me, with the biggest progressive audience out there.

It's the place where a transgender teen can find affirming bible texts. It's the place where your church will watch and then chat about a sermon, it's where you'll find new books and organizations that you care about.

It's an app but it's also a movement. It's about ending a stigma against what it means to be a Christian and filling in a pitfall that generations before us have fallen into. We can make that difference for ourselves and for our communities. Please donate today. 

What’s the money for?

  • Authors! We pay our authors and want to encourage all of us to use our life experiences as worship and learning materials. Much of this money goes into supporting the organizations that we all love
  • Making sure the app gets to those who truly need it, like young adults who just need to know which way to turn
  • Coding and building the rest of the app
  • Licensing bibles, books and other media
  • Little elves that edit, run social media, prepare marketing plans and basically create an atmosphere of hope paving a road to years of stable growth and success

When does it launch?

Our Bible App Launches June 30th, 2017. For updates on the launch, join our newsletter at: www.ourbibleapp.com

PRESS

Autostraddle,     TeenVogue,    Essence - June 2017 Issue,     LGBTQ Nation,    PBS

 

    Our Bible App will include:

    • A library of progressive devotionals (pro women, pro LGBTQ, inclusive of other faiths, etc)
    • Ability to chat with the Our Bible App community or just your friends
    • Different bible translations (including translations that have gender neutral names for God)
    • Various progressives authors, podcasts, videos & more.

    Who is involved?

    Along the way Crystal Cheatham has been joined by a team that has taken the vision to a whole new level. Eliel Cruz, Rodney McKenzie, Sophia Olkhova and Oliver Cheatham are breathing life into the gears and cogs of this thing.

    • Eliel is the communications director and has sought early coverage in publications like TeenVogue and LGBTQNation.
    • Rodney shares the dream of diversity and is curating a fantastic devotional library.
    • Sophia could not be a more efficient editor and works with authors to make their submissions shine.
    • Oliver is both Crystal's brother and the marketing genius spreading the word. 

    We are supported by:

    Parity, More Light Presbyterians, Soulforce, Many Voices, Auburn Seminary, Reconciling Works, Lord Have Mercy Podcast, Room For All, Unitarian Universalist Association, #FaithfullyLGBT, Trey Pearson, the Reformation Project, Kevin Garcia, Two Feminists Annotate the Bible, The Christian Closet, Reconciling Ministries, Rachel Held Evans.

story:
Summary

Hi my name is Khurram Raza, I'm the inventor of the iClub Multifunction lug wrench. my idea is currently in utility patent pending status.  and I need to raise money to bring this idea to reality. 

iClub Multifunction Lug Wrench is designed to serve as a variety of tools, including a wrench, socket holder, flashlight, tire thumper, and self-defense tool. 


  • Purpose of the Invention

    iClub Multifunction Lug Wrench is a tool that can be used to efficiently open the lugs of car wheels with less force required by the operator by utilizing a built-in ratchet. This innovative product can also be used to open hard-fastened lugs with the help of a foot support, as well as a flashlight, a tire thumper, and a self-defense tool if stranded on the road in an unfamiliar area late at night. Variously sized sockets and extension pieces can be stored directly in the tool’s body, preventing individuals from having to first locate the sockets in a tool box, garage, or glove compartment. Anyone who drives an automobile will appreciate the convenience afforded by this product.

    Problems Solved by the Invention

    Opening a wheel’s lugs can be difficult for anyone. Individuals can spend a lot of time and exert a lot of energy simply trying to open the wheel, as the wrench has to be removed from the lug after every turn. When trying to do this at night without a flashlight, the wheel nuts might accidently roll away. Also, if alone, individuals may be unable to hold both a wrench and a flashlight. Additionally, if using a wrench, individuals must first search for the proper sockets, which can be scattered about in toolboxes, garages, or glove compartments. An effective solution is necessary.  

  • contributors will help me  achieve funds to get a prototype develop for mass production and for further improvement of the idea. 


What We Need & What You Get

  • Money will go toward continuity of the patent, CAD design and getting a working prototype developed along with enough units to distribute among the people who bought their perks!


    Risks & Challenges

    • I will do my best to develop this product here in the United States of America, doing so will bring jobs back to the people in this tough times.

    Other Ways You Can Help


    • If for any reason you can not help my idea financially you can help me by sharing it to your social network, Facebook, twitter, and to your friends and families. 
    •  you can  use the Indiegogo share tools to do so!

story_txt:
Summary Hi my name is Khurram Raza, I'm the inventor of the iClub Multifunction lug wrench. my idea is currently in utility patent pending status.  and I need to raise money to bring this idea to reality. 
iClub Multifunction Lug Wrench is designed to serve as a variety of tools, including a wrench, socket holder, flashlight, tire thumper, and self-defense tool. 


Purpose of the Invention

iClub Multifunction Lug Wrench is a tool that can be used to efficiently open the lugs of car wheels with less force required by the operator by utilizing a built-in ratchet. This innovative product can also be used to open hard-fastened lugs with the help of a foot support, as well as a flashlight, a tire thumper, and a self-defense tool if stranded on the road in an unfamiliar area late at night. Variously sized sockets and extension pieces can be stored directly in the tool’s body, preventing individuals from having to first locate the sockets in a tool box, garage, or glove compartment. Anyone who drives an automobile will appreciate the convenience afforded by this product.
Problems Solved by the Invention
Opening a wheel’s lugs can be difficult for anyone. Individuals can spend a lot of time and exert a lot of energy simply trying to open the wheel, as the wrench has to be removed from the lug after every turn. When trying to do this at night without a flashlight, the wheel nuts might accidently roll away. Also, if alone, individuals may be unable to hold both a wrench and a flashlight. Additionally, if using a wrench, individuals must first search for the proper sockets, which can be scattered about in toolboxes, garages, or glove compartments. An effective solution is necessary.  
 contributors will help me  achieve funds to get a prototype develop for mass production and for further improvement of the idea.  
   What We Need & What You Get 
Money will go toward continuity of the patent, CAD design and getting a working prototype developed along with enough units to distribute among the people who bought their perks! 
  

  Risks & Challenges 
I will do my best to develop this product here in the United States of America, doing so will bring jobs back to the people in this tough times. 
  Other Ways You Can Help  
If for any reason you can not help my idea financially you can help me by sharing it to your social network, Facebook, twitter, and to your friends and families.   you can  use the Indiegogo share tools to do so!

story:
!!!TODAY!!!

!!! First 10 backers will get a special reward from uni-i team !!!


Always be stay connected with uni-i PowerBank, Tracker and Flash Drive. 

Tiny and mighty device on your key chain. 
Charge your smartphone with the World's Smallest 1000mAh PowerBank, Tracker and 32GB Flash Drive on your keys

Design and innovation of Mac Book Air have inspired us to create uni-i.

Apple keeps on surprising us, reinventing each essential element as part of a singular, deceptively simple design. It is everything there is to love about Mac. 
It's purest form ever.

Every edge, every line and every curve of uni-i, combines maximum performance with an attractive Apple look and feel. It will fit perfectly in your life style.

We have combined three most common needs of our days - in one tiny device. 

Every single detail of uni-i - is an answer to your problem.

7mm thick and only 55g , it is very tiny stylish accessory for an iPhone user.

PowerBank

Have you ever had your phone battery die at the most inconvenient moment?
Have you ever forgotten your charging cable and been stuck with a dead phone?

uni-i is the convenient solution that will always be with you. 
Stylish PowerBank will give your phone at least 60% charge, so you will be able to go online and check Facebook, take and upload new pictures on Instagram, play your favorite game and of course talk to your loved ones! 

                                

uni-i will  give you that emergency boost of charge when you need it the most. 

It is going to keep you connected all the time. Just plug it to your phone and charge on the go while you do your calls, navigate the map, or send a message.

Tracker

Let’s admit it – we misplace our keys all the time. This problem deserves simple yet efficient solution. uni-i will help you find your lost keys in seconds. 

Simply attach uni-i to your keys and find them with our easy-to-use application
uni-i responds to your call through loud sound and light. In your house or in the street, under the sofa cushions or inside a purse, you will not miss it. 
An incorporated LED will let you easily spot it in the dark. 

Flash Drive 

We have used Apple Lightning USB 3.0 Flash Drive, allowing you to transfer data (photos, music, video) between computers and iOS devices (iPhone, iPad & iPod touch) in no time, without the need for iTunes or the Cloud.

uni-i is one of the fastest USB 3.0 flash drive in the market

Transfer files between computers and iOS devices in no time. Expand iPod, iPhone, iPad storage for music, photos, movies & much more!

You can transfer music from computer to any Apple device or playback directly from uni-i.No need for lengthy synchronization or for streaming services.

Free up space on your iPhone by backing up all your photos, videos and files to the high capacity uni-i. No need to pay for recurring online storage subscription.

Stream tons of movies directly from the uni-i to your iPad, anytime and anywhere you want, even on planes. No Internet or wireless network required.


                                      PERKS
                       50% OFF RETAIL PRICE
            BEST OFFER THIS HOLIDAY SEASON!



               Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)  


                                    How does it connect to my Iphone?

uni-i connects to your Iphone via Bluetooth Low Energy and via lightning connector

                                    What is the reach of uni-i Tracker?

You can Track up to 200 feet (60m) in line of sight. This distance can be shorter depending on the environment. 

                           Why uni-i PowerBank has 1000 mAh capacity?

1000 mAh is enough in order to charge Iphone by 60%. At the same time, 1000 mAh is small enough to fit on keychain.

                                    What kind of battery does uni-i use?

uni-i uses a 3.7li ion battery 553450 1000mah battery.

                                           

                    What mobile devices are compatible with the uni-i App?

iOS devices with Bluetooth 4.0 and running 8.0 or above.
uni-i is compatible with iPhone  5, 5S, 5C, 5S, 6, 6+, 6S, 6S+; iPad Mini, iPad 3rd and 4th Gen; iPod Touch 5th Gen

                                           Is the uni-i iPhone App free?

Yes. It's absolutely free and there are no additional charges whatsoever.

                                       What countries will you ship to?

We’ll ship worldwide.

                                         How much does shipping cost?

Shipping is $10 worldwide and on all orders.

                                             When will my order arrive?

Estimated shipping dates for the device is late May. 

                       Can you provide tracking numbers for packages?

Yes, all orders can be tracked. Once an order is shipped, you’ll receive a confirmation email and a tracking number. 

                                    Can I sync and transfer data as well?

Yes, you can. uni-i provides both charging/syncing ability. 

                           What kind of chip do you use for uni-i Tracker?

We use Bluetooth Smart Tracker Solution basic on TI CC2540 chip

                                                             

                                                 How big is uni-i?

uni-i is just 55g and only 7mm thick. Very tiny but mighty device. 

                                      What is uni-i's transfer speed?

USB 3.0 transfer speed: 140MB/s (read), 45MB/s (write)Apple Lightning transfer speed: 30MB/s (read), 20MB/s (write)

If you have any other questions, please do not hesitate to contact us in Comments or via email unibandteam@gmail.com

story:
ITTO is a wearable charging cable that can be worn around the wrist which means you’ll never forget your charging cable. It charges your phone 2x faster than a standard cable and will never get tangled. Because we made your charging cable wearable, it had to look and feel great, so we wrapped ITTO in Italian leather that’s hand stitched to perfection by the finest craftsmen. To make ITTO ultra strong and durable we fused it with webbing polyester, the same material used to make seatbelts, if you still manage to break it ,don’t worry ITTO comes with a 1 year replacement warranty. We wanted to make your charging cable personal and unique,now each backer can have thier name and statement laser engraved on their cable. ITTO is available in 6 different leather colour options, Black,brown,blue,pink,red and yellow. ITTO is LIMITED EDITION only for our indiegogo backers and will never be available for retail or online sale.

 

Each backer can have their name and statement laser engraved on their ITTO Cable. We wanted your cable to be unique and reflect your personality. A customized cable means no 2 cables will be alike ! After you back the project , we will send you a e-mail asking you to upload your name, statement or logo .

 

ITTO cable is wrapped in high quality Italian leather that is handstiched to perfection by the finest craftsmen one cable at a time. There are 6 different leather colour options to choose from -  Black,brown,blue,pink,red and yellow

 

ITTO is compatible with most of the smartphones and devices out there ! ITTO is available in lightening and microusb versions.

 

ITTO is LIMITED EDITION only for our indiegogo backers ! Its LIMITED EDITION laser engraving and glass packaging will never be available for retail or online sale ! 

 

 

 

 

ITTO cable comes in a glass jar that is reusable and recyclable. Since ITTO cable is LIMITED EDITION , each package has a unique number and manufacturing date stamped. 

 

 

 

 

Why don't you have Paypal as a payment option?

In early 2011, the Reserve Bank of India passed a regulation that restricts Indian accounts from receiving funds from accounts outside India. Only Indian accounts can send funds to other Indian accounts via PayPal. We regret the inconvenience caused due to this.

What are the risks and challenges of the ITTO project?

During the past 1 year we have perfected the ITTO Cable, from the design to the prototype. We have teamed up with a factory in Shenzhen China who are ready to make the ITTO cable as per our requirements. The leather will be sourced from Italy and stitched in India. Together with our joint expertise, we are confident that we will be able to ship in time as per schedule with no delays.  

When do we begin shipping?

If we continue to meet our current deadlines, shipping will commence once we have collected the funds from Indiegogo in mid April.  

When can I select the color,choice of cable and let you know what I want to be written on my cable ?

Once the campaign has ended an email survey will be sent out which will allow you to pick the colors that are available,choice of cable i.e lightening or microusb and also your name and statement ( optional ) that you want on your cable

Can the ITTO Cable sync as well as charge?

Yes apart from charging the ITTO Cable allows you to Sync as well as transfer data/files from one device to another

Can I use ITTO Cable as a regular charging cable?

Yes, ITTO Cable can be used as a regular charging cable

Will you be getting MFI?

Our manufacturing partner in china has to apply for a MFI certification for our product. They have made several cables previously which were MFI certified , so getting the certification for ITTO shouldn't be a problem 

How long is ITTO Cable?

It wraps your wrist comfortably. 

How do I contact you?

For any questions please info@ittocable.com

story:
Are you full of crazy and exciting ideas but don’t know how to bring them to life? Maybe you think about 3D printing them, but then you realize that 3D printers cost too much money? Maybe you already have one but it's not working properly (or like they said it would), or you are new to 3D printing and want an easy to use 3D printer?

That's exactly why we created !

We have been active followers of 3D printing in the past few years. After monitoring news, reading comparisons, testing different models, we really couldn't decide which 3D printer could be the most appropriate one to buy for everyday use as well as professionally. So, we developed the  which is the best you can get for your money!

ALUMINIUM FRAME

The aluminium structure ensures that the printer is lightweight but still rock solid, strong and stable.

AUTO LEVELING

Neptune includes a deployable end-stop for platform leveling. Before printing, it automatically measures height at 9 points providing consistent first layer height even on an uneven print platform.

EXTRUDER

The printer is equipped with a “gripPYItruder”, a Bowden style extruder made for 1.75mm filament, ensuring consistent grip with adjustable tension. Ideal even for use with flexible filaments.

HOTEND

A hotend that can reach temperatures of up to 300°C allows you to print a wide range of materials. With the dual head upgrade Neptune can print either two colors or two materials in a single print.

CHANGEABLE NOZZLES

Changeable nozzles from 0.2 mm up to 0.8 mm wide (all included with every Neptune) allow for both high-quality detailed prints and for stronger, less detailed prints at a quicker speed.

LINEAR RAIL MOTION

The linear rail motion system, like those used in high end CNC machines,achieves precise and smooth printing. We use them on all three axes – X,Y,Z.

HEATED BED

Prevent warping with a heated bed that can reach temperatures of up to 120°C. Print onto borosilicate glass ensuring excellent adhesion and easy removal, or select your own alternative adhesion methods.

CURA SOFTWARE

This easy to use, Open Source program was specially modified for Neptune. It comes pre-loaded with the material and speed settings you need to get started.

LCD DISPLAY

The LCD display and simple dial give you full control of the printer without need for a computer. Store and print projects directly from an SD card.

LED LIGHTS

The LED lights allow you to see your whole project clearly, giving you the attention to detail you desire.

With a resolution up to 50 microns (0,05 millimeters) and a speed up to 150 mm/s your prints can be both highly detailed and very fast. You can also speed up your printing process, or make your prints more detailed by changing different nozzles, which come with your printer. Along with stock 0.4 mm, you will get 3 additional nozzles 0.2 mm, 0.6 mm, 0.8 mm, where 0.2 mm supports higher precision at lower speed and vice versa 0.8 mm for lower precision at high speed printing.

You can build projects up to 300x300x300 mm/11.8x11.8x11.8  inches (W×H×D), while the whole printer measures 500x500x500 mm/19.7x19.7x19.7 inches. It is protected by a strong and durable aluminium frame.



Are you young and curious about how 3D printing works and you want to explore more with your mom or dad? Are you a tech expert? Are you a grandparent and want to show off in front of youngsters on how you manage technology and simultaneously build yourself something for your home decoration? Are you a designer or maybe an architect? Are you just an enthusiast who wants to play?



No matter who you are, you can use  in many different ways. Don't worry about the complexity and figuring out how to calibrate your printer. We have been working on making it accessible and user friendly. Just scratch your object or simply download an existing design from over 100 online libraries with millions of designs and ideas. 



It is also the perfect opportunity for business owners and entrepreneurs to create numerous examples/prototypes of your next product/accessory for just a few dollars. It can really be a good investment for your business. For entrepreneurial use, we highly recommend dual head upgrade.


 

 is focused on high quality 3D printing and user friendliness. We want to make sure that everyone who'll get it will have no problems using it. The fully automated system will allow you to just print whatever you want, without worrying about petty and silly processes, like bed leveling and first layer adhesion. Maybe you've wondered why we hadn't put a lot of fancy stuff like touch screens or wireless connectivity. It's because we are focused on extreme reliability, user friendliness and ease of use in our 3D printer, while also looking quite good and at a bargain price. 


 has an open filament system that means you can use nearly every material from any supplier.

PLA, ABS, PET, HIPS, Flex PP, Ninjaflex, Laywood, Laybrick, Nylon, Bamboofill, Bronzefill, ASA, T-Glase, Carbon-fibers enhanced filaments, Polycarbonates and more everyday.

All metal hot end heat up to 300°C.

There are also two fans for active cooling, which mean you can bridge more than 10cm/3.15Inch with no problem.


We have a lot of support from our local partner:


- Leading insurance company in Slovenia



The majority of your contributions will go toward the production of your Neptune (parts and labor costs). We also want to make sure that delivery is on time. Total production will be held in our workshop in Slovenia. Part of the funds will be transferred to advertising and dealing with possible refunds and repairs. While a smaller amount will help us continue our mission to make 3D printing even more accessible, fun and easy.


With your support we'll guarantee you ours! If you have any special requests or  questions, please feel free to send us an email.

 Aljaž Šegula, founder & CEO  (aljaz.segula@pyi3d.com)

 Nandino Žderić, founder (nandino.zderic@pyi3d.com)

With your help we can bring 3D printing to a new level, making it easier and more accessible for children who are still educating and shaping their lives, technology non-geeks, and also grandparents who were not necessarily growing up with technology and have problems using it. You can be part of our mission. Let's get started printing your imagination!

1.  I am a beginner. Is Neptune hard to use?

Absolutely not. It's plug'n print, so you just download a desired object from any online library (Thinkiverse, Pinshape, etc.), put it on SD card and print it. With auto bed levelling (self-calibration) you don't have to have any pre-knowledge about 3D printing. To help you get started, we'll also provide user manual.

2.  Does Neptune comes fully assembled?

Yes. And you'll also receive a gift.

3.  What is an estimated price of shipping?

We are shipping to all corners of the world. Our shipping package weighs about 20kg, so on average it would cost around $60 to ship.

4. Is Neptune based on open source system?

Yes. All the sketches, drawings and .stl files will be available to download from our webpage after the campaign ends. Neptune is based on open source Cura software. If you're a pro, you can modify it comletely to your needs - no laws will be broken!

5. Why should I add the dual extruder head or heat bed upgrade?

Dual Extruder Head Upgrade allows you to print two different colors or materials at once. 

Heat Bed Upgrade allows you to print a wider range of different materials because of better adhesion.

6. What is the retail price?

It's going to be $1399 MSRP.

7.  Why is Neptune so cheap compared to others?

Because it will be built with already established materials and parts, but still very high-quality. Some parts are used from professional CNC (stands for: Computer Numerical Control) machines, for example linear rail motion system, which make it even more reliable and durable.

8.  What are the dimensions of the machine?

19.7”W x 19.7”H x 19.7”D ( 50 x 50 x 50 cm ).

9. I have more questions. Where should I contact the team?

Please send your message to info@pyi3d.com.
story_txt:
Are you full of crazy and exciting ideas but don’t know how to bring them to life? Maybe you think about 3D printing them, but then you realize that 3D printers cost too much money? Maybe you already have one but it's not working properly (or like they said it would), or you are new to 3D printing and want an easy to use 3D printer?
That's exactly why we created !






We have been active followers of 3D printing in the past few years. After monitoring news, reading comparisons, testing different models, we really couldn't decide which 3D printer could be the most appropriate one to buy for everyday use as well as professionally. So, we developed the  which is the best you can get for your money!














ALUMINIUM FRAME
The aluminium structure ensures that the printer is lightweight but still rock solid, strong and stable.



AUTO LEVELING
Neptune includes a deployable end-stop for platform leveling. Before printing, it automatically measures height at 9 points providing consistent first layer height even on an uneven print platform.


EXTRUDER
The printer is equipped with a “gripPYItruder”, a Bowden style extruder made for 1.75mm filament, ensuring consistent grip with adjustable tension. Ideal even for use with flexible filaments.

HOTEND
A hotend that can reach temperatures of up to 300°C allows you to print a wide range of materials. With the dual head upgrade Neptune can print either two colors or two materials in a single print.

CHANGEABLE NOZZLES
Changeable nozzles from 0.2 mm up to 0.8 mm wide (all included with every Neptune) allow for both high-quality detailed prints and for stronger, less detailed prints at a quicker speed.


LINEAR RAIL MOTION
The linear rail motion system, like those used in high end CNC machines,achieves precise and smooth printing. We use them on all three axes – X,Y,Z.

HEATED BED
Prevent warping with a heated bed that can reach temperatures of up to 120°C. Print onto borosilicate glass ensuring excellent adhesion and easy removal, or select your own alternative adhesion methods.

CURA SOFTWARE
This easy to use, Open Source program was specially modified for Neptune. It comes pre-loaded with the material and speed settings you need to get started.


LCD DISPLAY
The LCD display and simple dial give you full control of the printer without need for a computer. Store and print projects directly from an SD card.

LED LIGHTS
The LED lights allow you to see your whole project clearly, giving you the attention to detail you desire.




With a resolution up to 50 microns (0,05 millimeters) and a speed up to 150 mm/s your prints can be both highly detailed and very fast. You can also speed up your printing process, or make your prints more detailed by changing different nozzles, which come with your printer. Along with stock 0.4 mm, you will get 3 additional nozzles 0.2 mm, 0.6 mm, 0.8 mm, where 0.2 mm supports higher precision at lower speed and vice versa 0.8 mm for lower precision at high speed printing.



You can build projects up to 300x300x300 mm/11.8x11.8x11.8  inches (W×H×D), while the whole printer measures 500x500x500 mm/19.7x19.7x19.7 inches. It is protected by a strong and durable aluminium frame.







Are you young and curious about how 3D printing works and you want to explore more with your mom or dad? Are you a tech expert? Are you a grandparent and want to show off in front of youngsters on how you manage technology and simultaneously build yourself something for your home decoration? Are you a designer or maybe an architect? Are you just an enthusiast who wants to play?


No matter who you are, you can use  in many different ways. Don't worry about the complexity and figuring out how to calibrate your printer. We have been working on making it accessible and user friendly. Just scratch your object or simply download an existing design from over 100 online libraries with millions of designs and ideas. 


It is also the perfect opportunity for business owners and entrepreneurs to create numerous examples/prototypes of your next product/accessory for just a few dollars. It can really be a good investment for your business. For entrepreneurial use, we highly recommend dual head upgrade.




 
 is focused on high quality 3D printing and user friendliness. We want to make sure that everyone who'll get it will have no problems using it. The fully automated system will allow you to just print whatever you want, without worrying about petty and silly processes, like bed leveling and first layer adhesion. Maybe you've wondered why we hadn't put a lot of fancy stuff like touch screens or wireless connectivity. It's because we are focused on extreme reliability, user friendliness and ease of use in our 3D printer, while also looking quite good and at a bargain price. 









 has an open filament system that means you can use nearly every material from any supplier.
PLA, ABS, PET, HIPS, Flex PP, Ninjaflex, Laywood, Laybrick, Nylon, Bamboofill, Bronzefill, ASA, T-Glase, Carbon-fibers enhanced filaments, Polycarbonates and more everyday.


All metal hot end heat up to 300°C.


There are also two fans for active cooling, which mean you can bridge more than 10cm/3.15Inch with no problem.







We have a lot of support from our local partner:



- Leading insurance company in Slovenia













The majority of your contributions will go toward the production of your Neptune (parts and labor costs). We also want to make sure that delivery is on time. Total production will be held in our workshop in Slovenia. Part of the funds will be transferred to advertising and dealing with possible refunds and repairs. While a smaller amount will help us continue our mission to make 3D printing even more accessible, fun and easy.



With your support we'll guarantee
you ours! If you have any special requests or  questions, please feel free to send us an email.

 Aljaž Šegula, founder & CEO  (aljaz.segula@pyi3d.com)

 Nandino Žderić, founder (nandino.zderic@pyi3d.com)
With your help we can bring 3D printing to a new level, making it
easier and more accessible for children who are still educating and shaping
their lives, technology non-geeks, and also grandparents who were not necessarily
growing up with technology and have problems using it. You can be part of our
mission. Let's get started printing your imagination!


1.  I am a
beginner. Is Neptune hard to use?
Absolutely
not. It's plug'n print, so you just download a desired object from any online
library (Thinkiverse, Pinshape, etc.), put it on SD card and print it. With
auto bed levelling (self-calibration) you don't have to have any pre-knowledge about 3D printing. To help you get started, we'll also provide user manual.
2.  Does
Neptune comes fully assembled?
Yes. And you'll
also receive a gift.
3.  What is an
estimated price of shipping?
We are shipping to all corners of the world. Our shipping
package weighs about 20kg, so on average it would cost around $60 to ship.

4. Is Neptune based on open source system?
Yes. All the sketches, drawings and .stl files will be available to download from our webpage after the campaign ends. Neptune is based
on open source Cura software. If you're a pro, you can modify it
comletely to your needs - no laws will be broken!

5. Why should I add the dual extruder head or heat bed upgrade?
Dual Extruder Head Upgrade allows you to print two different colors or materials at once. 
Heat Bed Upgrade allows you to print a wider range of different materials because of better adhesion.
6. What is the retail price?
It's going to be $1399 MSRP.
7.  Why is Neptune so cheap compared to
others?
Because it will be built with
already established materials and parts, but still very high-quality. Some parts
are used from professional CNC (stands for: Computer Numerical Control) machines, for example linear rail motion system, which make it even more
reliable and durable.
8.  What are the dimensions of the
machine?
19.7”W x 19.7”H x 19.7”D ( 50 x 50 x 50 cm ).
9. I have more questions. Where should I contact the team?
Please send your message to info@pyi3d.com.
